Summary: This is a great property.  The rooms and public areas are very clean, it was as clean as 5 star hotels I've stayed at.  The breakfast is great and free, no resort fee or parking fee.  The rooms were big which was nice since we have 2 kids and were in town for disneyland. The hotel was very quiet, I'm a very light sleeper and had no problem sleeping. We stayed here twice in the past few months and plan on staying here whenever we come to disneyland.  As someone who has worked in the hotel industry and is very fussy about where we stay, I highly recommend this hotel.  It was spotless and the staff was extremely friendly.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The only time that I am unhappy with Ayers Hotel Orange is if they are sold out when I need a room.  The front desk staff are kind, friendly and eager to welcome and ensure that my stays meet my expectations.  Most important, I always feel safe.  Oh and free parking, free wi-fi, and free breakfast are all extra bonuses!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We‚Äôre very happy with our stay. The hotel is clean and in good repair. Staff is very helpful and accommodating. It‚Äôs about a 20-25 minute shuttle ride from Disneyland, but the shuttle picks up very close to the hotel and runs on time. Breakfast was great; eggs, meat, potatoes, pancakes, yogurt, fruit, toast, and pastries. They do have sample size toiletries, so you may want to bring your own shampoo and conditioner. Overall, we were very happy and would definitely stay there again! Highly recommended!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our family loves this hotel.  The employees are amazing.  They are very helpful.  The rooms are clean and very spacious.  Breakfast is very good with lots of options for every member of the family.  I highly recommend this place.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Ayres Hotel met my husband‚Äôs and my travel needs beautifully. The staff were efficient, kind, and helpful. Our room was quiet, spacious, and thoughtfully designed‚Äî lots of counter space, a large non-slip tub, and both a microwave & a mini-refrigerator. We will definitely stay there again when we return to visit our friends.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I liked the hotel as it was just what you need if you‚Äôre looking for a nice place to cleanup/sleep. The place was clean and the staff was polite. The only thing I didn‚Äôt like was when checking out they added an additional $10 extra for each day I stayed because the rates are rated for 1 person only. So if you have your spouse with you. The FB will add that on after you stay.. yeah.. wasn‚Äôt pleased. Other than that, it was a clean/nice/friendly place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much Steven for your kind review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  For clarification purposes, all hotel rates with the exception of government rates are for 2 adults in the room.  Our government rates are set by the government (state of federal) per diem which is for one person only.  We are happy to extend the government rate to government employees who are not traveling for work but we do charge for the 2nd person.  Again thank you and I glad you enjoyed your stay overall. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: It was nice hotel to stay they Served free breakfast in the morning  Love it the rooms very clean the housekeeper really friendly. The price was reasonable.for the room I got a 2 bed. Hoping 2 go again.
Manager Response: Dear Meli B,   Thank you for your quick and concise review!  We also hope that you are able to stay with us again in the future.  Until then, happy travels!  Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at Ayres Hotel in Orange, CA. The rooms were immaculate and the beds were very comfortable.  The garden tub was definitely a bonus!  A full breakfast was included in my stay.  There is a wide variety of breakfast items that included cold cereal, fruit yogurt, eggs, sausage/bacon, potatoes, pancakes, and three different juice options. It was a feast and very delicious!  I recommend Ayres Hotel to everyone!!!
Manager Response: Thank you Evelyn for your recommendation!  I appreciate your time spent writing a review and are very happy you enjoyed your stay and all the hotel amenities.  My staff and I will look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Hotel is very close to the park. only 5-10 minutes driving. rooms are big and comfortable for a family with great beds. Hotel facilities are well decorated and everything is very clean. breakfast was nice also and the restaurant offers a nice happy hour dinner suitable to families with kids. all in all excellent value for money and for sure one of the best options to those who don't insist on sleeping in the park itself.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We loved our stay at the Ayres Hotel Orange. I couldn't get over the amount of shelf/storage space in the bathroom. When travelling with 2 teenage girls in tow places to put make-up, hair supplies, etc...tend to get scattered all about the room. When we arrived we were pleasantly surprised to see it wouldn't be an issue here. There had also been little cubby shelves in the bathtub/shower; 6 of them!   The cool linens, mattress, and pillows made for a very comfortable sleep. It is across the street from a hospital so you do hear sirens more often but not enough for us to want to leave. There is a small partition in-between the two beds which provides a little bit of privacy. The lighting in the room was plentiful as well.   Breakfast was decent. The eggs tasted powdery but
Manager Response: none

Summary: This property served as accommodations for a large group of families  traveling together for a girls basketball tournament.   I had previously stayed at the Ayres property in Irvine and had a great experience.   This stay was equally impressive.  FIrst of all, Thania, our sales representative, was very easy to work with and very helpful with booking our rooms.    She made sure all our requests were handled quickly and without issue.  The rooms were super clean and well decorated.   I cannot sure but they appeared to be recently renovated as they had very nice finishes and no visible signs of wear or tear.  The included breakfast is definitely a step above your typical mid-priced hotel.    The staff was always friendly and helpful.    The gym was larger than the typical hotel
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everyone was friendly and the breakfast is quite above average.  Nearby to shopping area with Corner Bakery Restaurant and Krispy Kreme.  Rooms are in very very nice condition.   This hotel has a nice Mexican Restaurant within its sister property.  Starbucks also nearby !!

Summary: This review is literally a year late, whoops! My whole family adores this hotel. This was our second time staying here and we brought my grandma and other sister with us as well this time, and they both loved it as much as we did. Such a nice hotel, especially when compared to hotels across from Disneyland that cost the same as this hotel, with none of the amenities. We would much rather drive a tiny bit (like an 8 minute drive to the Disney parking lot)  and stay here. Great filling and varied hot breakfast, amazing beds and bedding, spacious rooms, clean grounds. We stayed for five nights, and again, the best part of our trip after Disney was coming back to our home-tel room every night.  We are headed back to Anaheim in February and will be staying here for the third time. I

Summary: We love this hotel. It has nice comfortable beds  nice front desk, and the manager was very helpful It has a pretty pool and places to hang out outside.  bar and restaurant   breakfast is good, fresh and free.

Summary: I will never stay any where else but this hotel when we go to SoCal.  This hotel was so clean, great breakfast,and amazing customer service. We've stayed at so many hotels in the area and have found our "home" when we visit.  Thanks for a great stay!!!

Summary Heading: The best place to stay in Orange, CA
Summary: Over the past 4 years we have stayed at the Ayres Orange whenever we're in town.  It is consistently outstanding in every way.  Housekeeping, front desk ... all take their jobs seriously.  The complimentary breakfast and free parking are great perks.  Thank you Ayres Employees for making our visits extra special.

Summary: We took the kids to Disneyland, Universal Studios, San Diego Zoo, explored Los Angeles and surrounding beaches. This hotel is in a great location, so close to the main highways, big outlet mall just 5 min walking.Very nice area! Also if you don't have a  car you can get the city bus (shuttle) to Disneyland right at the corner of the hotel. You can buy the shuttle tickets from the guest service in the lobby. The free breakfast was so good!! Many options, fruits, yogurt, pancakes, sausage, bacon, eggs and lots more. We had dinner a few times at the restaurant in the lobby and it was great. Nice service, awesome price and very yummy. Also the rooms were so spacious and had comfy bed and pillows. The room was very well cleaned every day. All the staff were so nice. Pool area always
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everything about this hotel was great.  Front desk staff very friendly and helpful, rooms were excellent and the complimentary breakfast served each day was exceptional.  The location was good too.  I would definitely recommend this place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear KeizerResident,    Thank you very much for your kind review and for letting us know you enjoyed your stay.  Thank you for your recommendation and we hope to see you again in the near future.  Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Stayed one night at the Ayers in Orange. This hotel  smelled fresh and was very clean. Breakfast was very good. It‚Äôs walking distance from UCI Medical Center, Starbucks, Shopping Outlets, and if you don‚Äôt mind walking a few blocks Crystal Cathedral. I was pleasantly surprised and would recommend this location.

Summary Heading: EXCELLENT LOCATION TO UCI ORANGE CAMPUS
Summary: We have stayed at this location once a year for about the past 3 years. Always pleased with the pricing, the rooms and consistent, professionalism of the front desk staff and management.   Only change this time would be the current restaurant Spoons off the lobby. There were two waitresses.  One, not so pleasant or accommodating.  The other, made the experience much better.  With that said, the food was not very good.  The Good News is, there are plenty of excellent restaurants in the area. FOR BREAKFAST, the hotel does provide a good variety of breakfast foods!  Foregoing Spoons, we will continue to stay at this hotel in the future!

Summary: From the very welcoming, knowledgeable, friendly staff to the beautiful room, I had the best stay! The location is great too, easy access to the highways and a great local coffee shop! Breakfast was good, not great but it was fine and free!!

Summary: We have stayed at a lot of hotels all over the country and I would put this hotel in my top 3, maybe even my number 1. All of the staff were courteous. The hotel was clean and modern. We had a room on the first floor and the high ceilings made it seem even more spacious. The rooms were large, clean, and nicely decorated.   Housekeeping went above and beyond. We somehow inadvertently lost our child‚Äôs beloved stuffed animal when it got mixed in with the laundry. I told the front desk about it and it was sitting in the room when we got back.   Breakfast was great, the pancakes, eggs, bacon and sausage were delicious. They also had hash browns, fresh fruit, yogurt, bagels, pastries, muffins, cereal, milk, and juice. I did feel like they need more help in the breakfast area on the
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was super nice! Our room was very clean. The carpet was nearly new. The furniture was nice and we loved the room decor. The room was large and the bed was comfortable.There was plenty of hot water! We enjoyed the complimentary breakfast, especially the pancakes. We had lunch at the restaurant and the food was good and the prices reasonable. The lobby was pretty and there were complimentary homemade cookies. We will stay there again!

Summary: It is always a pleasure staying at this beautiful property. It is beyond beautiful. Staff is great. Breakfast is always delicious and stay stocked. Rooms are spacious and beds are so comfy. Thanks so much!

Summary: Fairly new, super clean, beds are comfy. Wow 4 towels dont have to ask 4 more..good location..Spoons inside but dont open until 3pm.Free Breakfast and Parking big plus! Direct TV..pool not much there..work out room nice...just a very clean property..I'll be back

Summary: The moment I walked in the friendly staff at the hotel made me feel welcome.  The hotel was very clean and the room and bed were incredibly comfortable.  I love hotels that invest in great pillows, and this hotel understands the need for a great night of sleep when being away from home.  I already booked my next stay.  Truly a great experience!
Manager Response: Dear Mark,  My staff and I are very happy to know you have already booked your return stay and that our service, our cleanliness and investment in the hotel made such a great impression on you!  Thank you for your review and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.  Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed 4 nights and it made a great base for Disney and OC beach trip. We had a king size with sofa and they honored our request for a quiet room on a high floor. The room was huge, bathroom as well, great shower, very clean and had zero street noise (hotel is near freeway and medical center w/ helipad).  Bed was comfortable, pillows were a bit flat but we had 4 so we could stack them. No safe in the room which was a little odd. Only letdown was that housekeeping did not come in one day and we had no clean towels ‚Äì that was quite unexpected for a hotel that gets such high ratings for its service. Walls are thin and we could hear the neighbors running their water and also walking sounds above us sounded like a small stampede. Not many children running around and a very
Manager Response: Dear Curioasa, Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel, we always appreciate when our guests write about their stays!  You are correct int hat the hotel does not have safes but we do have safety deposit boxes at the front desk for your next visit.  Thank you for noting our "excellent value as a Disney base," we love our families and seeing their kids first time joy at visiting Disneyland. Safe travels for now! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Had a great stay for 4 nights while at disneyland. Nice and clean facilities and great breakfast every morning. Close to the bus line for pick-up and drop off. Nice restaurant and pool onsite to enjoy.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent choice for the Disneyland experience!
Summary: After a much-longer-than-expected commute from the Las Vegas area, we arrived late at the hotel and were welcomed by a very friendly and supportive staff at the hotel.  Once through the check-in process, we entered our room to see a very large and updated room - clean in every aspect.  The beds were quite nice and quiet from the other rooms.  In fact, I had to blend my son's supplement drinks while we were at the hotel, from an adjacent room - with no one in our original room being able to hear the loud appliance I was using.  The distance from Disney is great, with shuttle services that fully met our needs.  Around the hotel are plenty of food choices, but we opted to utilize Spoon's Bar& Grill which had excellent food for a very reasonable price.  Check out was fast and easy,
Manager Response: Dear Nicole, Thank you very much for your kind review and recommendation of the Ayres Hotel Orange!   Safe Travels! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I used to drive 108 miles one-way to UC Irvine Health in Orange CA for my medical appointments & drive home in the same day.  As my illness has progressed &  abilities have decreased I now stay overnight then return home the next day.  The Ayres Hotel is conveniently located across the intersection from the Hospital & UCI Health.  The hotel staff are wonderful; very helpful, friendly, & professional.  They put me in a handicap accessible room close to the front desk & parking lot.  The room was very clean, spacious, & the temperature control system worked superbly.  The bathroom had lots of room & handrails were everywhere you needed them.  The bed was very comfortable & the felt luxurious. The hotel also has an onsite restaurant so once you're settled in you you don't need to
Manager Response: Dear UCI guest, Thank you for writing your review and letting other potential guests know about the hotel's close connection to UCI.  When guests are having procedures or treatment at UCI or visiting loved ones at UCI, my staff and I know how important it is to provide the quality service and empathy to make sure they all feel that the Ayres Hotel Orange provides a bit of refuge from daily challenges and priorities.  Again thank you! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I stay at this hotel for 5 days approximately 10 times each year when I travel for business. For the price and convenient location, I recommend it.  The room is comfortable, well laid out, and has a small fridge and microwave.  The staff is always very friendly and helpful.  The included breakfast is a full meal and not just a small continental breakfast.  I don't love the onsite restaurant but it is a decent option when you don't feel like going out.  Parking is easy and safe.  Every time I have been there, the hotel seems to be pretty full but it is not loud.  Right now, it is my hotel of choice in Orange.
Manager Response: Thank you FlorFamily for making us your "hotel of choice in Orange!"  It is great when we get to know our regular guests and they become family; we strive to provide the comfort and friendliness from staff so all guests feel like we are their "home away from home." We will look forward to your next visit.  Safe travels until then! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Excellent hotel for a visit to Disneyland. 10 mins from Disney in the car. Huge rooms. Fabulous staff.  Arrived at the hotel early after a forced last minute change of plans.  Corey was so helpful trying to get us a room for an early check in. Congratulations Ayres on your staff. Corey did you proud.  Wouldn't hesitate to recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your "Awesome" review!  And I have shown Cory your review and I am appreciative that you gave me the opportunity to thank him for a job well done.  We hope to see you again on your next trip the Anaheim/Orange area. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Good breakfast, good choices. The coffe could be stronger. Clean but a little dated. Shuttle to Disneyland, very convenient and not expensive. Would stay there again. Friendly staff. The fridge made a lot of noises. It was fixed after the first night.
Manager Response: Dear Emilia, Thank you for your nice review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  I am glad we were able to fix your refrigerator when you let us know of the noise problem.  Too often guests do not report problems and suffer through noise or other challenges.  We love it when guest let us know how we can help make their stays perfect!.  Again, thank you and safe travels. Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great staff, nice room and perfect location
Summary: The Staff were great, the room was perfect and the location was ideal for visiting Disneyland and the shuttle was easy to use for the park. They left us a note with Champagne and chocolate to congratulate us on our honeymoon. I'm allergic to down and when requested they quickly replaced our pillows and comforter. Great hotel, I'd stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear AuDegger, Thank you for taking your time to write such a nice review!  And again, congratulations on your new marriage!  Hope to see you back for your first year Anniversary! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I highly recommend this hotel. We stayed one week to visit family and to enjoy the local sights.  The rooms are very spacious, clean and quiet (ask for the side away from freeways). The maid service at this hotel is just excellent. The ladies cleaning the rooms are very friendly and accommodating to our request for extra towels and facial tissues.  The free breakfast was amazing. The food was fresh and refilled often; we even went down 15 minutes before the end of breakfast, and the staff was still refilling the hot items in the buffet. Coffee had some funny taste to it so we didn't drink it as much.  The hotel had free cookies in the afternoons, which my family appreciated. The free parking is also a huge plus since other hotels charge extra to park your car. Instead of dealing
Manager Response: Dear Grace, WOW, thanks so munch for your comprehensive and wonderful review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  My staff and I really appreciate all your accolades and are thrilled when guests let us know what a wonderful stay they and their families had.  And thanks for the great advice given to future travelers to Disneyland from our Hotel. With appreciation, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I have to say that our first experience with this chain of hotels was remarkable.  Got a great deal on Expedia and even got late check-out (which we unfortunately weren't able to use).  The hotel is clean and room are very spacious.  Our king room and sofa bed could even have accommodated another king bed! We waited for a bit to check in as we were a bit early, but were given a key to access the pool area where we enjoyed sitting on the lovely wicker furniture under the umbrella.  Pool area was a bit small, but worked for a "cool off" dip.  The breakfast was outstanding! This is not the usual continental breakfast.  Thank you Ayres for introducing us to our new favorite CA chain.
Manager Response: WOW, back at you!!!  Thanks so much for your wonderful review and for noting our guest service, amenities and value for the rate you received.  We very much appreciate guests describing their stay and recommending the Ayres Hotel Orange to potential future guests,  Safe travels and again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The rooms were very spacious, clean and modern. My room with a comfortable king bed, had a 2 seater sofa and cofee table,  bedside USB ports and TV with a gooc range of TV channels. Location was s 15 min walk from the Outlet Mall at Orange snd $6usx by uber. On meals, the Spoons Restraunt$$ at the hotel,  served awesome Tequila chicken penne! At the Outlet mall, the Corner Bakery$ served very wholesome meals at an afordabke price. Book early for awesome deals on the hotel price.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your great review of your stay at the Ayres Hotel Orange!  We hope to be able to welcome you back in the near future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Id like to say that this was a fairly pleasant experience. My wife and I were set to be married on July 6th. I made arrangements with the hotel to have a room ready for her and her 6 bridesmaids to get ready the day of. The only problem was I provided the staff with a credit card and my wife called me when they showed up at the hotel that they couldnt let her into the room until they had my credit card personally. I wasnt happy and made my way over to the hotel. Needless to say I wasnt happy having to do this in person 2 hours before the wedding, but Josh the manager made everything right with a room discount and a bottle of champagne and some chocolates for the inconvenience. The only other distraction was in room 431 we could her something that sounded like a helicopter
Manager Response: Dear Torrance Tom, Thank you for your review, your noting of our error and how the hotel tried to remedy our error.  My staff should have explained to you at the time you made the reservation, that whoever was checking into the room had to present a credit card to secure the room before entry.  Had we explained the policy to you, you having to come to the hotel on your wedding day would not have happened.  I appreciate you mentioning Joshua extending champagne and chocolates as a means of a goodwill gesture and I also appreciated your king email response when I offered a complimentary room night in the future.  My staff and I wish you the best on your marriage and are glad we were able to turn a negative experience into a positive one. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The hotel in general it‚Äôs good. The rooms are nice, breakfast is good (I only wish they had a little more variety) but other than that the food was great, the staff was really kind. Just few steps from the shuttle bus to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review pautgzz!  We appreciate each and every one of guest's comments, suggestions and feedback.  We do hope to be able to welcome you back to the hotel in the near future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We absolutely loved our stay. Service was excellent. Staff was always super friendly and helpful. Breakfast was delicious. Off the highway;gave us millions things to do. Close to Disneyland, Convenient stores, Outlets, Restaurants. Which by the way we never got a chance to dine or order from Spoons. No doubt it would of been delicious aswell. Overall would definitely recommend and will plan my next stay at Ayers  Hotel. Happy Husband and kids. Vacation success. Book it.

My staff and I always appreciate feedback from our guests and in your case it looks like our high level of guest service and amenities exceeded your expectations.  Safe travels for now! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I came to Orange County to attend a wedding.  This is the first time I have stayed at an Ayres Hotel and I was very pleased.  The outlets and shops were only two blocks away and an easy walk.  Breakfast room clean and bright, food fresh and tasty.  My room was quiet and spacious. Loved my stay and will definitely return. Thank you.
Manager Response: Dear RoundtheWorld2025, I am so happy to hear you had a "wonderful stay" with us!  Thank you for your kind review, my staff and I do hope you are able to stay with us again in the future, perhaps for a trip to Disneyland. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I'd never stayed at an Ayres property before and overall I was pleased. I came to town for an Angel's game. The hotel is a 15 minute walk to the park. The OC outlet mall is also about a 15 minute walk. There's plenty of restaurants and a small cafe in the hotel that serves dinner. The breakfast buffet was good. The staff was exemplary.  So why "almost"; I had some noise issues.  If you stay get a room on the opposite side of the main street. Also I kept hearing a mechanical rattling noise my second night. Perhaps the AC in the unit above mine was the source. Of course I never leave home without my earplugs!  Overall I still recommend this property.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your "almost perfect" review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I appreciate you letting us know that you had a problem with noise, I am so sorry.   My maintenance department is checking all rooms as we are in the middle of a busy summer and want all our guests to have a restful nights sleep.   Take care for now and thank you for recommending us to future guests. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I arrived before my room was ready and was given the option by Alexander at the front desk (who was fantastic) to wait for my super fancy corner king suite, or take another room and check in immediately. First of all, it was very nice of them to offer another room, and secondly, I'm happy I waited for my super fancy corner king suite, because it was an AMAZING room. The room was huge, had a enormous garden bathtub, an incredibly comfortable bed, a writing desk, a couch, a coffee table, a mini fridge and a microwave, and everything was impeccably clean. I wanted to take the who room with me when I left. I swear, that room was bigger than my apartment. Also, the exercise room, the pool, the hot tub, the patio, and the restaurant were great. All the staff were wonderful. If I ever
Manager Response: none

Summary: Rooms are spacious and quiet. Easy access to freeways and close to shopping. No charge for breakfast or parking. Breakfast room cheery and they have a choice of hot and cold items and is a small restaurant at night.
Manager Response: none

Summary: What a lovely hotel. From check-in to check-out everything was great. The lobby is comfortable and front desk staff is helpful and friendly. Our room was beautiful and clean and there was plenty of conveniences like an empty refrigerator, microwave, lots of counter space, and a beautiful bathroom (including a large tub).  The complimentary breakfast in the morning was exceptional. Everyone enjoyed. Thanks for a wonderful stay. We'll definitely be back if we are in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you Sara for taking your time to write such a great review of the hotel.  My staff and I appreciate your comments and am happy to know we will be able to welcome you back on y our next trip to our area! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: A nice quiet spacious hotel. A great location for Disneyland visitors.There is a frequent shuttle bus to Disneyland and plenty of eat options nearby. The mall is a 5 minute walk and the parking spaces are at the front of the hotel. It was a very comfortable stay for us,
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Mom & daughter trip was perfect at Ayers!!!
Summary: We were in SoCal for the BTS concert at the Rose Bowl but we still wanted to stay in the OC area so we could make time for Downtown Disney & to check out some areas we haven't been to in OC (we love Orange County!!!).  So I split the trip in 2 with 2 nights at Ayers Hotel in Orange & 2 nights in Glendale.  I do all my research on TripAdvisor & found very good ratings here.  I also found a really good deal on Expedia.  I'm so glad we stayed here.  It was such a bummer that we only had 2 nights but we enjoyed every second of it.    I always book hotels with free parking, free breakfast, & clean rooms.  Ayers Hotel Orange had it all!  We took the ART to Downtown Disney since we had free hotel parking & didn't want to pay for parking at Disney.  The ART pick up/drop off is next door
Manager Response: Thank you Mom and Daughters! Wow, I really appreciate the personal time you took to write such a warm and genuine review!  Thank you for listing our complimentary amenities, mentioning the ART shuttle to Disneyland, our great location and your overall happiness to staying at the Ayres Hotel Orange.  We hope we can welcome you back over Christmas one year so that your daughters can experience a roaring fire next to our beautifully decorated Christmas tree.  Until then, safe travels! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: First time using the Ayres brand and I was very impressed. Really spacious rooms, extremely clean and friendly staff. Free parking outside and free wifi. Breakfast was open from 0630am and plenty of choices to fill you up. Saw quite a few families staying there. Had the ground flloor end room towards ALO and heard a little bit of traffic noise but nothing enough to annoy us. Didnt hear any other guests at all. Very comfortable bed and close to lots of restaurants, outlet mall and Anaheim stadium. Easy access on/off freeway. Happy hour and dinner pricing was really good at their restaurant.  Only stayed overnight but would use again for a longer stay if in the area as the extra space provided and comfort was fantastic.
Manager Response: Wow what an "excellent" review!!  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your comments and for letting us know how much you enjoyed your stay.  We do hope you are able to come back in the future for a longer stay and until then, safe travels. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We loved this hotel.  Rooms were very large, with a great little kitchen counter area. Large bathrooms..everything was very clean and new.  Great pool/hottub.  We also really liked the breakfast area and was a great area to hang out for happy hour or to catch a bite to eat.   Staff extremely friendly and helpful!  Will stay again!
Manager Response: Dear cnlenard, Thank you for your "perfect" review and your appreciation of the hotel and all the amenities we offer!  I was happy to hear that you enjoyed our in-house evening restaurant Spoons; we appreciate the great partnership the hotel has formed with Spoons and how they are so good at taking care of our guests.  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to our area! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: There is so much to say about this hotel I have stayed in many places and the Ayres hotels are by far the best from the amenities to locations the rooms are always amazing , the beds are so comfortable and the staff are above and beyond the best and friendliest. I would always recommend this hotel to all my friends and family.
Manager Response: Thank you very much drumlinetraveler for your "fantastic" review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  I am so glad you enjoyed and stay and I thank you for recommending us to your friends and family.  Safe travels! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great location. Close 3 freeways. Easy access in and out of the parking lot.
Summary: Easy check in. All the front desk personnel were very helpful, but for us, Christopher went above and beyond the call of duty, when assisting us, while making our reservation.  Very clean rooms and bathrooms. We will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your kind review, and am so glad you enjoyed your stay, the hotel and the staff.  i have passed your "shout out" to Christopher and he thanks you for acknowledging his guest service skills.  So happy to hear that you will be back in the future, until then safe travels! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I stayed at this hotel after a five week holiday travelling America! I would definitely stay here again. The rooms are huge and super clean! We arrived at the hotel at 10:30 and were able to check in early! The staff were so helpful and friendlyüòÄ. Very comfortable beds and the breakfast was great. We also loved the happy hour!  Thank you Ayres hotel for a great stay.
Manager Response: Dear DebbieB440,  You are very welcome!!  And thank you for your wonderful review, my staff and I appreciate your kind words and hope that we can welcome you back to the Ayres Hotel Orange one day in the future. Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Ayers Orange is highly recommended. Clean, organized, very good customer service, nice restaurant/lounge/lobby with fireplace. Easy 20 minute walk (north a bit, turn right) Angel Stadium right there, safe neighborhood. Park for free at Ayers Orange hotel (stadium parking is $10), walk to the game, stop at a brew pub on the way, drink all you want, you're not driving. Drink more at the game, drink more after the game at area pubs/restaurants, walk back to Ayers Orange. There is Ayers Anaheim hotel that is a little closer to the stadium, but parking is $10 there.
Manager Response: Thank you JohnnyJrNY!  Great tip to all our guests going to an Angels Ball game, WALK, DON"T DRIVE!  I am so glad you enjoyed the hotel and the close proximity to Angels Stadium and the near by brew pubs.  Thank you for recommending the hotel to possible future guests and we hope to see you soon for another stay and another game!  Sincerely,    Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The customer service staff are very friendly and helpful! My room was very nice and clean and was cleaned everyday! The hotel has great services such as a gym, pool, and restaurant! There are restaurants and shopping center within 5-10 minute walking distance!
Manager Response: Thank you!  Thank you!  My staff and I really appreciate you taking the time to write such a nice review about the Ayres Hotel Orange.  We are so happy the you had a "great stay" and hope to see you again in the near future!  Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: one of the best stays ever
Summary: I travel a lot for business, and even though this was for personal reasons it was one of the nicest hotels.  The staff are all amazing, they are very accommodating and one day was better than the next.  Thank you and I look forward to every visit to southern CA to be at one of your hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you Barry for your wonderful review!!  We appreciate your kind comments and are happy to hear you will seek out Ayres Hotels when visiting Southern California in the future.    Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I have stayed in a few different hotels near Anaheim on my trips to Disneyland these last few years, and though the other hotels I have stayed in were nice, the Ayres Hotel Orange has got to be my favorite!  Their prices are amazingly reasonable, the rooms are huge (as are the bathrooms), you don't hear the traffic outside the hotel, there is plenty of free parking, they offer free breakfast (which was quite good and included a nice variety of options), and the staff was very friendly.  I really can't think of a single complaint (and we stayed there for a week and a half).  I highly recommend this hotel, it will save you a bundle compared to most of the other local options and it's only about a 10 minute drive to Disneyland-which in my opinion is totally worth the savings,
Manager Response: Daniel, Thank you for naming the Ayres Hotel Orange your "favorite hotel near Disneyland"; we appreciate the accolades!  and yes I have to agree that our rooms are quiet, our free breakfast offers more options that most other hotels and we priced well considering all the amenities and freebies we offer.  Take care for now and we will look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Disneyland. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Stayed here twice and the hotel always exceeds my expectations. Friendly staff, spacious clean rooms. The hotel is in immaculate condition and is always well maintained in the rooms and common areas. Will always seek them out when traveling.
Manager Response: John, Thank you for letting us know we have exceeded your expectations and than you will seek out Ayres Hotels when travelling.  We appreciate your business! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: MY MOST FAVORITE HOTEL IN ORANGE COUNTY! recommended by a TripAdvisor agent
Summary: For over 2 decades now, every year for the annual conferences at #ChapmanUniversity , we stay at this Ayres Hotel , even before the New Facility was built and the older one name changed to #theAlohotel. In addition, my children would stay here for their Disneyland trips as well. The shuttles are so convenient too. Christine Smith , the GM and her staff is excellent in all aspects. The rooms are super clean and the breakfast delicious... It sure adds more fun and satisfaction as we receive the tremendous blessings from GOD for learn more about Him at the conferences! THANK YOU CHRISTINE AND STAFF!
Manager Response: Tweetie, Thank you so much for naming us your "favorite hotel in Orange County"!  I am so blessed to have gotten to know you and your family over the 15 years and appreciate your patronage of both the ALO Hotel and the Ayres Hotel Orange.  My staff and I appreciate your kind review and look forward to welcoming you back for your next conference at Chapman University!  Take care for now! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Clean and newer. Had a big tub which was super nice. Comfortable beds. Small pool. Cookies at night, fruit during the day. They used to have a happy hour but no longer offer it since adding a restaurant. Also they told us at the shuttle was over at ALO Hotel and we waited in line to find the shuttle came on the street instead of the hotel drop off / pick up like it used to. It would have been nice to have been told exactly where it was located because we missed our shuttle and had to wait a half-hour. Breakfast is good with fresh fruit daily but they could use a bit more of an assortment. The only thing they change day daily is the meat from sausage to bacon. It would be nice if they provided more fruit and some other healthy options. We were right above the new restaurant and
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your comprehensive review of the Ayres Hotel Orange, I appreciate the detail and especially the suggestions.  I can't respond to each suggestion but please know that we are taking them all to heart and will work of those that are feasible for the hotel to act upon.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we do hope to see you again on your next trip to Disneyland. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed with our 2 kids and the staff helped us out with watever we needed to accomodate them and to keep us all comfortable.   Great breakfast with many options. Close to many good shops and outlet mall
Manager Response: Dear Erumsalman,  Thank you for such a great review.  I am pleased that you and your family enjoyed the hotel and we were able to meet all your expectations.  The hotel continues of offer complimentary parking, full breakfast and WiFi and are always happy to hear when guests appreciate our amenities.  We do hope to see you on your next trip to the Orange/Anaheim area.  Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay and Excellent staff
Summary: I stay at this hotel on a regular basis.  Because of the staff accomodating around for me many times on schedule changes, the rooms are well taken care of and up to date.  The Breakfast is always fresh.  And lets not forget the cookies every night i'm there.  Highly recommend this Hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you Evelyn for your recommendation to other potential future guests, we appreciate it immensely.  And especially thank you for being a "regular" guest, we appreciate your loyalty.  Safe travels until your next visit. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We have stayed here 5 or times and we love it.  Very clean rooms, excellent customer service and close to the 5, 22 and 57 freeways.  Whenever we come to the O.C. this is where we stay.  Excellent staff!
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you!!!!! We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Employees extremely helpful and friendly.  Room spacious and clean.  Beds comfortable. Complimentary breakfast was excellent. Easy to walk to shopping mall. A short drive or walk to the ballpark.   We would not hesitate to return. A wonderful stay!! Highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Betty, Thank you for your "wonderful" review!  And thank you for your recommendation!  It is the kind words from guests such as yourself that bring pride to myself and my staff; knowing that we are doing a good job and reaching our goals of quality product and great guest service. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Stayed here 1 night while visiting colleges with my son. I chose the hotel because of its location, free parking, and free breakfast. It exceeded expectations.  The hotel feels brand new. Very clean and modern. It has a warm atmosphere throughout. The rooms are huge and so well-planned... not only did they contain everything we needed, but they offered so much more. They have lots of storage space. Nice coffee & tea selection in room. Plenty of outlets. Free wi-fi. Very comfortable and well done.  I also like how quiet the hotel was. I never heard anyone in the halls, TVs next door--nothing.   Free breakfast was standard fare, but nice.Breads, cereals, fruit, eggs, sausage, pancakes... Plenty of choices.  And every single employee we interacted with was so friendly. It just
Manager Response: Dear ellenmac, Thank you for you great review and I do hope your son chooses a college nearby so we can be your "go-to" hotel for the next four years.  We appreciate your detailed comments and recommendation!  And should your son happen to choose Chapman University we do offer a special rate for parents and families of Chapman students. Take care, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: A+ Our second stay at this Ayres location, with plans for the future.  The rooms are very clean.   Location cannot be beat for proximity to Disneyland, outlet stores, the freeway, etc.  Complimentary parking, breakfast and WiFi are welcome bonuses.  Stress-free...wish they had locations everywhere we need accommodation.  Thank you for another pleasant experience.
Manager Response: You are very welcome!  I so glad you discovered Ayres Hotels and happy to hear you will look to stay at Ayres when travelling.  In addition to our current hotels in Southern California and the Central Coast we are opening a new hotel in Chula Vista in the next couple of weeks and have new hotels under construction in Vista and Rialto, CA.. Thank you for you review and happy travel! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We had a fabulous stay at Ayres Orange!  Location was fantastic! (Near freeway, walked to Angels game, took shuttle to Disneyland). Breakfast was great- eggs, bacon/sausage, pancakes...made on sight. Room was very spacious for our family of four. Elevator was speedy. Staff was friendly and helpful. Would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room is super clean, bed is very comfortable, free hot breakfast is good, free parking, convenient location, everything we need and exceed my expectation for a reasonable price. Will stay again next time.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Loved this place! It was beautiful and very comfortable. Employees went out of their way to make us comfortable. I highly recommend  this place. Great for family or single travel. Perfect location. Couldnt hear sounds from the freeway.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Big, beautiful, clean room. Thick doors and walls. So quiet. Could not hear a sound and we were right above the restaurant and front desk. This is going to be our go to when visiting our son at Chapman University.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Relaxing stay after park attraction visit
Summary: Our visit was very pleasant, I asked for a few things to the front desk and they were very accessible in having them in my room long before checking in. The service was very good, the food on the restaurant was very tasty, the attention of the staff was exceptional. It is a really good place to stay. The morning buffet was.... yummy and had several thing to choose from. I will recommend them for a family or business stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: One of my favorite hotels near Disneyland
Summary: Located only a couple exits from Disneyland, the Ayres Orange is a great option for those visiting Disneyland and/or the Anaheim area.  The hotel and rooms are very nice and upscale.  Free breakfast is a plus.  The quality of the free breakfast was very good too!  Parking is free and prices for the hotel stay is reasonable.  I've stayed here a few times and have always been happy with our stay.  The only reason why we don't stay here more often when we visit Disneyland is because we prefer to stay close to the park and walk.
Manager Response: Thank you Z2G35 for taking your time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange.  We will forgive you for splitting your loyalty between Harbor Blvd hotels and us, as long as you continue to come back when you need the extra quiet stay.  And thank yo for mentioning our breakfast and beautiful rooms.  We hope to welcome you back soon and until then, safe travels!!  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice room and hotel but very noisy.
Summary: The room has decent and more that large enough for 2 adults and 2 children.  The breakfest was OK.   My only real compliant is that our room was exteremly noisey.  Since the hotel is next to the highway, there is a lot of road noise (cars racing, fire trucks, etc), but also inside the room.   I woke up in the middle of the night because our fan was so loud that I though the alarm in the neihboring room was going off, so I turned it off.
Manager Response: Dear 706kurts, I am so sorry that you bothered by the noise and especially the fan noise.  I do hope you reported it to the front desk so that our maintenance staff could take care of the problem.  Should you like to try the hotel again please contact me directly as I would be happy to ensure you have a quiet room and extend a great rate.  Again, thank you for your review. Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay a few miles from Disneyland.
Summary: We stayed at the Ayres Orange for 4 nights. The service was fantastic, they went the extra mile to make sure we had everything we needed to make it a comfortable stay. I will stay there again next time I visit the area.  Thanks for the great stay Ayres Orange!
Manager Response: You are so welcome Trayvaler!!  Thank you for your wonderful review and noting our "fantastic service."  My staff and I appreciate your taking the time to write a review.  And we will be here to welcome you back on your next visit to our area.  Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I can‚Äôt say enough about how wonderful the Ayers hotel in Orange CA is. My husband needed to be at UCI Medical Ctr for an early morning appt. So we decided to book a room at a hotel nearby. I tried to book online but it showed no rooms available. So I called the hotel directly and spoke with Rihanna. She was so sweet and helpful. There was one room available and she would book it. I told her that it was only needed for one night as we had to be at UCI Medical Center in the early a.m.  She then informed me we would be given a UCI patient discount. Wow!! That just made our day as the original $$ was somewhat over our budget. When we checked in Oh My Gosh!  The facility is absolutely beautiful!  The lobby is huge and elegantly decorated. Staff were so friendly and helpful. Our room
Manager Response: Thank you XM4051!!  We so much appreciate your "5 Star" review and are pleased that we and the hotel exceeded you and your husband's expectations.  I hope that you can join us again in the future for a leisure trip, we will have those chocolate chip cookies waiting for your return.  Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I stayed at Ayres for 3 nights during a business trip and was pleasantly surprised! The staff were very sweet and helpful. I believe one of the managers was actually the one shuttling me to and from my work conferences!  The rooms were VERY clean and inviting and offered all amenities I needed. The bathtub was HUGE and I needed that after my long training days! I especially loved the amount of space in the closets and the private little patio outside my room. Even though Disney is right down the street, it was quiet and secluded outside at my table. The hotel restaurant, Spoons, was also incredible! Complimentary HOT breakfast, lobby cookies, fruit, and fruit infused water were also very nice. It's very obvious why my company books with this hotel, but even if they didn't, I
Manager Response: Thank you Sara! And Yes, Cory who drove you to your training each morning is the Assistant General Manager for the Ayres Hotel Orange.  We all pitch in to accommodate all our guest's individual needs and were happy to do so in your case.   Thank you for your wonderful review, we so glad you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you back should you have another conference int he area!  Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Amazing, clean, room is huge and the restroom is decent, not too crowded, parking is decent, food is amazing and very accessible to Disneyland,now we have a home/hotel in Orange County. Thanks Ayers Hotel. -RV
Manager Response: You are very welcome RV!  And we are so happy to hear that we are now your "home/hotel."  Safe travels until your next visit, we will look forward to welcoming yo back. Sincerely, Christine Smith  General Manager

Summary: Loved everything. Quiet clean fresh and new. Great shower head. Comfortable beds yummy cookies.   Nice staff.   No complaints  Breakfast had eggs bacon or sausage potatoes and pancakes.   Hot and fresh  Would stay here again
Manager Response: Dear Storyteller, Thank you for your review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  We appreciate your detailing of our great amenities and benefits of staying with us and we do hope to welcome you back one day in the near future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: They didn't even know what they did for us
Summary: I flew out to attend my mother's funeral. Her house was full of my sister and her kids, so my husband, son and I stayed at Ayres in Orange. They were fully booked, so when my teenage son said he didn't sleep well on the pull out after our first night, I asked if we could get a room with 2 Queens. I also asked for a room on the other side of the building so that the morning sun was on the other side. I never told them why we were in town. I just asked. At first they said they couldn't because they were fully booked, but they said they would try. I get a call a few hours later saying that they asked another couple if they would be willing to switch rooms for us and they agreed! We all got a good night's sleep after that, which we all desperately needed. (For those who want to
Manager Response: Thank you Shannon!  Often my staff and I do not know why guests chose to stay with us and we don't assume that everyone is here for Disneyland.  We just work hard to make each every guest's stay as comfortable as possible and strive to meet their individual needs.  Thank you for letting us know that we helped to provide a bit of a sanctuary for you, your husband and son during a difficult time.  My condolences to you and your family.  Take care,  Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Great hotel! Clean, up to date, tons of storage, huge bathtub, good breakfast, great location, clean pool and hot tub, convenient parking, good housekeeping every day, friendly staff. Loved this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This is a nice hotel for business at the convention center.  The room was clean, comfortable, and the bed cozy.  I like the high ceilings. It's a ways from the convention center but a short ride by taxi or ride share.  Some good restaurants close by to walk at The Outlets at Orange. Breakfast was standard but plenty to have. The cookies and oranges in the lobby are a nice touch for an arrival or late night snack.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a great comfortable stay with yummy chocolate chip cookies.The front staff was Was professional and kind.We were here for a medical stay @ uci Douglas. Thanks so much for all your compassion.It meant so much to our family.
Manager Response: Dear Tracy4children, Thank you for your kind review of the Ayres Hotel Orange; we love to hear from all our guests but especially those who are staying with due to medical needs at UCI.  WE strive to make the hotel comfortable and a bit of a sanctuary from the hospital.  Take care and we hope your next visit will for leisure rather than medical. Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We‚Äôve stayed here twice for medical reasons, as the hospital is across the street. The staff is very kind, the restaurant has good affordable food, breakfast is good quality, and the rooms are very nice. We are happy staying in our room during the day as the rooms are so nice! We‚Äôre planning on staying again in the future!
Manager Response: Thank you Erin! I am so glad to hear that you will be staying with us again in the future and that you enjoyed your past stays while visiting UCI.  My staff and I work hard at taking care of all our guests and it is indeed a pleasure when guests write such nice reviews.  Take care until we see you again! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My husband and I were very pleased with this hotel. Check in and out was quick. Our room was larger than most hotel rooms we have stayed at; very clean. The breakfast was free and above and beyond normal breakfast offerings at other hotels. The breakfast was hot and plentiful.  Pancakes, scrambled eggs and bacon were served everyday along with varieties of breads to toast, pastries and cereals.  Fruit. Variety of juice. Coffee. Tea. I was very happy! In the afternoon.. warm cookies and fruit along with ice water were available in the lobby. We did not eat in the restaurant outside of breakfast but it was a nice convenience If we needed it. The hotel was in a convenient location. We were able to take a low cost shuttle from the hotel to Disneyland.  Overall I would highly
Manager Response: Thank you so much JillWC71 for your wonderful review!  I appreciate the time you took to outline all that great things that you and your family enjoyed while staying with us and we hope to see you at the next Cheer competition or trip to Disneyland.  Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Room was fine and comfortable access to the hotel is somewhat limited due to traffic restraints.  We enjoyed the breakfast and having access to Pizza and other amenities after normal hours was good. While we were unsatisfied with the local traffic and driving conditions the hotel became a spot of refuge and welcome.
Manager Response: Thank you Phillip! I cannot agree more that the traffic constraints around the hotel can sometimes be a true hassle.  We thank you for persevering and making you way back to the hotel each day of your stay and glad we became a "refuge for you and your family."  We do hope that should you travel this way again you will again persevere the traffic!  Thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Stayed here while visiting a few of the local colleges. The hotel was clean, well maintained and the staff was friendly. The room was large and kept up to date. The breakfast was good. We will definitely return.
Manager Response: Thank you Chiara, I am so happy to hear you will return to the Ayres Hotel Orange.  It sounds like you son or daughter has chosen a local college for their next life adventure.  Take care for now! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This is a very nice small hotel in the Anaheim area. Very convenient to the many locations we were going to in the OC area during the weekend. Rooms were clean, spacious and comfortable. I liked that parking and breakfast were included. Front desk staff were friendly and helpful.  A couple annoying things, HVAC was very loud in our room and woke us up in the middle of the night as it switched on. Also staff were talking very loudly in the hallways in the early morning. Also the door to the bathroom in our room swung out instead of in making if very hard for someone to be at the sink area as someone else was coming in/out of the bathroom. Sounds petty but got to be pretty annoying.
Manager Response: Thank you baglady123 for your review! I appreciate the heads-up on the noisy HVAC, maintenance are working on it along with the room the prior reviewer had.  Trust that I will be speaking with staff and reminding them about talking loudly in the hallways; this is not acceptable as our guest's sleep is out priority.  In regards to the bathroom door opening out, I completely agree.  Unfortunately it is a California building code going back approximately 8 years, for all new buildings.  The doors have to swing out to comply with ADA handicapped accessible codes. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: A nice Hotel but not a 4 star
Summary: Nice and clean, free parking, free breakfast, good location with minor issues keeping it from being a 4 star.   Constant noise from inside the room. Fridge and ac fan are loud.  You have to leave your card inside the room or the lights shut off. If someone wants to stay in the room while others leave you have to coordinate room keys (small annoyance).  Breakfast wasn't that good. My kids kept pleading with me not to make them go back.  Overall for the price it's a good value for a 3 star Hotel. I won't stay here again but that's not the Hotels fault. I just don't plan on going back to this area of California.
Manager Response: Dear Euphyllia, I am sorry you were disappointed with your stay, and especially sorry that you did not contact us in regards to remedying simple challenges.  The hotel will always immediately take care of a loud fan, or AC once notified and would have provided you with as many keys to your room as you needed if asked.  I do understand that guests often may not have time to bring challenges to managements attention; especially when travelling with family; but I encourage all guests to give a hotel the opportunity to correct problems so that their stay is great. Again, thank you for your feedback! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Hotel is clean, rooms spacious and nice. Beds excellent ( for those who enjoy a soft comfy bed). Also the added touch of cookies was a bonus. We had room service from Spoons and it was. Good. They were nice and prompt.check out was fast and easy.
Manager Response: Dear Kandis P, Thank you for your kind review and I so happy you enjoyed our new in-house restaurant, Spoons.  They have been very successful and our guests are giving them wonderful reviews as well.  We hope to welcome you back to the Ayres Hotel Orange soon! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Ayers Hotel Orange for 3 nights while attending a conference at the Anaheim Convention Center.  The hotel staff was very friendly,  the hotel was clean, breakfast was way better than the normal hotel breakfasts.  All in all a great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you Charlie for writing such a nice review.  We do hope you are back with us next year should your annual conference be held in Anaheim again.  If not, we suggest you and your family return for a fun trip to Disneyland. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My husband came on business but I tagged along for a much needed getaway. This is probably one of my favorite stays. We stayed on the 4th floor, overlooking the pool. The King studio was very spacious and comfortable. With any and every request, whether it be a simple question, or request for something from housekeeping our needs and desires were superbly met. The breakfast every morning was delicious. I would definitely recommend, and consider staying here again if needed in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you so much jsnelson88! It is always a pleasure to hear such wonderful comments from our guests.  Thank you for taking your time to write this review.  We look forward to you possibly joining your husband for another trip in the future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for 5 nights.  The room was great - clean, spacious, comfortable bed, very quiet.  I slept well.  Staff was friendly and helpful, check in and out smooth.    Negative was breakfast.  Lukewarm to cold eggs and potatoes, little variety.  Stale croissants and muffins.  Mostly white bread choices.  The pancakes, which I normally avoid, were good.  By the 5th morning I was wishing that there was another place to go for breakfast nearby.
Manager Response: Dear Julie, Just when I thought we had our breakfast kinks worked out due to overwhelming positive comments; we must have taken a miss-step.  I am so sorry that our breakfast did not live up to your expectations and to the Ayres standards.  I will be monitoring breakfast and staff to ensure that food is fresh and hot.  I appreciate your feedback as it gives me the opportunity to fix our miss-step. Thank you. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Stay here often.  Always have a great stay. Cory Irwin, asst. general manager, always goes out of his way to make us feel welcome.  Chris, at front desk, is also very friendly. A special shout out to Reanna Cardenas for her kind, friendly help. Thank you all Ayres Hotel Orange!
Manager Response: Dear rsims538 Thank you for your wonderful review and shout out to individual staff members, we all appreciate hearing when guests feel welcome and cared for.   Cory, Chris, Reanna and all staff look forward to welcoming you back!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for a few nights just after Thanksgiving.  My father-in-law was dying and even though we flew out as soon as we could, we were a day too late.  The staff were very kind to us and gave us a nice room after she heard (she asked if we were visiting family....)  The rooms were nicely decorated and comfortable.  Breakfast was good, too.  We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, First let me extend our condolences to you and your family over the death of your father-in-law.  I believe I remember your stay and am happy that my staff was kind and gracious considering the circumstances.  We always want all our guests to feel cared no matter the reason they are here; it a simple thing but we are very proud of our efforts.  Take care for now, and again thank you for your kind words. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Ayres for two nights while visiting Disneyland.  From the moment we arrived, we were warmly welcomed.  The rooms are very impressive as are all of the amenities.    This was an excellent choice and one we would make again!
Manager Response: Thank you debweave!! I really appreciate you taking time to write such a nice review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  And I am especially happy that we may see in again in the future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Hotel is in a great location near the Block Orange Outlets, Orange County Courthouse and UC Irvine Medical Center. Free breakfast, manager's happy hour, free parking, guest laundry facilities on every other floor.
Manager Response: Dear Cowgirl V. Thank you for highlighting our location and close proximity to so many areas of interest, I would also like to add that we are also close to the Angels Stadium, Disneyland and Chapman University.  Thank yo for your review and we do hope to welcome you back in the near future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The location of the hotel was excellent and easy to find. Check in/ check out was quick and friendly. The room was spacious and clean. The hot tub was great, but the pool a little on the cool side.  Breakfast was excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us while visiting family and thank you for the heads up on the pool temperature; we are checking it as I type.  The pool is normally 80 degrees but should we have high winds we have to shut down the circulating pump to avoid having debris clog the pool, don't know if it was windy while you were here but will follow through with checking the pool temp twice a day instead of just in the morning. Again thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Stayed here for A1 at angels stadium. Great location - about a 10 minute walk to Angels Stadium or the outlets. Beautiful hotel. Friendly staff. Warm, fresh cookies in the lobby. Free parking. Comfy beds. Free REAL breakfast - bacon and eggs etc. this is the place to stay if you want to walk to the stadium and avoid the $25 parking fee.
Manager Response: Thank you Traves for posting your great review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!!  I appreciate you detailing our amenities and location; my staff and I also feel that we provide a friendly and caring environment for our guests!  Happy future travels and we hope to welcome you back very soon. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect place to staff while on trip to the Magic Kingdom
Summary: Check in to check out. Room, cleanliness, breakfast, staff...all exceeding expectations.  It sure how old the property is but it felt like it was brand new. Typically most properties have a mediocre breakfast. This one was actually very good.
Manager Response: Thank you Robert for taking the time to write a review for the Ayres Hotel Orange! It is always great to hear we have exceeded our guest's expectations in terms of service and quality of product.  The hotel is now over 4 years old so it is wonderful to hear that our guests feel as though it is brand new.    Happy travels!  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My wife and I go to Disneyland every year for New Years Eve and book a room nearby so we dont have to drive home. This place was clean comfortable and the staff were all great! The breakfast is delicious! We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear Bolintski Family,  Thank you for your wonderful review!  We are so glad you found us for your New Year's Disneyland tradition and hope to become a permanent part of that tradition in the coming years.    Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Experience at Ayres Hotel near Disneyland
Summary: Spent 3 nights here. Rooms were very spacious, plush and had all amenities (including microwave which most hotels are now removing). Breakfast was awesome and among the best I have had at hotels I have stayed. Hotel staff was very courteous, easy parking and very close to Disneyland.  Only minor negatives were that the Fitness center temperature was warmer than optimal and I could not figure out how to lower it & there were kids in the room above who started stomping around 6:30 in the morning. Despite these, I had a great experience here.
Manager Response: Dear Maheshwaran S,  My staff and I couldn't be more pleased that you enjoyed your overall stay!  I would like to apologize about the temperature in the fitness center and the kids running amok in the room above yours.  Please know that in the future just advise the front desk of any concerns you have and we will immediately work to resolve them.  We want our guests to be 100% happy at all times.  Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: At the free breakfast, pancakes, hashbrowns, etc are cooked on a grill by a real cook. This is unlike most budget/mid-priced chains in America where factory food is unboxed for breakfast.  An Uber/Lyft to Disneyland costs $8 and takes 8 minutes, and is the perfect way to come and go speedily, without stress or tiring walking from a huge parking lot - save your walking for when you‚Äôre inside the park.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you for your awesome  review of our breakfast.  It is wonderful when our guest appreciate the extra care we take in providing a quality breakfast for them.  We do hope you make your way back to the Ayres Hotel Orange in the near future.  Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed at Ayers Orange for 5 nights. Our room was clean and staff were friendly.  Before booking this hotel, you should look at the map and make sure you understand that most rooms if this hotel are right next to higher traffic streets. What I did not like about the hotel AT ALL was the breakfast experience. This hotel does not have a kitchen so they prepare breakfast in the dining area which does not have a vent/hood to take the smell of the food out. They cook hash brown, bacon, pancake, etc right in the dinging area each morning. Of course food over cooks sometimes so in the mornings, as soon as you get out of the elevator, the smell of food (mostly over cooked and burnt food.... not an appetizing smell) is everywhere. Smell was so strong that I was worried about smelling
Manager Response: Dear Cuiser81091,  Let me first thank you for taking the time to let me know of all your concerns and challenges with breakfast.  I appreciate your concern about the smell as this is a challenge we are addressing for a third time since the hotel has opened.  The exhaust system initially was not large enough to handle breakfast cooking and we have just installed a new larger capacity exhaust fan that should eliminate the odors.  For other potential guests reading this review, please know that the kitchen is not in the "middle" of the dining room.  We do have an open concept cooking area/dining room common in many hotels and restaurants.  Breakfast ends at 10 am so I understand your confusion when food was being put away at 11 am.  I would like to apologize for the breakfast server's attitude, it is unacceptable and not an example of our normal guest service as evidenced by other TripAdvisor reviews.  Trust that I will be working with the young lady in question to help her improve her guest service skills.  Should you have any challenges at a hotel in the future please contact management as we appreciate the ability to handle the challenge immediately and make sure you are taken care or as our guest.  Again, thank you for your feedback.  Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Customer service of the front desk was amazing. I left an item in the room after checkout and they were able to help me retrieve it. In addition, the room was spectacular. Even at a reasonable price. I would come here again!
Manager Response: Miguel,  Thank you for you "amazing" review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  It is great knowing we will have another "return" guest when you are back in the Orange/Anaheim area, take care for now.  Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Spent two nights here this past weekend and couldn't have picked a better hotel. About a 40 minute drive from LAX. About 10 minute drive to Disneyland. Shuttle service available. Orange outlet malls within walking distance. The hotel was clean, relaxing and just a delight, all done up for the holidays. Very helpful front desk. The rooms were much bigger than I imagined. Iron, ironing board and hairdryer in the suite which was much appreciated. Parking is FREE !! Unheard of in LA. The only thing to remember is if you are late coming back to the hotel you may not get parking right in front but may have to park in the parking garage behind the hotel. Not too much of a hassle. Complimentary HOT breakfast included which included scrambled eggs, pancakes, sausage or bacon, fruit,
Manager Response: Dear dsequeira,  Thank you for your "awesome" review of the hotel.  I appreciate the time you spent detailing our location, amenities and guest service.  All our employees read our reviews and it is always gratifying when we see how our extra efforts in doing our jobs are recognized by our guests. Again, thank you!  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Christopher at the front desk was very helpful. Breakfast was very good and had a variety of items for everyone. Rooms are very nice and clean.  Would recommend this location to anyone looking for a nice property.
Manager Response: Thank you Kimberly for your wonderful review.  I will pass on your kind comments to Christopher, he has worked for Ayres Hotels for 15 years and is indeed a true asset to the hotel.  Take care and hope to see you in the future should you again be in our area. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay. The room was comfortable and had thick walls, so we never heard our neighbors. The bathroom was big enough with a large tub/shower combo. Everything was well appointed. This isn‚Äôt like some national chain that‚Äôs more interested in quantity over quality. There was plenty of free parking and a delicious free breakfast each morning. I thought I had read that this hotel had a chef on site to make omelettes, but we never saw that option (could have been a different hotel I read about). Regardless, the breakfast was great. I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you StormFan76!   I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and all the amenities the hotel has to offer.  And yes, some Ayres Hotels do offer cook-to-order omelettes but not the Ayres Orange.  Due to the busiest of the hotel and our kitchen setup we are unable to offer omelettes, the line would be out the front door and we would have nothing but unhappy guests.  We do hope you stay on your next visit to Disney, we will be her for you and your family! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Ayres Orange is great for families!
Summary: My family and I had first stayed at the Ayres Hotel Orange for Mother‚Äôs Day weekend. It was such a nice hotel, not too big and not too small, with a very unique and elegant styling. The ambiance and atmosphere from the lobby and all of the Ayres team is very welcoming and inviting. We loved it! So we decided to stay again for Father‚Äôs Day weekend! Another great experience! So we decided to stay again this past weekend for my sister‚Äôs birthday! Each stay has been wonderful. The rooms are very quiet so you can relax, along with a nice bath tub, the whole family enjoys the delicious breakfast, the pool courtyard is good sized and comfortable, all the employees are nice and helpful from check-in to taking a picture of the family by the big fireplace! I have been to basic motels, and
Manager Response: Wow, thank you tdominguez_hg! What a great and sincere review, I remember you and your family and my staff and I will be happy to welcome you back on your next trip.  It is really our pleasure to provide wonderful guest service when we have such great guests who appreciate our efforts and appreciate the hotel.  Take care and Happy Holidays to you and your family! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I've been wanting to stay at this place for a while after finding it on other websites. I've read the many positive reviews it had and was hyping it up so much that I decided to stay here with my family for our latest Disneyland vacation. I was worried that I hyped it so much that I would be disappointed. After staying here for 3 nights, the hype was warranted. As soon as we stepped into the lobby area, it was decorated with Christmas decorations and felt very welcomed by the staff. I forgot the person's name, but she was new and very helpful as soon as we checked in. I requested for a quieter room as the many hotels we've stayed in had a noisy hallway. I was glad that this place honored that and placed us at a corner room (room 152) that little to no noise. Plus, it is next
Manager Response: Dear David, Thank you very much for your comprehensive review; you definitely have a calling as a travel writer!!  In regards to the mini fridge I do hope you take me up on offer, extended via email, to let me reimburse you for the frozen items.  Our mini-refrigerators are a constant challenge and the hotel is looking for a better one to replace our current ones.  My staff and I will look forward to welcoming your family back next year and until then take care. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights during our trip to Disneyland, which was really a short drive to the hotel.
