To start off with, it was my daughter's 4th birthday and the hotel prepared some small snacks for her birthday which was really appreciated. We had a room facing the carpark of the bestbuy building next to us. The room is a good size for 4 of us, 2 adults and 2 kids and with a microwave so no complaint. The bathroom is large. No bathtub though. We are really impressed with the cleanliness of the building and the room. It's so well maintained and has many storage space for your stuff. The staff are really friendly too. Parking was free so that's a bonus. I would have rated it 5 stars if it has better breakfast, which was limited in choices. Overall a good hotel for a 2 night
Manager Response: Thank you Adelyn_lsl, It is wonderful to here you enjoyed your overall stay with us!  I would to hear what other items you would like to see on our breakfast menu as I always appreciate our guest's feedback.  My email address is csmith@ayreshotels.com. Take care for now and Happy Holidays! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for our 25th wedding anniversary. Will definitely stay here again. Staff were really friendly,breakfast was awesome and so very clean. Rooms were big and the bathroom was amazing complete with a bath which was oh so relaxing. Highly recommended. Also shuttle to Disney was 1 minute walk away.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you!!! I and my staff appreciate you kind comments and are very happy to have helped make your 25th Anniversary special!  Hope you return to us next year for your 26th Anniversary! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My wife and I took our young son to Disneyland over the Veteran‚Äôs Day weekend.  We had stayed at this hotel a few years ago and thought it would be a good fit for us again.  You can‚Äôt walk from the Ayres to Disneyland but you are also away from all the crowds and congestion.  The Ayres Hotel Orange does everything well.  Our room was quiet, clean, modern and surprisingly spacious.  It looked like they just opened the hotel last week. Their complimentary breakfast was much better than breakfasts at similar hotels.  They had plenty of fresh fruit. YES!  Ayres uses real-not plastic or Styrofoam- dishes and silverware.  Finally, the staff was great.
Manager Response: Dear GlobeTrotting778510, Thank you so much for your great review of the hotel, the rooms, breakfast and the staff!!  And I really appreciate you mentioning our use of real flatware and dishware; we want to be good to our planet!!  I am so pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope to welcome you and your family back in the future!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This hotel was a great experience for me.  The rooms were spacious, well appointed and clean.  The breakfast provided was hot and good.  The staff was friendly and efficient.  In addition, the decor throughout the hotel was beautiful  What more could one expect?
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you!! Terry, my staff and I are happy to hear you enjoyed the hotel and that we exceeded your expectations.  Thank you and hope to see you soon! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The Ayres Orange is in a convenient location, but is surprisingly quiet given proximity to the freeway.  Breakfast included a wide variety of options. The lobby and rooms are large and calming, and the staff is super-helpful and attentive.
Manager Response: Thank you Ryan for your kind review on TripAdvisor!  We do hope yo visit us again for business or pleasure, take care for now. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Lovely aesthetics, cozy touches, and great breakfast included
Summary: Stayed for a night while I went to an event at UC Irvine, and they honored the UC Irvine rate which made this a decent value. Out of my recent hotel experiences while traveling in the last month, Ayres stands out as feeling unique while practical, with uncommon accents like an exposed brick wall by the elevator, thoughtfully folded towels and tissues, and pretty lamps. The breakfast was included and the pancakes were delicious! Customer service was also top notch. My one complaint would be that the buzzing noise of the mini fridge and AC units were significant enough for me to notice while trying to fall asleep.
Manager Response: Dear Alina K., I pleased that you found the Ayres Hotel Orange while visiting UCI, and glad we were able to offer the UCI rate to you.  It is wonderful when guests let us know how much they appreciate the little touches in decor that the design team so thoughtfully integrated into building the hotel.  I am sorry about the mini fridge noise and am having maintenance check your room out, thank you for the "heads up."  Take care for now. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My husband and I discovered the Ayres Hotel chain way back when the Seal Beach location opened.  We fell in love with it and now when the family travels to California it is the only one I stay at if one is near where I'm going to be visiting.  The staff is always polite and friendly and always at the top of customer relations.  The breakfast is a welcome addition to the stay with such a variety of items to choose from.  I don't get over to California as often as I would like but at least I know that I will get royal treatment staying with Ayres!
Manager Response: Thank you Jane, I am so happy to hear how much you appreciated the "royal treatment" you received!!  We strive to let all our guests know that we want them to feel that staying here is like their "home away from home."  And we especially appreciate your loyalty to Ayres Hotels!!  We have 3 new Ayres Hotels under construction right now; one in Rialto, one in Vista and soon to open, one in Chula Visita California.  Perhaps these new locations will help make your travel to California more frequent.  Take care for now. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The location is great. I was going to Irvine/Brea, Fullerton, Newport, and the location had me on my way very easily and quickly. It's also a quick walk to the Outlets at Orange, which any shoppers will appreciate! There's a Wendy's and Starbucks right around the corner too. The room was clean, large, spacious, and well equipped (mini fridge, coffee maker, microwave).
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review!!   Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Went to Disneyland this past weekend and stayed at Ayres based on the recommendation of a friend. Really enjoyed our stay.  Morning breakfast hit the spot.  Cookies in the lobby were nice.  apparently, this and the next door hotel, Alo, are owned by the same company.  Alo had a nice tea and coffee bar available throughout the day, while Ayres did not. There were only water and cookies that were replenished regularly. The only reason for the 4 stars, their air conditioning was unable to be set colder than 68 degrees.  We like a cold room, 64 or below, so I was very disappointed that we could only get the a/c to go as low as 68 degrees.
Manager Response: Thank you DNSarg and Family, First I would like to apologize for you not being able to set the AC to a lower temperature than 68 degrees.  Unfortunately our HVAC units will freeze when the temperature is too low for an extended period of time and we needed to set the lower limit at 68 degrees.  We do hope that in spite of the temperature settings who will find your way back to staying with us in the future, and thank you for your review. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Delicate Time/ Helpful, Friendly & Accomodating Hotel Staff
Summary: This hotel is nice on the outside as it is on the inside!! The lobby is inviting with a lovely fireplace, complimentary water & cookies. They have a snack bar area next to the check in that is convenient with a lot of goodies. They also have a complimentary breakfast that provides really good eats, juices & coffee. The rooms are immaculate, beautiful, clean comfortable they are spacious with comfortable beds, nice bathroom and vanity sink. The room also has your basic needs TV, hair dryer, iron, microwave, mini fridge. The hotel staff is helpful, accommodating, friendly and professional and they are always there to help answer any questions or concerns!! This hotel deserves 5 Thumbs up! We love this hotel and would refer to family, friends & folks reading this post.
Manager Response: Thank you for your "5 Thumbs up" review!  My staff and I appreciate your comprehensive and wonderful review.  All reviews we receive are posted for all employees to read, it truly makes our day when we receive such high marks from our guests.  Thank you for referring us to potential future guests and we do hopw to see you again in the near future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: First Class experience and great amenities. This was a very "classy" place. It provided an excellent complimentary breakfast and a very important free and fast wi-fi service tha you don't always get this at other hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you Tnails46 for your kind and "classy" review of the hotel.  We appreciate you staying with us and hope to welcome you back in the near future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Everyone here was very kind, the hotel looked very good. Very well priced with a cheap Disneyland shuttle (An all day was like $11 for two people and they had multi-day passes that were cheaper). Breakfast was free and tasted pretty good as far as those go and the selection changed both mornings that we were there.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to submit a review on TripAdvisor!!   I am very pleased that you enjoyed the hotel, our friendly staff and had such a great time at Disneyland.  We do hope you are able to make your way back to us int he future, take car for now and Happy Holiday! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This was by far the best hotel experience. The room was very clean and spacious with comfortable beds. Good quality furniture. Excellent breakfast  with many choices.Great hotel, great amenities and service, and in a very convenient location
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you Trip54585203577 for your "Excellent" review of the hotel.  I really appreciate you taking the time to post your thoughts. Take care,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Great hotel, great amenities and service, and in a very convenient location if you‚Äôre doing further traveling in the area. Everything was very clean, and comfortable. Best hotel breakfast we have ever had with lots of healthy options.
Manager Response: Thank you caro9497 for your "wonderful" review!!  And I glad you noted all the healthy  breakfast options we offer as many of our guests seem to miss all the options available to them.  My staff and I strive to provide great amenities, great guest service, clean rooms and a great breakfast; I am pleased you enjoy your stay, Mission Accomplished!! Happy travels!  Christine Smith General  Manager

Summary Heading: Best hotel stay of the year
Summary: This was by far the best hotel experience I had in a long time. The reception staff was extremely helpful, going out of their way to find me a charger and to deliver business cards.  The room was clean and comfortable and the complimentary breakfast buffet was good for the price of the night. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Thank you Lucie D for your recommendation to all potential future guests of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  I am pleased to hear that my desk staff attended to all your needs and made your stay the "best you have had in along time."  We do hope you stay again in the future, whether it if for business or pleasure, we will be here with a warm welcome! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We had a great experience at Ayres Hotel Orange! The front desk crew was very helpful and friendly and the ART shuttle was convenient, just right next door . Nice large rooms, huge bathtub, and good breakfast, we‚Äôll stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear adensmom2000, Thank you for taking the time to write such a great review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  I am very happy you enjoyed all our amenities and the overall hotel for your Disneyland stay.  I hope you and your family make it an annual event, and if so, we will be here ready to welcome you back. Take care, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Our family just had another perfect stay at the Ayres Hotel!  This hotel has the friendliest staff and the rooms are always very clean and comfortable. The hotel decor is inviting and the included breakfast is lovely, including eggs, bacon, pancakes, potatoes, fresh fruit, pastries etc...... This hotel is a gem and we will be returning again in the future. Thank you to all at the Ayres Hotel for another delightful stay!
Manager Response: Dear chrisanne2812, And thank you once again for another great review of the hotel!!  We love our returning guests and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit! Happy Travels, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Clean room, friendly staff, we visit Orange County regularly, we have a college student there and this hotel is our favorite place to stay. The rooms are oversize, clean, and comfortable. The staff is very accommodating. The location is great. If you are traveling to Orange County without small children (or even with) this is the place to stay. It's not too close to Disney, so its not filled with young families, but its close enough and has a shuttle. Breakfast is great. For us its perfect. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you CBS_13 for your wonderful recommendation; we truly appreciate it!  And don't forget that the year your college student graduates, try to make your reservations at least 6 months in advance.  We try to remind all our parents so that the Ayres Anaheim, the Ayres Orange and the ALO Hotel by Ayres will have enough space for all our loyal parents who have stayed with us for the 4 years of their child's college experience.  We will look forward to welcoming yo back soon. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean, quiet hotel close to Disney
Summary: Wonderful hotel if you are looking to be close to Disneyland but not pay the ridiculous prices. Plus free breakfast and free parking! Located in a safe area right off the interstate. Easy access to restaurants and shopping, and about 8 minutes from Disneyland parking. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you Bridget for your great review!  We do hope you are able to stay with us again in the future so that you can take advantage of all  our amenities at a great price.  Safe travels until then! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The king suite was very nice.  It had that at home feeling and was larger than a standard hotel room.  Having the love seat in the room was great, which helped give it that home away from home feeling, and it gave you more seating options than having to sit in bed for everything you do.  I was very pleased with the location, close to many things without being in the Disney crowd, and the breakfast was great.  My only complaint about my stay is the occupant in the room above me was an extremely heavy walker and I could hear every step they made.  Fortunately they weren't in the room much so it was infrequent.  Highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you Stacy! I appreciate your sentiment in saying the hotel was "home away from home feeling."  That is exactly what we want all our guests to feel and to enjoy all the amenities we offer.  We are seeing more and more guests who are going to Disney but who do not want to be in the middle of the Disney chaos on Harbor Blvd.  I am so sorry you had a heavy footed guest above you, please alert the desk as we are happy to contact guests in a diplomatic manner and request they remember they are in a hotel and to be a little more quiet. We will look forward to welcoming you back should you visit Anaheim/Orange area in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The hotel employees are the cherry-on-the-top for this venue. Every person was so nice, you feel as though you are at home. Our room was very comfortable, nicely furnished and absolutely spotless.The breakfast is excellent: nice variety of food and very pleasant dining room. Try it, you'll like it !
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is located right off the 5 freeway. Decent and clean. The pillows were great.  Breakfast wasn‚Äôt wonderful but the cookies at night were! Internet was down.  If I were going to Disneyland again I would select a hotel with more restaurants around it.
Manager Response: Thank you ainla for your review.  Unfortunately yes, our internet was done for a a couple of hours during your stay due to issues with the company providing internet to the hotel, and they as well as I would to apologize for the inconvenience.  I am so sorry you were not aware of all the restaurants that are walking distance from the hotel.  The Outlets of Orange is a 3 block walk and there are dozens of restaurants ranging from fast food to fine dining as well as other restaurants in opposite directions from the Outlets.  Should you wish to stay with us again I would be happy to offer a great rate so you may experience the hotel again along with the local restaurants. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Great location! Less than 2 miles from Disneyland and you can grab their shuttle for $5.50 a person round trip.  Way less than parking and runs every hour.  Also, great overall location to the freeway and nearby mall with LOTS of great places to eat as well as Quizno's and Starbucks within walking distance.  The staff were all wonderful and the hotel was super clean and looks like it has been freshly remodeled sometime recently? The free breakfast buffet was also a bonus.  Not just the usual pastries and cereal and yogurt.  They had a real chef there in the morning making fresh eggs, hash browns/potatoes, sausage/bacon and pancakes.  Would definitely recommend this place.
Manager Response: Thank you PattyZ!!! I love the "quaint but modern" description you used for the hotel!  We are not remodeled recently but are 4 years old, two months into our 5th year of operation.  My staff and I take great pride in keeping the hotel clean and fresh so when guests let us know we are accomplishing our goals, it means a lot to us.  We do hope you will return for another stay in the future as we will look forward to welcoming you back. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Spacious and beautifully decorated room. Fresh and new hotel. Smoke free room smells great. Quiet and safe environment with the Med Center opposite and the Orange Outlets at the next block. The bathroom is well designed. There‚Äôs iron and board. Dryer. But no safe. My only complain is the mattress which is too soft for me. Will work for others, I don‚Äôt know. Sheets and the room are clean. Coffee machine and fridge available in the room. Breakfast is a good spread and tasty hash too.
Manager Response: Thank you Chin71!! I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Ayres Hotel Orange!  I am sorry though that the mattress was too soft for you but I appreciate the "heads up."  It is only when guests let us know that a mattress might be too soft that we know to evaluate the mattress to make sure it is not too worn.  The hotel is 4 years old and our mattresses usually have a life of 7 years but once in a while one will break down more quickly so we are checking the one in your room.  Again, thank you and we hope to see you again very soon! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We are in Orange two times each year and have made the Ayers Hotel Orange our "home" during these visits for the past few years.  The friendly, welcoming staff (Mr. Cruz at the front desk especially) compliment the well maintained property.  The location is ideal for our purposes.
Manager Response: Thank you grampafixit for another great review!  I will let Mr. Cruz aka. Christopher know of your complimentary comments regarding his service; we also think he is the "best."  We will look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.  Take care for now and Happy Travels! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Perfect location to visit granddaughter at Chapman University with shopping and restaurants nearby.  Good access to freeways.  Staff was friendly and professional.  The breakfast was far above what we expected.
Manager Response: Thank you JJ2travel for your wonderful review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  We love our Chapman parents, grandparents and friends that stay with us, we work to be your home away from home for at least the 4 years your students are at Chapman.  We hope you visit again soon, and don't forget to make graduation reservations at least 6 months in advance to secure a room for your granddaughter's special day! Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing place in great location with friendly staff
Summary: First I got an amazing rate on this high end hotel (roughly $10 more per night than a standard hotel.) The room was huge, had a full size leather couch, desk and basic fridge and microwave. Bed was very comfy with excellent pillows. Plenty of free parking as well.  The staff went out of there way to help me learn the area, suggestions on where to eat and even let my friend park in their lot for free when we wanted to drive my car.   The restaurant was minimal but with great burgers, etc and their sister hotel next door had a fancier one, if you prefer. The free breakfast was a eal breakfast with sausage, bacon, eggs, hashbrowns, pancakes, fruit, yogurt, cereal, bagels, you name it.  The outdoor pool and whirlpool were a nice peaceful way to end the day. And the gym facilities
Manager Response: none

Summary: We spent nine nights here during our recent trip to Disneyland. The hotel is in a great location for Disneyland, shops and restaurants. We stayed in an King Suite which was fabulous. the room was so clean and spacious. All the staff that we came across from the front desk to house keeping were all very polite and helpful. We loved that as an expedia vip guest that we got to check out at 2pm which was a bonus and made our last day easier as we had an evening flight home.  We are looking forward to booking here again in 2019.
Manager Response: Thank you very much wispa59a for the "Amazing" review.  I am glad to hear that the hotel met and exceeded all your needs as a travelling family.  We will look forward to you returning to us again next year! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Great location, cleanliness, free breakfast. The front desk was very welcoming and helpful. Our stay was awesome and I would stay here again and recommend to all. We actually walked to Angel Stadium and used the ART services to Disneyland as well.
Manager Response: Dear azcatattack25, Thank you for taking the time to write and submit your review to TripAdvisor!  I appreciate your kind words and recommendation and we hope you are able to return to us again in the near future. Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This Hotel is super clean and has the friendliest staff. Complementary Breakfast, no Parking fees, no resort fees. Stayed here to attend a Wedding close buy and this place was AMAZING! Will definite stay here again. Very close to the Orange Shopping Outlet, Target Store, Starbucks, etc.... also as an added bonus, we were able to see the nightly fireworks show coming from Disney Land right from our Hotel window!   Highly recommend! People it‚Äôs so new and clean please keep it that way. So tired of staying in hotels that aren't cheap and are destroyed by no one other than the visitors!!!! So aggravating,
Manager Response: Thank you Dawn V, Thank you for noticing our high level of cleanliness and our pride in the upkeep of the hotel.  We have been open 5 years now and my staff and I really do work hard to maintain the hotel so that it appears new.  And yes, we do have those guests who do damage our rooms but we understand sadly, that is part of being in the "hospitality" business; and we understand the importance of keeping the rooms, hotel and grounds in perfect condition.  Thank you again! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The stay at Ayres was awesome.The rooms were very clean.  The front desk was very welcoming and helpful.  Breakfast personnel was very nice also and the food was great  thank you so much for letting us stay at ayres.      Jim and Lynn Heinz
Manager Response: You are very welcome Lynn and Jim, it was our pleasure to have you as our guests!  We do hope you are able to visit us again in the future and I appreciation your recommendation to other potential future guests. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I really enjoy this hotel. Its clean. Its comfortable. It has a very pleasant atmosphere. The staff are responsive. They've managed to put together a team of good people who are skilled, as well as personable!  This has become the hotel I stay in any time I'm in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you Nancy for your kind review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  We are very proud of the team we have put together and their high level of friendliness and guest service they extend to our guests.  Thank you for noticing and I will be sure all read your comments.  Take care until your next visit with us! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland and the outlet
Summary: I chose this hotel because of the good reviews and the location which is close to Disney, it's only less than 10 minutes away.  The room is good sized, bathroom is bright and the bathroom tub is bigger than normal one.  Lots of parking spots.  And also there's an outlet mall about 5 minutes away.  Overall, it was a pleasant stay and we would stay here again if we go to Disneyland next time.
Manager Response: Thank you Queenie! I am pleased to hear you enjoyed our rooms, tubs and location close to Disneyland and the Outlets.  We look forward to your next visit and maybe you will be able to catch an Angel's game, the stadium is also close to the hotel, walking distance.  Safe travel! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I stay at Ayres Orange at least once a year and it is always amazing. Comfy beds, amazing water pressure. Delicious breakfast. The staff during breakfast on Thursday and Friday were so nice and helpful. Chris (Front Office Supervisor) was beyond helpful with my shuttle passes to Disneyland and during my checkout. Hotel is Impeccable. Thank you so much!
Manager Response: You are so welcome Toni!  I am happy to hear you are now a repeat guest and Disneyland regular.  We hope to see you again next year for the Star Wars attraction opening at Disneyland, it will be a crazy but fun time for all.  Until then safe travels and happy times! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: good points - very close to disney, each Uber ride costs us around 7 bucks. very quiet, seems soundproof walls nice breakfast.  bad points- pool was cold, couldnot even dip our feet into it room service/ housekeeping and receptionists were just okay
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have to visit Orange County twice a month and choose Ayers strictly because it was walking distance from where I need to go. I‚Äôm glad I did. The service is great. The rooms are nice. The complimentary breakfast is delicious and it‚Äôs clean and quiet.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We love this hotel. We have stayed here the past 4 times we have gone to Disneyland. They are so friendly. The hotel is beautiful and clean. The rooms are beautiful and spacious. The Breakfast each day is amazing. Each night they put out fresh baked cookies which are so delicious. We will definitely continue to stay here when we come to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you Melaney for taking the time to write such a nice review!  And thank you for now being a "regular" guest who will we look forward to welcoming back on your next Disney Trip.  We have expanded our cookie flavors to now include peanut butter and oatmeal raisin; they have been a big hit with all our guests.  Safe travels and we hope to see you again soon! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We love Ayres!  This was a trip in connection with the CHOC Walk to benefit Children's Hospital of Orange County, and the Ayres folks offered a special discounted room rate for walkers, which was really nice of them.  Our room was spacious and had a huge bathtub, big enough for two.  Every amenity you could ask for was present, including microwave and small fridge.  The beds were comfy.  There was even a small partition partway between the beds to allow for more privacy.  I don't think we even turned on the TV, but there was a large one in the room.  Plenty of drawer and cabinet and closet space.  The pool was perfect temperature. The breakfast was good, except the hash browns left a little to be desired.  The staff was so friendly and helpful, especially Christy, who checked us
Manager Response: Thank you VtaTraveler for your "totally terrific" review!!!  I am pleased to hear you were staying with us for the CHOC Walk; it is our pleasure to extend a special rate for guests who are here specifically to walk the WALK!  And thank you for noticing our employees who were also walking.  The Ayres Hotel Group is one of the co-sponsors of the CHOC Walk and we had about 100 employees representing our 23 hotels walking and raising money for CHOC Hospital.  The Ayres Family pays for all of their employee's entry fees which is a wonderful gesture on their part.   I will pass on your comments to Christy and all staff; and thank you for taking your time to write such a great review.  We will look forward to welcoming you back next year for the CHOC Walk!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Always a beautiful hotel and great experience at this location. Great proximity to all we want to do. We love the reliable, consistent staff and the attention to detail.  Breakfast is always good. Love the clean grounds
Manager Response: Thank you once again for your nice review and for being a "return guest!"   I will pass on your kind words to the entire staff and we will look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to our area! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: I look for  Ayres Hotels every trip
Summary: for business I have a choice which hotel to stay at. I travelled for 7 years from Chicago to California and every trip I stayed at an Ayres hotel. Now several years later and with a new job I still search to stay at Ayres hotels anytime I am in Southern California. Their rooms are clean and comfortable, and their staff is always helpful, professional, and able to help anytime I need it. It's a great hotel that never feels like a "chain".
Manager Response: Thank you so much Gayle L!!  I am appreciative that you stated "it's a great hotel that never feels like a chain."   My team really works hard to ensure each guest is taken care of and their individual needs are met while staying with us.  the term "cookie cutter" hotel is not in our lexicon.   Thank you for being a loyal guest, we look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We've stayed here many times. Great location for us. Rooms are clean and staff are friendly and helpful. TV remote didn't work but was replaced/fixed quickly. Refrigerator had a whine to it so it was unplugged to solve the problem. Breakfast seems to have gone down a notch or two in quality. Eggs and sausage looked pretty bad but maybe that was because it was late? Still, if the foods out it shouldn't look old. Coffee was good one day and bad the next. Will likely return as the alternatives aren't noticeably better.
Manager Response: Thank you Steven M for your review!  And special thanks for the "heads up" on the breakfast.  You are correct, food should look fresh and appetizing no many what time it is.  I will be working with staff to ensure fresh food is out at all times of breakfast.  We do look forward to your return to the hotel.  Take care for now. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Clean, roomy room. Two comfortable queen beds. Friendly and helpful staff. The included breakfast was really good. Must try the pancakes. If headed to UC Irvine Hospital, the campus is across the street.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you raycarlson62 for the great review of the Ayres Hotel Orange! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Really clean and relaxing! One of the best hotels we have ever experienced...this is our second time staying with the Ayres chain and will choose them again next time! Workers are so very polite. Fresh cookies baked everyday! Pleasant atmosphere! Nice area that is right off highway, near shopping and restaurant areas...We will be back next summer!
Manager Response: Dear Tiffany W, Thank you so much for your great review!  We will look forward to your return next summer and in welcoming you back to the Ayres Hotel Orange.  Thank you for mentioning the Ayres Hotel chain, we currently have 22 hotels in Southern California and have 3 additional hotels under construction.  One in Rialto, one is Chula vista and one in Vista, all to open in the next 6 months to one year. Again, thank you Tiffany! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel at an affordable rate!
Summary: I stayed at this hotel with my 8-year-old son instead of a closer hotel to Irvine simply because of the greater rate, larger rooms, free wifi, free parking and complimentary hot breakfast. My son and I thoroughly enjoyed our visit. We would definitely come back again. Plus, they offered fresh cookies every evening at about 5 pm.
Manager Response: Thank you engally!!  I am so happy to hear that you and your son enjoyed the hotel and the price value you received.  We will keep baking those cookies and have added peanut butter and oatmeal raisin cookies to our cookie menu in addition to our chocolate chip and sugar cookies. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay near Disneyland
Summary: My husband and I love the Ayres Hotel Orange. We've stayed 3 or 4 times now. It's modern and clean. Everything still seems newer and the showers are wonderful. Free hot breakfast is a HUGE plus as many hotels no longer offer this. Shuttle service to Disney is also a great convenience. The only thing I don't love is that the beds don't have mattress pads that cover the whole mattress. It's just a small a mattress pad that sits on top the mattress (under the sheet) but doesn't even cover the whole top of the mattress. I feel way more comfortable about sleeping on a hotel bed that has a fully covered mattress. Sheets are a bit scratchy too for my liking, but these are minimal complaints and we will continue to stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you foreversynchro!  And thank you for being a "return guest".  When you make your next reservation just let us know that you want a mattress pad that completely covers your mattress, we will make that happen, and we are happy to accommodate that request. We hope to see you and your husband again very soon, take care for now! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This is a nice and clean small hotel.  We stayed here four nights to go to Disneyland and Universal studios.   Pros: Clean, smaller hotel, decent free breakfast, free parking, free WiFi, close to Disneyland and shopping, big shower tub, decent size room for a family of 4. Cons: Ceilings are super noisy and can hear tenants walking above, if your room is facing the street you can hear the cars and cops go by while sleeping, the vents in the main restaurant/hotel  is bad because you can smell breakfast upstairs as soon as you step out of your room, and small refrigerator makes noises.   All in all the hotel is nice But not sure if I would book again unless I was guaranteed a room towards the back where it might be less noisy and a room on the 4th floor where I cannot hear the
Manager Response: Thank you oregon5032018 for your review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I appreciate your time in writing a thorough review.  I completely agree with you in regards to the smell coming from our dining area.  this is a problem we are currently working on as I write this response.  We have found that the exhaust system we have is too small for the stove top area of the kitchen. First step is to balance the air exchange system which is actually happening today.  If that does not solve the problem we are committed to replacing our exhaust unit for a more powerful one that will solve the smell problem.  I am sorry that the noise of other guests  and street noise bothered you during your stay.  This happens on occasion and the hotel is always happy to move guests to a quieter interior room when alerted and also request noisy guests to be a little more quiet.  Just let us know so we may handle the problem immediately.  Again, thank you for you comments and Happy Future Travels! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My family of 5 stayed here for 5 nights during our Disney vacation. We were so happy that we chose this hotel. Very clean, great breakfast every morning, convenient shuttle to and from Disneyland, and great customer service (both at the front desk and in the restaurant). The ladies cooking breakfast and cleaning the tables in the restaurant work very hard and with a smile on their faces.  The room was very clean and quiet. The beds were a tad bit small as they were doubles and not queens but we knew that going in.  This will definitely be our choice for hotel the next time we plan a Disneyland vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you EG Brandon!! I am happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed the hotel and all the amenities that we offer.  I will definitely pass on your comments about our excellent guest service to all my employees; it those wonderful compliments from our guests which keep smiles on all our faces. I do want to let future guest know that our mattresses in our Queen rooms are indeed queen mattresses.  In our King rooms there is a sofa sleeper which is a double mattress; so I just want to clear up any confusion.  Brandon, we will look forward to seeing you and your family on your next Disney trip! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean and Cozy with a Breakfast buffet!
Summary: Stayed here for a wedding in the area. Hotel Is located near some great food spots. Check in was quick. nice rooms. Breakfast buffet included Scrambled eggs, bacon, hash browns, pancakes on my first visit; next morning was Scrambled eggs, sausage and country potatos (which were both great) and pancakes. Coffee, juice, milk and pastries server  as well. Small cozy hotel. Would definitely stay again. Parking structure in back of hotel very close to entrances.
Manager Response: Enrique, Thank you so much for taking your time to write such a nice review of the hotel; may staff and I appreciate hearing your comments and we look forward to having you back as a guest in the near future.  Safe travels for now! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Excellent accomodations. Room was 5 star. All the support services worked very hard every day and were friendly and kept the hotel clean always asked if there was anything we needed. We arrived very late due to flight delays and they held our room and guest services were great about getting us processed.  I am recommending this hotel to everyone going to Anaheim CA for any reason.
Manager Response: Thank you Aaron F for you kind review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  It is such a pleasure to hear that the hotel and my staff made such a great impression upon you and your family.  and special thanks for recommending us to future guests. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We enjoyed our stay for several days at the Ayres Hotel in Orange. It's within walking distance of Best Buy, the Outlets of Orange, and more. Plenty to eat of breakfast, and other features, make this a no-brainer.
Manager Response: Dear davidV1642TR, Thank you so much for taking your time to write such a nice review.  I appreciate you pointing out our great location to Best Buy and the Outlets of Orange.  We are also close to the angels Baseball Stadium as well as Disneyland.  Take care for now and we hope to see you in the near future! Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: I bought baseball tickets for the Angels' series against the Astros months ago and needed a hotel to stay for the weekend.  The Ayres Hotel Oragnge was the best choice out of all of options in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you Noel B, We love our Angel's fans as we see more and more booking with us for the easy walk to/from the Stadium down the street.  I hope you were able to try our in-house restaurant prior to the game, the Old Camp Bar and Grill, or one of the other brew pubs located between the hotel and the stadium.  Take care and know that we will continue to allow Astros fans to stay with us!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We came for a basketball tournament. The staff was amazing. They went above and beyond. The complimentary breakfast was delicious. The hotel was immaculate. Finally, the location was great. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you April for the great review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  My staff and I really enjoyed hosting your group and we do hope to see you all back next year!  Happy travelling! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: The cleanest and best smelling hotel I have ever stayed in
Summary: I've stayed in a lot of hotels for both business and personal travel and this was bar far the cleanest hotel I have ever stayed in.  I mean the minute you walk in the door it just smells good/clean.  The whole time I was there people were cleaning something.  Free parking in this part of Orange County was great as was the free wifi and free breakfast.  All the amenities you could need and for an excellent value.  I would definitely go back.  Also for once a place that has all the plugs you could possibly need by the nightstand!  Also the set up of the rooms is perfect, whoever designed these with large showers with shelves, with the sink outside the shower/bath, with shelves behind the sink and short place to hang items, just everything was super smart.
Manager Response: Dear ibkatg, Thank you for the wonderful review of the hotel!  The Ayres Family build all their hotels and I have passed on your comments to the Family to let them know how much you appreciated the design of the room and bath area.  My staff and I are very proud of the high level of cleanliness you find in our hotel along with all the amenities our guests receive.  We do believe we provide excellent value for the price paid.  Take care for now and we hope to welcome you back something in the near future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This is the third time I have stayed at this location.  The first two times were for business, but this time I had my three kids with me for a visit to southern California that included stops in Orange County, Hollywood and San Diego.  I was fortunate to get my company's corporate rate, which really made this stay a great value.  This facility is sparkling clean inside and out.  The towels were fluffy and new, the linens were fresh and clean smelling.  There's just nothing to complaint about.  We were able to check in about an hour early and got a great room that overlooked the pool.  It also had a nice sitting area just outside the door where I read the paper and had coffee the two mornings I was there.  Breakfast was a notch above what you get at the National chains and the
Manager Response: Thank you PaulinSTL, It is so nice to hear when our "business" clients return with their families to also vacation with us!  Thank you for mentioning our cleanliness, amenities and service.  See you soon on your next "business" visit! Take care, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Nice new hotel in Anaheim near Disney. Rooms and hotel are really nice. You can tell it's a newer property. Price was substantially less than other hotels in the area plus it includes free parking and a decent free breakfast. Our room looked out to the highway but we rarely heard any traffic noise. Floors seemed a little thin as you could hear people walking around in the floor above, though the walls seemed to provide excellent sound isolation.   Staff was responsive to requests but overall could have been a little more friendly. It's not that they weren't friendly when contacted but they didn't really acknowledge you as you passed by.    It has easy access to Hwy 5 and other main arteries in the Anaheim area making it easy to go just about anywhere in the area LA traffic not
Manager Response: Thank you Kini62 for taking the time to write a review, I really appreciate it when I receive feedback from our guests, that I in turn can share with my staff.  And special thanks for mentioning that my desk staff needs to be more open when guests pass by, a great reminder teaching moment for us.  We will be looking forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Disneyland. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for easy access to Disneyland. When we (single Mum, 3 daughters) arrived, our luggage had been lost by our airline. The staff at the hotel were so helpful with following up the airline, assisting with our laundry and they even had free hot cookies in the afternoon for us!  The breakfast had a great selection of hot food, fruit, and drinks. Internet connection was quick, and shuttle bus came so often we couldn‚Äôt keep up! The pool & spa was a great cool down and massage inbetween our long sessions st Disney too.  Thank you for the friendly, helpful and kind service! Highly recommend to families, couples and singles travelling around Anaheim!
Manager Response: Thank you Vanessa! Wow, 3 kids, single Mom, lost luggage and Disneyland; I am so happy my staff was able to help turn a potentially problem filled vacation into one that turned out great!  Thank you for the recommendation to other potential future guests.  We do hope to see you and your daughters again in the near future.   Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Excellent customer service and accommodations. The room was very nice and immaculate love the breakfast. This was my second stay at a Ayres and I have to say both stays were excellent very good experience. Thank you for making my stay very pleasant.
Manager Response: You are very welcome sweslander! I am glad your stay was pleasant and we met your expectations. Take care for now, Christine Smith Manager

Summary Heading: Ayers Hotel Orange - Great place to stay!
Summary: We stayed for 7 nights on business.  Everything at this hotel was a wonderful experience.  Breakfast is complimentary with a nice variety of items to choose from.  Staff is pleasant.  Does not provide wi-fi with a secure feature (password)...it is a general wi-fi, like going to a Starbucks or Barnes & Noble.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I must say my stay was pleasant from the very start when they allowed me to check in early the young lady at the front desk gave me a call as soon as my room was ready. To the friendly staff that made me very comfortable and welcome at all times. I definitely will stay hear again my wife was very happy she was able to sleep all night being a light sleeper and all she did not hear a thing all night, happy wife happy life. So 5hank you to all the staff a very pleased Angel fan.
Manager Response: Dear "pleased Angel Fan", Thank you for your kind comments!  I will be passing on your comments, as we do all comments from our guests, to the entire staff.  We will look to welcoming you back the next time you attend an Angel's game.  I don't know if you saw we recently opened the Old Camp Bar & Grill in the hotel, a perfect place to enjoy pregame drinks and food prior to walking to the stadium.  If not check it out on your next stay.  Again, thank you!  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: business trip at 120F degrees in a cool, comfortable environment
Summary: The front desk staff went beyond the call of duty to help with transportation arrangements, I had problems with adjusting the temp. in the room, a tech person arrived within minutes and took care of the issue. I was a few minutes late for breakfast due to a business call. The restaurant made sure I was taken care of. I would recommend this hotel to anyone for a pleasant experience.
Manager Response: Dear bcox92110, Thank you for taking the time to let us know how pleased you were with the hotel and my helpful staff.  We all work together as one team and are very proud when guests take notice of our caring and helpful attitude.Thank you for your recommendation to other potential future guests and we do hope to see you again in the future as well. Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My stay at Ayers Hotel Orange was excellent because the staff members were so helpful and accommodating. They went out of their way to assist me with multiple special needs and special requests and were very friendly and welcoming. This hotel is comfortable and lots of nice extras and freebies. I would definitely stay here again for either business or pleasure.
Manager Response: Thank you Marita for the wonderful review you posted!  I am especially pleased to hear that my staff made all the difference between an "excellent" and a just a regular stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Again, thank you! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great stay!  One of the best!
Summary: My 18 year-old daughter and I stayed here on a trip to Disneyland. The hotel is super clean and the rooms are huge. Vaulted ceilings throughout and an extra wide tub-shower combo. The beds are comfortable and there isn‚Äôt a lot of noise. We slept great. Complimentary Full hot breakfast in the morning with excellent food.   It‚Äôs far enough from Disney that you get away from the hustle and noise, yet close enough for a few minute drive to the Mickey & Friends parking structure. With easy access just off the freeway.   Hotel is a mix of business and family travelers. Most afternoons we had the pool and hot tub practically to ourselves.  It‚Äôs also near a large nice outlet mall and movie theater. With lots of shops and places to eat.   Great clean beautiful hotel with friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you travellingsiscos!! I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us so much!!  It is satisfied guests such as yourselves that make our jobs here so fun and rewarding.  WE do hope that return to us on your next visit to Disneyland, and again, thank you for your wonderful review. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: It was our first time at an Ayres property and we loved our stay.  The rooms are extremely spacious, comfortable and include both a microwave and mini fridge. I personally love the wide bathtub. There is free wifi everywhere on the property. Parking is plentiful and free, a bonus since many properties in the area charges a daily rate. The pool and whirlpool are underused so we had it all to ourselves both weekend afternoons. The business centre is convenient for those who need to check email or print off e-vouchers for attractions. We also love the free (ice) cold water station located in the lobby - the fresh fruit infused water is super refreshing. The only drawback is breakfast, though decent, hot food selections were limited and lacked variety.  The hotel is conveniently
Manager Response: Pauline,  Wow, "top five choices for Anaheim and Orange County."  My staff and I really appreciate your comprehensive review of the hotel.  I am so happy we met all your needs while staying here and do hope you are able to visit us again in the near future!   Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Super super clean and new rooms, super helpful room service. Hotel is small but has everything a good hotel ought to have. Nice breakfast area. Nice Pool area. Even though close to big freeways, we had no noise at all and had a great sleep (and overall stay). And again, great room service (nice and reliable).
Manager Response: Thank you Christoph B for your "Super" review!!  Thank you for mentioning our quiet rooms and our breakfast and pool areas.  My staff and I look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to Southern California. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Always a Pleasure to Stay at Ayers
Summary: We always enjoy our stay at Ayers whenever we come to Orange on business. Great location, clean rooms, decent breakfast, and free parking. What more could you want?  Oh yes, a great staff of friendly people!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very pleasant stay and the hotel was very clean. Breakfast enjoyable. I would definitely stay at this hotel again. The reception area was welcoming. Parking was good too. They offered free hot and warm cookies along with fresh oranges.
Manager Response: rstrube64, Thank you very much for your review!  We do pride ourselves in being an exceptionally clean hotel and providing extra amenities at a great rate.  We will keep the oranges and cookies coming, along with our free WiFi. We hope to welcome you back on your next rip to our area.  Take care! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: If all hotels were this consistent...
Summary: The Ayres truly stands out among the sea of average to above average hotel chains. I often stay at Hamptons, and I was pleasantly surprised to find the Ayres' consistency from lobby to elevator to hallway to guest room. Although I don't often think about energy consumption, the room key in the light switch was a nice touch.  Oh and free parking...WIN. I paid $32 at a Hampton in PHOENIX for cryin' out loud.  Since I travel to California often for business, I'm definitely going to put the Ayres properties on my radar and stay often.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff is nice and courteous, place is clean, and lots of nice touches.  Really excellent place.  I've stayed at the ALO and AYERS a lot, both great.  Both right next to each other, both good.   Things are clean and there are like probably 10 electric charging stations for cars.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good place to stay in Orange
Summary: I was in Orange for business, but I also has my infant daughter and my mother staying with me. I picked this hotel due to proximity to the office and amenities. The rooms are very large, parking is free, and there is free breakfast and happy hour.  They were helpful about sending a pack n play to the room for my daughter. And it was nice having a refrigerator and microwave in the room.  Overall, the place was nice. Everything felt clean and new.  Water pressure in the shower wasn't great, but this is drought-y California. The food served wasn't special, but it was filling and reasonably tasty.  The only blip in our stay was that someone hit and scratched up my rental car in the parking lot. I wasn't parked near a door, so no security camera caught the crime. But that was the
Manager Response: none

Summary: Prompt check-in. Easy parking. No valet. Spacious, clean, newly decorated, well appointed room. Enjoyed a  Good breakfast. Snack shop. Nice patio and pool area to enjoy a glass of wine. Restaurant open for casual dining after 4:00. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was very clean, nice large rooms and excellent service. A good value!! I would stay there again for sure  Here's what I don't like, my review has to have at least 200 characters...........wasting my time on this survey
Manager Response: Dear K3909ZCjim, I hear your pain!!  I wish I had control over the "200 character" requirement, unfortunately I don't, but I loved how you met the requirement.  I take no offense.  And I am happy to hear we might see you on your next trip to Anaheim/Orange.  Happy travelling! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for a Disneyland trip
Summary: This hotel was so nice and was such a great place for a Disneyland vacation.  That access to the park was a simple 5 to 10 minute drive to the Mickey and friends parking garage.  The hotel was clean and nice and had free parking and a nice pool.  It is right down the street from a large mall with restaurants and shops.  I'd stay here again for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Bob, Thank you for your great review!  We appreciate you mentioning our amenities and how staying with us helped make your Disney vacation one to remember.  Take care and we hope to welcome you back next year! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed at Ayres Hotel Orange for our vacation to Disneyland.  The front desk, maid and kitchen staff were all very professional and kind.  The rooms were always clean and tidy when we returned at the end of the day.  The breakfast buffet was fresh and we enjoyed waking up to it each morning.  We highly recommend this hotel and look forward to staying here once again.
Manager Response: Dear agnetha2011,  Thank you for reviewing the Ayres Hotel Orange!  I am so hapy to hear you enjoyed our breakfast, our high level of cleanliness and especially our staff!!  Should you return to Disneyland we will be happy to again host you and your family. Take care and happy travels, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed at Ayres Hotel Orange because we were attending a concert at Honda Center.  This is a lovely property, everything appears new and the entire hotel is very well appointed. Rooms are very large and comfortable - also quiet.  Breakfast was very nice with freshly cooked eggs and pancakes.  I was impressed and would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: CatherineinLA, Thank you very much for taking the time to write such a nice review.  Our location is indeed great for events at the Honda Center as well as baseball games and the Angels Stadium.  We are also close to Disneyland and the Outlets of Orange so please don't hesitate to stay with us again.  Thank you!! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I had a pleasant stay at Ayres Hotel Orange. The bed was super comfortable (granted, I was exhausted, but I slept like a baby) the room was immaculate and the shower/tub was extra roomy. I loved it! You need to have a room card in order for the lights to work, which I thought was a little strange, but apparently some hotels have this feature as well. It took a little getting used to, but it wasn‚Äôt a deal breaker.
Manager Response: Yikes, I am behind in responding to our wonderful reviews from our awesome guests!!  Thank you very much for your kind review!  And thank you for heads-up to remind my front desk staff to be more thorough in explaining our energy saving device.  I am happy to hear you loved our Ayres Dream Sleeper beds; and we hope to welcome you back in the near future. Take care for now, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel, close to shopping and freeways
Summary: This is the 2nd Ayres hotel we stayed at. This hotel was a nice as the Anaheim kocation. The room was clean and well appointed. We stayed in the two queen beds suite. There is a partition floor to ceiling about half the length of the beds for privacy if you are sharing the room. The tub in the bath was oversized and great for soaking if you have sore muscles. The one problem we encountered was with the fridge, but the staff had the problem resolved in less than 30 min after we alerted the front desk. The maid service was great, we did not partake of the complimentary breakfast (no time) but it smelled delicious as we walked past. The staff was very friendly and went out of their way to be helpful. We would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Claudia, Thank you taking the time to write such a nice review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I so happy you have discovered the Ayres Hotel Group and we hope to make you a regular guest!!  I am very proud of my staff, we really work hard to exceed our guest's expectations and truly love working as one team.  We hope to welcome you back in the near future, take care for now. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent staff and very comfortable room
Summary: The staff knows their way around Disney and the other sites of So. Cal.  They were able to suggest the best way to Universal, the beaches and some very nice fine dining in the area.  They have a stop for the ART bus just up the parking lot.  The pool is nice for family's and those with out the kids on the trip. The breakfast was much more than we anticipated.  the Kitchen staff took care of anyone not familiar with American kitchen tools. (toasters and what not to place in them)
Manager Response: Dear Guest, So you must have experienced the fire alarm going off when someone accidentally  put a croissant in the toaster and it caught on fire.  Even though we have signage, once in awhile someone will ignore the warning.  The good news is our fire alarm system works should there be a real emergency!! Joking aside, thank you very mush for your kind review of the hotel.  I am happy to hear my desk was able to help you with travel information that helped you save time and money.  Take care, and should you return to Southern California in the future, we will be here to welcome you back!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My son & I stayed here for a baseball tournament he had. We loved our stay. The staff was helpful & friendly. The rooms were updated and really nice. The beds were amazing! We just enjoyed being there so much! All of us parents would meet up in the evening in their lobby for their complimentary wine & beer happy hour. Just a sweet little spot.
Manager Response: Thank you Connie, We loved hosting your son's team along with you and the other parents.  And we hope to be able to welcome you all back next year should the tournament return to this area.  Take care for now! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My husband and I stay at this hotel every 3 weeks so I can get medical treatment  nearby. It is clean and I enjoy our stay. Room is comfortable. Staff are friendly. Breakfast is included and good. When I stay at a hotel this property is exactly what I want to stay at. Kudos to this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guests, Thank you very much for your review!  We know that not all hotel stays are for pleasure so I am happy to hear that we provide an warm and welcoming home away from home when you are here for your medical treatments.  Take care and we look forward to seeing again soon. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The rooms were beautifully maintained, and the staff an absolute delight. Very spacious and clean, and incredibly comfortable. Was able to organize a Disneyland shuttle through them, and they were very helpful with all of our queries.
Manager Response: Thank you Tim for your review!  I am happy to hear that you had a wonderful stay and we were able to provide "delightful" service to you and your family.  We hope to welcome you back on your next Disney trip!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The hotel feels brand new.  The room is very spacious and has the most comfortable bed of any hotel I have stayed in.  The staff couldn't be better. I would highly recommend this hotel and you will be glad you selected the Ayres Orange.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your recommendation for future guests of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  And we appreciate you recognizing what a great value our hotel is for the money spent!  We hope to welcome you back should you venture our way in the future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: New hotel, clean rooms, friendly staff, awesome rates... nothing to fault. I stayed here for 3 nights for a family trip to Disneyland and the stay was simply awesome. I will definitely stay here again for my next trip to this part of LA.
Manager Response: Thank you Shane for your "awesome" review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  My staff and I are very happy you found us friendly, the hotel very clean and a great price for the value!  We hope to be able to welcome you back on your next trip to Disneyland. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for six nights and we found that the hotel is a very clean and well run establishment. The rooms are a good size, very comfortable and clean especially the bathroom. The room has a sofa, a good TV plus coffee maker, microwave and a small fridge. The reception area is very nice with a fire and plenty of seating. There is a small shop to purchase drinks, milk and other essentially. In the evening they provide cockies and a voucher for a drink at the bar which is a very nice touch. An example of how this hotel goes the extra mile to differentiate itself and make you feel welcome. I have stayed in all levels of hotels all over the world and this was a really good experience which exceeded our expectations. It was a great base for exploring Southern California and
Manager Response: Dear Tim and Family,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! I am really happy to hear that we "exceeded your expectations", our team goal at the Ayres Orange.  We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.  Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at the Ayres Hotel Orange. If you are planning on going to Disneyland then this is definitely a great choice. Everyone was very helpful and friendly and the shuttle from the hotel to Disneyland was extremely convenient and inexpensive, compared to parking at the park. The hotel itself was very nice and comfortable with a delicious complimentary breakfast. We have nothing negative to say about this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you kevingrffin91 and family!!  I appreciate you taking the time to review our hotel and am happy you were pleased with your stay.  We hope to be able to welcome you back sometime in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: We stayed at this hotel, it was awesome! Clean, nice breakfast, close to everything, shuttle to Disneyland.  We would come again.  The staff was great, nice& very helpful.  The food was great and they have a nice restaurant.  I am very picky about my hotels and this one was a 5 star!
Manager Response: Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Christine Smith Manager

Summary: I stayed here for a conference, and I was amazed at how nice this hotel was. The room was incredibly clean and well-kept. The bathroom was beautiful. We were upgraded to a balcony room (for no extra charge) and that was phenomenal. I will certainly be staying here next time I am in the area! Thanks Ayres Hotel Orange!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed here the last 2 years.  Good breakfast with free Wi-Fi and free parking! It‚Äôs in a convenient area with restaurants and shopping.  If we are in this area again, we will definitely stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you Y M! We hope to welcome you back for a third stay next year!  We appreciate your recommendation for potential future guests! Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary Heading: Sons Wedding at Heritage Museum Santa Ana CA
Summary: We booked 4 nights stay at this hotel for my sons wedding at the Heritage Museum. Many of our guest stayed at this hotel for the wedding and were extremely staisfied with the accommodations. The rooms are very spacious and comfortable. The free breakfast was wonderful with large tables to allow many people gather together. The food was servered warm and tasty. The hotel staff was outstanding and personable.We requested a new iron and within minutes we had a new one delivered. The hotel is conveniently located with many parking spaces. Many of our friends and family commented on what a lovely hotel this was to stay at for the wedding. I would  stay here again if needed. A++ rating
Manager Response: Thank you so much our the "A++" rating!!  I remember your wedding group and the hotel especially enjoys hosting guests who are here for special events, such as your sons wedding.  Everyone is for a happy occasion so our job is to just increase the level of happiness by extending our hospitality and quality of product.  Please congratulate your son and new bride for all of us here at the Ayres Hotel Orange. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We are in Orange several times a year to visit our college age daughter.  We always stay at the Ayres when there are rooms available.  The staff is friendly and helpful, the rooms are large, clean and well designed, the bed is comfortable, and the breakfast is really good.  Although I haven't utilized it, the pool looks nice and it seems to get use from guests and there is also a Disney shuttle.  I love the convenient location and abundant parking as well. We've stayed in more expensve hotels in the area, but honest.y, this one is better for all the above reasons. You really can't go wrong.
Manager Response: Thank you for highlighting what a "great value" staying at the Ayres Hotel is for families and individuals!  We appreciate your comments and hope to welcome you back many times between now and your daughter's graduation from college.  Take care for now. Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Our first visit to an Ayres Hotel, but it will certainly not be the last. The service from checking in to checking out was amazing. The hotel staff couldn‚Äôt do enough to make guests feel welcomed. The rooms were first class and cleaned spotlessly everyday. The breakfast was more than adequate. The free WiFi was also excellent, something our children really liked!!! I would certainly recommend this hotel in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Thank you for your "first class" recommendation!!  We hope you stay with us again so we can welcome you back with our warm hospitality! Sincerely, Christine Smith

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel near Chapman University
Summary: I stayed at the Ayres Hotel Orange with my son during a college tour of Chapman University. It is a visually appealing hotel with friendly staff. My son left his phone charger and they arranged to mail it to us. The complimentary breakfast is tasty and substantial. Eggs, bacon, hashbrowns, yogurt, fruit, cereal.  There is happy hour with complimentary sodas and wine. The sundry, snack & gift shop nook is a nice convenience. There is an atmosphere of environmental responsibility that went that little bit too far. For example, there was a sign at the entrance of the dining room for the complimentary breakfast telling guests not to bring food to their room to minimize food waste. The reason for the Average rating is because the cups in the room were Earthwise single-use, plastic
Manager Response: Dear soon to be College Parent, Thank you for taking the time to review the hotel so thoroughly, I appreciate hearing your comments!  First I am so sorry the sign for breakfast was not clear.  We do encourage our guests to "take all the food they want, but eat all the food you take."  Our request to not take food to the sleeping rooms is not intended to minimize food waste, but instead stop food being accidentally mashed into carpets, spills in the hallways and elevators and uncovered leftovers attracting ants (unfortunately these scenarios happen every day).  I absolutely agree that one use plastic glasses are not environmental friendly.  The hotel opened using glass glasses but after the 60 Minutes show a few years ago that highlighted how unsanitary glass glasses can be in hotel rooms, the majority or our guests requested wrapped plastic glasses, we could not convince our guests that our glass glasses were clean.  Last but not least I am checking with Housekeeping as to our towels and sheets as we pride ourselves in adhering to the Ayres Standard of providing a quality product.  Again, thankyo very much for your insight and comments. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The Ayres Orange is convenient to both Disneyland and the John Wayne airport (SNA).  The rooms are large and comfortable,p.  The free hot breakfast is delicious and so much better than the usual hotel buffet.  There‚Äôs a social hour in the evening with wine, beer and sodas, which was very welcome after a long day with Mickey and Minnie.  Staff was very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  We appreciate both your comments and patronage!!  Hope to see you again on your next trip to see Mickey and Minnie! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed at this beautiful hotel that just felt comfortable from the moment we got there to the moment we left. It‚Äôs only 3 miles away from Disneyland without the Disneyland hotel prices.   We had a yummy complimentary breakfast each morning.  Each day there was a breakfast meat (sausage or bacon) hash browns or potatoes, fresh fruit, pastries, yogurt and more.  The rooms were beautiful & very spacious, we stayed in suite that even had a small balcony which was a nice surprise.  We will definitely be staying here for all of our future Disneyland trips. This hotel is a true Gem.
Manager Response: Thank you Tammy for a great review, myself and my staff enjoyed having you stay with us and loved the Disney themed cookies your daughter made!!  We hope to welcome you back int he near future and thank you for choosing the Ayres Hotel Orange! Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel out of the resort area
Summary: The room was spacious, clean and quiet.  No resort fees.  No parking fees.  Hot breakfast is included.  10 minutes from the convention center.  The whole hotel looks new.  There is a restaurant next door and many more choices a few blocks away.  We had a very nice stay.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear ARG805,  Thank you for taking time to write such a nice review of the hotel.  We value our guest's comments, both positive and the rare negative; and will continue to strive to offer the very best in customer service and the best in cleanliness and quality of product.  Thank you. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I am so glad we chose this hotel.  It was nice and clean everywhere we went.  Beds were pretty firm, which isn‚Äôt my favorite. But I think more people than not prefer them.  the bathroom was huge and I loved that the vanity area was separate so someone could get ready while someone else used the restroom or shower. The breakfast was honestly the best hotel breakfast I have ever had. Actual crispy bacon (most places it‚Äôs soggy and fatty) and fresh pancakes every single day. Not frozen steamed like most places. It was conveniently located to many places which was nice. Staff was so nice and helpful anytime we needed anything.  Loved that they had free WiFi, breakfast and parking, along with amazing rates.  You can‚Äôt beat it.  I also saw security checking cars in the evening so it
Manager Response: Dear oktraveler76, Thank you for your kind review!  Can I hire you to help with "public relations?"  Seriously though, I am so happy to hear that we met and exceeded your expectations in terms of service and quality of product.  My staff and I hope to welcome you back in the near future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We were there for four nights while visiting Disneyland. The shuttle was reasonable and timely. Our room was larger than expected and super clean. The the breakfast was decent - with nice options. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone looking for somewhere to stay in the in Anaheim area. Staff was friendly and accommodating. Due to late nights at Disney it would have been nice if the pool area would have been open earlier that 10am.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you!  I really appreciate your review and am glad you enjoyed the hotel.  Next time you visit just ask the desk to open the pool earlier for you, as long as the chemicals are disbursed and cleaning is done we are happy to open it a little early.  Tell the desk Christine said it was OK.  Take care for now! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Having a daughter at Chapman University I am always trying to find a nice place that is nearby. I felt Ayres was perfect for this kind of stay or for business. The rooms were so clean and nicely decorated. The shower was a prefab type but was brand new. Different then I am used to. Slept great in the bed with great pillows. Very quiet night. Felt like a boutique hotel. I compare it with the DoubleTree by Hilton. Free parking here is a plus and being smaller it is much quicker to get in and out of hotel! Love that. Price was right too!
Manager Response: Dear lisamarie98, It was our pleasure to have you stay with us while visiting your daughter at Chapman University!  We hope to see you often during the next couple of years that your daughter will be in college, and don't forget; the year she graduates make your reservation at least 6 months in advance.  All 3 Ayres Hotels near Chapman fill up quickly for Graduation Weekend.  Take care for now! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: A friendly place of peace and quiet
Summary: I stayed at the Ayers Hotel Orange for my medical visit to UC Irvine.  All the staff were so friendly, I have to compliment them on that.  The room was clean, quiet, and comfortable.  The USB wall outlets where you could charge your electronics was a real plus.  I can't even think of any negatives.
Manager Response: Radiopeg, I am so glad you could not think of any negatives!  and yes, I agree, my staff is friendly really enjoy interacting with all our guests!  Hopefully your next visit to us will be for a non-medical reason and we will look forward to welcoming you back! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for three days for our biannual trip to Disneyland. I wanted to  stay off the Disney strip so we picked this place, primarily because we have always had great experiences at Ayres hotels. This location is newer than most and actually has an elevator which is nice. The hotel is lovely and very clean. The parking is ample and the breakfast is good. We stayed on the freeway side and I thought I was going to lose my mind the first day because it was loud. By the second day I couldn't even hear the noise anymore. Clean, modern, friendly, free parking,free wifi and free breakfast!! You can't go wrong choosing this hotel for your stay.
Manager Response: Dear LLLfromAZ, Thank you for taking the time to write such a nice review of the hotel.  I apologize your sleep was disturbed the first night but happy tohear it went away the last nights of your stay.  I appreciate your recommendation to potential future guests and hope to be able to welcome you back again in the future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: One word says it all ..... ‚ÄúAmazing‚Äù yet I must add !!!
