Reservations, Check-in - Convenience of Room - Room pristine - Room Amenities - Parking .... and BEST of all professional and warm Staff makes up AMAZING!  640 Radio Guru‚Äôs John & Ken .... thanks for highlighting Ayers Hotel of Orange CA
Manager Response: Dear Wonderful Guest, Thank you very much for your "AMAZING" review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am so glad we meet all your needs and exceeded your expectations!  Take care for now and we do hope to see you again in the near future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The hotel was not bad. The room was clean and the hotel was convenience to the Anaheim Convention center. I flew in for a convention. The hotel was courteous enough to receive in a ton of boxes that were shipped. However, I received a nasty gram that said unless I remove my boxes I would be charged $500 dollars. I did not appreciate that, especially since we had a block of rooms in which we paid around $12k dollars for! The breakfast was okay. Nothing to write home about.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the hotel.  Yes a note was left in your room advising you that if the boxes were left after your departure you would then be charged a $500 disposal fee.  The hotel accepted 25 boxes, each 2 1/2 ft x 2 1/2 ft and stored them several days prior to your group's arrival.  The note was left only after the hotel was told the boxes would be removed by Thursday evening, they were not and messages left on voice mail went unanswered.  At no time did anyone from your group communicate with the desk as to what was happening with the boxes, even after the note was left.  We luckily had a vacant meeting room over the weekend where the boxes could be stored, and where you were able to repackage for FedEx to pick up on Monday. The majority of other Anaheim hotels accepting boxes for the trade show charge a per day fee per box, the Ayres Hotel graciously chose not to charge any of our trade show guests for storing boxes.  Again, thank you for your review.

Summary: Had to make an extra booking and called the hotel directly, was able to talk to the GM and she help me to get an extra room immediately.  Am impressed with their services and throughout my stay the staff are all extremely friendly and was able to answer all of my questions with a big smile.  Room are huge if compared to other hotel in the area, I had a wonderful time at Ayres Orange.
Manager Response: Albert, It was my pleasure to help you get a room at the hotel during the very busy Natural Products Convention in the area.  I am happy to hear you enjoyed the hotel and we would love to welcome you and company back again next year! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The Ayres Hotel Orange is part of a collection of family owned and operated boutique hotels.  It shows in the pride the general manager Christine Smith and staff take in ensuring guests are treated like family.   Thank you for a great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you Cynthia for your review!  I really enjoyed talking to you and learning about your business and sharing some of the Ayres Family history with you.  Should you travel this way in the future, we look forward to welcoming back to the Ayres Hotel Orange! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great location, wonderful staff, beautiful hotel
Summary: The staff was friendly and helpful. Our room and the hotel was very clean and comfortable. Close proximity to Disneyland.  The breakfast offered a lot of different options. Would definitely stay here again. Loved it!
Manager Response: Thank you "LovingAyres!" I am so happy to hear how much you loved the hotel and all of our amenities.  We do hope we will be able to welcome you back on your next trip to Disneyland!  Take care for now. Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great value for money and location
Summary: Stayed for one night and was very pleased.  Clean room, friendly service. Can‚Äôt ask for more  Just the complimentary breakfast was a bit down, but I don‚Äôt expect hotels offer extraordinary meals for the price you paid  I‚Äôd consider this hotel again if I come back
Manager Response: Thank you jhonnux, I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your stay at the Ayres Hotel Orange.  And thank you in advance for considering to stay with us again should you return to the Orange/Anaheim area! Safe travels, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I booked a reservation at the last minute. The hotel was beautiful, the Staff was amazing especially the Director of Sales. Johanna Belfer.   I will recommend this hotel to everyone that is traveling to Orange County. The location is great.  Thank you so much!
Manager Response: Thank you onblessedgal!!  I agree that my staff and Jhoanna are all amazing, we take great pride in our guest service skills and work hard to make every guest feels special.  We do hope to welcome you back again int he near future!  Take Care. Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Ayres Hotel Orange from 2/23/18 to 2/26/18.  Let me just say that the cleanliness of the hotel and the friendly staff made our stay extremely enjoyable.  The complimentary breakfast was also excellent.  The management at the hotel does a great job making sure everything is done to a T.  The cleanliness of this hotel is second to none.  The beds are very comfortable and the room/bathroom is spacious.  It is also conveniently close to the I-5.  Next time we visit the area, we will definitely be staying at this hotel!  Thank you Ayres Hotel Orange!  See you next time!
Manager Response: JessicaC, I am so pleased to hear that you will be a returning guest the next time you and your family visit our area, that means a lot to myself and my staff!  Thank you for recognizing our superior level of cleanliness and overall comfort of our rooms.  And see you next time! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Ayres Orange is our go to hotel when in Orange County. The staff is friendly, welcoming and very gracious. The hotel is super clean, quiet, and updated. The breakfast is a terrific perk with good food! Can't recommend the Ayres properties enough. Make the reservation - you won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you Rob!!  And thank you for recommending Ayres Hotels to potential future guests! Christine Smith Manager

Summary: Loved our stay here!!! There was hot breakfast everyday and complimentary happy hour with wine, beer and cookie every M-Th. Free parking. The front desk were very helpful and always smile on their faces. The facilities are clean especially the room. Housekeepers are nice as well. Very happy with our first stay here. Highly recommended! 10 mins drive from Disney
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: We stayed because it was close to Disneyland!
Summary: The hotel was very clean, and staff was friendly! The rooms were very spacious and was enough room for my toddler to run around. The bathrooms on the main floor do not have changing tables, which was inconvenient  when i wanted to change my toddler after breakfast.  There was something for everyone at the complimentary breakfast, and the cooks were accommodating.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was our second stay at the Ayres Orange, and we really like the hotel!  The breakfast is good, rooms are clean, the beds are comfortable, and the large soaking bathtub is so nice after a long day at Disney!  The Disney shuttle comes every hour and is located just outside the neighboring ALO hotel (which is only a few steps away), and the shuttle was much more reliable this stay than our previous.  The staff is extremely friendly and helpful, too!  We are annual pass holders, and this is our new go-to hotel.  Wifi was reliable, too, which is necessary when I need to work.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: I wouldn‚Äôt Choose any other place...
Summary: After a sudden change of plans, living situation and the whole 9 yards - I found this hidden gem ‚Äú Ayres Hotel ‚Äú since Summer of 2017   Pregnant w/ 3 kids which doesn‚Äôt come often as I-am still running my small business in OC - driving back and forth from Las Vegas every other week... thinking I should find a small place to rent locally-well that didn‚Äôt happen...  I was staying at the Sheraton n found Ayres at Orange at the Block ‚Äî from there, problem solved...  The Staff are amazing, from Cory to Chris, Christine and 4 other amazing Ladies at the Frontdesk and the 4 breakfast crew in the kitchen who makes the place so much more special.   The rooms are very roomy and comfy. We have been bringing our infant since he was less than 2 weeks old, every other week since. I work
Manager Response: And we look forward to welcoming you back each and every time you and your family check in.  We love watching your son grow up, but a little quickly.  Time goes by too fast!  Thank you for your review and for choosing the Ayres Hotel Orange as your "Home away from Home!" Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: friendly staff, overall nice hotel and location great nice wine and happy hour complimentary week days breakfast great but after many stays, need to update or change up  would recommend to everyone, great stay
Manager Response: Thank you codyjayfox for your review!  I am pleased to let you know that after many many months of the same breakfast items being severed we are sitting down with our breakfast cooks to see how we can change up the menu a bit.  Take care and wehope to see you again soon. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Great hotel and location with a nice breakfast but our room was near the elevator and the on the street so it was very noisy.  We also had noise from the room above at 11 pm.  Called the front desk and they took care of the loud group above us.  Ayres should seriously consider better sound insulation in future build outs.
Manager Response: Dear IC, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I appreciate that your overall review was good, highlighting our location and breakfast but I would like to apologize for you having to endure a loud group of guests above you.  The dates you stayed we did have a wedding party who did celebrated a little too loudly as we had several complaints.  I have forwarded your comments to our corporate office as we are building three new Ayres Hotels in Southern California in the next year. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Loved the Ayres Orange. Pay attention to the address, The City Drive. There‚Äôs an Ayers close to here on Kattela. Loved: good wine at happy hour, perfect WiFi (easily streamed the Olympics), oranges in the lobby, all staff really friendly, very clean, free parking, full great breakfast. I almost don‚Äôt want to share this so I can get a room next time! but honestly these guys are hitting it out of the park, they deserve this.
Manager Response: Thank you Makooda7 for your wonderful review of the Ayres Hotel Orange (and yes, not to be confused with the Ayres Hotel Anaheim).  I am so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and that we exceeded your expectations.  We will look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!.  Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The location and amenities were perfect. The room was clean and as others have mentioned, their breakfast buffet is outstanding. The front desk staff was friendly and accommodating. Very nice experience, we will definitely stay there again if we are in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you bjfierro! I really appreciate it when guests take the time to review our hotel, it means a lot when their sentiments are genuine.  I will post this review as I do with all reviews, for our team to read and know their work ethic and attention to detail are appreciated,  Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: We return to this hotel whenever in the Anaheim area because it is always clean, breakfast is great, front desk personnel are very pleasant, and for the area, the price is reasonable for the great value!!! Keep it up, Ayres!!
Manager Response: Thank you Susan, we will "keep it up!"  And thank you for mentioning what a great value staying with us is: parking, breakfast and WiFi all included in our competitive rates.  Take care for now and we look forward to your next visit! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Hotel is always clean, breakfast is great and people are nice.  Can't beat the hotel, close to almost everything.  We had a great time at the hotel nice an quiet even when families were present.  If you are going to Disney, Angels or Duck check out Ayres.
Manager Response: Dear Travelhistorian, Thank you very much for your kind review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  And thank you for mentioning our location; we are indeed close to the Honda Center, Angel's Stadium, Disney Resort and the Outlets of Orange.  We hope your next trip will be for leisure and look forward to welcoming you back.  Take care! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: From ALO to Ayres Hotel Orange
Summary: We've stayed in Ayres ALO in previous years and really liked it there, so we thought we'd try the new Ayres Hotel Orange.  It is truly a beautiful place to stay - great accommodations, and it was one of the quietest hotels we've experienced.  The folks are all really nice there.  We went to Disneyland/California Adventure each day, and it's nice that the shuttle goes directly there and back, without any stops.  Our big complaint is the breakfast.  It's a major reason we like to stay at hotels like this that include the breakfast.   Every day (all four breakfasts), the pancakes were somewhat burnt (dark brown or black) on at least one side of the pancake.  I even watched the gal cook them one day and she left them on so long, I wanted to say something.  Sure enough dark and
Manager Response: Dear Guests, I am so sorry your had a negative experience while guests here at the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am very embarrassed as our breakfasts normally get high raves from our guests.  We did have a substitute cook for a week, but that is not an excuse; substitute or not the hotel should have maintained the same high standards that we are known for.  I wish I had been made aware of what was going on at the time, and I have spoken with my staff to always give a shout out when another staff member needs help so we can all pitch in and remedy a poor service situation.  Thank you for your honest comments and I would like to invite you to try us again in future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We decided to try the Ayres Hotel chain, and stayed at their location in Orange after comparing reviews and prices.  It's a short drive from Disneyland and actually a stop for ART (Anaheim Resort Transport) if you'd rather go that route.  The facilities were all modern, up to date, and comfortable.  The staff were particularly helpful, friendly, and attentive.  It was our first time staying at an Ayres hotel and won't be the last.
Manager Response: Thank you Michael for taking the time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am especially pleased to hear that this stay will not be your last!  I love that you used the word "chain" hotel as the Ayres Hotel company is family owned and been competing with the "big chain" hotels for the last 30 years.  Our hotels can be found throughout Southern California with one hotel, the Allegretto Hotel by Ayres located in Paso Robles.  Again, thank you for your kind review and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great stay at NAMM...for the first time
Summary: Really like staying in this hotel during this busy time of NAMM.  The hotel is relaxed and not crowded at the same time, you are not far from NAMM. Many things to eat around the area...Lucille's just right at the corner. Outlet is not far away.  Staffs are great and helpful.  Most importantly, got great sleep in the very comfy bed.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your great review!  Your comments are appreciated and we hope to see you back next year for NAMM.  and yes, Lucille's BBQ restaurant is just down the street and is delicious.  Our location is central to many other great restaurants as well, everything form fast food to brew pubs to chain restaurants and fine dining.  See you next year!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Hotel Does Not Honor Its Best Rate Guarantee
Summary: I had the most frustrating experience with the hotel's Central Reservations representative that I have ever had with a hotel. I found a lower rate on TripAdvisor and I submitted a claim to the hotel under their Best Rate Guarantee Policy within 24 hours after the booking. They replied that they couldn't independently verify the rate and so they would not honor their policy, Instead, they offered me a small discount to the rate that I had booked through them. When I pressed them on this and sent them screenshots of the rate on TripAdvisor, they insisted that it was not publicly available and they still refused to honor the lower rate,. They then also cancelled their prior offer to discount the rates as a courtesy.  So, be forewarned - their "Best Rate Guarantee: is a sham.
Manager Response: Dear Jann M.,  Thank you for taking the time to provide a thorough review regarding your communications with our team member(s). Unfortunately, after reviewing the communication and policies regarding our Best Rate Guarantee Claim Form, it appears the offer you saw on the mobile website was not publicly available. This means, if the team member cannot view the rate, they cannot match the rate, and therefore, the rate is not publicly available. Our team member did offer a rate lower than the rate you had requested and you responded with a decline of that offer. With that statement, our team member ensured no changes were made to the reservation as you had requested. My sincere apologies for any inconvenience you have experienced.  Warmly,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Love this location ;) Love the rooms and the breakfast  It‚Äôs very clean and very accommodating . We found the downtown area and the food down there was amazing  Also it was a good area to go in the daytime to look around at the shops. The outlets are in walking distance and you can find some great deals !
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great Service and clean rooms and very quiet!!! The service was nice and very helpful. The Sunday breakfast was great as well. So close to the freeway, shops ,and restaurants. Great location Recommend staying here. I know I will stay here if I'm in the area again
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind review!  The hotel and staff appreciate your recommendation to potential future guests and we do hope you are able to make your way back here to the Ayres Hotel Orange in the near future! Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary Heading: Always a pleasure to stay here
Summary: We ‚ù§Ô∏èStaying @ Ayres hotels. They are beautiful and they consistently make us feel like valued guests! Great breakfast included with room. Nice proximity to anything in Orange County. We don‚Äôt stay anywhere else
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you! Christine Smith Manager

Summary Heading: Hi Ho it's off to work I go!
Summary: This was the second stop and week 2 traveling for work.  I did not know what to expect as this was my  first time to stay at this hotel and was impressed with the room, breakfast and most of all the customer service .  I am definitely going  back again and looking forward to the stay.
Manager Response: David, So glad to hear you found the Ayres Hotel Orange and that you enjoyed your stay with us!  My staff and I work hard to create a "home away from home", whether our guests are here on business or pleasure.  We will keep the welcome mat out for you and we hope to see you int he near future! Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: This hotel is close to freeways, good food and resorts. The room was not ready at the 3pm check-in time but staff allowed us to use the business center while we waited. We got into the room at 3:30 and it was clean and nice. We have stayed here before and will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guests, Thank your for reviewing the Ayres Hotel Orange and for being a return guest.  I really appreciate you understanding when your room was not ready by 3:00 pm.  Check-in time is at 3:00 pm and 99% of time all rooms are ready by then, but once in a while we miss that deadline due to a high number of guests who  linger in their rooms well past the check-out time of 12 noon.  A domino effect ensues and a few guests then have to wait a bit past 3:00 pm to check-in.  My staff and I will look forward to welcoming you back again in the future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: First time but not the last
Summary: This is the first time my wife and I have stayed at an Ayers property. It most certainly won‚Äôt be the last. We enjoyed comfy beds, a very clean room, extremely helpful and kind staff, and a very good breakfast. Thank you!
Manager Response: Nick, Thank you for your TripAdvisor review!  I am pleased to hear that you and your wife were first time guests to an Ayres Hotel and that our service and quality has won you over.  For your next trip to Southern California check the Ayres Hotels website, I am sure that one of our 22 hotels will be near your destination.  Take care for now! Sincerely, Christine Smith  General Manager

Summary: Excellent location and very nice, new hotel.  We really enjoyed everything. The breakfast buffet was a nice touch so that we didn't have to leave the hotel in search of food early in the morning.  We were also surprised at how close the hotel was to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Cindy, So glad you enjoyed the hotel and especially for such a happy occasion!  And yes, we are very close to Disneyland so should you return to visit the Mouse, we will be here for you and your family.  Take care for now and again thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Excellent place to stay. Spacious rooms and very well kept. Great home away from home. Location is superb at the confluence of I-5 and CA22. Easy to get anywhere in Orange and Anaheim from here. Freeway noise is not a factor in the hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you A2135BUjohnd, Thank you for your kind review!  And I couldn't agree more, that the hotel's location is central to everywhere you would want to go in Orange and Anaheim.  We hope that we can welcome you back as a return guest in the near future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The Ayres Hotel Orange is an extremely clean, classy, and well-maintained property located just ten minutes from Disneyland. I found the staff very friendly and the hotel's amenities were above those found in most three star hotels. The only problem I had with the property was an extremely lead-footed guest in the room above me, and a noisy mini fridge.
Manager Response: Jonathan,  Thank you for your review, I really appreciate hearing feedback from our guests.  I am so sorry the mini-refrigerator was noisy, hopefully you let us know at the desk so we took care of the problem.  And should you ever have a "lead-footed" guest about you int he future, please let us know so we can contact the guest and request they thread a little more lightly.  We do hope to see you back in the future!  And, again, thank you for your review. Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: I have stayed at 6 3-star hotels around Santa Ana and this has become my favorite. It does not feel like a soulless chain, it's got some character. The rooms are spacious. The happy hour in the lobby is a great way to end a work day. The complimentary breakfast is good and has lots of variety, not just cereal and bagels. Free parking. Good, free wi-fi. This is now my go-to place when I do business in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you M S, I am very happy to hear that the Ayres hotel Orange has become your "go-to" hotel when you are int he area on business.  Thank you for noting our complimentary amenities which all go a long way to help both the business person or Disney families save money when travelling to the Orange Anaheim area.  We will look forward to welcoming you back and for now take care. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: To me staying in a hotel is all about service and being able to sleep. I had a Groupon deal and should have figured that the Front Desk were likely to give me a less favorable room as a result. Indeed, they first stuck me facing the freeway and then on the second floor. I said I am a very light sleeper - please did they have something on the top floor as I can't sleep when I hear people above me. Though I checked in at 3pm, the answer was a curt no (lady checking me in, young Hispanic lady for any managers reading). Sure enough I had a leadfoot above me pacing and as a result lost my sleep.  This is a new hotel but I guess they didn't invest in soundproofing.  They really didn't invest in training their staff at listening to their guests either. The Groupon still wasn't cheap.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I must however remind you that the young lady did acknowledge your request for an upper floor, she placed you in a 3rd floor room with triple pane glass facing the freeway.  The hotel has not received any noise complaints from guests in these rooms.  Upon your return to the desk the young lady let you know that if you wanted to move, the only rooms left on the upper floors were facing the street which you did not want.  She moved you to a room on the second floor, the only room left that was not facing the freeway or the street, it faced our interior courtyard.  The desk did not hear from you as to noise during the evening which we would have gladly handled on your behalf.  I would like to apologize for your experience and welcome you to contact me directly. Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: This hotel was easy access, parking was never a problem and the front desk was always very helpful and professional. The room was clean and bright. The cleaning staff always left the room with clean towels and anything else you would ask for. Sometimes because of being next to a medical center it was a bit noisy with sirens. Nothing that wasn't easy to deal with though. That had a great breakfast buffet also. I would highly recommend this hotel
Manager Response: Thank you Vicki for your recommendation to other future guests!  So glad you enjoyed your stay overall and I will pass on your review as I do all reviews, to all staff to see their work is appreciated. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: #1 Hotel in Area for Good Reason!
Summary: If you're not familiar with Ayres Hotels, rest assured you will enjoy your stay here.  Rooms are big and spacious, so is the shower.  They are well lit, have plenty of outlets, a little fridge and coffee maker.  Speaking of outlets its close to the Outlets at Orange and not too far from Disney, walking distance to Starbucks. It's hard to beat the location.   Free wine, beer and cookies in the large lobby at Happy Hour, But no free bottled water in your room.  Breakfast is included and there is something for everyone.  They have a nice selection of hot sauce for the eggs, which I find particularly delightful.  But my favorite part is Anepalco restaurant is on the property and that place is a destination itself.
Manager Response: ScottD58 Thank you Scott for writing such a great review!  My kitchen staff is always after me to increase the selection of hot sauces we have available so your email is timely, glad you appreciate our variety.  And thank you for mentioning Anepalco's Restaurant.  For future guests, Anepalco's is located in our sister hotel the ALO, with whom we share a parking lot.  Anepalco's is a hip, cutting edge restaurant serving  Mexican French fusion cuisine.  Their Yelp reviews are phenomenal.  Thank you Scott for this tip for our guests and we look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: The hotel is new so the design of floors and rooms has been thoughtful with adequate storage space and lighting. The breakfast was very good with real scrambled eggs and real pancakes as opposed to the nasty food served for complimentary breakfasts at other competing hotels (the kind that involved powdered eggs in a bag and pour-your-own-waffle). Disney shuttle bus comes to the hotel and there is nice parking. WiFi was excellent and the fitness room is spacious.
Manager Response: Thank you WarPaintWithYoga! I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed all of our amenities from breakfast to WiFi to fitness center.  My staff and I really appreciate when we get such positive feedback.  Take care for now and hope to see you again for your next Disneyland trip. Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary Heading: Felt like a Boutique or Family Owned Hotel! So personalized! Wonderful Hotel!
Summary: Our experience with Ayres Hotel Orange exceeded our expectations!  The rooms felt so luxurious!  It was very clean and well planned to make each guest comfortable!  The bathrooms were very spacious as well as the room.  The staff were also very accommodating  and friendly!  highly recommend this hotel!  Convenient to a lot of restaurants and parks!  15-20 minutes away from Knotts Berry Farm and Disneyland.  Also very near to malls.  Loved everything about this hotel!
Manager Response: Hi Lilli Ann, Yes we are a family owned hotel and I am so glad you felt the difference in our ability to make you feel welcome and in providing that "boutique" hotel feeling.  The Ayres Hotel Group is a Southern California family owned and operated hotel company that is ever expanding throughout SoCal.  Next to open will be a hotel in Chula Vista with more on the drawing boards.  For other Ayres Hotels check out our website ayreshotels. com.  Thank you for staying and we hope to welcome you back in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Hotel Ayres is very clean, rooms are huge, loads of space, we're a family of 5 with children under the age of 9. The beds were excellent, located near theme parks, great front office staff that we're very accommodating.
Manager Response: David Thank you and your family for choosing to stay at the Ayres Hotel Orange, I love the family photo!  So glad you enjoyed the Ayres Dream Sleeper mattresses, we get many compliments on our beds.  Take care for now ans we hope to see you on your next trip to the Orange/Anaheim area. Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: We booked the king suite at this hotel to stay after an event at Angel's Stadium. Very nice staff. Beautiful, boutique entry. We were surprised that breakfast was included. The pool looked nice, although we didn't stay long enough to use it. We're definitely planning to stay here again. It's close to Disneyland and Angel's Stadium.
Manager Response: Thank you Elizabeth for taking the time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am happy that you enjoyed your first visit us and especially that you will be back as return guest in the future!  Along with being close to the Angel' Stadium and Disneyland, we are also very close to the Outlets of Orange, UCI Medical Center and Chapman University.  Take care for now and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Great experience!  From the moment we stepped into the lobby to the time we left we were very pleased.  Honestly, we prefer to stay in our motor home and our own bed, hotels are not something we look forward to after traveling for work for years.  This was our first time staying at an Ayers Hotel and I can honestly say we look forward to staying again at this location or another.  EVERYTHING was sparkling clean and fresh and the room was cozy, comfortable and exceptionally well cared for.  Every employee we encountered was friendly and helpful, customer service was practiced to the letter.  Thank you for a great time!
Manager Response: Thank you RVCrzy for letting us know we provided an "outstanding experience" for you!  Thank you for acknowledging our high level of guest service, we continually strive to provide a warm and welcoming atmosphere for your guests.  Hope we can coax you out of your RV again in the future and look forward to welcoming you back! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: 12/30/2017 - 01/02/2018, I frequently stay at this location, at least 1x per month
Summary: I recently stayed at the Ayres Orange location 12/30/2017 - 01/02/2018, I frequently stay at this location, at least 1x per month. I was extremely disappointed in this stay. I was not able to check in to my room til 4:30pm, which made me late to my dinner plans at 5 pm, my room keys would not work, and housekeeping knocked on my door at 9:30am even though there was a do not disturb sign hanging on the door.
Manager Response: Thank you Jennifer for your review.  In reviewing your guest history file with us and seeing how many nights you have stayed with us over the last three years, I can‚Äôt believe I have not yet met you in person.  Christopher and the rest of the front desk staff all know you and take great care in automatically upgrading you to your preferred patio King room, allowing early check-in when possible and making sure Housekeeping is aware of your request for extra towels during your stays.  I am very sorry that last week the desk was not able to check you in until after 3:00pm.  As the desk knows your preference for patio rooms, they assigned you 135, the only patio room available on the 30th.  The prior guest in 135 checked out late which in turn caused Housekeeping to clean 135 later than normal.  Again, my apologies that this time you were made to wait.  Also I have spoken to Housekeeping in regards to staff knocking on your door with your DND sign visible, my apologies again. We have now emailed each other regarding this stay and I look forward to meeting you in person on your next visit in February! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Good hotel with below average shuttle service s
Summary: Good hotel. Not too far from Disneyland. Won't stay here again if we visit Disneyland. Shuttle service only runs once an hour and wasn't consistent, doesn't even pick up by Ayers only at property next to it.   Not ideal.
Manager Response: Thank you kamimarie16 for your review!  I am so sorry that you were disappointed in the ART shuttle to Disneyland.  I will be forwarding your comments to the ART staff and management.  Last week was probably the busiest week for them all year and I have to say that their service has been stellar since September, with the exception of last week.  The ALO Hotel sharing the parking lot with the Ayres Hotel Orange is an Ayres Hotel and due to the traffic configuration of the parking lots, it is the most efficient place for large shuttles to pull in and out.  I apologize that my staff did not make you aware that both hotels are Ayres and we share the one stop.   With the exception of the shuttle I am glad you enjoyed the hotel overall. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Really nice and clean, breakfast was good every morning, close to disney, Everyone was accommodating and pleasant to speak with.  Also washed some clothes while i was there and that was easy and everything was clean. They made really yummy cookies daily -that was my favorite part of the stay :)
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you!  I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and we will keep those cookies coming!  We hope to welcome you back in the near future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Outstanding hotel great for families and business
Summary: This is a new hotel with modern furnishings, very clean and well kept with large rooms.  The Ayers Orange is right across the street from the UC Irvine Medical campus, a block away from the Outlets at Orange and only a 5-10 minute drive from Disneyland.  The hotel is also on the ART route that goes to Disneyland hourly.  I highly recommend the hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Always enjoy staying at Ayers Hotel Orange. Rooms are clean and comfortable, Staff members are very pleasant and accomodating. The daily breakfast is very nice. Like the little area they have next to front desk for beverage and snack purchases.
Manager Response: Thank you Veronica for taking time to write such a nice review of the hotel.  I am glad you enjoyed your stay and we do hope you make our way again int he future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The Ayres hotel is a wonderful place to stay. The facilities, location and feel of the Ayres makes me want to return. But the best feature is the people! Every employee was happy, friendly and over the top helpful.   This is where I will stay when I travel back to California next month.
Manager Response: Thank you Doug for your kind review and especially acknowledging our staff and their guest service.  We work hard to create and maintain a work place atmosphere where we all enjoy coming to work, enjoy our jobs and especially the interaction with our guests.  We hope to welcome you back in the near future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Love this hotel! Staff is super friendly, rooms are specious, super clean, very comfi and nicely decorated. Love the happy hour and breakfast is good. Although it's a big hotel, it feels very cozy and personal. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Thank you Lucy! I really appreciate when our guests take the time to let us know we have accomplished our goals of making guests feel taken care of and comfortable.  And thank you for your recommendation to future potential guests!   Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: This was one of our favourite places to stay, it was lovely and the room was big with lots of storage and space to move. We had a King Studio Patio room stepping right onto the pool and in my opinion was the best room in the place. Breakfast was great as well and free parking an absolute plus. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you Lauren for you recommendation to potential future guests of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  The King Patio rooms are requested all the time, I only wish we had more of them for our guests.  And yes, all our rooms are spacious with lots of storage.  Thank you for your comments and we hope to see you again soon! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We loved this Hotel There are lots of Pluses   Best things:  1. affordable price compared to other Disneyland hotels nearby 2. Huge spacious rooms (none of the other hotel chains like Hilton, Mariott, Sheraton can give this)  3. Very clean Lobby and rooms 4. Very friendly staff who can attend to even small details and help   5. Free parking  6. Transportation to Disneyland 7. Breakfast included  8. Even though the hotel is near I-5 the rooms are quiet and couldn't hear the noise in the room ( we stayed in the room facing the interstate)   Opportunities:  1. More options for Breakfast ( we stayed couple of nights and had pretty much same things on both days)   Negative: 1. Need Car for other areas  (other than Disneyland)   We will stay here again and recommend to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you Vijay for your comprehensive review of the hotel!  Loved the way you listed "best" things, "opportunities" and "negative."  One of our goals for 2018 is to look at our breakfast menu and change things up a bit, so thank you for your encouragement in that area.  And yes, our guests do need a car for areas other than Disneyland, Angels Stadium and the Outlets of Orange.  Thank you for your recommendation and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: New, spotless, spacious room, tastefully decorated.  2Q beds perfect for family of 4, with fridge and microwave.  Breakfast was superior, hot items continually replenished and excellent Harney & Sons teas.  Great location for Disney, a very quick ride ($5-7 one way) by Uber.  Staff is friendly and warm.  Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you jengalang for your wonderful review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  So glad you enjoyed breakfast, and that the room met the needs of your family!  We look forward to welcoming you and your family back the next time you are going to Disneyland!  Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Ayres for a quick trip to Orange County. The room was clean and the bed was very comfortable. The hotel finishes are current, so the environment is pleasant. Ayres offers a free breakfast, but I can‚Äôt for the life of me understand the trend toward reconstituted powdered eggs. They‚Äôre gross and I hate starting my day with bad food choices. Brought the experience down a notch for me and I‚Äôd pick another place next time.
Manager Response: Rebecca, Thank you for your review of the hotel, glad you enjoyed the bed and overall atmosphere of the hotel.  I do need to let you know that the hotel does not use powdered eggs, we use whole liquid eggs.  I am sorry you were not able to find good breakfast choices from the fresh fruit, granola, juices, oatmeal, yogurt, pancakes, pastries and breads we also serve at breakfast, and I welcome any other suggestions you would have.  Thank you for taking your time to review the hotel. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: we will stay in this hotel again so clean beautiful rooms awesome atmosphere in lobby and very close to disney we are just sorry we did not book for 2 nites thought we would drive home after disney but decided to stay and they were booked.
Manager Response: So sorry we were booked up when you tried to stay an additional night!  During the Holidays the hotel does fill up quickly but we definitely look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  So happy to hear you enjoyed the hotel and appreciated the high level of our cleanliness.  Take care until your next visit!. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: A winner after an exhausting day
Summary: This is our 3rd stay at this location and I'm happy to say our experience was top drawer.  I always look for something to mention to management so they could improve.  In this location, it's hard to do.  I would like to see an addition to the gym that allows for a back exercise or stretch but that's about it.  Sounds like a pretty meager request but, like I said, this place is the best.
Manager Response: Thank you Warren for another great review!  So happy we have met your expectations on three consecutive stays and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.  The gym does have the yoga mats for getting down and stretching out backs but I will also look for another piece of equipment that might work a little better for you. Thank you for you suggestion! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: The friendly and helpful Ayres Hotel Orange
Summary: This hotel offers great value, quiet , yet centrally located and very close to the UCI Medical Center( right across the street) .Breakfast are huge and very nice, rooms are large and quiet, and the staff are very friendly. There is free parking for your car as well.   I have stayed there 6 times over the past year and enjoyed every time
Manager Response: Thank you Tim! I am very pleased to hear you have enjoyed the hotel over the last year.  My staff and I pride ourselves on providing "friendly and supportive" service to our guests, and appreciate you letting us know we have succeeded.  Take care for now and Happy Holidays! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The Ayers Hotels are always a go to for me. But the Ayers in Orange really stepped it up a notch. Always helpful, clean rooms, very close to my business destination. The complementary breakfast was great. I had never used Uber and the staff was more than helpful in assisting me. I will stay again!
Manager Response: Dear sreed92253, Thank you for your review and we were very happy to give you an Uber tutorial!  many of our guests are taking advantage of Uber, and there are always close by drivers minutes away from our location.  We do hope to welcome you back in the future! Happy Holidays! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This was our first time at this hotel, and we will definitely book again.  The room was very clean, with a nice layout. I especially like the sink separate from toilet and shower area, and the fact that there is a shower stall rather than tub with shower curtain. There was plenty of space to hang clothes and store luggage. The hotel is just a short drive to Disneyland, which was one reason we chose to book it through Groupon. They offered free parking and breakfast, and the hotel staff were very friendly. Our room faced the freeway, but we did not hear traffic noise.
Manager Response: 702dleon, Thank you for taking advantage of our Groupon Promotion!  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed the hotel and we met all your expectations.  Keep an eye out for our special promotions, they and go and we love that we get new guests that might not have tried us otherwise.  WE hope to welcome you back in the near future. Happy Holidays, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: An excellent hotel that I stay-in every month when I have to come to Orange County
Summary: This hotel is great because it is fairly new, the rooms are a nice size, the staff is very friendly, and the included breakfast is not your average cold hard boiled eggs and cereal. There is a hot breakfast buffet, with fruit and a nice dining area and outside space to have breakfast.  I highly recommend this property
Manager Response: Dan, thank you very much for taking your time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange.  We appreciate your comments and thank you for your recommendation to other potential guests.  Happy Holidays! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The hotel was clean, modern, and comfortable. The staff was welcoming and efficient. The included breakfast bar was very good, and a great added value. Overall this is one of the best hotel bargains around.
Manager Response: Thank you Derek for letting us know what a "great experience" you had while a guest at the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am glad you enjoyed our breakfast and hope you will be back in the future.  thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Staff was friendly, check in was great and our room was clean and looked brand new! The rate for our room was a good deal for what what you get! Also the free breakfast was good! I would definitely recommend you try out the Ayers hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you Robert for your recommendation to other potential guests at the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am pleased that you felt you received "value" for the price you paid.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Wonderful hotel.  Staff is the best!  Couldn't have been a better stay.
Summary: I have stayed at other Ayres hotels and have always had a great experience.  I have some special requests and they always take care of me.  This hotel is very clean, the staff is phenomenal (very helpful, kind and quick to help).  The rooms are nice and spacious.  The beds are comfy, the wireless worked great.  The breakfast was great (fresh and hot) every morning.  I thoroughly enjoyed staying at this hotel.  I stayed for a week.  I don't think you could do better than this hotel.  Also, close to freeways, food, and shopping.
Manager Response: Dear wtrotten1, Thank you for taking your time to review the hotel!  I will be sharing your comments with all our employees, as I do all reviews; as we all appreciate the feedback and accolades from our guests.  We really appreciate you being a "return" guest and look forward to continuing to provide you the wonderful service we are known for.  Again, thank you. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: 10 out of 10!! You get what you see!
Summary: I love that my room is the same as the picture i saw online, it‚Äôs why I booked in the first place. Also the breakfast was great! It was close to Disney, the bathroom was big and shower was nice, I‚Äôm a clean freak and totally approve.
Manager Response: Yea!!  We love "10 out of 10's."  Thank you Julian-sebastian for your review, we appreciate the high marks and look forward to having you return the next time you are in the Anaheim/Orange area. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This hotel was awesome in so many ways. It was super close to Disneyland. The cleaning staff is amazing and didn‚Äôt miss a spot. The breakfast was warm and fresh every morning. We had full access to cable which was nice as well. Only thing I would improve is the pillows as ours were a bit soft. We‚Äôll definitely stay again and look forward to staying at other Ayres properties. Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you Veroh730 for you kind review.  My staff and I appreciate your comments and recommendation on the soft pillows.  I will alert Housekeeping and please, never hesitate to request firmer pillows should you not be satisfied; we want to make sure you and all our guests are happy! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Comfort  and support during Thomas fire.
Summary: We stayed at the Ayres after evacuating due to the Thomas fire.  Everyone was kind and accommodating from our initial arrival through our check out.  They offered us a discounted rate because of the disaster and helped us extend our stay, even though we were always uncertain how long we would need to be there.  They had a nightly "happy hour" Monday through Thursday with beer, wine, and cookies in the lobby! Great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your wonderful feedback, floresabnere! I'm so sorry to hear that you were affected by the Thomas fires and hope that all is safe and sound back home.

Summary: Thank you for the great service. I have been visiting regularly and am comfortable doing so. Always clean and the staff is always friendly. Breakfast is hot, the coffee is on. Ample parking. I‚Äôd like to be recognized as a frequent visitor. I do enjoy those perks with a competing brand.
Manager Response: cslack5, you are very welcome! We work hard on our cleanliness and service, so it's very gratifying to see them acknowledged. If you haven't already, please make sure to sign up for Ayres Rewards so that you can start accumulating loyalty points with us. We hope to see you back again soon.

Summary: Very clean and nice decor. Easy access to many places. 20 mins. to John Wayne airport, 30 minutes to Newport Beach, 10 minutes to downtown Old Orange. Ample free parking. Only complaint was that facility description led me to think that breakfast was made to order, when it was a typical buffet type motel breakfast. The scrambled eggs and potatoes were cooked where you could watch before they were put out. Food quality was very good. We will definitely stay here again while visiting our granddaughter at Chapman University.
Manager Response: Thank you, GregandPJ, for taking the time to share your feedback! We don't have the setup to provide cooked-to-order breakfast, but we work hard to provide a great variety of complimentary breakfast buffet items. We hope to see you back again soon! Go, Chapman!

Summary: Very close to UCI Medical Center, everyone was friendly, good breakfast, decent fitness facility, really nice evening reception with complimentary wine, beer, sodas, and cookies! Room was large, up-to-date, and very clean. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Claudia L, I'm so glad to hear that you would definitely stay here again! We work hard to provide great service and amenities to our guests. We look forward to having you back again soon.

Summary: Staff was super helpful, the free breakfast was delicious, the room was clean, the neighborhood was safe.   The happy hour has wine, beer , soda, and yummy cookies.  All that and free parking, what more can you ask?
Manager Response: Thank you, bikesrus41, for noticing all our great amenities and commitment to great service! Please come back again soon!

Summary Heading: Great hotel , very clean and gr8 location .
Summary: ÿ¨ÿßŸÖÿØ ŸÉŸäŸäŸäŸäŸÉ  Very cool and clean hotel ÿå breakfast gr8 , parking free , lovely people at the reception , this is the absolute successful model of a clean hotel , love it , will definitely come back to Ayres.
Manager Response: kimoelgen, thank you for your "gr8" review! We appreciate your feedback and hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Nice, clean and worth the $$$ for the location. Easy to access freeway and many locations. If one was going to Costa Mesa, Disneyland, airport, Orange Anaheim- close! Friendly service and good breakfast for most people. I need gluten free as I have Celiacs so choices are limited but staff was willing to double check ingredients for me.
Manager Response: Teagoodies, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. I'm glad to hear that you felt we were worth the price you paid and that our staff was able to help check ingredients for you. Next time, let us know in advance about your food allergies so that we can look at options for you. Hope to see you back soon!

Summary Heading: Elegant, well appointed and comfortable hotel with a great breakfast
Summary: Beautifully appointed hotel with clean and comfortable rooms, elegantly appointed and spacious.   Breakfast was in a large room with comfortable seating and the variety on offer (both hot/cold) was the best we experienced in our two weeks in the States. Staff were professional, well groomed and well spoken.   We spent two days here in order to shop at the Outlets at Orange (within 5 minutes' walk of the hotel) and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Lovely pool and spa area. It was a welcome and enjoyable place to stay after the madness of Disney but you could easily take the ART shuttle from the hotel area to Disneyland if you wished.   Despite being near the freeway and hospital, the double glazed windows meant you could not hear any traffic noise, and the curtains in the room were
Manager Response: Thank you, SmiggleMickey, for the wonderful feedback! I'm so glad to hear that we were "the best" you experienced in your 2 week US trip. Our hotel is designed expressly to provide the maximum comfort and value to our guests. We hope to see you back again in the future!

Summary: Nice facility, lobby welcomes you with cozy fireplace and cookies! Friendly staff at check-in and throughout stay. Complimentary breakfast was convenient and tasty. The breakfast included scrambles eggs, home fries, sausage, croissant, bagels, yogurt, fruit, pancakes...standard complimentary bfast. The room was very clean, spacious, beautiful, and comfortable. I wish I had more time to spend in it! Also the hotel had many cable channels.   The location was convenient by car to everything I needed including grocery store, outlets, and close proximity to the Anaheim convention center (12-15 minute drive).
Manager Response: littlerock08, thank you for rating us a "great value"! From our clean, spacious rooms to complimentary breakfast and personal service, we strive to give our guests an elevated travel experience. We hope you come back to visit us soon!

Summary: When making my reservation several weeks ago, I inadvertently reserved a room at the Ayres Anaheim facility. When I showed up in Orange with no reservation listed the hotel agent was able to rectify my error and had me in a room at the same rate within minutes, (Christy you were a life saver). This is one more reason, I will only stay at the Ayres Hotels when I travel to the LA area, great accommodation's, locations, and people !
Manager Response: Thank you, Jeffrey H, for your great feedback! Christy is definitely a "life saver" on our team, committed to living up to our Ayres values of teamwork, hospitality and positive guest experiences. We look forward to welcoming you back again!

Summary: Came for a business trip to the UC Irvine Medical Center, which is very easy walking distance from the Ayres Hotel Orange. I had a very nice stay, the hotel was clean, staff were friendly and professional, check in and out were easy. Room was spacious, clean, and modern.
Manager Response: Glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, zhdouglas! UCI Medical Center is just a quick 5 minute walk across the street from the hotel, making us a very convenient location for UCI patients and business travelers. We hope to see you back again soon.

Summary: I really enjoyed the people the breakfast each morning maybe they can have it brought to your room since its kind of early but other than that pretty awesome. This hotel was very close to Disneyland where we were going.
Manager Response: Mrswright2b1g, I'm so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you found us to be a convenient location for your Disney visit. We hope to see you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent Cost to Value.  My new first choice.
Summary: Arrived with a disabled LO, & received top-rate service, start to finish.  Rooms big, clean, well-designed, & as advertised.  Easily one of the best hotel experiences I've ever had.  The breakfast was an easy way to start our day properly fueled up.  I only wish this "chain" would expand.  Loved the smaller size hotel, much more personable.  Staff very responsive & responsible: when our TV wasn't working properly, in the middle of the night, they offered to move us to another room, or we could wait for a technician in the morning. We opted to wait until morning, but I appreciated their honesty (no tech at midnight) & the generosity of their offered solution. Recommend this place with no hesitation.
Manager Response: Wow, SonomaCountyMaryBeth! We are so proud to be your new "first choice" hotel! Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to see you back again soon.

Summary: We always enjoy our stays at the Ayers when we come to Orange County on business. The hotel and rooms are clean and comfortable, and the location is perfect for our needs. The breakfast is better than most other hotels, but it could use a better variety from day to day. The fitness room is a big plus. Overall, Ayers meets our needs at a good price. The best value in Orange.
Manager Response: Thanks, mikeyk916, for rating us "the best value in Orange"! We pride ourselves on providing great service and comfortable accommodations, from our clean rooms and complimentary breakfast buffet to our big fitness center. Much appreciated!

Summary Heading: Great hotel, responsive staff - when pushed!
Summary: This is the second time my wife has stayed at Ayres, Orange and my first. Comfortable rooms - I absolutely recommend the rooms with a Kind sized bed. Plenty of space, particularly for business folk working on the go.  Cannot fault any aspect of this hotel except when the front desk staff were challenged with an unexpected situation. This hotel was one of the preferred accommodation sites for the American Heart Association's annual conference. The conference had early starts each morning with a conference shuttle picking up from the sister hotel next door every half hour. Problem was breakfast on the weekend started 5 minutes before the first shuttle bus pick up. Maybe some lack of communication between conference accommodation organisers and the hotel may be the issue here.
Manager Response: SOS_traveller, I'm happy to hear that our Front Desk staff was ultimately able to accommodate your request for an early breakfast option and that you found the hotel to be comfortable for your conference needs. We've taken your feedback as a training opportunity to reiterate our commitment to providing great service and smart solutions to guest requests. Thanks again & we look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: We were visiting family nearby and reserved several rooms at the hotel. Best customer service EVER! Flexible, resourceful, upbeat, kind... Rooms were new, super clean, comfy beds... Complimentary wine/beer & cookie happy hour made everyone happy. We'll stay here again for sure!!
Manager Response: Thank you, leslieray2017, for your wonderful review! Our complimentary manager's reception Monday - Thursday and fresh baked cookies each afternoon are just a few of the ways we try to make our guests feel special. We look forward to having you back again soon!

Summary: We chose a 2 queen bed room for our stay. The rooms are beautifully appointed and large and the beds are extremely comfortable. They are well designed and laid out with a sitting area and a separate ‚Äúoffice‚Äù area for setting up my laptop. The bathroom is large ‚Äì with a large, comfortable tub if you desire that ‚Äì and the sink & vanity area is separate from the tub and toilet area. The only issue here is the door separating the two areas opens into guests who may be using the sink such that they must move to allow someone in or out of the bath area. This occurs more than you may think with 2 or more adults/teens in the same room.  The TV is large and the service is DIRECT TV with several movie channels. There‚Äôs also plenty of space for your luggage and extra items without getting
Manager Response: Thanks, Matt G, for the great feedback! I'm so glad to hear that you enjoyed the spaciousness of the rooms and evening social hour. Thank you for letting us know your thoughts about the breakfast offerings; we are always looking for ways to improve our guests' experience. I was surprised to hear you did not receive great WiFi access. The hotel has recently upgraded our bandwidth and speed and have had glowing comments from our guests, especially our return guests. I do hope you contacted our WiFi support number for assistance as WiFi should not have been a problem. We hope to see you back again. Thanks again for taking the time to review us!

Summary: My husband and I stayed at Ayres Hotel for 3 nights and it was awesome! Staff was friendly, check in was easy, and the breakfast buffet was really good! Rooms are huge and they have a great amenities! Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Thank you so much, 113faye, for your kind review! Our team members work hard to ensure that our guests have a great stay, and it's great to see their efforts reflected in your experience. We hope to see you back again soon!

Summary: This hotel was awesome! For the price we paid 2 nights includes breakfast from Groupon is a great deal. The best part was their customer service - very attentive and friendly. We check in late and we were welcome with some complimentary wine,cookies, beer, and other drinks. Checking in didn't take that long and from King suite they gave us double beds which is awesome! Very CLEAN! Love it. They have shuttle bus for $5.50 each all day pass to Disneyland. Why 4 stars ? The night before we check in I called in and found out they overlook our booking through Groupon and have I not called them ahead of time it could have cause a problem. However, i will book this hotel again next time we visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Kimmy482, I'm so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on providing great service to every guest. I'm sorry to hear that there was some confusion about your Groupon booking, but glad to know that it was resolved to your satisfaction. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: I always like how clean the rooms are. The breakfast is well stocked with very good food. The staff is always helpful, from the moment you whale in this doors to the moment you leave.  I would not stay anywhere else
Manager Response: Thank you, jram2381012, for the glowing review! We are honored to be your "home away from home" and look forward to seeing you back again soon.

Summary: We spent one night here while in town for a wedding. We found the hotel to be very clean and comfortable. The hotel was quiet despite the location near a freeway. There was ample free parking. We would choose this hotel chain again if available at our destinations.
Manager Response: I'm so happy, scbythesea, that we were the right fit for your wedding weekend! Thank you for taking the time to review us. We appreciate it and hope to see you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel.  Great location for nearby attractions.
Summary: The hotel was very clean and brand new. Staff was friendly and is nearby to Disneyland and other attractions. The only negative was loud traffic noise as it is near a hospital and freeways. I would definitely recommend the hotel to others and the price was a very good value.
Manager Response: Thanks, Matt H, for the positive feedback! We work hard to ensure our rooms are clean and our staff is friendly. I'm sorry to hear that you experienced some noise disturbance; our windows are double-paned to minimize traffic noise. Next time, please ask for a courtyard-facing room as they do not face the street. We hope to see you back again soon!

Summary: Very happy with my stay! Staff (especially day staff) were very helpful and courteous! Daisy went extra step to make sure that I have shuttle reservation to the airport. The room I had was double bed and the truly the size was double as any hotel experience I had before. Room was clean and bed comfortable. I truly appreciated how quiet it was considering the large conferences going on at the same time. It was certainly worth it for me to be 2.5 miles away for the convention center and shuttles were provided free every hour to the convention center (20min) There are also shuttles for $5 to and from Disney (10min). Breakfast included with plenty of fruits which was a bonus. Walking distance (10min walking) is an outlet mall with restaurants and shopping center as well. Overall,
Manager Response: nilulu, thank you for the wonderful feedback, especially about our team members! We work hard to make sure every guest receives the best service we can provide. I'm glad that you tried us out for your conference and hope to see you back again soon!

Summary Heading: SO WORTH A FEW EXTRA DOLLARS!
Summary: I loved the Ayers Hotel Orange so much I could live there! Excellent staff from front desk, to breakfast staff to security, everyone was gracious and so nice. And BREAKFAST! More like an amazing buffet! I had never seen anything this elaborate at a hotel. Lots to choose from and lots of it! Fantastic! Don't miss out on Happy Hour at 5pm with complimentary wine, many choices of interesting beer, sodas, and freshly baked cookies. Pool. hot tub, workout room and a well-stocked mini-mart right in the lobby are great extras. The whole place was spotless and smelled wonderful! I stayed two nights at this jewel of a hotel. Close proximity to Disneyland and a nearby shuttle to the park and back were the reasons I took a chance on a hotel I was not familiar with but after searching thru
Manager Response: cindykern, I'm blown away by your wonderful review! I'm so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and found our breakfast, evening social hour and proximity to Disneyland all worth your visit. Thank you so much for recommending us! We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Lovely stay - our 2nd at an Ayres hotel, this one was as pleasing as the first at a different location.  Pleasant easy check-in, greeted by free wine, cookies and snacks in the lobby,  Very large totally clean room - bathroom area amazing, lots of storage space, quiet, good beds, etc.  Really liked decor.  Will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you, Ann M, for giving us a try and taking the time to share your kind feedback. We love to see Ayres repeat guests, and I'm so glad to hear that we lived up to your expectations. Thanks again! We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: Hotel staff are friendly and efficient.  They knew the area.  The room was spacious, clean and very well appointed with a HUGE soaking tub.  My window had two windows that could be opened, perhaps to block out traffic noises.  I could only hear traffic if the window was open.  Food was okay. Nice to have a fridge and microwave.  Also nice to have many plugs for charging devices.  Coffee in the room.  Will stay again!
Manager Response: teresaaZ8187WT, thank you for telling us about your "amazing experience." I'm so glad that you enjoyed the soaking tub and extra charging plugs in the room. Our team members work hard to make sure each guest feels welcomed and appreciated. We hope to see you back again soon!

Summary: Pros: The hotel staff were friendly and helpful. The room was spacious. Cons: A large reason we chose this hotel was the positive reviews on the free breakfast and in my opinion it left A LOT to be desired. Same thing every day and the food wasn't very good. Pancakes were stuck together in a warming tray and the edges were stale and crusty. Road noise in the hotel room was loud. Location wise it was hard to get to, having to flip a U turn every time with no way to turn directly in.  Walking next door for the shuttle was inconvenient and the shuttle only went out once per hour. It was further from Disneyland than we had hoped.  All in all we had a good experience but we won't be staying there next time we come to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Kenny M, thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. I'm glad to hear that you received friendly service from our staff and that you enjoyed our spacious rooms. I'm sorry to hear that the breakfast was not up to your expectations and that the traffic was disruptive. Please ask for a quieter, courtyard-facing room if you stay with us again. Thanks again for the feedback!

Summary: I stayed there with my family for 3 nites, we booked for a king suite package. We checked in late and guy at the desk was not so hospitable. But nonetheless, it was so close to Disneyland and hotel amenities are great. I‚Äôd be coming back here again the next time we plan for another Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Thank you 157dianna for your comments and especially for giving me a "heads up" as to my employee not taking care of you and your family in a kind and friendly manner.  Please trust than myself and his direct supervisor will work with him to improve his guest service skills.  The hotel is #1 on TripAdvisor because of our guest service and amenities, so I have taken your comments to heart.  Thank you for saying you will return in the future, we want you to have a 100% perfect stay. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Hotel room was spacious, and all the employees were very helpful and nice, especially the front desk personnel.  The room was clean, but the cleaning staff didn't clean the 2nd day we were there, so that was disappointing. This included free breakfast (pancakes, eggs, hashbrowns, coffee/juice, and fresh fruit) and parking, and the ART (located at the AYO) was a short ride to Disneyland.  I would stay there again if I had the choice.
Manager Response: Thank you Chris, I am glad you enjoyed your overall stay and i am happy to hear you will be back!  I do apologize for your room being missed one day.  We have a few new room attendants that we will continue to diligently work with to ensure they are completely trained.  It is always embarrassing when we miss a room due to human error.  Take care and we do hope to see you again in the future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I didn't think that the facility would be as nice as it was.  From check-in to check-out I was pleasantly surprised with everything about this hotel.  The employees were nice, the rooms were clean and modern, they had everything we could think of and then some.
Manager Response: Adam, I so am happy to hear we continued to surprise you throughout your stay with us!  Guests often tell us that when they booked with Ayres Hotels they had never heard of our hotel company and just as you said , "did not know what to expect."  We do hope yo will find your way back to us the next time you visit the Anaheim/Orange area of Southern California.  Safe travels for now! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice Room - Good Breakfast - Last stop and first drop-off for Disneyland.
Summary: The ART pickup was at the hotel next door - just a few hundred feet away.  This is the nicest place we've stayed while going to Disney (including the Disneyland hotel).  The front desk even gave by sons the leftover cookies even when their happy hour was over.
Manager Response: Thank you Andrea for taking the time to write a review, my staff and I always appreciate feedback, good or bad!  I am glad you tried the Ayres Hotel Orange and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Disneyland. Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This will be the only hotel I stay at every time I go to Disneyland. I loved how big, luxurious and comfortable the king suite was! I also enjoyed the helpful staff and the breakfast they provided us. I definitely recommend this to anyone who is looking for a close stay to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Mary, thank you so much for your recommendation to future potential guests.  I am always pleased to hear when our guests have a great experience here.  Your comments will be posted as are all our reviews, for our entire staff to read.  Reviews such as yours make all us enjoy our jobs all the more.  Take care for now! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful homey and welcoming must stay great value
Summary: Great place to stay.  Rooms are spotless.  Pool nice and relaxing.  People at the front desk helpful and friendly.   Great location and value.  We will stay again and again.    Such a great surprise.    Room to work stay and move around.  Great fun and well decorated.    We so enjoyed ourselves and the breakfast and cocktail hour a nice surprise
Manager Response: Thank you pammyba!!  I am so glad you enjoyed all our amenities, from the complimentary breakfast to Happy Hour.  And thank you for mentioning our superior level of cleanliness, my housekeeping staff are the best around if I am permitted to brag a little.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel "again and again." Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I was on business and stayed here.  Lovely decorations.  Very clean.  Great staff.  Loved the cookies!  Rooms are very spacious.  Free breakfast and parking is always great too! They also have a pool.  Excellent!
Manager Response: Thank you 739janed for your "excellent" review!  I always appreciate the time a guest takes to write a TripAdvisor.  I understand the importance so when I travel TripAdvisor is also my go-to source of information when I am looking at hotels I am unfamiliar with.  Again, thank you! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My recent trip to LA area for annual budget  meetings was highlighted by my stay at the Ayres Hotel Orange. Accommodations, staff, and location are all outstanding. Even access off the 5 is great. This hotel will continue to be my top choice of hotels when coming to the Los Angeles area in the future.
Manager Response: Wonderful Jeffrey, so glad to hear we will been your choice in hotels when visiting the Los Angeles area.  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The staff is always friendly, the rooms large and clean, and the happy hour provided is always fun. Great hotel to which we return again and again. We especially like that if we want to stay in and watch t.v. this hotel's television selection is better than any at any other hotel we've ever stayed at. Not to mention their proximity to the Outlets at Orange and the local Krispy Kreme!
Manager Response: Thank you tiffer905!  I think I know who you are and want to thank yo and the rest of your group for staying so often and being such fun guests to interact with!!  I appreciate you pointing out our great location and proximity to the Outlets of Orange and Krispy Kreme.  Take Care for now and see you on your next stay! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Ayres Orange always make me and my family feel welcomed. The hotel is always in top condition and cannot complain about anything. The complimentary breakfast is great. My daughter loves their freshly made pancakes. Thank you Ayres Orange
Manager Response: You are very welcome allsmacks!  We love it when we see families who have enjoyed their stay return to us again and again.  It makes all our efforts at guest service worthwhile.  See you all on your next visit to our area! Sincerely, Christine Smith

Summary: I recently spent several nights at the Ayers Orange while attending a conference, and worked with the hotel to arrange a couple of receptions and a small meeting space.  I've done this in several different contexts, and both the hotel stay and the hosting process were exceptional.     The rooms are generally quite large -- I had a King Single, but a large living area with a couch.  Very comfortable bed, amenities, etc.  Only downside was the view of I-5, but I was amazed how little I could hear the traffic when the double windows were closed.  If you're able, I'd ask for a room with a pool view, instead, although across the freeway I could see a partial view of the Disneyland fireworks, so that was a trade-off.  The staff help make this place distinctive -- everyone was very
Manager Response: WOW!  Thank you so much for the great review you posted!!  And yes, the entire staff enjoyed working with you and your group for the conference you held here.  "Caring" is such a simple concept but not always found in the service industry which is a mystery to me.  The Ayres Hotels Mission Statement is "We Care About People, We Value Teamwork, We Deliver Results," and in your case I am happy to know we practiced what we preach. Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed one night while visiting Chapman University.  We are not Chapman parents, but the hotel did tell us they offer a great deal to Chapman parents.  The hotel is extremely convenient to Chapman and less than 10 minutes from Hart Park, where the Chapman Panthers baseball team play.  The breakfast lounge is really lovely, with lots of choices including fresh melon, more than your typical apples and bananas, and hot breakfast beyond the waffle machine.  I got a reservation thru Trip Advisor (executed thru Groupon) that was reasonable for the area.  there is a restaurant next door walking distance in the Alo Hotel (Mexican/French fusion, interesting) for the road weary.  Every detail has been thought of in the guest rooms and bathrooms.  Has fitness center, beautiful lobby,
Manager Response: Thank you happytravelingfamily!  I love your moniker!  And thank you for the comprehensive review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  We do hope you find your way back to the Anaheim/Orange area, and look forward to seeing you then. Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: The hotel is well located on The City Drive within the 'Orange Crush' intersection. It has a good pool with an outside seating area and good facilities.
