The employees are friendly and they also serve a good breakfast, alongside extremely clean rooms and a luxurious feel. Hope to return soon.
Manager Response: Thank you Danny S and we also hope you return again soon.  Whether for business, Disneyland, a game at Angel's Stadium or the Honda Center, shopping at the Outlets of Orange, there are always lots of reasons to return to the Anaheim/Orange area. Take care for now and we do hope you retung one day. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: excellent and bigger rooms.needs a bar  to relax although your close to the city. will try to recommend to friends and return in the future. accessible to all shopping malls etc. staff friendly food is good
Manager Response: none

Summary: Ayres Hotel Orange does what I always want when I'm traveling: Greet me with a smile at Reception, respond to my requests for a certain type of room, quickly get me on my way, and check me into a perfectly sparkling clean, comfortable and well-designed hotel room. And the, serve me an amazing complimentary breakfast that other hotels easily charge at least $18 for. And don't charge me to park my car! I completely respect a company that doesn't throw charges at me for simply being a guest. And all the extra cheer helps a lot when I'm tired and ready to recharge. Can't wait to look for this company next time I travel to CA.
Manager Response: Dear Geneva, Thank you so much for taking your time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange.  My staff and I are always thrilled when we hear we have once again "exceeded" our guest's expectations.  And thank you for mentioning our complimentary breakfast and parking, the little things do mean a lot.  We hope you are able to make your way back to this hotel or any of the fine Ayres Hotels in Southern California.  Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel several times.  It is well maintained with a hard working staff.  Mr Cruz at the front desk is a great asset to the hotel.  The breakfast has many good choices and the staff keep the area clean and neat. Our room was quiet, clean and nicely decorated.  The location is convenient to both Orange, Anaheim, Santa Ana, etc.  Our visits are usually 6-8 months apart.  We see many of the same staff members as we did on prior visits, which speaks well of the hotel.
Manager Response: Grampafixit We loved having you and your family visit us once again, and thank you for another great review!  I will pass on your kind remarks to Mr. Cruz AKA Christopher at the front desk.  Take care until next visit and enjoy the Holidays with your wonderful family! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel in city of Orange-near all attractions in Orange County
Summary: We stayed 2 nights at this hotel for a birthday celebration.  The hotel itself is really beautiful, well decorated.  The rooms were spacious and comfortable.  The breakfast was well above most of the ones you get at hotels-very fresh, lots of choices, and cooked right there.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  We would go back there whenever in the area or try other Ayres.
Manager Response: Thank you Linda! It is wonderful to know that we have converted another guest to Ayres Hotels.  We have 22 hotels located in Southern California along with the Allegretto Hotel and Suites by Ayres in Paso Robles.  I am confident you will enjoy future visits to other Ayres Hotels as much as you enjoyed your stay here. Happy travelling! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I have stayed at this Ayres numerous times and they continue to provide a clean and friendly stay!  I will continue to stay here for all my futures travels to the area.     The rooms are always very clean and  well maintained and the staff is  always friendly and very helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you Mrozinsky! I appreciate your time in writing this review, you are one of our favorite "return" guests and look forward to your next stay with us!  Again, thank you. Christine Smith Manager

Summary: By far the nicest hotel we have stayed in at this price range. The rooms were clean and quiet and the staff was friendly. The buffet breakfast was great. The ART shuttle picked up in front of the neighboring hotel that is in the same parking lot and was direct to Disneyland with stops. This will be our go to hotel when we travel to that area in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your Great Review on Trip Advisor.  My staff and I appreciate your comments and we look forward to seeing you again in the future. Take care for now! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My fiance took me to Disneyland for the first time on my 25th birthday in October. I booked this room and it was my third time booking rooms for trips.   Fiance was supposed to call and check when the check in time was as we're used to 10AM but this one is at 12PM... or was it 3PM? Just call ahead and make sure. Supervisor Chris was very nice and helped us out with our mishap. He told us we could visit the shopping center for Disneyland since it's "free" during our wait time and gave me complimentary popcorn for my birthday when we came back. Yum!   The room was very nice! The room was very spacious and there was a couch. The bed was very soft and plush and the feather pillows were so comfy! I slept so well and we have a queen size memory foam bed and pillows. I loved that there
Manager Response: Dear Donna, First, Happy Birthday, and second, what a great fiance' you have to take you to Disneyland for your birthday!  Thank you for listing all the amenities you enjoyed and the suggestions as well.  We do hope you celebrate your 26th birthday with us and make it an annual tradition.   Take care for now, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: I will never stay in another hotel brand again!
Summary: This was the 2nd time I've stayed at an Ayres. I had such a great experience the first time (Ayres Corona) and I was excited to stay at this location. I was in town for work at the Long Beach Convention Center and even though this hotel was about a 30 minute drive from there, IT WAS AMAZING! The front desk staff were professional and super helpful when I was looking for late night food, knowing all of the local spots and hours of operation. The room was super clean and spacious! For the 2nd time, I felt like I was staying in a big house rather than a hotel. I highly recommend
Manager Response: Jessica, Wow, that is dedication, driving 30 minutes for work just so you can stay at an Ayres Hotel.  I am so glad we did not disappoint you and know you will enjoy other Ayres Hotels as much as Ayres Orange and Ayres Corona.  Thank you for your wonderful review! Take care, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This was our second time staying at Ayres and my family absolutely loves staying here. The breakfast is great. The accommodations are great. NO complaints. Although we stayed in a different room, it was like the one from our previous stay - comfortable and familiar. The kids love the free cookies in the evening. We will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Elisa, Thank you for taking your time to write such a great review.  My staff and I are so happy to hear that you feel the Ayres Hotel Orange is your "home away from home."  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to our area. Take care for now, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: One of the BEST hotels!!! Near Disney land
Summary: One of the cleanest hotels I've stayed in a long time. We had a family of 4. They upgraded us to the 1st floor with bath tub per request for our son with special needs. Free breakfast,wifi,parking and no resort fee. We didn't mind paying for parking at Disneyland since it = to resort fee to all the other hotels nearby. Nice having options. They do offer shuttle for a fee which you'd be picked up at ALO hotel next door that picks up every hour and option to purchase Disney tickets at front desk. We stayed here for 5 nights and 6 days and everyday we would come to our clean room and cookies complimentary wine, soda in the evenings in the lobby. I would definitely stay here again. Highly recommended
Manager Response: Dear hayes-mafua, Thank you so much for writing such a great review!  I remember your son and am happy the hotel helped make your Disneyland unforgettable.  We look forward to welcoming you back should you and your family travel to Orange County again in the future. Take care, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This is a great hotel in my ways , the breakfast served is a wide variety , also always hot ! Beautifully decorated , cleanliness is a AAA + ! All the workers are friendly and ready to accommodate you with any needs ! When we come back next year we will definitely stay here !
Manager Response: Thank you Teresa for your great review.  We will look forward to welcoming you and your family back next year.  Take care until then!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: beautiful hotel, nice location, ton of cops.
Summary: checked in early, was upgraded to a beautiful room in the 1st floor.  went to grab my stuff out of my car and there were police cars in the front entrance, didn't think anything of it. I had to return to my car and there were more cops...  I asked to be moved off the 1st floor because I was so uncomfortable with the need for police and asked if it was always like this..  I never got my room.changed and left that night.
Manager Response: Dear Vanessa, I am really sorry that you had to witness the police dealing with a homeless person in front of our hotel.  And because the hotel was 100% full with fire evacuees from the Canyon fire and also with fireman on rest breaks from the Canyon fire we were unable to move you to another room.  My offer extended to you via email still stands, we would love to have yo come back and enjoy a quiet and restful stay with us in the future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Hotel decor is modern, spacious and welcoming. Staff is very helpful and friendly. Great hot breakfast buffet with eggs, bacon, sausage, hash browns, etc. Evenings they offer complimentary snacks in the lobby.
Manager Response: Thank you chrisliu808 for taking the time to write such a nice review of the hotel.  We look forward to having back in the future should your travels bring you our way again. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Nice home away from home during Homecoming, Parent Summits and graduation.  Good Chapman Family discounts, all the amenities, comfortable beds and delicious breakfast buffet.  Attentive service.  Easy parking.
Manager Response: Dear Karen, Thank you for you review and we hope to see you again for the next Parent event at Chapman University. Take care until then! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: What a wonderful place!  All amenities were top notch.   The service was amazing.   The shuttle service to/from Disneyland was easy to use. The breakfast was delicious.  I‚Äôd highly recommend this hotel.  It is a great value.
Manager Response: Dear DebDemo, I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and all our amenities at the Ayres Hotel Orange has to offer.  We do hope you will return to us on your next visit to Disneyland! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Best hotel I have stayed at in a long time
Summary: Super clean, big rooms, delicious breakfast and cookies too. Great value as well. I would highly recommend! The hotel is also very energy efficient. Lights in room shut off after 7 minutes unless room key is inserted in power slot. Free parking and located very close to the freeway. Close to Chapman University and Disneyland. Starbucks within walking distance
Manager Response: Dear Laura, So nice to hear all your kind comments regarding your stay here.  As we do with all our reviews we will post for all our employees to see; it is really uplifting for all our team members to know their hard work is appreciated.  We hope to see you on your next trip to our area. Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect stay for our Disneyland adventure!
Summary: This hotel is right next to the freeway that takes you to Disneyland - only 10 minutes away! (no noise though) It was nice, clean, seems like new, comfortable, with a great Free breakfast buffet.  The shower was huge! :)  Great value.
Manager Response: Thank you Global_Travel_Tales I am very glad that you appreciated the value your received while a guest at the Ayres Hotel Orange! We appreciate our guest's "word of mouth" endorsements for potential future guests.  Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Very Comfortable, Great Shower, Great Free Breakfast
Summary: I was in town with family for a wedding.  Three of us shared a room.  We all thought the room was very comfortable and the breakfasts were great.  It's within walking distance to the outlet mall and other great restaurants.  While close to the freeway, we didn't notice much traffic noise.  I would definitely recommend this hotel and will stay here again when in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you for your review!! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Nice very spacious room, easy check in and check out. The hotel is centrally located in Orange county,  easy access to FEY, dining and shopping nearby. I wouhave give it 5 stars except the WiFi signal was weak and internet connection very slow,  while it was advertised as very good WiFi.
Manager Response: Dear db1234704, I am happy to hear you enjoyed your overall stay but surprised to hear you did not receiving great WiFi access.  The hotel has recently upgraded our bandwidth and speed and have had glowing comments from our guests, especially our return guests.  I do hope you contacted our WiFi support number for assistance as WiFi should not have been  a problem.   I would kindly ask that you give the hotel another try, and again thank you for your feedback. Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Really glad I stayed here. Room and hotel was super clean. Staff was totally nice and loved the free parking garage. Also great to have a refrigerator in the room. Not too much noise even with a hospital across the street.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Wonderful Hotel that is very clean and well maintained.  My family loved the hotel and liked the room size as well.  Highly recommend for all types of travelers.  We went to Disneyland and it was a good base of operations.  The breakfast was very good as was the happy hour.
Manager Response: none

Summary: WELL  Worth the Groupon price. Clean, modern, well decorated, great service, and a phenomenal free hot breakfast. What more could you ask for?!  I will stay here anytime I am in the Anaheim for Los Angeles area. I was very pleased.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Beyond what I could have imagined
Summary: The rooms r clean and spacious and quiet. Breakfast was delicious, food was always being filled, so never a battle to get anything. Pool was nice, and the hotel just had a brand new feeling to it. It was within walking distance to the Angles stadium and only a 10 min drive to Disneyland. We did a star line tour in LA and they actually picked us up at the hotel, so no driving in or out of LA for us. Couldn't ask for more.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is very convenient to UCI; my husband had surgery there so I stayed at the Ayres Hotel.  I could go over there and take a nap and then go back to the hospital.  Valet parking is also convenient.  The rooms are well equipped, clean, and roomy.  Food at the breakfast is very good and easy to find in the lobby area.   Definitely recommend this hotel, especially if you need to visit someone at the hospital.  I had to stay another day since they kept my husband longer and the hotel was very accommodating to make that change.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Ayres Hotels are our preferred hotel chain when in the SoCal area. Every aspect of the hotel, service, staff, amenities, etc. top notch. Even made new friends while in the hot tub. Would love to live there permanently.  Thank you AYRES for a wonderful 2 night stay. Make your rez now!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Would stay here again in a heartbeat
Summary: We chose this property for the proximity to the theme parks, without having to be directly across the road from the parks - stayed there before and I think those hotels are average, and extremely expensive. The Ayres was a 10 minute drive from the parks, and the shuttle was so convenient - $5:00 return, without any hassle of parking. The hotel itself is lovely. Very large, modern rooms, clean and serviced daily. The pool and hit tub area were great. We also appreciated the complimentary drinks served Mon-Thu in the lobby. Also a nice touch to have the fresh baked cookies available throughout the day. The General Manager Christine was exceptional helpful and really went out of her way to ensure we had a great time during our stay.  The only thing I missed was a Supermarket within
Manager Response: Thank you simondD3169IG for your comprehensive review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!!  I can't thank you enough for taking the time to write a review and i am so glad you enjoyed your stay here.  I also enjoyed meeting your family and having you back as a return guest.  Take care until your next visit! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Wonderful hotel with clean rooms, friendly staff, and good breakfast
Summary: My family stayed for two nights to go to Disneyland. We were impressed with the hotel from check-in. The staff was very friendly and gave us information we needed about getting to Disney the next day. It was an easy trip to and from the park. The room was very clean and modern. Breakfast was a hot, buffet style with lots of extras. They even have a great selection of good hot teas to choose from.
Manager Response: Dear Melissa M Thank you for your great review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  I very pleased that my staff and the hotel provided a "wonderful" stay experience for you and your family.  We do hope to see you on your next trip to the Orange/Anaheim area, and again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Such a great stay! continental breakfast was great. eggs, sausage, pancakes, toast, fruit, yogurt coffee and juice station. we stayed in a king bed suite with fold out couch. room was very spacious and staff was very pleasant. our room was bottom floor, had no problem with freeway traffic noise. we definitely will return.
Manager Response: Thank you ebrayton88!! I really appreciate hearing when our guests have had a great experience when staying here at the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I will pass on your kind comments to all my staff, and thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed your stay!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We are regular visitors to our favorite Ayres hotel in Costa Mesa but since we were visiting the Orange Circle for the first time we decided to stay at the Orange location so we could explore some of the stores the following day. They have a great staff and though we had a short stay we would definitely come back. The rooms are meticulous and cannot say enough about the most comfortable bed and pillows. The best sleep ever!!!! I highly recommend this hotel!!!
Manager Response: Thank you Patricia, I am happy to hear you are an "Ayres Hotel" fan and glad to hear you chose to try our location out for a test run while visiting the Orange Circle.  We do get many compliments about our pillows and mattresses, so much so, that I have an order form ready to go should a guest want to purchase a mattress.  We thank you for being a loyal Ayres Hotel guest and hope to welcome you back in the near future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I often usthis facility when I am in Orange County. It is clean and comfortable. I even arrived especially early on my recent stay and they were able to accommodate an early check in. Thank you to the OC staff
Manager Response: You are very welcome ronmen2017!   And thank you for taking the time to write a review of the hotel.  See you on your next trip!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean, modern rooms and nice amenities throughout
Summary: Great room layout for a family of four.  We had one child in a queen and another in a pack n' play provided by the Ayres.  The room was modern, clean and thoughtfully laid out (e.g., partial wall divider between the two queen beds). My wife commented on there being a "good" hair dryer present as opposed to what she's used to from hotels.  The breakfast was tasty... fresh fruit, nice variety of eggs, breakfast meat, yogurt, breads and pastries.  We also had a chance to use the pool and hot tub which were clean and at nice temperatures.  Would definitely stay here again.  No issues with freeway noise though we were facing the freeway.
Manager Response: Dear Izzy5461, Thank you for your kind review, I am happy to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us, and that the room exceeded you expectations.  Thank you for mentioning that you did not experience freeway noise.  The hotel does have triple pane windows on the freeway side and it is a very rare occurrence that a guest says they are bothered by noise.  Take care and we do hope to see you and your family on your next visit back to our area! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I've stayed here a few times when I visit my son at nearby university- clean, simple, good price- never had a problem with parking, internet works well enough, never used the pool but seen/heard people doing so- had the breakfast once and it seemed fine, nothing high end but plentiful- only downside is no room service, well there is but it is some "call an 800 number to order" and seems a bit odd to me so didn't use it- the staff is very friendly, there is wine and soft drinks in the lobby in the evening, all in all good value
Manager Response: Thank you Anne for taking time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange, we love our University parents and am glad to hear you stay with us when visiting your son.  Unitel your next visit, take care. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I cannot believe that the best part of our extremely pleasant five day vacation in Anaheim was the hotel!! It was honestly hard work convincing ourselves to leave the hotel and actually go to disneyland every day!! Everything about this place feels like a hotel in a commercial, in the best possible way! The front desk ladies knew our names, and were always helpful with questions about nearby restaraunts. The beds are amazing, the breakfast buffet is extensive and very well made. The rooms are huge, and the water pressure was pretty dang amazing, considering that whole years-long drought dealio! Our go to hotel from now on, hands down! Only complaints (and this is like, major nitpicking here)- tiny parking lot. Impossible to remember which street to turn on, and if you miss it
Manager Response: Dear frozenbell, I absolutely love that you refer to the hotel as "home-tel."  We will have to pay you a residual fee should we use that term in future advertising!!!  Thank you for all the kind comments you made and I am so glad your stay exceeded your expectations!  As far as the parking, looks like we forgot to point out that there is a massive parking garage behind the hotel for our guests as well as the smaller lot in front of the hotel.  I will remind the desk to be sure and mention the garage to all our guests.  Again thank you and hope to see you back soon!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel and location for the theme parks, Angel Stadium and City of Orange.
Summary: Friendly staff. The hotel is almost brand new. The pool is much smaller than it appears in the pictures but adequate.  My husband and I enjoyed sitting out in a lovely shaded lounge area and relaxing.Cookies in the evening with  a glass of wine were a great plus. The breakfast was better than the average free breakfast with a lovely dining room.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It's a nice and lovely, cozy hotel. The staff were very helpful and friendly. The king suite was large, new, and very clean. I hope they keep it that way. The parking was good and able to park anywhere near the hotel- even close to the lobby. I will be staying here again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Angel E, Thank you , thank you, thank you for your feedback! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: What a great place to stay! Very clean, the beds are very comfy, the staff is very helpful and welcoming. The hotel is located in a perfect spot, close theme parks, dining and entertainment and sports events.
Manager Response: michele4122016, Thank you for letting us know you enjoyed your stay, we always appreciate our guest's feedback.  We do hope to see you again should you return to the Orange/Anaheim area. Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: Stayed here for the second time August 2017. Good, big and clean rooms. Good location for Angels stadium(10min walk) and The Outlets at Orange(10min walk). Lots of restaurants nearby. Good breakfast and on some weeknights, a reception with free beer and wine(and warm cookies too). Small pool in the back, ok for sunbathing. Customer service was average, nothing special but got the job done. Will stay again when in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you P_H_Helsinki_Finland! I really appreciate your kind words and for staying with us a second time!  I definitely agree that our location can't be beat and we are central to the Stadium, the Outlets of Orange, and Disneyland.  Looks like I need to remind my clerks to step up our level of guest service, that's what we are known for and I do want to keep up our high level of service, thank you for letting me know! Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: Our stay at this hotel was outstanding. Warm reception, nice decor, huge room, nice breakfast, free drinks and cookies on weeknights, we love everything about this hotel. It fulfilled all of our expectations.  We already recommended Ayres to family and friends. It will be our first choice from now on.
Manager Response: Thank you uphnguyen!!  I am so glad you found the Ayres Hotel Orange, and thank you for recommending us to your friends and family, we love "word of mouth" endorsements.  My staff and I look forward to welcoming you back in the near future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: The Cleanest, most comfortable & quiet.. best of the best!!
Summary: Hospitality plus, thank you to the warm Ayres team members for going above & beyond to your warm welcome, & my time here with you in Orange relaxing! You go above & beyond for your guests in offering cookies all the time & offering your delicious complimentary home cooked breakfast each morning. All of the staff here treat guests like family with sincere appreciation, even the housekeeping staff are great at what they do because they're happy to work in your warm family atmosphere. 5 star resorts aren't kept with the level of cleanliness guests find at your propertyüòÅüôÜ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è‚ù£
Manager Response: Thank you so much luvt0travel2!  My staff and I appreciate your kind words and to know that you left the hotel  happy and relaxed!  We do try to make our guests feel like family, and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to our area. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The reception, expediency, breakfast, room cleanliness were all fantastic! Affordable, too. We're not sure why the water left our hair feeling kind of sticky, but we would to stay there again on our next trip.
Manager Response: Dear mthappy2017, Thank you for your "fantastic" review.  I appreciate all your comments.  As far as the water, the water here in the City of Orange is very hard so we do have a water softener system.   I can't think of any other reason your hair would feel sticky but we are checking it out.  Again thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: I have stayed here many times. Rooms are always very clean and great customer service. Comes with breakfast and the rooms are big. If you get a room with 2 beds, there is a small wall between the two which is great for privacy. Easy access off the freeway. Some rooms you can hear the freeway but just turn on the fan and it blocks it out. Most rooms in the back you can't hear the freeway. Also the back rooms have a view of the Disneyland fireworks. Close to Disneyland and 2 blocks from the factory outlets. Highly recommend for the price.
Manager Response: Dear DreaminCalifornia, Thank you yet again for staying at the Ayres Hotel Orange!  We always appreciate feedback from all our guests and hope to see again soon! Sincerely, Christine Smith - Manager

Summary: Excellent room with fridge and microwave clean room service everyday. Breakfast was a great bonus plus free parking which can save you a lot of money if travelling around. Outlet mall not too far walking distance with bars and restaurants. El Torito 3-9pm happy hour and lovely food.
Manager Response: Thank you David, I am so pleased you enjoyed the hotel and am glad you found the Outlets of Orange and El Torito's Happy Hour.  We also have a new Karl Strauss Brew Pub that opened in our neighborhood to add to the many great restaurants and bars within walking distance.  We do hope to see you again as a return guest. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Top marks for an outstanding hotel
Summary: What a gem of a hotel, we stayed as a family of 4 in a twin room, I absolutely loved the 2-3ft divide wall between the beds, never seen it in a twin room before and can't imagine why every doesn't do it - simple yes brilliant. the room was spacious and very comfy. the pool and hottub were very welcome at such a warm time.  Loved the breakfast. The staff were excellent, the parking was great. although we had a car we always used Uber to get to and from disney, it was always between $7-10 to/from Disney (better value than parking or the bus for 4 people) The only single thing I would change, is adding a room safe, we had to use safety deposit boxes at the from desk (which is a great service in liue of no safe) but it mean I was always asking the staff for the box as we were
Manager Response: Dear Sc_uk01 Thank you so much for the wonderful review of the hotel; I am so glad we met and exceeded your expectations!  We would love to have you and your family back should you return to Southern California in the future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My girlfriend and I traveled from Ohio to California for the first time recently, and having never been there we had no clue which hotel brand was good. We were staying 5 days and 6 nights, so we wanted a hotel that was comfortable and relaxing for a longer trip. From the minute we arrived, it was excellent customer service, anything we needed, they provided. Here are a few highlights from this hotel:  1) Very spacious hotel room (we stayed in the room with a couch) and beautiful bathroom area;  2) Very good parking at the hotel with easy access to the 5 freeway and very close to a lot of amenities;  3) There is a hotel shuttle that runs at their sister property next door for Disneyland. This was a HUGE timesaver, and very cheap (10 bucks for 2 people); and   4) The breakfast is
Manager Response: Dear C4720PMdavidm, I am so happy your trip to California from Ohio was enhanced by staying at the Ayres Hotel Orange.  As Ayres Hotels are only located in southern and central California, visitors from outside California can be reluctant to try an "unknown" brand of hotel.  Thank you for taking a gamble and allowing us to show you what Ayres Hotels are all about and great we take care of our guests.  Take care and we do hope to see you again in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Comfy, clean with oversized soaking tub.
Summary: I've come to expect a Gold standard at Ayres, but this particular location has a Platinum standard. Clean, comfortable, oversized bath tub with sink outside, and good sound proofing made this one of the nicest rooms I've ever stayed in. Thank you! The breakfast has bacon!
Manager Response: Wow, thank you Diane for branding the hotel as a "Platinum Standard" hotel, it doesn't get any better than that!  WE do hope you are able to visit us again in the near future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We were referred to this hotel by my daughter's new college due to it's convenient location. Upon arriving around noon, we were greeted promptly at the front desk. I asked for a room convenient to a door and parking lot for loading and unloading of all the stuff we had for the dorm. We were offered a room on the first floor right next to garage. The room was ready and we were able to go without waiting for the 3pm checkin time. It couldn't have been more convenient. Hot breakfast everyday was very good as well. Much nicer than the continental a lot of hotels serve.  The only issues I had with the room was a weird water flowing noise through the sink pipes periodically and the fridge made a high pitched hum whenever it turned on. One night my husband had to unplug it entirely
Manager Response: Thank you SVgal56, I am so glad you enjoyed the hotel overall but do want to apologize for the noise issues you experienced.  Maintenance has already taken care of the "water" sounds and the refrigerator, thank you for letting us know.  Email me prior to your next stay and I will ensure the room is perfect for you; we definitely want to keep you as once of our 4 year "Chapman Parent" guests.  And thank you taking your time to write yor review, I appreciate all your comments. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Absolutely loved my stay here and will book here again for future Disneyland trips. The breakfast was one of the best breakfast buffets I've seen offered compared to other hotels. Appreciated that parking was included and the ART bus pass was only $5.50, and beats the price for paying for the parking at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear pittsley, Thank you for your kind review of the hotel, I am happy to hear you will become a "return guest" of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  We looking forward to making your next visit as enjoyable as this stay was for you and your family! Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: This is such a beautiful hotel, rich with gorgeous furnishings very close to Disney and great shopping.  The beds are SO comfortable and rooms have everything you need, microwave and refrigerator, free wifi and breakfast.  Perfect! I had dinner at the restaurant next door and it was delicious. Really enjoyed my stay while in the OC for the CHOC Walk. The service was awesome!
Manager Response: Thank you 2Higgins!! Thank you for your "awesome" review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  And thank you for participating int he CHOC Walk.  Ayres Hotels is one of the co-sponsors for the CHOC walk and we had about 100 employees representing our hotels in the Walk as well.  Hope to see you next year for the Walk if not before! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Great location, very clean, beautiful rooms, friendly, breakfast, nightly wine and snack reception, highly recommend. We will definitely stay here any time we're in Orange, CA. And of course Chapman Family welcoming!
Manager Response: Thank you Rob for taking your time to write such a nice review!  As a Chapman Parent we hope to see you several times in the next few years, and don't forget, when graduation year rolls around, make your reservation about 7 months in advance.  We wish your child the best Chapman experience possible! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great stay at Ayres in Orange
Summary: From the start to the end it was a great stay. The facility was clean and very decorative, the staff pleasant and welcoming, and the room was awesome - clean to a fault, and layed out nicely.  The breakfast was good, however standard. We enjoyed our stay!
Manager Response: Thank you aaho15! Thank you for your review, I really appreciate our guests taking the time to give us feedback on their stays.  Good, bad or indifferent we always learn from our guest comments and strive to continue our great guest service and high level of cleanliness. Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: One night stay for an event at ANA Conv, Center. Clean, updated and well-appointed amenities, comfortable and spacious room, friendly, and accommodating staffs at the front desk, great breakfast buffet for the value. They've exceeded our expectations and beyond, definitely will be my first choice of hotel next time when I return to the area.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you for your "exceptional review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  My staff and I are very please to hear we exceeded your expectations and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.  Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: It is wonderful that Ayres Hotel Orange has several Tesla Charging ports in their parking lot!  After driving down I-5 from northern CA in our electric car The Ayres Hotel makes it super simple to charge up my Model S overnight while I sleep.
Manager Response: Thank you Tammy, Yes, we love that we are able to provide charging stations for our Tesla guests as well as our other Electric car guests.  All Ayres Hotels now have charging stations so spread the word.  Take care and we do hope to see you again on your next trip to Southern California. Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: The staff at this hotel are not only friendly but very helpful.  They assisted me with a third party reservation (DO NOT USE ReservationCounter.com).  The hotel is clean and bright.  The rooms are large and comfortable.  We will be staying here again!
Manager Response: dperrino, It was our pleasure to help you out with your reservation challenges.  Next time you are looking for a room do not hesitate to contact me directly for a great rate without having to go through online hassles.  Take care and we look forward to seeing you again in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith

Summary Heading: Very Good Hotel, Clean, no parking charges
Summary: Good Hotel overall, breakfast was good as well, clean and as expected, quiet rooms, no party animals, good for families, no charges for parking, which you will get with some hotels in big cities such as LA, Thanks
Manager Response: Thank you allrph for taking your time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am pleased to hear you were happy with our breakfast, cleanliness and quiet atmosphere.  We do hope to become your hotel of choice when visiting the Orange/Anaheim area in the future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Ayers Hotel - Orange - Very Nice Indeed!
Summary: Was thoroughly impressed with the hotel and the value we received.  They exceeded our expectations for our stay.  The room was fresh, clean and super nice - and the same was true of the staff.  Would definitely stay there again when in town again.  Thanks to everybody there who made our stay so pleasant!
Manager Response: You are very welcome 'zippykiddo"!  WE strive to exceed our guest's expectations and so happy that we did so for your stay.  My staff and I look forward to your next visit to our area, we will keep the welcome mat out! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My daughter & I loved staying at this hotel!  Clean, comfortable, spacious rooms; friendly, accommodating staff, nice pool.  Very affordable.  Years ago I had stayed at an Ayres Hotel in Redlands, CA & was so pleased!  I was delighted to find this one in Orange.  Fabulous place!  Definitely recommend this hotel. We didn't want to leave!
Manager Response: Dear jlsudekum, and I am "delighted" that you found us here at the Ayres Hotel Orange!  Mys taff and I appreciate your recommendation to potential future guests and we do hope to see you again in the future. Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary Heading: Ayres Hotel Orange exudes service and convenience
Summary: This was our first family trip to the greater LA area.  We had eight days of events scheduled from Santa Monica to San Clemente.  We selected the Ayres Hotel Orange hotel for its central location - close to many major roads.  The location and the people were outstanding.  We enjoyed views of the mountains, a nice breakfast every morning, drinks and cookies each evening, a nice pool and hot tub and especially the pleasant service every day.  It will be our hotel of choice for our next trip.
Manager Response: Dear Joel P, Thank you for taking your time to write your wonderful review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am pleased that we are now your "hotel of choice" and will look forward to welcoming you and your family back the next time you are in the area. Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: As always when I'm in Orange County for Business this hotel has met all my expectations.  The wonderful greeting from the front counter and warm welcome to my amazing and cozy room.  I will never go any where else when I'm in Orange County.  Ayers Orange is the best place to stay when your looking for that home feeling.  The rooms, bathroom and floors are clean, the bed and pillows are comfortable and the room always smells fresh.  Thank you Ayers Orange for always making my stay there pleasant....and of course I can't leave Christopher out, he is always pleasant and a comedian too.
Manager Response: Thank you Theresa, I will definitely give a "shout out" to Christopher; he has worked with Ayres Hotels for quite awhile and prides himself in getting to know our regular guests and treating them like family.  It was a pleasure to meet you in person this last visit and thank you for your great review of the hotel.  We hope to see you soon on your next business trip to the area. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We selected this hotel based on reviews on this site as well as Expedia. We wanted an option close to Disneyland that has free parking, free Wifi, free breakfast, and shuttle service to Disneyland, and this hotel has it all. The reviews were great, so we booked it for 3 nights. Definitely made the right choice! Our room was spacious (huge, actually), the room was very clean, the shower tub was very large with tons of shelf space and was more like a spa tub. There was a lot of counter space by the sink and a second large counter area on the opposite wall. A fridge, coffeepot, and microwave were provided, the bed was very comfortable and clean, and the room was quiet despite the hotel being alongside the highway.  The shuttle service was easy to use and timely. I was very
Manager Response: Dear TDPGH, Thank you so much for your recommendation to potential future guests of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  As always, my staff and I are happy to know that we exceeded your expectations and were a part of making your vacation memorable.  Yes, we do not have in-room safes but we do provide guest safes at the Front Desk so we sure to ask on your next visit.  Again, thank you!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Very nice hotel. Close to Disney. Good continental breakfast. The breakfast includes scrambled eggs, potatoes and bacon. Comfortable beds and amenities including c free parking. Friendly front desk staff.
Manager Response: Thank you ravin837 for your nice review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  We do hope we can welcome you back sometime in the future. Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: The beds were amazing. The hotel was quiet and clean. I was glad to see security patrolling the parking areas each night. Staff was very friendly. Short drive to Disneyland. We definitely will be staying here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Love this hotel. Have a son at Chapman University and stay whenever we visit. Friendly staff nice rooms and decent free breakfast buffet. They have a cute small snack are a where you can purchase some cravings.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for its proximity to UC Irvine medical center.  My sister in law was admitted for surgery and was found to have ovarian cancer. We asked for a late checkout so we could spend more time with my sister in law but they were unable to accommodate us.  This was very disappointing.  Our room was clean and in working order. The breakfast provided was average. The breakfast area was crowded and it was difficult to find seating.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family and I were debating if we should stay across the street from Disneyland or find a place with more options. So, we decided to stay at the Ayres Hotel because of the free parking and the free breakfast in the morning. On the weekdays, breakfast starts at 6:30-10:00 AM and weekends 7:00-10:00 AM. I must say, the free parking and free breakfast saved me ALOT of money. The breakfast for my family was great with lots of varieties. One suggestion, I know the hotel staff wants to get a head start in cleaning up the dining room. If the dining room is going to stay open past 10:00 am for the late starters, at least leave the coffee with the cream out and the juice and water dispenser on until everyone has left.   I purchased the Disney Couples Package with the room and the two
Manager Response: none

Summary: There are many places to stay at in the Disney/Orange County Area. We chose Ayers.  It's quiet, affordable, spacious, very clean, FREE PARKING, FREE BREAKFAST and in my opinion just as nice as a 4Star in that area.  We actually found Ayers back in 2012 in Seal beach and have always tried to stay at any of their properties.  Its hard sometimes because they book up very quickly, obviously because of the great ratings they have. Will always definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you Conrad001 for your great review!  I am so glad you discovered Ayres Hotels a few years ago and are a committed return guest.  With 22 hotels in Southern California and a few more on the drawing board, there is sure to be an Ayres Hotel in pretty much any area of SoCal that people want to explore, have fun or need to conduct business.  We hope to see you back again in the future Conrad, so take care until then! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This is our 2nd stay here and just like the first we loved it. We stayed in a king suite overlooking the pool. The room was very nice and clean. The bed was so comfortable. The vanity mirror is a makeup persons dream. The Jacuzzi tub is a nice feature. The hotel was very quiet and we even stayed on a weekend. Check-in took less than 10 minutes and checkout was even faster. We would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: citygirl1985 Yeah, so happy you are now an official "return guest!"  My staff and I will be here on your next visit to the Orange Anaheim area.  Take care until then! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed for one night while visiting Chapman University.  We arrived at happy hour and were greeted with wine and cookies, which was a lovely surprise.  We had a really nice corner room (king bed with pullout for our daughter) that walked out to a patio with a nice pool and hot tub.  Friendly, helpful staff.  Close to outlet stores and restaurants.  Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Clean, polite staff and a nice facility. However, it is very hard to find the bathroom in the middle of the night given the energy conservation system that is not being explained at check-in.  I was told the property has Room Service but when ordering it, you find out that in fact it is an outside service that will fulfill your order. The placing of the request is cumbersome, difficult and not handled by trained people. So, now, after checking in relatively late at 8PM and placing the order almost immediately wanting to go to bed to attend a meeting in the morning, the actual food didn't get to my room until close to 10PM. The quality was adequate but not great.
Manager Response: Dear Herbert S,  Thank you kindly for the candid feedback you have provided. Please accept my sincere apologies for the service the third party delivery service provided, as well as the lack of communication you experienced. I hope this incident does not keep you from returning to our hotel. We hope to welcome you back for a more enjoyable stay in the future.  Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Wonderful!!! Very spacious rooms. Breakfast delicious. Super clean.location great. I would stay here for sure on any future visits.pool on smaller side. Courteous staff.public transportation runs right by the hotel. A++++
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here with the family while visiting Universal. While it is a bit of a drive, we hit very little traffic (time it right) and the rates are much cheaper than LA area hotel prices. Plus the hotel is beautiful. Clean, modern and spacious, with refrigerators in the rooms, comfy beds and huge bathrooms/showers. Each evening the lobby offers complimentary snacks including beer, wine and soda for happy hour. Several restaurants are in the area, a few within walking distance. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would absolutely come back and/or stay at another property.
Manager Response: Thank you Judelr for taking the time to write such a nice review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  Often times it is better and more relaxing to stay away from the chaos of Universal or Hollywood or even Disneyland and have to drive a little, yes, do time it right.  I am glad you enjoyed your stay and we do hope to see you again in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: What can I say, this is one of the best hotels I've stayed in. Everything was on point. We stayed here to attend UFC 214. Front desk staff were all super nice and happy to help direct us where to go for dining and entertainment as well as good beaches nearby. The lobby is open and inviting, and they provide free newspapers, which is awesome to still see. They have a really good breakfast buffet that's included with the room also. The rooms themselves are very modern, clean and spacious. They're super close to the outlets, dining, and downtown Orange. Everything was up to par, and I will definitely only be staying at Ayres hotels when I visit California and they are nearby from here on out.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a family vacation!
Summary: Hotel is super clean and fresh.  We had a room for 4 (2 adults, 2 teens) and it was very spacious.  It's conveniently located near I-5, Angel Stadium, and Orange Outlets. Staff are friendly. Free hot breakfast and parking.  Highly recommend this place.  We definitely will come back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Ayres hotel was one of 7 hotels we stayed at on our trip. Definitely one of the best. Nice change from the typical expensive chain hotel. Beautifully decorated, super nice rooms, huge bathtub, nice pool, very nice staff, and an unexpected free happy hour in the lobby with wine, beer and cookies. Would definitely recommend this place.
Manager Response: Thank you VanE1919!  It is wonderful to hear that we were "one of the best hotels" you experienced while on your vacation; that means a lot!  AS I do with all reviews,  yours will be posted for all my employees to read.  Our goal is to exceed guest expectations and extend a quality experience for a reasonable price.  Looks like we succeeded!  Again thanks! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Very nice, brand new and rooms very spacious. Love that it's all hardwood floors no carpet. It's super clean and in a great area.  The employees were very friendly. Loved the hot breakfast in the morning. Also very quiet place you can't hear noise from other rooms whic is Abigail plus. Definitely recommend you won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you Nana L! I really appreciate you taking time out of your busy day to write such a nice review.  We pride ourselves int he upkeep, cleanliness of the hotel and our outgoing helpful staff.  The hotel is actually 3 years old now but still has that "brand new" feel and look.  Take care and we do hope to see you again on your next visit to Orange. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Spotlessly clean room, comfortable beds, wonderful feather pillows, great water pressure in the shower. Generous sized room, lots of light, nice A/C system. Could use more soundproofing as we heard car noises all night long. Breakfast had a nice variety with fresh fruit, eggs, bacon, pancakes, yogurt and pastries.  The hash browns were the worst I have ever tasted, a combination of horribly burnt yet also completely mushy. They were absolutely inedible. I would suggest the staff omit these from the offerings. Ample parking, nice pool.
Manager Response: Thank you Jill for your overall great review of the hotel, and I promise to work on the hash browns!  We do hope to see you again at the Ayres Hotel Orange or at one of our other 22 Ayres hotels in Southern California.  As for noise, please request the interior side of the hotel should you book with us again.  We receive comments on both side of the noise issue, some guests don't hear a thing while others do hear traffic; just a difference in sleep patterns.  Have a great rest of the summer! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed for several days doing medical tests. The staff were very helpful, we were allowed a late checkout, and even hung out for a while longer in the facility because we had a late flight. Unlike some hotels, we still had internet to the end. The facility is in good shape, the breakfast area is larger than many with better food and longer hours (6-10 am), and the place is just classier than most mid-priced hotels. We have stayed at other Ayres Hotels/Suites, and never have been disappointed. Kudos
Manager Response: Dear jimwhelchel, And Kudos to you as well for your wonderful review.  My staff and I are always happy to help out all our guests but especially those dealing with medical tests etc. at UCI.  We love working with UCI to provide a comfortable and affordable place to stay for all their patients and patient families.  Take care. Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: All I can say is that they are rated a 4 star hotel and they are every bit of 4 stars and more. Extremely large, beautiful and clean rooms. Free breakfast. Nice pool, gym and hot tub. free parking too. GOV rate and tax exempt so it was a win win for me. thank you
Manager Response: randz66 Thank you for your review!  So glad you found us when doing business in the area; hope to see you again for business or leisure and bring the family next time too! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Unfriendly staff and poor location. You should know that this hotel is far from all Los Angeles attractions, except for Disneyland in Anaheim. In Hollywood, Beverly Hills, Santa Monica and other places need to get more than an hour and a quarter. At the same time on the road there are always traffic jams. The hotel is located right next to a busy highway. Very noisy. Sound insulation of windows and walls is bad. Noise from the road is heard all night. When the neighbors from the top just walk in their room - it's very well audible in your room. The staff is unfriendly. They do not even always greet you when you pass by. The manager at the hotel seems no, we have not seen him in 3 days. Arriving at the hotel, we asked for a quiet room, but got a room with windows on the road. The
Manager Response: Dear pcmaxim, First let me say I am very surprised by your review as I remember you as our guests.  I wish you had reached out to me, the General Manager (female), as I would have been more than happy to move you to a more acceptable room for your needs; as my front desk would have also done so if asked.  As for our location, I can appreciate how persons from another country may not understand how big Los Angeles is, and often think that Orange County is the same as the City of Los Angeles.  The two are very different geographical areas and people wanting to visit L.A. would normally stay in L.A..  I am sorry you did not feel you had the best quality guest experience that so many of our guests write about in their TripAdvisor reviews and invite you to contact me personally should you wish to visit Orange County in the future, I promise to make your stay perfect. Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: Great hotel that is within about 45 minutes of everything in the LA area, from Laguna Beach to Hollywood, and really close to Disneyland and Angels Stadium.  Spacious and very clean rooms!  The free breakfast is convenient and includes the best bacon ever!
Manager Response: Thank you Taylor!  And yes, our bacon is delicious, we continually receive compliments from our guests; I wish I could sell it on the side for guests to take home!!!  We look forward to welcoming you back as a return guest should travels bring you back to the Orange/Anaheim area in the future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My son was in a basketball tournament and the free breakfast was perfect and convenient.   The Anaheim Sport Facility is near which made it easy for us to get to our games.  The rooms are very comfy and the tub is huge!
Manager Response: Thank you Phyllis, I appreciate you taking the time to write the review about the Ayres Hotel Orange.  We enjoyed having you and your son's team here while participating in the tournament, I hope they won!   Christine Smith Manager

Summary Heading: I highly recommend Ayres Hotel Orange. It's for sure our favorite!!!Clean, convenient and the staff was so friendly.
Summary: The hotel was so clean on the outside as much as the inside. The friendly service from the front desk and also the cooking staff in mornings. The breakfast buffet was great and well worth it. Last but not least the location is so centralized from Disneyland to the beach to the Angels stadium. Thank you Ayers Hotel Orange!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Clean hotel with friendly and courtesy staff. Within walking distance to Angels Stadium and Orange Outlets. Great pool and breakfast to enjoy each morning. We recommend this hotel and are planning our next trip to go back
Manager Response: kristih124, Thank you for your kind review and I am happy to hear you will be returning as a valued guest in the future.  Take care for now and see you soon! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean, new,  comfortable and all inclusive
Summary: Great hotel that makes me feel like home away from home.  Breakfast (great bacon),  parking,  wifi plus evening reception with wine,  snacks and drinks - all included in a very reasonable price.  Good size room,  powerful spacious shower, and soft towels.  10 min walk to the outlet mall. Yes,  room has no safe - quite surprised but all the goods allowed me to overlook that :)
Manager Response: Thank you WWKY, Thank you for your review, I am so glad all your expectations were met and then some!  True, we do not have safes in the rooms but we do offer safe deposit boxes at the front desk, soon your next visit please ask.  Take care for now! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect for getting ready for my wedding!
Summary: The king suite had plenty of space for a makeup artist and hairstylist to work with three ladies without brushing elbows! Comfortable king sized bed and large bathroom and shower. When checking out, I mentioned starting my honeymoon and the host at the desk gave us an Ayers bear! Great staff! Would stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Dgedey, I believe I sent you a thank you via our Ayres survey system; so thank you again for your kind words.  I am very happy everything worked out for you and your attendants to prepare for your special day.  Perhaps we can welcome you back on your First Anniversary if not before!  Congratulations! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel numerous time on the last year and never had a bad experience! The staff is friendly, the rooms are very clean and the breakfast is pretty good   I especially like the room with one king bed and the spa tub,
Manager Response: Thank you Mary Anne for your review and for being a valued return guest!  We always appreciate our guest's feedback. Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: This was a great hotel. The breakfast each morning was filling with lots of options, the room was so nice and the staff was amazing. While it's not walking distance from the park, it is an easy ride to both the park and convention center via ART. I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I always stay at Ayres Hotels when available because of the comfort, cleanliness, and friendly, helpful staff. This time I got a big tub! I was tempted to stay in it all weekend! First time at this location, very happy with it.
Manager Response: Thank you Alison! I appreciate you taking the time to write such a nice review of the hotel.  I do want to let futures know that our rooms have either a large standing shower or a large tub/shower; so if you prefer one over the other, just request when making your reservation. Take are Alison and hope to see you soon!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The hotel offer nice spacious rooms and high quality service. His strategic position near highway entrance is few minutes drive from Anaheim attractions. Very fast wireless internet access available in all rooms.
Manager Response: 230daniele62, Thank you for your review, and for noting our high speed internet access.  We just upgraded our WiFi increasing bandwidth and speed, so it is nice to know our guests are happy with the better internet access.  We do hope to see you the next time you are in the area! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We loved our stay here! Walking into the room we were amazed by how large, clean and beautiful our room was. The layout was fantastic. The breakfast buffet went on for hours and hours and was SO good. Every staff we encountered was super friendly! AND not too far from Disney! Great hotel, great experience!
Manager Response: Dear U5302LRashleyk, Thank you for your "amazing" review of the Ayres Hotel Orange and i am happy that my staff made your stay a "great experience." Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I booked 2 rooms at this hotel for my bridesmaids and I to get ready the morning of my wedding. The rooms were extremely clean, pretty spacious for having hair & make up done, and the staff were friendly & helpful!
Manager Response: First, Congratulations!! Happy to hear that everything went smoothly for you and your bridesmaids and that the hotel helped make your wedding day very special.  We will be here should you want to return for your 1st year Anniversary!  Take care! Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This hotel was great for our stay! They had a very welcoming staff. They had complimentary hour with beer/wine and cookies, and a great breakfast.  Our beds were very comfortable and we loved the huge tub.  Would come here again.
Manager Response: Tara, Thank you, thank you, thank you!  I really appreciate your kind review of the Ayres Hotel Orange. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We've stayed at Ayers more times than I can count and we've never had a bad experience.  Rooms are always clean, beds are comfortable, and the complimentary breakfast is a great bonus.  This is the only hotel we will stay at when we visit So Cal.
Manager Response: Thank you Candace! Thrilled to hear we have such a dedicated return guest.  The hotel I look forward to welcoming you and your family back on your next visit! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The hotel is lovely. It is located in a good location, near to a shopping mall and an outlet village. The room we had was lovely. It was very large for a two bed room, and had a large TV also. We faced the road which comes down from the freeway, and even though it faced the road we did not get any noise at all which was really good. The room had nice touches such as: a good selection of TV channels, you will definitely find something to watch and the wall outlets had USBs on them so you can charge without using the plug for the outlet. There was also a large fridge which was good, however no bar in the hotel was unusual but not a deal breaker. We stayed in many hotels on our two week trip around California, including Hilton and Holiday Inns and this one was by far the best. We
Manager Response: Thank you Rob, I remember you and your family; so happy we helped to make your California trip memorable!  And thank you for highlighting the hotel's features and amenities for future guests to see.  Happy travels and should you be back to California in the future we will look forward welcoming you back to the Ayres Hotel Orange! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Always a nice place to stay
Summary: Love the rooms, free parking and breakfast. Alway a nice place to stay. Beds are a too firm for my liking, but that is typical for most hotels. Love the big spacious bathroom! Also love that it has a microwave and mini fridge in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you Veronica for being one of our "return" guests.  It is nice to hear that you appreciate our rooms and amenities.  So sorry about the mattress being too firm, we also have guests saying some of our mattresses are too soft; everyone does have their own preference but find overall the Ayres Dream Sleeper mattresses please the majority of our guests the majority of the time.   Should yo find the mattress too firm on your next stay, let us know and we will be happy to find a less firm one for you! Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: Many of the employees have been at Ayres for years. That is a testament to the leadership. Always attentive to the customers comfort and always helpful. Ayres is consistanly my first choice when staying in the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Ayers offers a 5 Star feel at a 3 Star price. Nice, clean and comfortable rooms, friendly and helpful staff and a better breakfast than most places. Highly recommend. Even with many families staying, it felt quiet and I was well rested for my business trip.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A great place for us to stay.
Summary: A family wedding at a local wedding venue was made very pleasant by a great hotel to stay at. Clean rooms; easy access; nice pool; good workout room. All we wanted. Breakfast was not fancy, but above average hotel meal.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was our first stay, and I know we'll be back! We were impressed with the cleanliness and spaciousness of our room. The bed was very comfortable and we weren't drowning in an over abundance of bedding - it was just right.  For being in a pretty urban and busy location, it was very quiet. We were in the back on the 3rd floor.  The bathroom was great - large, uncluttered, and pristine. We have a suggestion for you, Ayres. We like to follow the practice of reusing towels, etc. but if you offer this, for crying out loud, PROVIDE ADDITIONAL TOWEL RACKS FOR DRYING USED TOWELS. There were only a couple of clothing hooks, which don't get the job done. And there could easily have been a couple of large towel racks in there. The breakfast was good, but the room (even including the
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Exactly as described and pictured. Great stay
Summary: Friendly staff, large room, nice lobby, and plenty of parking. Quiet, quiet, quiet room and comfortable bed. Shuttle was easy steps away. There is an additional cost for the shuttle. We would definitely stay here again when we make our way back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Accommodating, clean, convenient (within 5-10 mins of Disneyland, 20-25 mins of beaches), 20 mins to SNA airport).  Included breakfast and free parking were very appealing too.  Many other hotels in the neighborhood (including other Ayres) charge for both of these (as much as $20 a day for parking alone).  The only con was: our room was next to the highway so some road noise was unavoidable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were lucky enough to stay @ ayres on a recent family holiday. As soon as we walked in we knew we were in for a pleasant stay. There are so many positive things to say I'm not quite sure where to start. Firstly, breakfast was wonderful, & gave us & the kids energy to start the busy day. Happy Hour meant my husband could enjoy a beer & i could enjoy a nice glass of wine. Ofcourse the kids loved the freshly baked cookies...and the parents too. The pool area is lovely to come back to after a big day. Rooms are a great size, clean comfortable & good storage areas travelling with children. Staff went above & beyond & were always very helpful. Gary was lovely to chat to @ happy hour. There is also a courtesy bus which will take you to local places, walmart, Santa Ana shopping centre
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was a great hotel experience and conveniently located close to UCI Medical Center. The breakfast was delicious. The hotel was clean and felt new and fresh. The 2-queen bedroom was large and had all conveniences.  The staff were friendly and helpful. A great value.
Manager Response: Thank you Barbara B for your kind review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  As I have said in the past, the hotel always looks forward to hosting UCI Medical Center patients and families and providing the support and comfort they need when dealing with medical issues.  Take care and again thanks for your review! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This is the 3rd year we have stayed here for our annual managers conference and the accommodations are always beyond wonderful. The breakfast selection is amazing, the spa is relaxing and the conference hall is very spacious.
Manager Response: Thank you kristinaw207! And yes, we love having your group stay with us yearly and look forward to your company re-booking with us next year!  You and your fellow managers are always fun for my staff to work with and we really enjoy everyone who stays with us. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: staff service excellent, very friendly staff and willing to help whenever, ladies in particular in the front desk very professional.  place clean, and serviced well daily and place is clean all the time.  room size great and great services to rooms. secure place.
Manager Response: Thank you Anastasia N for taking the time to review your stay with us.  I am pleased you noted our high level of cleanliness as well as the hotel being safe and secure.  We do hope to see you should you return to our area in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We added 1 more day to our Disneyland trip last minute. The room was spacious and the hot breakfast was better than expected..The hotel staff were all very nice. It was not a far drive to Disneyland either. Just a quick hop on and off the freeway. Beds were comfortable. There was a delicious BBQ place called Lucile's just around the corner!
Manager Response: Thank you dianaj656, Glad you found us at the "last minute" and that we met all your expectations.  And yes, Lucile's is one of our great local restaurants that we are always happy to recommend. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This place is awesome. Clean. Fresh. EXCELLENT hot breakfast with lots of options. Staff was extremely accommodating and friendly. Room is large, spacious, clean & comfortable. The common areas are inviting and relaxing.
Manager Response: Thank you CXCaptainswife! I am so glad to hear your appreciation for our high standard of cleanliness, our guest service and amenities. Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Clean rooms, comfortable beds, and good free breakfasts. The staff was also courteous and helpful. My family and I stayed at the Ayres hotel in Orange, California, a good hub for touring the area since the tour buses will pick you up in front of the hotel. The hotel is comparable in quality and price to a Hyatt Place.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you for your wonderful review! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Over all stay was really great. The only thing that was wrong with my experience is that the bed had a big dip in it on one of the sides and I had to sleep more in the middle of the bed to stop falling into it. Staff were friendly and nice and everything was real neat and orderly.  My room didn't have a bath tub in it which I was hoping for but had a huge walk in shower.
Manager Response: Thank you Christina for your review!  I responded to your direct review to the Hotel and thanked you for bringing to our attention the saggy bed.  I encourage all guests that should you find anything not acceptable in you room (shower, no tub or saggy mattress) please bring it immediately to the attention of the front desk to allow us to correct the room.  As you company paid for your stay this last time, I do hope you take me up on my offer to extend a really great rate the next time you are in the area for fun! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Based on the good reviews on Yelp and Trip Adviser, I booked this hotel for our Disneyland trip. I am very picky about the cleanliness of where I stay. Ayres meets my expectation. I highly recommend it. Front staff is very friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you Michelle for choosing the Ayres Hotel Orange.  And thank you for noting our high level of cleanliness.  I am very proud of my Housekeeping staff and the daily pride they show in their work and for their positive attitude and understanding of the Ayres Mission Statement; "We Care About People, We Value Teamwork, We Deliver Results."  We do hope to see you again on your next trip to the Orange/Anaheim area. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Lovely property, only wish we had longer to stay!  Breakfast is much better than typical, the pool was very helpful, as we had a son in training mode, and fitness center was great as well.  All the staff were very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you Trip030492! I appreciate your feedback and am happy to know that we exceeded your expectations!  The pool will always be here for your son! Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: Hotel is very clean and modern. Hotel staff were very friendly at check-in. The hotel offers a decent breakfast daily and a nightly reception week nights. We stayed in a King suite which was very spacious and the small fridge and microwave help cut costs because we could have lunch in the room. Room service was also available but we didn't try it - however prices were around $15 for an entree which is good for room service. Lots of storage space in the room. Pool area is well kept and had nice landscaping. You can easily walk to the shoppes at Orange, a few fast food paces for a quick bite and a nearby gas station for  things like water/soda and snacks.
Manager Response: Rochelle O, Thank you for your review as I always appreciate our guest's feedback about their stay.  So glad the amenities and location of the hotel met all of your needs and then some.  We hope to welcome you back to our "little gem" of a hotel in the near future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Elegance, Great Customer Care, Thumbs Up
Summary: My parents were visiting and stayed at this hotel. Very clean hotel, awesome breakfast with room rate, and they have disability access room! My folks loved there stay and the hospitality! Thanks Ayres Team! You guys ROCK!
Manager Response: Yeah, I love it when the hotel gets a "Thumbs Up."  Thank you SarahInLB, I remember your parents and am glad the hotel met all of their needs.  WE will be here for their next visit and thank you for your review! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Loved the hotel ! Peaceful and quiet. Great room. Not basing my review on the bacon but, wow, I haven't had that quality at a hotel EVER! 5pm they set up a "reception " in the lobby. Beer, wine, sodas and cookies. Great customer service.
Manager Response: Thank you Cal3920!  Yes, our bacon is amazing and a real favorite of our guests overall.  I am happy you were able to attend our Guest Reception and thank you for noting our wonderful customer service.  We love to make our guests feel at home!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Wish I had more time to enjoy it!
Summary: Lovely hotel that I found last minute for a good price.  Large reception area with complimentary wine and cookies when I arrived. Staff was really friendly and my room was large with nice amenities, comfortable bed and huge bathtub!  Unfortunately, I checked in at 6:45 p.m. and had to check out by 8 a.m. as I was on a work trip.  Would've loved to spend more time there.
Manager Response: Thank you moirahk, I think you should return to the Ayres Hotel Orange for a leisure trip next time so you can take full advantage of all our amenities and maybe even sleep in a bit all the more to enjoy the "comfortable bed."  Take care and we do hope to see you again in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Above average hotel - absolutely excellent staff
Summary: The staff treated us and everyone else like we're treated at a five star hotel.   It was fantastic to be there, and I'll definitely stay here before anywhere else in the area.   Daisy, in particular, worked very diligently to get a minor room issue straightened out perfectly the same morning.   Always smiling - all of the staff were always outgoing and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you Bob S! I appreciate your comments and will make sure Daisy sees your accolade in regards to her service.  Thank you for acknowledging all my staff's friendliness; we feel there is no other way to treat our guests other than with respect and friendliness.  It always amazes me that not all businesses understand that simple concept.  So, we look forward to seeing you back should you have the occasion to be in our area in the future. Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: I stumble across the Ayres Hotel on hotels.com and I must say, I was highly impressed. This is truly an underrated hotel. Perfectly situated steps from The Outlets in Orange, a 5 minute drive from Disneyland, Downtown Disney, and the Garden Walk without the traffic congestion of the hotels located on the main streets leading into Disney. I had a room on the third floor and views of Disney's evening firework show.   Nicely appointed furnishings accompanied by an immaculate room. Take advantage of the pool and hot tub. There is a wonderful sitting area around the pool.   Complimentary wifi, parking, and continental hot/cold breakfast. Parking is easily assesible in front of the hotwl, along the sides, and a parking garage at the rear of the hotel. The continental breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you errubi 7 for your wonderful review.  I am so glad you "stumbled" across the hotel in searching online.
