The Ayres Hotel Orange is ideally situated with Disneyland, the Outlet's of Orange, Chapman University, and Angels Stadium all being within walking or short driving distance from the hotel.  And I am so glad you took advantage of all our amenities!  We do hope to see you on your next visit to the Orange/Anaheim area. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The Hotel was outstanding, very clean, close to the airport and walking distance to shopping. Breakfast each morning was cooked fresh and hot, Natalie has great customer service skills, very helpful and courteous. Carlos made it very easy to check in and my room was ready when I arrived.  Thanks Ayers for a pleasant stay!
Manager Response: Thank you arnital2017 for taking the time to review the hotel and letting me know about our great staff.  Your encounter with Natalie happened on day 2 of her training at the front desk, so I really pleased to hear that she is providing the customer service the Ayres Hotel is known for, I definitely will be passing on your remarks to her, as well as Carlos, aka Christopher. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The hotel is very nice and extremely clean! The bed was super comfortable! The staff were very friendly and the breakfast was also a huge plus. As advertised, the hotel is centrally located and close to many local attractions.
Manager Response: Dear Jamie B,  Thank you for taking the time to provide some feedback into your recent stay. Your compliments regarding the cleanliness of our accommodations are warmly welcomed. It pleases us to see that you were satisfied with our comfortable Celestial Sleepers as well as the service our attentive team provided. Thank you again for your insight, I look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The hotel s very nice and clean.  The bed is very comfortable.  The bonus is free breakfast buffet and no parking fee.The other hotel would charge for parking.  I would definitely stay here again if in town.
Manager Response: none

Summary: No faults. Ayers has a European look but fully modern.  Loved the free breakfast, covered parking and internet.  Loved the washer / dryer on our floor.  Huge tub in bathroom. Very clean facility.  Warm, quaint, comfortable stay.  Bed was like home.  Missed the wine tasting and did not use gym.  Convenient location.  Mall close by.  Thoroughly loved our stay.  I can't imagine a better place
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, I am very glad we helped make your first trip to California so enjoyable.  Should you return in the future we will welcome you back with open arms.  Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My partner picked this hotel. What an awesome choice he made!   The rooms were large and spacious, had everything that you needed. Comfortably fit 3 people in it.   I was also a VIP as I booked through Expedia, so I was greeted with some caramel popcorn and a letter on the bed, informing me of a late check out. Was a nice surprise.  We weren't in the rooms a whole lot but when we were they were great. The pillows are amazing.. (What pillows do you use Ayres?) House keeping were amazing. Room was always cleaned to a high standard. Fresh towels and new toiletries.   Buffet breakfast was yum as... typically consisted of eggs (scrambled), bacon, breakfast potatoes, sausages, fresh fruit, yoghurt, cereals and pastry. And of course tea/coffee and juices.   I would 100% recommend
Manager Response: Thank you Anderson for your "amazing" review of the hotel.  Please contact me at the hotel and I will be happy to provide you with the information as to where to purchase our pillows.  Take care and hope to see you again should you be in the Orange/Anaheim area in the future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This hotel is way above my expectation.  Really enjoy staying over there.  Senior people and kids were all enjoying a lot while staying in this hotel. I will recommend this hotel to my friends and relatives.
Manager Response: Lonelystar, Thank you for your recommendation to future guests; it is the wonderful reviews and the positive word of mouth that make my and my staff's jobs so worthwhile.  Hope to see you again in the near future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Great location, clean, modern rooms. Nice breakfast area and pool. Very close to Disneyland, Honda Center and Angels Stadium. Free parking, happy hour and a great breakfast. Would stay there again for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you willsderek for taking your time to write a great review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  I agree with your assessment that the hotel provides a "fantastic" value to our guests.  You are welcome back anytime. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: House keeping did not leave toilet paper, tissue box or soap. Also when having breakfast, there was no more egg in the tray and I asked the girl on the grill and I was ignored but when a little kid asked she responded right away. I felt ignored and not welcomed. Customer service is really important so that customers go back to the Hotel. Big Smiles make a difference üòä
Manager Response: velvira69 I am so embarrassed and would like to apologize on behalf of my housekeeping staff  forgetting to replenish your room supplies.  I do hope you contacted the front desk to take care of the situation immediately.  As much as I think my staff is perfect, we are human and on a rare occasion make an error, again my apologies.  You are 100% correct in saying that customer service is really important and I thank you for letting me know these incidents occurred.  It allows me to continue to work with staff as extending great guest service is our mantra. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Great service, beautiful hotel! The rooms are very spacious, comfortable bed, and couch that made into a bed if needed. Love that they don't charge for parking. The free breakfast buffet was enjoyable.   It is in a good location, near freeways to get to all the desired OC fun locations.  I would recommend it to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you!! Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: From the ease of checkin to the quiet clean rooms to the fabulous breakfast to the convenient parking, everything is spot on here. Oh, did I forget to mention the yummy cookies at the end of a busy day?
Manager Response: Thank you Jennifer!  Our cookies will always be waiting for your return! Christine Manager

Summary: The room quality and customer service was incredible. I would recommend this hotel to other colleagues. The breakfast was terrific and well organized. Our night stay was so relaxing, and beds were comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you very much Anna for your review of the Ayres Hotel Orange, I am so happy to know that you enjoyed your stay with us! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This is our second visit to The Ayres.  We stayed last year and liked it so much we reserved rooms a year in advance for Chapman University graduation weekend.  There are several reasons we like this property.  First it is centrally located to Orange, Anaheim, and Irvine.  Second, it has large, clean, and lovely rooms.  While there are double Queen rooms, both times we had the king bed and fold out couch.  Three of us occupied the room comfortably without falling over one another.  The room includes a good sized refrigerator, blow dryer, and outlets throughout the room to power all the family devices.  The hotel has an interesting way to manage electricity use and the lights can only be used when a key card is entered in a special holder in the room.  Third, wifi and parking are
Manager Response: Wow Lisa, what a gracious and wonderful review.  I am so happy to hear we met and exceeded your expectations and that you are now a "repeat" guest.  I value your feedback and as I do with all our reviews, I will post for my entire staff to see.  Reveiws such as yours giving meaning to all our hard work.  Thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We have always chosen the Ayres Hotel first when staying in Orange over the past 4+ years that our daughter was in college at nearby Chapman University.  Friendly staff, immaculate property, nice breakfast and great location.  Until our most recent visit, we'd stayed in the "old Ayres Orange," now the Alo.  The "new" Ayres Orange takes the whole experience up a notch, with beautiful new rooms and facilities.  We always appreciate the fresh fruit or cookies waiting in the lobby when we return from a full date out and about.  Sad that we won't be returning as often, as our last trip was for graduation, unless our daughter ends up employed in the area, in which case, we'll definitely be back again : )
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for four nights and were very impressed by the friendly staff and spacious rooms. The shuttle service was very convenient for travelling to the theme parks. The guest laundry was very clean and super convenient for a family of four. The free breakfast was a great way to start the day and the mid-week happy hour was a great way to end the day! We would have zero hesitation staying here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed here many times.  The staff are friendly, the rooms are spotless and the buffet is always very delicious, and has a great verity to choose from. The location is great and easily accessed from the 3 major freeways.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The were so very good and kind with us.  My sister was as UC Irvine and we did not know one minute from the next what was going to happen.  They worked with us.  Can't say enough good things about the hotel.  Also, very pleasant and immaculate.  Susan Leavitt
Manager Response: none

Summary: Went to see a hockey game with my daughter. Close to the Honda centre and Disney. Friendly Staff and nice lobby and rooms. Breakfast is pretty good as well. We enjoyed our stay. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Go Ducks!!!  Thank you for choosing to stay at the Ayres Hotel Orange for the hockey game.  I appreciate your review and we look forward to seeing you in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: This hotel was one of the cleanest and well maintained. The buffet was delicious. Overall a great value and close to Disneyland.  The pool was a bit small but perfect for quick dips and warming up to sun.
Manager Response: Thank you George for your review!!  My staff and I work hard at keeping the hotel clean and well maintained and we really appreciate that you noticed our efforts.   Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: This is a great hotel! The rooms are large and the beds are very comfy. We would definitely stay here again! They also have free hot breakfast, and free happy hours from 5pm to 7pm with great cookies.
Manager Response: Thank you Debra0812, I am so glad you enjoyed staying with us and that we can look forward to a return stay the next time you are in the area.  I will clarify for other future guests that our Happy Hour is Monday - Thursday.  Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Quick stay at this hotel on a business trip. I loved the breakfast buffet, night reception, and free parking. Another hotel I stay at in Anaheim charges almost $20 to park. Although close to the freeway, I didn't hear a thing.
Manager Response: KatieJaye, Thank you for taking the time to review the hotel!  I am pleased you enjoyed the free breakfast, guest reception, parking and internet access.  We feel our guests receive quality amenities and service at a value rate. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Nice room, very clean, well-appointed.   I enjoyed the hotel gym and walking to local restaurants.   One-night stay on business trip.  Will stay here again.  Good for family, couples, business.   Just off freeway but did not notice freeway noise in room.
Manager Response: David, Thank you for reviewing the hotel!  We too feel our location is great; near Disneyland, the Outlets of Orange, Angels Baseball Stadium and many more local attractions.  We are also welcoming a couple of new brew pubs to our area, also within walking distance of the hotel.  We do hope to see you on your next business trip to the area or perhaps a visit to Disneyland! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Stay was great! Staff was very accommodating! We loved the breakfast buffet as this was one less thing to worry about during our trip to Disney.  Rooms were very spacious and super clean. The one thing preventing me from rating it as "excellent" was just not having peace of mind as the room did not have a safe to store our valuables.
Manager Response: Dear Horns08, Thank you for letting us know about your "Great Stay" with us at the Ayres Hotel Orange. The hotel does have safe deposit boxes at the front desk but I appreciate that some guests need larger safes and will pass along your comment to our Corporate office for future consideration.  Thank you for letting us know this is important to you. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel every time I fly to California from Oklahoma to see my doctor at UCI.  The rooms are excellent and the staff  is friendly.  I would recommend this hotel to everyone.  The breakfast buffet is great.
Manager Response: Thank you sheok5, As I always mention our UCI guests are very important to us and we always try to strive to be our guest's "home away from home."  Thank you for letting us know that yo appreciate our friendly service and great rooms. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The beds and bedding at this hotel were wonderful!  Rooms were clean and spacious, breakfast was tasty and plentiful.  The entire hotel was gorgeous.  Only negative were that housekeeping attempted to enter one morning despite the "do not disturb" sign and us yelling "don't come in".  The only thing that kept her out was our additional door lock.  Other than that, the stay was wonderful!
Manager Response: Oh Catherine, I am so sorry my staff member did not honor the Do Not Disturb sign.  We are currently working with new staff members to ensure they are correctly trained on all of our policies and procedures and I will follow up during training.  I am pleased to hear you enjoyed the bedding and beds.  Ayres Hotels get so many compliments on our mattresses that we now sell them to the public.  All hotels have order forms available. We do hope to see you again on your next visit to the area. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Large rooms, clean rooms and fantastic breakfast
Summary: The rooms were spacious, the pool was clean and the morning complimentary breakfast was fantastic. The price was reasonable.  The location was close to many restaurants for night time eating and close to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you for your kind review! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Ayres Hotel Will Be Our Primary Hotel for Disneyland Visits
Summary: Ayres Hotel is a very clean, comfortable and great staff Hotel. We use to stay at other hotels when we visited Disneyland (which was about 2 times a month) but now that we have stayed twice at Ayres, we will for now on stay here. We feel welcomed by the staff and service we get. The room was very spacious and clean. Haven't seen this kind of service and clean hotel in awhile. We will be back next month.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We thought the hotel was very nice. They kept it clean which is always important to us. The king room was a good size and the bed was comfortable. The TV was also a good size but the remote did not always work as it should (not sure why). A good hot breakfast every morning, with nice fresh fruit (I can be very picky with fruit) - only suggestion: it would have been nice if they offered something other than scrambled eggs on alternate days. I would not hesitate to return.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed at Ayres Orange and Ayres Anaheim many, many times . We have been going to Disneyland with child renter and now grand children and this is by far our favorite place to stay. Wonderful breakfast , great staff and quick hop on shuttle for Disney !!!! Thank you Ayres family and staff. Arnold and Laura Phillips Canby, Oregon
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very nice hotel in Orange/Santa Ana. The property is very nicely done. The staff were very helpful. The hotel has great amenities. There was wine and cookies in the evening, a treat my husband enjoyed very much. The room was very large and nicely decorated. We were very impressed.
Manager Response: Thank you sueI648KL, I am pleased to hear the hotel and my staff impressed you and your husband!  We work hard to make sure our guests enjoy their stays with us and we do hope to see you back in the near future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Always great staying at the Ayres Orange...
Summary: Excellent service and the staff is exceptional. We needed to stay for several days due to our daughter's hospitalization. At first the number of days needed were not available but Christopher was able to make it happen. Christoper spend several minutes trying to find a way and fortunately he did. This is not the first time we have stayed and it won't be the last. The rooms are roomy, comfortable, nicely decorated and modern. Beds are very comfortable. The complimentary breakfast is yummy!  When travel comes up and it is not related to being by a hospital, we will always look at staying at an Ayres Hotel!
Manager Response: Gail00, Thank you for your kind review and I will let Christopher know how much you appreciated his efforts.  Taking care of our UCI families is a priority for all my staff as for myself and the Ayres Family.  I am happy we were here for you and to know you will be using Ayres Hotels in the future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Hotel was super clean.  Had a double queen room and very spacious with nice bathroom. The staff was friendly and the free breakfast was not too shabby. Was visiting my son at Chapman University and they give a Chapman family discount so that was an added bonus.   I would definitely stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you!! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Excellent modern hotel.  Great location next to ALO Hotel, Wendy's, and Best Buy.  Within walking distance (10 minutes or so) of Outlets at Orange with shopping, restaurants, and movie theaters.  The closet was small, but additional open storage area beside bathroom made for plenty of room to hang all clothes.  The sink is located outside of shower/toilet area, which is convenient if multiple guests are staying in the room.  The bathroom only had a shower, but I believe a shower/tub combo is available upon request.  Plenty of shelving available for storage (most hotels only offer chest of drawers) along with both a mini-fridge and microwave beneath a small counter area.  Very comfortable beds and pillows.  DirecTV service and onscreen guide offer a great selection of channels
Manager Response: Brent, Thank you for your review and for giving a heads up to future guests about the ART service to Disneyland.  After we spoke the day you checked, I contacted ART to again let them know of the Ayres Hotel Orange and the ALO Hotel's frustration in their inconsistent service.  ART as assured us that they are working diligently to hire enough drivers and also to stay on schedule.  Again, thank you and I know we will see you in the near future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: A good start to our road trip
Summary: Good value, clean and comfortable. Good location. Free breakfast was very good. We stayed during Spring Break and although the hotel was busy we still found a table to eat in the morning it was just a little more crowded than usual. The restaurant staff coped very well and were very friendly. Make sure any requests or messages are understood or actually written down. Some staff were super and reliable others forgot to write in a book that coffee/tea maker was broken............and my friend from Newport Beach called the hotel on the day of my arrival as she wanted to drop some things off for me and was told when calling 3 different times that I was not staying at the hotel and not due to arrive!!! Caused a little worry to my friends and relatives!!
Manager Response: TripDivaHamphireUK, Thank you very much for taking the time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am so glad you enjoyed your stay overall, and I do apologize for my staff's inconsistent attention to detail.  We will keeping working on getting it 100% right all the time! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Everyone and everything there was amazing.  The room far exceeded our expectations.  It was exceptionally clean and the hotel was very accommodating.  Breakfast was delicious, staff was extremely helpful.  We'd love to stay there again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband recently had a major surgery at UC Irvine Medical Center. We stayed at the Ayres Hotel just across the street, within walking distance from the hospital. The fact that we could park there and just walk across the street was a major bonus. The hotel itself was very welcoming, clean, large comfortable room, quiet (even though we were facing the freeway, double glazed windows kept out the traffic noise), comfy mattress, pleasant breakfast room with the usual faire and a wine/beer/cookie reception each weekday evening. We have to return for a post op check next week and we have already booked our return stay.
Manager Response: Thank you Claudia for taking the time to write a review!  I am glad that the Hotel was here for you and your husband.  We try to all we can to lessen our UCI guest's and their family's anxiety when having procedures done at the Hospital.  WE will see you again this week, and again thank you! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Wow I have nothing but good things to say about Ayres Hotel Orange.  Stayed with my family in April, 2017. This hotel is very clean, modern and its location is perfect. Walking distance to the Block at Orange, Starbucks on the corner, Bestbuy behind the building and many other little shops all in walking distance.    The hotel was very quiet, I loved the huge parking structure behind the hotel it was easy access when you used the side doors or stairs rather than the elevator.  Most of the hotels we have stayed at have had little to no parking availability.  Its a 5 min drive from Disneyland or a $7 Uber ride.  The breakfast included (eggs, bacon or sausage, hash browns, fruit, bagels, yogurt, danishes, toast etc)  was better than any paid breakfast at other hotels in the area,
Manager Response: Thank you Ariele for your "amazing" review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am so happy that the hotel and my staff were able to exceed your expectations!  We do hope to see you the next time you are in our area.  Take care! Christine Smith Manager

Summary: We love this place. My family won't stay at any other hotel when visiting Disneyland. The rooms are large, the beds are amazing, the rooms are quite. The blackout curtains great when trying to getting little ones a nap Ayres serves a full breakfast every morning that is tasty and warm. The staff is helpful and very very nice. The shuttle to the park is a 1 min walk.
Manager Response: Carolyn, Thank you for your review, we always appreciate feedback on our service and cleanliness; and I am so glad you have become one of our "repeat guests."  Take care until your next visit, we look forward to seeing your again soon! Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: The Hotel was very good and clean.   The room was very well done easy to access. Staff very friendly and knew the area well.  The Hotel is very close to the Disneyland and about a hours drive to Universal Studios Hollywood.
Manager Response: Rash, Thank you, thank you, thank you for your review!! Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: Right opposite the Orange outlet stores, close to Disneyland and the Angel Stadium. Friendly staff and great breakfast. The rooms are large and clean. If your looking for a hotel with a personal touch, then Ayres Hotel Orange is the one.
Manager Response: Cjs1050, Thank you for your great review of the Hotel, we do pass on all our guest's comments to our staff.  I want my staff to know how much I and especially how much our guests appreciate their efforts.  And thank you for your recommendation to potential other guests, that they try the Ayres Hotel Orange. Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary Heading: This is the BEST place to stay in Southern California!!ü§ó
Summary: First, let me start by thanking Christine and her staff for the outstanding time we had celebrating our 45th anniversary with our family at the Ayers Hotel Orange!! From the time you walk in the door, you're greeted by the most friendly employees, a beautiful hotel, and treated like family! The hotel is spotless, the rooms are clean, bright, spacious with the most comfortable furnishings and beds! They have the best hotel breakfast buffet that comes with your stay serving hot food, such as eggs, bacon, sausage, pancakes, fruits, cereals and much more! Plenty of parking for the cars! There is a shuttle service you can purchase, very low price, that picks you up at the hotel and drops you off right in front of Disneyland entrance, every 40 minutes, and brings you back to the hotel
Manager Response: Thank you so much Lynn, it was our pleasure to help make the celebration of your Anniversary a memorable weekend for your family.  And thank you for writing such a great review of the Ayres Hotel Orange, I appreciate your feedback as does my staff.  We do hope to see you again in the future when you can make it back to California! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for four nights in March and really enjoyed our time here.  The room was a nice size and it was very clean and comfortable.  The fitness center was small, but had everything we needed.  The breakfast buffet has many options and is very good.  The location is really great, it's not too far from the Outlets at Orange, Honda Center, and Disneyland.  I would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you Tamara for pointing out what a "Great Value" the Ayres Hotel Orange is, along with it's perfect location to all the fun things to do in Orange County.  Take care and we do hope you will be back! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The staff (all shifts) - great, helpful, accommodating, knowledgeable and friendly. The rooms and building - new, modern and CLEAN!!! The location - under 10 minutes from Disneyland parking space to hotel parking space using the 5 fwy.
Manager Response: Dear jojan1, I am so pleasured to hear we met and exceeded your expectations!  My staff and I pride ourselves on the high level of guest service extended to our guests as well as the cleanliness of our rooms and public areas.  Thank you for your feedback! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My daughter goes to Chapman University and we always stay at this hotel. We never leave disappointed. The rooms are nice sized, clean and updated. The staff is always friendly and helpful. The breakfast is wonderful too!!
Manager Response: Thank you Vicky!  With your daughter at Chapman we know you will be a return guest for the next four years.  We appreciate all our Chapman Parents and would like to remind you  to make your reservation for your son or daughter's graduation at least 6 months in advance as that is one of the busiest weekends in our area.  Take care and see you soon Vicky! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We loved our time at Ayers Hotel Orange!  Spacious room, immaculately clean, great linens, good service, delicious F&B... we did Disneyland, and used Ayers Hotel Orange as our homebase. Awesome location, wide variety of fantastic F&B options closeby. We will be back! The one issue we had was with the ART shuttle, to & from Disneyland. Never on time, took the "milk truck route" with 100 stops all over Anaheim. It literally took us over 90 minutes to get back to the hotel.  Do yourself a favor and take an Uber to Disneyland. You won't be sorry.  Other than that, this property is amazing!
Manager Response: Dear fastlearner333, I do hope you got on the correct ART bus coming back to the hotel.  During Spring Break the buses do get behind but the return trip to the hotel should only have 5 stops max and take only 30 minutes max if running late.  I have put in a complaint to ART on your behalf and they do want to extend their apologies to you and your family.  I do agree, Uber is a great idea and in the Orange/Anaheim area, an Uber driver is never more than 5 minutes away.  Thank you for your "amazing" review of the hotel itself and your recommendation to future visitors to Disneyland. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Stay was great, hotel was really nice and clean. The people at the front desk are very friendly, only complaint was that my room was not ready for my check-in until about 4pm when very clearly on their website and in my confirmation emails says that check-in time was at 3pm so I had to sit and wait in the lobby for over an hour until they could check me into my room and give me my room key.
Manager Response: Thank you Christina, First let me apologize for your room not being ready at 3:00 pm.  99.9% of the time all rooms are ready but once in awhile we will have guests who do not check out on time and do not understand the implications of their late departure to incoming guests.   I am happy that once you did check in that you found the hotel to be clean and nice for your stay. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Great affordable option for Disneyland visitors.  There's a small 60-90 second walk over to the Alo Hotel next door to catch the shuttle (#14 on the ART route, ask for a shuttle schedule from the Alo front desk).  Parking isn't an issue; I was able to find a parking spot in front easily each day.  Rooms are massive and well-equipped; bathtubs are of the garden-style which is a nice touch.  Fridge is large and includes a microwave as well.  Beds are very comfy and have a nice divider in rooms with two queens for privacy.  TV uses DirecTV which was really handy when trying to find cartoons for the kids.  The entire complex stays very quiet with really good sound-proofing.  Pool area didn't see a ton of use when I was there, but it's still on the cooler side this time of year.  It
Manager Response: AverySLC, Thank you so much for taking your time to write such a comprehensive and wonderful review of the hotel.  I have glad to hear you had such a great experience and will be back on your next visit. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I came with a high school for their choir trip and had never heard of Ayres.  I was pleasantly surprised!  The rooms were huge! I loved the comfortable bed and the free breakfast was outstanding!  We arrived late and was sad to learn that they didn't offer room service, but the quality of the room and friendly front desk service outweighed any negative.   They even offered fresh baked cookies!  I will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you jana m; and we really enjoyed having your groups stay with us.  They were one of the best bunch of kids we have seen; polite, respectful and fun loving!  We do ot have in house room service but do have a restaurant delivery service with a variety of menus and of course our Hotel Pantry which is stocked with food 24/7.  I do hope you  did not go hungry.  Thank you again and please extend my thanks to the entire gorup. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: I'm not staying anywhere else when near Disney.
Summary: Easy check-in.  Room was huge.  Very quiet.  We had a two bed room suite.  Lots of storage space.  Parking is free.  Tons of parking.  Free breakfast is excellent.  Much better than the one at a club room in the Sheraton Garden Grove.  You can take your food and eat it by the pool.  Business room is great.  Print your tickets or just do internet stuff.  We've stayed at about 15 hotels near Disney and this is by far the best.  Even stayed at the Double Tree next door and it's no comparison.  The walls at the Double Tree were paper thin and the rooms tiny.  Beds at Ayres were wonderful.  Fridge.  Microwave.  No safe, which may or may not be a problem.  We've stayed at the Anaheim Ayres and Orange is so much better.  Bathroom is huge and it looks like a spa or something.   They
Manager Response: Dear tcmorse6570, Thank you so much for writing such a detailed and awesome review.  And special thanks for booking with us again in the future.  I am very happy than you appreciated our room size, the gift shop, complimentary parking, breakfast,location and everything else you mentioned.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!! Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: We recently stayed at The Ayres hotel for the 3rd time in a year. I see a Doctor for treatment across the street at UCI Medical Center. Each stay has been fabulous, with absolutely no complaints! The General Mgr, Christine, sees to it that your needs and requests are always met. Her customer service is outstanding! She genuinely wants to make your stay a very pleasant experience. Brian drove me in the shuttle to my medical appointments (all complimentary). He's a super nice guy! During your stay, look for Reanna, at the front desk. She is the best!! She is always very pleasant, striving to give the best customer service possible. Another front desk employee, always willing to help is Christopher. They offer a complimentary breakfast in the morning, and Mon - Thurs from 5-7, in
Manager Response: Robin, I can't thank you enough for your outstanding review of the Hotel and my staff; it is posted for all the staff to read.  We try to treat all guests with the same warmth and caring attitudes but when we have such friendly and positive guests such as yourself; it makes it all the more easy to build a great relationship.  I know we will see you again in the future and until then, take care and know we are thinking of you and your family!! Very sincerely, Christine

Summary: I have nothing but amazing things to say about the Ayres in Orange. Was amazingly beautiful, the staff was super nice, the rooms were beautiful and newly remodeled, the 'continental' breakfast was more like a little restaurant with amazing FREE food! The location is perfect with the shopping mall across the street, Disney 2 miles away, and the freeway close by! I would recommend this hotel any day to anyone!
Manager Response: Thank yo so much gabbylane for your recommendation to potential future guests!  I appreciate your kind words and am "pleased" that you so enjoyed the Ayres Hotel Orange!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: From the moment I walked through the doors was treated with a friendly professional attitude, I was greeted at the front desk and was politely asked about the nature of my visit and immediately upon finding out that I might be coming back with a larger group promptly put me in contact with those that could help me plan.  I loved the way I was treated both as I was leaving or arriving and the genuine smiles that they had on their face, it made some long days feel better.
Manager Response: JMRaymer, I am pleased to know that we were able to make your stay a "great experience" for you!   Treating guests with respect, warmth and in a professional manner seems like an easy thing to do; but it doesn't always happen everywhere so I will thank my staff for their continued high level of guest service.  We do hope to see you back with your larger group and until then take care. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Descent, compare to others its got free parking , free breakfast , very close to disney, close to freeway, free wifi
Summary: The negative is the mattress is very soft, you cant take your breakfast food to eat in your room. Its a descent hotel , for the price its ok, rooms were clean too, they got lots of space to park, i would come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I am so sorry the mattress was too soft for you; it is difficult for one type of mattress to please everyone and their sleep preferences.  Should you stay again, please request a "bed board" when you make your reservation; we will be happy to place it between the mattresses and box spring to help firm up the mattress. Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: Staff was great. The breakfasts were very good. The rooms were clean and comfortable. Located in a pretty central location with shopping and food places close. We enjoyed our stay here and will definitely stay here again on our next California trip.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Fantastic Stay at Ayres Hotel Orange!
Summary: My family stayed at Ayres Hotel Orange for 5 nights over Spring Break.  Asked for a top floor room and was given one on the fourth floor facing the pool.  Definitely get a room facing the pool since the other side faces the highway.  The hotel was exceptionally clean in all areas: room, pool, lobby, breakfast area, and gym.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  The location was very convenient - around 10 minutes from Disneyland and 20 minutes to the nearest beach (Newport).  Parking in front fills up pretty quickly but there is ample covered parking in the back.  There were a lot of other families with small children so my kids were happy to meet new friends.  The room was spacious and well-appointed.  We had a view of the Disneyland fireworks from our room.  The breakfast
Manager Response: Wow, thanks Michael for you "fantastic" review of the Hotel.  Spring break has kept us hopping with more families than usual; and it is always fun to watch the kids interact and have such a great time away from home.  I am very happy the hotel and staff exceeded your expectations and we do hope to see you again in the future.  Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The staff was very friendly and made us feel very welcome during our stay. The rooms were clean never had a problem with house keeping. When we asked for extra blankets they brought them to us right away. This was our second time staying here and we will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you Wednesday S; you are now officially a "wonderful return guest."  Thank you for noting our guest service, my staff strives to meet and exceed our guest's expectations and I will post your comments as I do all guest comments, so they know they did a gerat job taking care of you and your family. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Highly pleased with the service, cleanliness, comfy beds and delicious breakfast,  my kids wanted to "live there" lol staying at this hotel again for sure , the only thing I recommend if you have kids is to maybe take your own car instead of the tram because ita not much more to park at Disney and when you and your kids are tired at the end of day it takes really long on the way back to drop you off.
Manager Response: Thank you bettyt797 for taking your time to write an "excellent" review of the Hotel.  I am so pleased that the hotel met your expectations and proved to be the perfect place for your family's Disneyland trip.  We hope to see you again next year! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: would have liked brewed decaf coffee at breakfast, otherwise meal was very good and workout facilities adequate given the lack of competition. nice idea for the happy hour, although I did not partake.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel, we appreciate your and all our guests feedback.  We do hope to see you again in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We booked this hotel as we could not get into the hotel of our choice for two nights, once we arrived we wanted to stay longer! Friendly staff, spotlessly clean, large bath towels, very comfortable room and bed, FREE hot buffet breakfast and wine in the evenings what could be better? Oh, FREE parking! We will be back later in the year and cannot wait! We were worried about proximity to the roads but couldn't hear a thing in our room and the blackout curtains made sleeping very cosy.
Manager Response: Thank you LoudJezebel very much for taking your time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am so glad you tried us out and will be come a repeat guest.We look forward to seeing you and your family on your next visit to Orange. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Despite some small problems it was good
Summary: We stayed 4 nights and while we were there the service was good.  We requested rooms together but the hotel gave them away because they were full (don't know why that mattered).  They also ran out of cribs on the first night.  It was not a big deal and we received a crib the second night.  Finally, the gas was siphoned from our van the first night so make sure you park in a well lit and occupied area.  Aside from these things the staff was good and helpful.  The rooms were clean and roomy with comfortable beds and good tv's. The breakfast was good but the same every day (scrambled eggs, pancakes, hash-browns, bacon, fruit, yogurt, and pastries)  In all we would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear wteancum, Thank you very much for your comments, we always appreciate our guest's feedback.  The hotel does try as best as possible to pre-block all requests but when a another guest who was to check out of the room we have other guests blocked into, decides to stay another night, their request to stay in the same room is granted first.  I am so sorry we were not able to honor your request to be closer.  I am also really sorry about your gas being siphoned, I spoke to Orange PD and apparently many hotels are experiencing this same problem.  We have asked our security company to spend a little extra time patrolling our parking structure and parking lots.  And lastly, thank you for staying with us in the future!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Beautiful hotel close to amusement parks, sporting venues, and restaurants. Enjoyed the stay, which was our first stay at a Ayres Hotel. We will stay at this chain if traveling near one in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you!! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Spent 5 nights here in February 2017. Large spacious 2 bed queen rooms , comfortable beds , no noise from adjoining rooms , or outside road noise .  Plenty of storage , fridge in room.   Free Buffett breakfast on site . Free parking , found spaces easily every night .  close to Disney , quick journey not much traffic when we were there .   Close to the outlets.   Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you MMJ-07, I really appreciate your review and that you found the Ayres Hotel Orange to meet all your needs while visiting our area.  We will look forward to seeing you again in the future should your travels bring you back our way. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The room was too bright woke up early morning after I had long day at work i addressed  this concern to management and got no help but attitude very rude and wasn't listening about the sleep deprevation
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Again, I will extend my apologies for you not being able to sleep even though you had the blackout drapes drawn in your room.  Per our conversation, I explained that when the blackout drapes are completely closed the sleeping rooms are pitch black.  I told you that we have airline crews that are day sleepers and the drapes meet with their stringent contract requirements regarding no light being let into rooms.   I also explained to you that since the Hotel opened we have never had a guest complain that there was too much light in the room when the blackout drapes are closed.  Lastly, I told you that I did not feel the hotel was in any way at fault for you not being able to sleep and I would not honor a discount in your rate per your request. Respectfully, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Excellent quiet hotel close to Anaheim Convention Center. Many restaurant choices within walking distance as well. Staff was excellent, free breakfast was very good. Starbucks on the corner! Will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you Andrew for your kind review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and will be cak for a future stay. Sincerely Christine Smith Manager

Summary: Had a great stay at the ayres hotel. Really nice and clean inside and out. The kids loved that bath tub. Had a decent hot breakfast buffet also. Only thing I wished they had was more equipment for the workout room other then that üëåüëåüëå
Manager Response: Thank you Steve for taking your time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am glad you and your family enjoyed the hotel and we do hope to see you again int he future!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This place was awesome and at such a great price, you can't beat it. They went above and beyond to help out with all accommodations for a surprise I had planned. Room was squeaky clean which was one of the most important things to us. Free HBO and WiFi and very cozy rooms. Definitely would recommend to anyone visiting Disneyland. Quick 5 minute Uber/Lyft or drive, and don't have to deal with downtown traffic.
Manager Response: Dear BakerTB11, My staff was very happy to help you out with your surprise; we have been really enjoyed being a part of all kinds of surprises in the past.  The hotel has helped with marriage proposals, Christmas trees in rooms upon check-in, romantic requests of champagne and flowers, kids birthday surprises, etc..  We are open to help with any and all (has to be legal) surprises our guests want to do for their families or significant other. thank you for choosing the Ayres Hotel Orange.  Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Who would have guess that this close to many treasure to visit in Orange was this lovely and exceptionally manicured hotel. It was immaculate, warm colors and very spacious and happy. The employees all smiles and greeted you and the breakfast was amazing and FRESH. We are going to recommend it to any family also that is going to Disneyland. Don't waste your money on those crap hotels close to Disney. This is a quiet respite after any long day and reasonably priced.
Manager Response: Dear Franny_9 Thank you for touting the cleanliness of the hotel along with the friendliness of my staff.  We work hard to please our guests while they are here, so they will one day return to the Ayres Hotel Orange.  Again, thank you! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean Spacious Friendly Breakfast Comfortable Breakfast Wine
Summary: This is the cleanest hotel I have been in.  The rooms are spacious. There is a partition between the beds for rooms with 2 beds. The beds are comfortable. The rooms are quiet. Towels are white are large. The bathroom is large with a large shower tub. Electrical outlets now have 2 plugs with 2 USB outlets. Very friendly staff members. Tasty fresh cooked breakfast. Wine in the evening with cookies.  I will stay at this hotel and any of the Ayres Hotel brand.
Manager Response: Dear Never Leave You...T And we are so happy to hear you will" never leave" the Ayres Hotel as nothing less than a Satisfied Guest!  Please do try our other Ayres Hotels, located as far north as Paso Robles California, as far west as Seal Beach, as far south as Alpine and as far east as Ontario and Moreno Valley.  Thank you for becoming a loyal customer! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The hotel room was clean, quiet, well laid out, comfortable and everything worked properly.  We enjoyed our stay and won our tournament!  We took advantage of the in-room refrigerator and microwave, as well as the coin-operated laundry to wash my uniform between games.
Manager Response: Thank you Larry for your great review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  My staff ad I are happy that you and your family found us the perfect hotel for the tournament.  We do hope to see you back when participating in upcoming tournaments. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: It was a great room, that had complimentary buffet style breakfast. The room was clean and well equipped with a microwave and a refrigerator.  The only thing I did not like and we should have asked for was getting joining rooms, which we didn't get even though we booked two rooms for that trip.
Manager Response: samcM3691UB Thank you for your "excellent" review!  Yes, the hotel will block adjoining or connecting rooms when requested by our guests; those reservations receive priority blocking of rooms.  After requests are met, all other reservations are blocked as best as possible, if we  see multiple reservations with the same name we try to block close by but it also depends on stay-over guests and what rooms are left. I am sorry Sam that we were not able to get your rooms closer this time.  Just request in the future and gain, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This is our 2nd time staying at Ayres and both stays were great! Very clean, family friendly, great pricing, great staff and a very nice relaxing atmosphere. Ayres is definitely our hotel of choice if available.
Manager Response: Thank you macky8799!  My staff and I are very happy to hear we are now a "repeat" guest!  Thank you for making Ayres your #1 choice! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I really enjoyed staying here. It's a quaint hotel beautiful lobby lovely breakfast and large comfortable rooms. They also have quite a good fitness center with free weights, weight machine and cardio. The pool area includes a hot tub. A very nice hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you travelwhenican; you are a fellow traveler after my own heart!  I am very pleased that your found our hotel to be "great", and hope to see you again on future journeys. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My daughter and I stayed at the Ayres while touring nearby Chapman University. This was my second visit, and found it consistent with the first. It is a convenient, clean property with welcoming touches - just the thing when you're traveling  and need everything to be easy. I love how cookies and beverages (including wine for adults) await afternoon/early evening arrivals. Parking is right out front and free, front desk staff is friendly, and rooms are comfortable and...roomy. The only negative I found is proximity to dining options. While the location, being near freeways, is handy for traveling it's not really walkable. I like being at hotel where you can go downstairs or next door for dinner. While there is a nearby Mexican restaurant, we checked in on a Monday and it was
Manager Response: Dear CaliforniaGal408, Thank you for your wonderful review!  I am so sorry that Anepalco's was not open during your stay, yes they are closed on Mondays.  If I may suggest walking down to the Outlets of Orange (2 long blocks from hotel), for dinner on your next visit.  There is a large number of restaurants from fast food to fine dining, and our area is very safe to walk around throughout the day or evening.   Again thank you for being a loyal Chapman parent! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Spacious rooms, freshly made breakfast (cooks right in front of you), close to Disneyland. Updated rooms. Clean rooms. I have no complaints. Rooms are larger than your average hotel room. Pullout couch. Continental breakfast. Great pool and hot tub area.
Manager Response: Thank you Michael for your "great" review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!!  HOpe to see you again in the near future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I travel for business. Easy in and out an free breakfast to get the day moving.  Everyone is pleasant and hotel is clean and comfortable.  Parking is easy. Although I did not use, there is a nice small pool and whirlpool..
Manager Response: Thank you George for taking your time to let us know you appreciate our hotel!  We will see you on your next business trip to the area. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: It's a great hotel, friendly, helpful, clean, great choices for breakfast and fun extra surprises! Like fresh cookies, wine and beer tastings in the lobby in the evenings. Had lots of family staying here with us,so we had a suite, it was great for everyone to gathered together!
Manager Response: First, congratulations on your new marriage!!!  My staff and I are happy to know we helped make the wedding memorable for you and your guests.  And thank you for taking the time to write a review and let us know that everything went well for this special event. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Modern, clean, well designed, comfortable rooms, nice exercise room, great breakfast included, great value. Highly recommended for business or personal and well located. Hope to return there again in future.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you Jeff!!

Summary Heading: Conveniently located hotel right on the freeway
Summary: Despite directly on busy streets it is very quiet hotel. However, without green spaces around the hotel. Rooms spacious and clean. Wlan could be better, but always worked. Breakfast extensive but monotonous.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights for a friend's wedding. Very spacious room with very comfortable bed and clean. Also very spacious washroom. The staff are very friendly and helpful. There is complimentary breakfast. It is less than 10 mins walk to the Orange outlet where you can find a big variety of shops. It is 8 mins by car from the French Estate where the wedding is. Free parking and very close to the highway.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you for your nice review.  I am very happy you enjoyed your stay while here for a wedding.  We do work with the French Estates to provide wedding groups with a great rate and am glad you enjoyed the Ayres Hotel Orange. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We were visiting friends in Orange, CA and needed a hotel. Based upon the great reviews on Tripadvisor  we selected this hotel. It was a really good decision.  This is not one of those "cookie cutter" hotels. It has a lovely European feel to it in looks and ambiance. That said, the room was large (un-European size), very well appointed and comfortable. The included breakfast was a very nice buffet. Everything was fresh. AND, the breakfast room is large and comfortable. Plenty of tables and chairs -- not cramped like some other places. AND the breakfast hours are generous -- 6:30 - 10:00 AM during the week (I'm not sure what the weekend hours are). In the morning, at breakfast, we did see a number of families with children, obviously headed to Disneyland. So the secret is out.
Manager Response: Thank you Bob for your great review, and yes "the secret is out."  The hotel enjoys a varied clientele from Disney families, UCI patients and families, corporate and university guests and people visiting friends in the area, such as yourself.  The Ayres Family definitely does not build"cookie cutter" hotels with each hotel a little different in theme and decor; thank you for noticing!!!  We do hope to see you again the next time you visit your friends! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We've stayed here previously and it was refreshing to see some of the same staff still working here. Rooms are perfect, clean, and more importantly quiet. Breakfast is great and Happy hour is a bonus.
Manager Response: Thank you Peter, Yes, we are thankful for the longevity of our staff and work to create a good work environment where our employees are well paid, appreciated and where we understand their personal goals and help to make them achievable.  In turn our staff enjoys working for Ayres Hotels and makes our high standard of cleanliness and guest service a priority.  Thank you for noticing! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My room was clean, large and a convenient location for my visit. It's only 2 miles from Disney & Convention Center, walk drive or take the shuttle. Free parking and breakfast buffet a plus. I'll be staying there the next time I'm in town.
Manager Response: Thank you rodney_toporek! We are happy that you are happy with the Hotel and we look forward to your next stay with us! Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: Hotel was very clean with spacious rooms and big bathtubs for the kids. Nice happy hour for guests with a good breakfast selection.  Free parking which is great and staff was very nice. Great location to freeway.
Manager Response: Christina, Thank you for your "beautiful" review of the Hotel.  Glad you loved our bathtubs but wan to mention to future guests, rooms have either tubs or showers, so if you prefer one over the other, just request when making your reservation or at check-in.  We want all our guest to be happy with our bathrooms.  Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Always accommodating..room always clean...great morning breakfast...spacious...refrigerator and microwave...i would recommend to anyone...staff is always pleasant and helpful...great location...next to outlet and all restaurants...5 mins away from Angel Stadium
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review!!!  See you on your next visit to Orange! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Room was clean, bedding was comfortable and towels were nice.  Room was furnished nicely, nice decor, not worn and well maintained. Provided soft drinks, wine and beer from 5 to7 pm Monday -Thursday. But what about the other 3 days? I like a glass of wine on those days too. Instead of being served with snacks, cookies were put out at the same time. Strange. Did not like energy reducing electrical system in room where room key has to be inserted in special holder for lights to work. I wanted to download to my computer but could not unless I was in the room with my key. Breakfast is okay better than most, but would have appreciated egg whites as an option to scrambled eggs. No sodas served at breakfast so had to get permission from the manager to have one with breakfast, even
Manager Response: Dear Pyrlover, Thank you for taking your time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am glad you found the hotel to be clean and comfortable, but am sorry the energy saving system was not explained to you thoroughly.  All guests are given 2 key cards, once to access their room and one to put into the energy system card holder for the duration of a guest's stay.  This allows the room lighting system to be on at all times, with a guest using the regular light switches to turn off/on lighting.  Electrical outlets are not wired into the lighting system and work 24/7; so charging phones or computers is not a problem.  You are correct that the hotel does not serve complimentary sodas at breakfast and will not do so in the future.  Our Breakfast is extensive and free and to be able to continue to provide it to our guests on a complimentary basis we are not always able to serve everything our guests request.  All guests are able to purchase sodas, wine, beer and snacks from our gift shop and the hotel will continue to provide a complimentary Happy Hour Monday - Thursday only.  Again, thank you for your review. Respectfully, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I spend about 150 nights per year at hotels, mostly Hilton properties. Ayres Hotel in Orange was one of the best, from check-in to check-out everything was perfect. I will become a member of your program to start earning points.
Manager Response: Thank you keys2happiness! And thank you for letting us know we exceeded your expectations after staying in Hilton Hotels, which are "great" hotels as well.  Yes, please sign up for the Ayres Rewards Program, so you may begin earning points for future stays or gifts.  WE do hope to see you again in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in the OC
Summary: Nice rooms and great location. Easy to get on the 5 and centrally located. I have a daughter at Chapman and this is where we alway stay when visiting her.  On this visit, I had a conference at the Anaheim Convention Center. That was only 10 - 15 min away, so again, the location was perfect.  I noticed that they now have a happy hour with wine and cookies! What could be better?
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff were wonderful. The breakfast was fantastic; large selection. The property itself was lovely and conveniently located within close proximity to Disneyland. I would definitely recommend to others and would stay again if in the area. Thank you for helping to make our stay in California a great one!!
Manager Response: You are so welcome kzengerle!  I am happy to hear we helped to make your Mother Daughter trip so special.  We recommend you make the trip an annual event, we will be here for you!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This is my "go to" hotel in the Orange area. Always clean, attentive and polite staff, and a good value for the money. You've got to love free parking, free wifi, and a free hot breakfast. And it's the perfect location for shopping, dining, and entertainment in the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was well managed in all areas.  Breakfast was excellent. The gym was well equipped. The location was great. We found housekeeping to be very thorough. The wifi for our room was the best we have found.
Manager Response: Thank you WMartin58 for you great review of the Hotel!!  We do hope to have you as a guest again the next time you are in the Orange/Anaheim area. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The place is very nice and close to Disney, I didnt give full marks for the breakfast, it was quite normal. The room was clean and most of the staff were very gentle and polite, There was only one of them that didn't make me feel welcome
Manager Response: Dear eddiemdevia, Thank yo for taking your time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I thank you for your overall good review but would like to apologize for the my team member who did not make you feel welcome.  I invite you to email me personally at csmith@ayreshotels.com to let me know what happened so I may take the opportunity to work with this specific employee to better their guest service skills.  Again, thank you for your review. Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary Heading: Our hotel for all OC trips!
Summary: We come down to OC many times a year, especially on the 4th of July weekend. We always got top notch treatments from the manager Christine S, to Allen B. (the Assistant Manager) to Rose ( back office) , Daisy ( counter clerk) and all other staffs. The breakfast and free parking were the plus, with a party of 4 people, the room charge was almost down to nothing.
Manager Response: Tweetiedang, Thanks so much for your review.  You have been such a loyal customer of ALO Hotel by Ayres and now the Ayres Hotel Orange.  We really appreciate you continued patronage and look forward to seeing you on your next visit. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Loved our stay at the Ayres Hotel!
Summary: The hotel and staff were top notch.  The breakfast included with the room was fantastic with something for everyone.  Other hotels in the area were charging $18 a night for parking, but here it's free!  The rooms were very clean and included a small fridge and microwave.  The location was convenient for us visiting our son who was receiving a living donor kidney transplant at U.C. Irvine Med Center - right across the street.
Manager Response: Thank you DonDon760! I really appreciate your kind review of the Hotel and am so glad we were perfectly located for you and your family to be close to your son while he was at UCI.  WE wish him a successful recovery and hope to see you and your family for a leisure trip the next time you are in the area. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We liked the hotel and the experience. Very kind people! It's clean, nice and well located. But not having room service definitely is an important issue for the overall experience. I think you can work in this.
Manager Response: Dear ei_castillo, Thank you for taking the time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am glad your enjoyed your overall experience!  And I appreciate your comment about the hotel not having room service.  When the hotel first opened we discussed having some sort of room service via Anepalco's, the restaurant in our sister hotel, the ALO with whom we share the corner.  Unfortunately, we did not have enough interest by our guests to economically warrant having room service so it was discontinued.  We do sell beer, wine, non-alcoholic beverages, and food items in our gift shop; and also have room service menus in our rooms that guests can order food delivered to them from local area restaurants. Again, thank you for your review!! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Good clean large bed and bath rooms.  Comfortable bed. Quiet. Tasty breakfast.  Free parking.  Plenty of spaces to park.  Plan to visit Orange county again in Feb.  We would consider to stay again. Courteous staffs. I wish the hotel would allow small pet.  This would attract more families.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review.  Yes we do have a "no pet" policy but our sister hotel, the ALO, sharing the same parking lot does allow pets.  Should you want to return to our are in the future with your much loved pet, please don't hesitate to book the ALO Hotel by Ayres. Sincerely,   Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I booked this hotel as part of a bundle deal and I read the reviews and this one stood out!  As soon as you walk in, the decor is very nice and the staff is friendly and helpful.  Our room was very nice and housekeeping did a very good job during our stay.  We will be back next year and we plan on staying here again!
Manager Response: So great to hear you found us and that our cleanliness and guest service stood out enough to have you return next year.  We appreciate knowing we exceeded your expectations! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Enjoyed mostly everything. Could have had the shuttle inclusive. Also night help could have been friendlier. Day staff were great. Area of hotel is great close to the mall and great places to choose from to eat. Loved the Saddleback Ranch Chop House is an excellent place to dine.
Manager Response: armidao2017, Thank you for your review and especially for letting me know that I need to work a bit with my night staff on their guest service skills.  It is not about what an employee says, but more importantly how it is said.  Thank you for giving me the opportunity to help an employee do a better job. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This is the second time we have stayed in this Ayres Hotel and we will continue to do so when we are in the area.  The rooms are modern, large and very clean.  Check in is always so easy and everyone is so accommodating. It doesn't hurt either that there is a happy hour and warm cookies available mid-afternoon.  It's so close to the outlet mall and very good restaurants which also makes it a convenient place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear babtek, I am so happy to hear that you are now a "repeat" guest and that the Ayres Hotel Orange has become your go-to hotel when visiting the Anaheim/Orange area.  See you soon! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This hotel was amazing. Probably one of my best stays in a hotel ever. The lobby was nicely decorated and cozy. The service at check in was great, they were very friendly and attentive. We had a double queen room and I loved the setup. I liked how there was a partial wall between the two beds which allowed for some privacy. The room was large and clean and the beds were extremely comfortable. The hotel was in a great location with access to a nearby outdoor shopping mall and several restaurants. It was a short drive to Disneyland (less than 10 minutes), which was the main purpose of our stay. I enjoyed the complimentary breakfast which had a large variety of options. During our stay my daughter had to be admitted to the Children's Hospital so we were forced to stay an additional
Manager Response: Dear emeli500, My staff and I hope your daughter is back to feeling welll; and we were happy to extend the CHOC discount to you.  The Ayres Family have long been supporters of CHOC hospital and each year many employees from our 20 of our hotels participate in the annual CHOC WALK to raise money for the hospital.  Thank you for your wonderful comments and I will make sure all my employees see your review.  Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This hotel was a nice surprise.  I had a two day conference to attend in that area and this hotel was a perfect stay!! I would definitely stay again and again!  Super clean, spacious rooms, comfortable bath tub and beds, the Jacuzzi area was nice and clean. Staff very friendly and breakfast was great!  Excellent hotel.  Definitely recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you deldiaz03 for your kind recommendation to future guests!  My staff and I appreciate your kind words and do hope to see you again in the near future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Very clean, great food, quiet, comfortable bed, great service!I also utilized the shuttle for our conference via the ALO Hotel next door, used the gym, and took advantage of close outlet shopping. Overall a wonderful stay for business!
Manager Response: lisadC108UP Thank you for your review!  It sounds like we were the perfect place to stay while in Orange on business.  WE do hope to see you on your next business trip or perhaps a trip to Disneyland.  Again, thank you! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Loved everything about this hotel. Fully recommend.  Near shopping centre. Shuttle bus to Disneyland. Good breakfast. Friendly staff. Everything I was expecting from a hotel was there. Really big room. Loved our stay here.
Manager Response: Chandi P, Thanks for letting us know that you loved your stay here, and we indeed loved having you as a guest.  We do hope to see you again in the future! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The hotel is very clean and quiet with plenty of parking space available. It is nice that they offer "happy hour" from 5-7 PM on weekdays, a nice way to unwind after a long day.I stayed on a third floor room facing the courtyard and it was very quiet. Room has a mini refrigerator, microwave and a single serving coffee maker. The bed was ok, not really what I would choose, too firm for me but for two nights, it was bearable. I did not try their breakfast although I could smell bacon and eggs all the way to the elevator.
Manager Response: Dana, Thank you for your review and next time you will have to try breakfast and especially the bacon, it is really really good!  I am so glad you enjoyed your stay and appreciated all the amenities we offer our guests. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Room with 2 queen beds was generously sized with comfortable beds and very nice bathroom set up. Clean, nice decor, excellent room facilities.   Free wine and drinks mon-thur evenings. Free wifi worked well.   Location excellent - shuttle to Disneyland and walking distance to Orange outlets for shopping and meals. Free parking onsite.   Reasonably priced.   Exceeded expectations and would definitely choose Ayres Hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you Elizabeth for your wonderful review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  I really appreciate the time our guests take to let us know how we are doing and we make sure our employees have access to read all reviews.  I am glad that we exceeded your expectations and that we will see you sometime in future. Again, thank you!  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I've never heard of this family-owned chain but my employer booked me here and I couldn't have been happier.  Very nice hotel from the moment I walked in-- decor was nicely done, FREE happy hour, large restaurant & most importantly - clean, comfortable and spacious rooms. Another bonus--the bed & pillows were EXTREMELY comfortable!!  Free parking and walking distance to a few chain restaurants and a Starbucks.  I'd happily stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you!  And we would be happy to have you stay with us again as well; maybe a Disney trip or non work related trip next time.  Ayres Hotels are only located in central and southern California and our name recognition is ever expanding due to guests like yourself who spread the work about this family owned chain.  Take care and shoul dyou return to our area, we will be here for you! Sincerely, Christine Smith

Summary: I have stayed at the Ayres Hotel Orange on two occasions for business, each trip lasting approximately 5 days, once in December 2016 and the 2nd time in January 2017 The rooms have ample space and are very clean.The beds are comfortable. Great tubs, if you like to soak or bathe more than one child at a time. The desk work space is great. The complimentary WiFi internet connection is fast. The breakfast in the morning is hot. The "evening social hour" from  5-7 o'clock (wine/beer/soda/cookies) hits the spot when you 're walking in from a full day. I will definitely stay here again. The hotel appears to suit all types of travelers, families (visiting Disneyland), business travelers, and couples. Noise has never been an issue when I have stayed here.
Manager Response: 895tam I really appreciate your review! The hotel does work hard at providing an environment and overall ambiance that suits our many types of guests; whether they be business or leisure.  It is great to hear that you appreciated our many amenities and that you will be a return guest in the future.  Thank you!  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Nice , clean and  big room, good parking and excellent location. Near outlets at orange , freeway , angel stadium... the rooms towards the  pool are more quiet.  Nothing fancy but the best I have found in Orange and Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you anaN7434ZF for your review! Christine Smith Manager

Summary: The room was very clean, spacious and the bed COMFY! I will be reunited with a lost ring (mailed back), after an employee found it after we vacated the room- Thank you Ayres Hotel for being so honest!
Manager Response: Robin, It was my pleasure to call you and let you know my Housekeeper had found your ring.  We do not normally call guests about lost and found item due to the sheer number of items left on a daily basis; we wait for guests to call us.  But in your case, the ring looked to be of value and I wanted to make sure it was sent to you as soon as possible. Thank you for appreciating our efforts! Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: My family and I stayed at this beautiful hotel in December.  We received great customer service at the front desk.  Our room was really nice!  A few minutes drive took us to quite a few restaurants.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Caroline33197 Thank you for noting our great customer service, I will be posting your comments, as I do all TripAdvisor reviews for all our employees to read; it really makes our day when guests let us know how much they appreciate our efforts.  We do hope to see you again in the near future! Sincerely, Christine Smith

Summary: Helpful staff, clean spacious and comfortable room and the breakfast was good quality with plenty of choice. We were able to get shuttles from the hotel to the theme parks and the hotel staff were happy to book for us.
Manager Response: Thank you Barry for taking the time to write a quick review of your stay! Christine Smith Manager

Summary: Clean. Nice people. Great location. Clean Hot tub and pool. Big shower. close to Angel stadium and Disneyland. Safe Parking lot. Cool feature to save energy when you are away from room by using a room key to activate lights and climate control.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  So glad our location worked out for your trip and that you appreciated our cleanliness as well as our room energy saving device.  We do hope you return to us on your next visit to our area. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Ayres Hotel Orange for 2 nights, as the hotel was close to the Christ Cathedral where we attended a wedding.   The staff was accommodating and friendly. The room was clean, beds/linens were comfortable. Our very spacious 2-queen room had a refrigerator, microwave, and plenty of storage space for our family of four. There were even several USB ports in the outlets. The bathtub was HUGE, the shower pressure was strong. Even though our room was close to the elevators, it was surprisingly very, very quiet. No thin walls at this place!   The hotel provided breakfast each morning - sausage, scrambled eggs, pancakes, cereals, pastries, fruit. For drinks there were coffee, tea, hot chocolate, 4 types of juices, milk, and water.   We paid a reasonable rate to stay here,
Manager Response: Thank you mlambing13 for your wonderful review!  The Ayres Hotel Orange have been partnering with Christ Cathedral for the last couple of years and we always enjoy meeting guests who are attending weddings, attending seminars or just here to see the beautiful church.  Thank you for your recommendation for future guests and we hope to see you in the future, maybe for a Disneyland visit!  Happy New Year! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Great hotel, free parking, nice breakfast, staff were all helpful and friendly.  Close to Disneyland and a short drive to the beach, too.  There is a mall nearby with lots of dining options. Room was very spacious for our family of 4.
Manager Response: Thank you Pam D for taking the time to write a nice review of our Hotel.  I am glad you found our location, amenities and guest service to meet your expectations and needs. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We had a clean and elegant room, wonderful free breakfast buffet, and excellent service from the entire staff. We spent the day at a very crowded Disneyland and when we got to the hotel and up to our room we agreed that the hotel experience was better than being at Disneyland. It was so relaxing. We will be coming back!
Manager Response: Dear iamrighting, Yes, please come back when Disneyland won't be so busy.  Several of our guests mentioned that Disneyland was particularly crowded over the Holidays so I am glad we were your quiet resting spot in the midst of chaos.  Take care and Happy New Year! Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager
