Summary: Stayed here over the holidays, and was really surprised at the rate that I was able to get considering it's super close to DisneyLand, and very convenient in general! Very pleasantly surprised by this hotel. Rooms were quite large and very clean. Bed was very comfortable, and there is a lot of closet and drawer space for everyone. This hotel is literally right off I-5, and is about a 15min drive from John Wayne Airport. Wifi was good and strong, and did not encounter any issues. Parking seemed to be in demand, and I seemed to always be lucky enough to get the last spot when coming back at night. There is a parking garage next to the outside lots, but it didn't seem that we were allowed to park there....not sure if that's really the case or if I misunderstood. Either way, I would
Manager Response: Thank you Cwazy G! And yes the parking garage is for our Hotel as well as our sister hotel, the ALO Hotel adjacent to us.  So we always have lots of parking available for our guests.  Thank you for your recommendation and detailing our guest amenities and benefits, and noting you will stay with us in the future should you travel to our area again. Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: everything about this place was GREAT!!! Friendly staff, spacious comfy clean rooms, spacious shower toilet area, fridge, microwave, washer & dryer available. loved the hot breakfast. loved the ART was close to take us to Disneyland! definitely would stay again! one of my favorite places! The hotel inside and out were very clean and well kept!!
Manager Response: Dear momm3y, Thank you for wonderful review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  I am glad our hotel met all your family's needs when visiting Disneyland.  Thank you for letting us know we are now one of "your favorite places." Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Bringing in the New Year at the Block of Orange, hotel was within walking distance from hotel. Perfect hotel for needs and nice breakfast set up. My kids 18, 21 enjoyed there time and I look forward to accumulating more points now that I have joined Ayres rewards program.
Manager Response: Dear Nubnlady, So happy to hear you joined the Ayres Hotels Rewards program!!  Thank you!  I am glad our location was perfect for your New Year's celebration, walking is always the Best on New Year's Eve.  thank you for choosing the Ayres Hotel Orange and we will look forward to seeing you in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: complimentary hot breakfast with eggs and bacon complimentary happy hour with alcoholic and non alcoholic drinks (kids and adults welcome) convenient location to both the honda center and disney land even more important! CLEAN
Manager Response: Thank you heavy-O for your kind review!  I am sure glad you appreciated our complimentary breakfast and Happy Hour; and that our location was convenient to your plans while here in Orange.  We hope to see you on your next trip to Southern California. Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: This is a beautiful hotel!!! The rooms are super spacious and very nice. Breakfast was great and the staff was very professional. My family and I enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend it to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you bgomez2373! I will definitely pass on and thank my staff for their professionalism and guest service.  And I really appreciate your recommendation to potential "future" guests.  Take care. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed 6D/5N   PROs: -Feels New and Clean Hotel. Bed and Linens are fresh. Did not experience  -Quiet, but if you have ultrasonic hearing like my husband a little loud because you're near the freeway according to him. -Decent Breakfast but if you have a longer stay, you'll  get tired of the choices and rotation of sausage and bacon every other day. -Bus ride going to Disneyland is a short walk, just next hotel. -Near the Shopping Outlet. -Friendly Staffs -Spacious Parking -They have complimentary Happy Hour  CONs: -Gets a little crowded at night, but not a biggie. I think a commercial aviation team, pilots and stewardesses check-ins here. -Plan to have your breakfast early, because space is limited. -Staffs are nice and friendly, but some of them cannot decide on the spot for
Manager Response: Thank you Maria! I agree, the Hotel was extremely busy the last two weeks with more than the normal number of families we host when they go to Disneyland.  And when everyone decides to come down at the same time for breakfast it can get very hectic to say the least.  Thank you for letting me know that some staff were having difficulty responding to requests.  The hotel does have a few new employees so your "heads up" tells me we need to spend additional time making sure we have trained them thoroughly and especially make sure they understand we have empowered them to meet our guest's needs immediately.  Thank you for your review and we do hope we will see you again in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This was a great hotel with a very friendly staff and great location. The rooms were spotless and breakfast was great. I will definitely be staying here again.  Our family of 4 stayed here and felt very comfortable with the size of the room. The huge bathtub was a giant plus.
Manager Response: Thank you rmssquared, Thank you for taking the time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange and for your kind remarks.  I do want to mention for future guests that the Hotel has either large showers or tub shower combinations in our guest rooms.  So if a guest prefers one over the other we are happy to accommodate their request. Again, rmssquared, thank you and we do hope to see you on your next visit to the area! Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: The hotel is in perfect condition and well maintained. The service was excellent and they have a great breakfast. The room was large with a part wall between the queen beds. The bed was comfortable with numerous pillows.  There is nothing remarkable about the neighborhood, but it is near the Orange Outlet Mall and other services.  A very nice high quality hotel.
Manager Response: Eric P, Thank you, thank you, thank you!  I appreciate you taking your time to let us know you enjoyed your stay. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I really liked the look and feel of the hotel. The staff was friendly and helpful. The breakfast buffet was pretty good for a smaller hotel. I loved the bathtub. Might seem like a weird thing to note, but it was a nice perk. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you Bethanie for taking the time to write a review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I always appreciate our guests giving us their feedback and we do hope to see you again in the future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Every detail was amazing! The rooms were clean. Newly decorated. Very comfortable. The holiday decorations made us feel like we were at home. Delicious giant cookies waiting for our arrival. The person who checked us in was amazing. He recommended a great pizza place for delivery.
Manager Response: Thank you Mike and Deb! I am very happy you found the hotel to be "fabulous."  My staff works hard to maintain our high level of service, cleanliness and friendliness.  Your comments will be posted for all employees to review as all our Trip Advisor reviews are posted.  We hope to see you again soon! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I usually go to Disneyland with my family twice a year and this was our third stay at Ayres. I love it I have a toddler so it's kid friendly and very clean. The breakfast is good as well, I have to say it's not your typical breakfast muffin and coffee but a mini buffet.
Manager Response: Carolina, Thank you for your review of the Ayres Hotel Orange; I am very happy we have you and your family as repeat guests.  Thank you for mentioning our cleanliness and service, we continual strive to exceed our guest's expectations. Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: As always, everyone we worked with was wonderful. The attention and service given to me and my guests was remarkable.This is what keeps us coming back year after year."  K. Smith - Geary Pacific Corporation
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind accolade!  We love having Geary Pacific as one of our clients and repeat guests!  See you next year. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Stayed here the week before Thanksgiving and it was a great stay! The only problem upon checking in was we requested a room with a bath tub, when we got to our room, there was only a shower, called the front desk and they took care of it within a few minutes. Great customer service, great location and great breakfast. The rooms were great size and very cozy. We will be back in the area in a few months and will definitely be staying here!
Manager Response: Thank you tinkgirl for staying with us before the Thanksgiving Holiday!!  I will share your review with staff so they know how you appreciated their customer service and hard work! See you soon! Christine Smith Manager

Summary: There is a reason we always choose Ayres Hotels. The hotels are so inviting and comfortable. The staff are very professional but friendly and knowledgeable. Never had a problem with anything, from check-in to check-out our stays have been worry free. We have stayed at their other locations throughout the years and always a wonderful experience.
Manager Response: Thank you la17travel for your kind recommendation for all Ayres Hotels!!  We appreciate your loyalty to our hotels and thank you for your repeat business! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I am never disappointed with Ayers hotels. This one in Orange appeared to be on the newer side. It was very clean and staff was hospitable. No fee for parking, free breakfast and wine happy hour are all added conveniences.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you!  I and happy you found us to be hospitable and that you appreciated our free breakfast, parking and happy hour! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Ayres Orange Hotel is nothing short of wonderful. I booked a king suite for 3 nights in early December, to celebrate my 1st wedding anniversary with my husband in Disneyland, and we had an incredibly pleasant stay at Ayres. The rooms are clean, spacious, and even luxurious considering the price - for the same quality, you'd have to pay a couple hundred more per night and larger chain hotels would still be a hit or miss. A lot of amenities were available in the room itself: coffee, tea, a mini refrigerator, a microwave, a blow dryer. The best part is that all of these were free to use and not an extra charge that would later be billed to the room. Breakfast was also free each morning, and it wasn't your typical "continental" breakfast. They would rotate the menu, but each morning
Manager Response: Happy Anniversary!!  Thank you so much for your wonderful and heartfelt review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  Perhaps you will start a tradition of staying with us on each of your anniversary's, although I will understand if you choose Tahiti or Paris over us one year!!  Thank you for your kind recommendation and we so hope to see you on your next visit to Southern California. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Thus is the cleanest hotel I have ever stayed in.  Well appointed.  Wine and cookies offered in terms evening.  Free breakfast is excellent.  I won't stay anywhere else!  Centrally located and near freeways.
Manager Response: Thank you Carolyn for being one of our favorite repeat guests to our hotel!  See you next time you are in Orange County! Christine Smith  Manager

Summary Heading: Stay at the Ayres Hotel, December 1 - 6, 2016
Summary: This was my first trip to California since I was five and my husband's since he was stationed at the Marine base in Tustin.  It was very nice.  I wasn't sure where to stay and wanted some place nice but not too expensive near where my Mom was being cared for and California attractions.  This was the perfect place.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great property located in the heart of orange & Anaheim. Convenient to everything; including Disney & Orange premium outlets! Very friendly staff. Amazing hotel! Amazing room! Clean & great shower! Would stay at this hotel again; whenever I'm back in Orange / Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you bretw121 for your great review.  Yes, our location is one of our great benefits to people travelling to Orange County and who want to be in the center of the action.  We do hope to see you on your next visit! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This is a great hotel with large rooms clean rooms comfortable beds hot breakfast and friendly staff the assistant general manger Allen Boganwright was super helpful and nice this will be our go to hotel when in the area
Manager Response: Thank you Darrin, and thank you for the shout-out for Allen, my AGM.  He along with his front desk staff pride themselves in providing great customer service and exceeding our guest's expectations.  It will be great to see you again in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: Very comfortable place to stay, the room was great very clean and all of the amenities you would want. Check in has a breeze and a very helpful staff.  The breakfast was also very good, hot food and very tasty.  We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here on our trip to Disneyland. We have stayed at another Ayres hotel and decided to try this one.   We arrived at our hotel at 9:30 in the morning and they were able to check us in earlier with no problem. The rooms are very clean! The staff is the friendliest staff that I have ever seen. After long days of walking, it was nice knowing we had comfortable beds to go home to. With the cost of going to Disneyland, it was nice to have a hot breakfast for free everyday.   Hands down. This is the best hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you Amy for your "awesome" review!  I am so glad you and your family appreciated all our efforts to ensure your stay was memorable and we do hope to see you on your next trip to Disneyland. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Great service, great room, great breakfast. And it's in a perfect location to get places. It's in easy driving distance to a number of great places in the Santa Ana area. The room was big and the bed was comfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Fullfilled my room request (top floor, west side) Very easy to get to/from disneyland Breakfast was good Staff was friendly covered parking  This trip we also stayed at the grand californian, and my family preferred the aryes. - Aryes was quieter - grand californian early hour entrance *sucks* (was nice later in the day) - GC: did not like valet service.  switched to self-park. ayres parking is way closer. - the only benefit to GC is you can bop back to your room whenever you want, but we had no issues swinging back to car instead.  just plan ahead
Manager Response: none

Summary: We came here recently w my 2 kids. We checked in late since we drove from Scottsdale. Room was large with 2queen bed and a divider between them. The bed was comfortable and the walkway is cosy.   Breakfast was good with hot servings. And buffet was part of the hotel deal...and parking is ample and free.   Highly recommended if you have family and heading to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you for your recommendation to families coming to Disneyland in the future!  I am pleased to hear you found our hotel to fulfill your vacation needs! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Wish I had booked this hotel for my stays in Los Angeles as well (this hotel just 30min away from LA without traffic)  I didn't hit traffic on my way here, not sure about going into LA but it shouldn't be bad. I lived in a 4 star hotel in LA and still have to travel 30min+ to go anywhere in LA anyway, why spend more money? This hotel is cheaper than the hotel I booked in LA with much better service and spacious room. Free parking + free breakfast! I'll book this hotel again next time I visit LA or Orange County
Manager Response: Thank you waytogo66! We agree about our location being ideal for travel in and around Orange County as well as LA.  and thank you for acknowledging our "friendly staff"!  We do hope to see you again in the future. Christine Smith Manager

Summary: The front desk clerk was very friendly and helpful exceeding our expectations. The rooms are spacious and clean. It was quiet inside the room and the bed was very comfy.  One fun bonus: in the room we stayed in, you could see the night sky towards Disneyland and watch the fireworks show at 9:00pm. If you have to go to CHOC hospital, it is very close by and makes a great place to stay, working well if you have to have an extended stay. We will go back here if we're ever in the area again.
Manager Response: Laura, Thank you very much for your review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  We love being here for our CHOC, St. Joseph's and UCI Medical Center patients and families.  And especially our long term guests that we are able to get to know on a more personal basis.  Take care and Happy Holidays! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The room was clean, looked like new. The front desk person was very professional and sweet. I work for Ayres myself and I have visited several Ayres properties and Ayres Orange is my favorite stay. I hope to stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Your hotel offers just what I'm looking for as well as accomidations and service couldn't ask for more keep up the good work and you will be there forever I'm hoping u top all other hotels. Or at least are equil to Hilton's embassy suites
Manager Response: Thank you Tim for reviewing the Ayres Hotel Orange, I appreciate you taking the time to let us know how we are doing!  And we hope to see you the next time you are in the area. Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: We came to Ayres for Duck's NHL Game. The hotel locates within walking distance from Honda Center which is great. Our room was big and clean. Unfortunately the air conditioner was very loud so we had to turn it off and after that the room heated too much up. Free parking space is wide. Breakfast was a bit dissappointing with narrow and unhealthy selection. Fitness center was okay.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a TripAdvisor review; I really appreciate hearing our guest's feedback.  I am so sorry you did not find enough selections on our complimentary breakfast buffet.  We do offer fresh fruit, yogurt, oatmeal, granola and whole wheat bread among our other selections.  I am open to suggestions as to what other offerings you would like see and you are welcome to email me at csmith@ayreshotels.com.  Again, thank you for your review. Christine Smith

Summary: The rooms in the Ayres Hotel in Orange are super clean, large and modern.  The beds are comfortable, the bathtubs are oversized and the customer service is excellent.  The bathtub stopper wasn't working so they gave me half off.  The rooms were zen like.  They were perfect!
Manager Response: Thank you Exploringangelini, I really appreciate you taking your personal time to write such a nice review of our hotel.  I will make sure my staff sees your comments as I do with all our reviews! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The rooms are beautiful!  I stay here every time I'm in Orange County.  The fridge and microwave make it convent to have snacks/drinks to feel comfortable and at home.  I like that they have a workout room, business center, and breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you OCMILECKI! And thank you for being one of our regular guests, we love having you stay with us and will look forward to your next visit! Sincerely, Christine

Summary: Room was very clean.  Beds were comfortable.  Nice to have the refrigerator.  The only bummer was room service ends quite early.  When coming in late after a long day at Disneyland we would have loved to have been able to order something to eat.
Manager Response: Aronque11,  Thank you for your review.  I am so sorry that room service ended early; I would like to suggest to you and future guests that there are many pizza places that deliver later into the evening.  The front desk would be happy to suggest close by great pizza places. We do hope to see you again in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This hotel felt so comfortable and safe! We had a late flight and did not arrive until 2:00am. The hotel was very understanding as we called ahead and said we were arriving late and they told us to not worry!
Manager Response: Dear Rahgiggle, Our porch light is always on, no matter what time our guests arrive!  I am pleased you felt safe and comfortable with us and glad you had an "awesome" stay! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Love this hotel! It was comfortable, cozy, decently priced, and easy to find. Great food. Amazing cookies and drink service at night. The rooms are great and the beds are insanely comfortable. I have a bad back so that is super important to me. All around amazing!
Manager Response: Thank you tamarism775 for your amazing review of our hotel.  We hope you stay with us the next time you are in the Orange Anaheim area! Christine Smith

Summary: Every time we visit this area, we stay at an Ayres location, but this was our first time staying at Ayres Orange.  The manager, Christine Smith, obviously runs a great hotel.  We chose it based on tripadvisor reviews and her attention and response to feedback and comments, and it still exceeded our high expectations.    Rooms are really big and very clean.  Beds are very comfortable.  The bathroom was surprisingly spacious.  My wife and 2 daughters loved that you could get ready in multiple spots outside the bathroom - many hotels don't have outlets or mirrors to help multiple family members to get ready at once, but this one did.  The only suggestion is maybe one more dresser with drawers - the room is so big that the multiple night stands with no drawers get lost in the room.
Manager Response: Wow!!  What else can I say?  Thank you so much for your wonderful review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I need to hire you as head of our Public Relations department!!  Thank you for taking your time to write a comprehensive review highlighting our guest service, quality of product and our convenient location.  Please stop by and introduce yourself to me on your next visit to Southern California, I would love to meet you and thank you in person.   Very sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Orange location for four nights. It was great! Very friendly, clean, quiet and an excellent location. Close to outlet malls, Disneyland, highway and other shopping. Highly recommend the Ayres hotels!
Manager Response: 52stepha, Thank you very much for your recommendation!  My staff loves hearing when their hard work has met and exceeded our guest's expectations! Christine Smith GM

Summary: I stayed at the Ayres in orange, with my two kids and enjoyed our stay there.I would recommend this hotel and would also return to this hotel any time. The whole place was really clean and well kept up.All workers are really helpful and go the extra mile to make sure your stay is great. And they also have a really nice breakfast every morning. If your looking for a really great  place to stay for a good price this is your place.
Manager Response: Thank you Adam! I am glad that you and your kids had a great stay with us.  And thank you for recommending us to future potential guests! Christine Smith GM

Summary: My stay was great!! The Room was huge and the bed & bedding were very comfortable. The cookies were fresh and hot, right out of the oven. The Breakfast was good. The staff was friendly and the hotel was close to Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center. I would recommend this hotel to my family and friends.
Manager Response: Mechelle, Thank you, thank you, thank you!  We do hope to see you again in the future. Sincerely, Christine Smith GM

Summary: One a recent trip to Disney, found this gem of a hotel.  There is not one issue or concern to comment about.  Everything from check in, accommodation, cleanliness and the breakfast were exceptional.  The shuttle to Disney is approximately 15 minutes getting there;  30 minutes to get back as it makes several stops.  I did a lot of research and you will not find a better value for dollar....parking and wifi is free too!  *  note that the breakfast is a full on breakfast with fresh cooked eggs, either bacon or sausage and hash browns. Plenty of fruit and beverage options as well.   Much better than the standard continental that most hotels serve.
Manager Response: Devolicious, Thank you very much for reviewing the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I really appreciate all the research you did to ultimately find us; and especially since we met all your expectations.  Thank you for recommending us to future guests! Sincerely, Christine Smith GM

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel and in good location near area attractions and medical centers.
Summary: My double queen room was very spacious, very clean, and very comfortable.  Everything we needed was there!  The staff was very welcoming and helpful.  The breakfast was great, lots of variety!  The hotel location is good for me when I visit the area and I will reserve a room there the next time I go to Orange, CA.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, very happy to know that we have won you as a repeat guest the next time you will visit Orange!! Sincerely, Christine Smith GM

Summary Heading: Convenient location, free breakfast and electric charger!
Summary: Quiet hotel off a very busy freeway, and immediately adjacent to UCI-medical center. Most convenient for meetings. There are several outdoor and covered parking spots that you don't have to pay extra for, including electric car chargers! There is a weight room, with several machines, including enough space for a jump rope and pull-ups! There is free breakfast, including eggs, potatoes, toast, cereal and hot oats, along with tea, coffee and OJ! The bed is very comfortable, with soft pillows. Large room with nice bathroom fixtures. Coffee maker in the room. Overall, very helpful staff and great rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you Lestertheinvestor, I want to let you know that I appreciate you taking time to write a great review about the Hotel.  We do hope you will return to us the next time you travel to Orange for business or pleasure. Sincerely, Christine Smith

Summary: Our room was beautiful and spacious.  With kids we could spread out a bit.  The beds are very comfortable and the breakfast was always delicious and hot.  Only one thing I wish this hotel had is a roll away bed.  We loved staying here and the kids loved it to.  Great location with the shopping outlets near by.
Manager Response: Dear Loriechatlin, Thank you for reviewing the Hotel.  I am glad that you appreciated the spacious rooms and breakfast.  I am sorry that the Hotel does not offer roll away beds, providing them would often lead to exceeding the maximum number of guests per room allowed by safety and emergency polices.  I do hope you will stay with us again the next time you return to the Orange/Anaheim area.  Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Loved this hotel and would definitely stay again
Summary: Pros: The hotel's decor was great The rooms are huge  The rooms were clean The bed was huge, comfortable and amazing- we slept so good after a long day at Disneyland  The pillows were perfect Parking was great The hotel was right off the freeway but couldn't hear it The staff was nice They had breakfast but didn't go so not sure how that was Cons: Long walk to Disneyland so had to park there  We would definitely stay again for our Disneyland trips
Manager Response: Adriennelin, Thank you for your kind review!  We look forward to your next visit and in helping make that Disneyland trip memorable as well. Sincerely, Christine Smith GM

Summary: I enjoyed our stay at this hotel very much!! We stayed for three nights Sunday-Wednesday morning while visiting Disneyland. The hotel was super clean, and the staff was very friendly and helpful. There is an evening reception with beer, wine, and cookies in the lobby on week nights, which was a nice plus. The hot tub was hot and relaxing. We were also so pleasantly surprised by the size of the room (huge!). The breakfast in the morning was also great, and one of the only hotel breakfasts I've experienced where the food was actually HOT. The only drawback I experienced while staying here was the ART shuttle to Disneyland (which is not a complaint about the hotel, as they are not connected). We waited over an hour for a shuttle to bring us back to the hotel from Disney. We decided
Manager Response: Thank you dilly_90, Thank you for your great review, and especially for mentioning the problem you had with the ART shuttle.  Both our hotel and our sister hotel, the ALO, along with other hotels in the area have been trying to work with ART.  The last month or so their service has been hit and miss and while our initial conversations with ART management have not seemed to help; we have escalated our complaints to the ART Board of Directors.  I am so sorry you had to wait but be assured we are raising our voices on behalf of all our guests. Sincerely, Christine Smith GM

Summary: While visiting our son at Chapman University, we decided to give the Ayres a try. We were impressed with the spacious rooms, updated features and excellent breakfast. The Happy Hour with beer, wine and cookies really topped off the day. All services were quite professional. We will be back!
Manager Response: Great Mike, so glad to hear you will return to us in the future.  And remember the year of your son's graduation from Chapman University, make your graduation weekend reservation at least 6 months in advance.  Grad weekend is always one of the busiest in our area. Sincerely, Christine Smith GM

Summary: Beautiful, clean hotel.  We loved our stay even though it was only one night.  Staff was professional, the room was spacious and clean.  Nice pool and Jacuzzi.  Great take out food nearby.  Our room faced away from the freeway.
Manager Response: Boeker4, Thank you for taking the time to write such a nice review of our Hotel!! Christine Smith GM

Summary: Excellent play to stay. Very friendly staff.  Room very clean and up-to-date. Full breakfast is a big bonus as well as the complimentary evening beer and wine.  Pool and spa very clean and towels available at pool side.  This beats the bigger hotels. I would recommend these hotels to all.
Manager Response: Tnails46 Thank you, thank you, thank you!!! Christine Smith GM

Summary: We stayed at the hotel from Thursday night, November 3rd-Saturday, November 5th and had a great time!  The room was immaculate, the staff very helpful and the General Manager very involved making sure our stay was top notch, which it was!
Manager Response: I am so glad Kathy that everything worked out for you and that you had a great stay; I was happy to help make that happen! Sincerely, Christine Smith GM

Summary: My boyfriend and I arrived at our hotel at 9am. We thought early check in was going to be a problem but our room was already ready and we were able to check in. The hotel staff is very friendly and accommodating. The rooms are very luxurious and clean. The breakfast is delicious. They even have a shuttle to Disney! My absolute favorite part of the hotel though was how quiet it was. Our room was on the first floor right next to the lobby and conference rooms, and we couldn't hear a thing. The only downside is it's a bit far from Los Angeles. But, I will definitely be coming back to this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you Maria for your review!  I am so glad your found the hotel to be quiet; even when we are at 100% occupancy, our guests remark as to the calmness and quietness.  We hope to see you on your next trip to the Orange/Anaheim area. Sincerely, Christine Smith GM

Summary: Had to have surgery at UC Irvine Medical Center, with a check-in time of 5:45 am on a Friday. The facility recommended Ayres Hotel, right across the street, so we wouldn't have to get up at 3 am and make a long drive. Because I was having surgery, our suite was large and spacious (handicap-accessible, close proximity to the elevator, very quiet). The bed was very comfortable, but I would advise bringing your own pillow - theirs were way too soft, offered zero support. The staff were very friendly, and they have electric charging spots in the parking lot (three for Tesla, one for all other EV's, but we lucked out as none were in use when we arrived). Because we were there for surgery, we missed breakfast, which is only served till 7:30 am, but it did smell good as we were
Manager Response: Lissannie Thank you very much for your comprehensive review of the Hotel.  I am happy to hear that UCI referred you to us and that you found the hotel to meet your needs, especially since your were here for a surgery. I want to let you and potential other guests know that our breakfast  ends at 10:00 am.  I apologize if my staff was not clear in communication the correct times to you.  I hope that should you stay with us in the future it will be for pleasure.  Take care and again thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I recommend Ayres Hotel Orange. The room was clean and the staff was helpful and friendly. The breakfast buffet was good. It filled up my family of four. If we were going back to Disneyland, I would choose this hotel again!
Manager Response: Thank you Ashley for your review of the Ayres Hotel Orange. I am so pleased that the Hotel and my staff met your family's needs and helped to make your trip to Disneyland a success.  We do hope to see you on your next trip. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel at a very good price
Summary: Great hotel. Rooms are very large, beds are comfortable, staff is accommodating and friendly, breakfast is good. Great location near amusement parks, shopping and freeway access. Hotel is clean and modern. Price is very competitive.
Manager Response: Thank you Ronald for your kind review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am very happy your found the hotel to have such high value for the price and we do look forward to seeing your again, should your travels bring you back to Southern California. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The hotel is beautiful, the staff is frenzy and the price was reasonable.  Our family stayed at another Ayers and it was cool but the one in Orange is much nicer and newre. Also, FREE parking was a plus.
Manager Response: Thank you Kenneth for taking your time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange.  Each Aryes Hotel is different in decor and ambiance but we all provide a high level of cleanliness, great guest service and value for the price.  Thank you for choosing Ayres Hotels. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Everything about this hotel was as advertised. Clean, fresh, roomy and comfortable. The lobby is laid out perfectly to enjoy the free happy hour. The room was ideal for spending time in, not just to sleep. Temperature controls worked well. Having a microwave and small refrigerator saved many dollars on food purchases. The nearby outlet mall (less than 1/2 mile) provided shopping, dining and entertainment options. Disneyland was nearby and easily accessible. Of particular note is the included breakfast, with eggs, sausage, bacon, potatoes and pancakes continually cooked fresh. Along with pastries, fruit, cereal and yogurt, there were options for all. This was an exceptional value. Highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you Mark for taking the time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange.  My staff and I are very happy we exceeded your expectations!  Thank yo for spreading the word and we do hope to see you and your family again in the future. Sincerely, Christine Smith GM

Summary Heading: Great new hotel close to Disneyland
Summary: Great place: new looks great. Great service, friendly people. Hotel has nice spacious rooms with large bathing room. Breakfast was good and fresh. Will definitely visit again when coming to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you Michiel for taking your time to review our Hotel.  I am so happy that the Hotel and staff met all you needs and am delighted to here you will be us again on your next visit to Disneyland. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I stayed at the Ayres Hotel in O.C as part of a 2 week holiday around California with some friends. Hands down I would say that this hotel was the best of all those in which we stayed.   The rooms are beautifully renovated to a high standard, with all the conveniences you would expect in a modern hotel. In addition the inclusive breakfast is extensive, great quality and available for a sufficient period, where you could factor a lie-in and still make breakfast.  I have to also commend the staff, the housekeeping were thorough and didn't start too early, (as I found to be the case in other hotels, which proved very disruptive!) The maintenance team were contacted during my stay, as I had experienced a problem with my television on arrival. A man arrived within half an hour of
Manager Response: Rachael Thank you for the awesome review!  I will make sure all my staff sees your kind remarks and give a special acknowledgement to Christopher for making your stay all the more perfect.  I am very proud of the teamwork and commitment to excellence my staff shows on a daily basis; and it is reviews like yours that make our hard work worthwhile.  Thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith GM

Summary: We went to Anaheim to go to Disneyland. The hotel was easily accessible and only 10 minutes or less from the Disneyland parking. Breakfast was fresh and better than expected for a hotel. The rooms were large and very clean. We will stay again!!!!
Manager Response: So glad to hear you had an "excellent stay", thank you!! Christine Smith GM

Summary: Check in was quick, room rate very reasonable, electricity conscious rooms, comfortable bed, complimentary breakfast was tasty, check out quick and easy as well. Only gripe would be for shorter guests: good luck adjusting shower head, it is quite high up.
Manager Response: Thank you Someguywhohatesbadse! So glad you enjoyed the hotel, and should you stay with us in the future please request a lower shower head.  We would be happy to make an adjustment for you.  We relish being able to satisfy our guest needs, no matter what they may be.  Again, thank you! Christine Smith GM

Summary: Fresh hotel with very helpful and nice staff. Pool is a bit small but still sufficient. Great breakfast with OK amount of selections, Loved the fresh watermelon and scrambled eggs. Location is good, close to Disney. Fridge and microwave in room, perfect when travelling with young children. Big shower with good pressure of water. Daily cleaning. It was a bit weird to me that they often changed the hand soap and toilet paper even though there was plenty left of both but maybe thats just a cultural difference. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Anna Thank you for taking the time to write such a nice review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I appreciate all your comments and will look into Housekeeping replenishing items when they are not really needed; we strive to conserve resources so thank you for the "heads up."  We do hope you will stay with us in the future should you be in the Orange Anaheim area! Sincerely, Christine Smith GM

Summary: The check in staff were more than professional and accommodating. They were knowledgeable of the area, which helped me plan a bit of my down time away from my business conference. The rooms were crispy clean and each return back from my busy day it was like the first night all over again.  The bed and pillows were heavenly. More than once I pushed my "snooze" button to get "just a bit more cushiony, tranquil rest".  I'll definitely be back for business and family vacations/s. Thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you imzamoood for taking the time to write a great review. The hotel does get a lot of compliments about our Ayres Dream Sleeper mattresses; guest even wanting to purchase one for their home which we have been able to accommodate.  I will also thank my staff for their great guest service in assisting you with their knowledge of the local area.  We look forward to your next stay with us! Sincerely, Christine Smith GM

Summary: Lovely facility, top notch.  Pristine!!! Loved the tranquility, craftsmanship and decor.  Spacious, clean and above a standard 4 star accommodation.  Convenient stores are far, however the outlets are a hop skip and a jump from the hotel.  Also, Best Buy is just in back of hotel for any needs.
Manager Response: Thank you Catherine for your kind review.  Yes, Best Buy and Starbucks are on our same block, along with the Outlets of Orange being walking distance.  I am so glad that you appreciated our location and sense of tranquility, along with our cleanliness.  Thank you again, and we do hope to see you again in the future. Sincerely, Christine Smith GM

Summary: The room and decor was so nice. After a long day at Disneyland it was so nice to get into a wonderful smelling, spacious room. The breakfast in the morning was awesome and the pool area was nice. Overall, great hotel, great price. We will definitely return!!
Manager Response: Dear KezieS, Thank you for you review and I am so happy you will be returning to the Ayres Hotel Orange in the future!  We will have that clean and spacious room waiting for you!! Sincerely, Christine Smith GM

Summary: The hotel and the room,  pool,  and breakfast were fabulous. The service was impeccable.   Location was nice,  easy to get to from the freeway.  We loved the easy access to the pool from our room,  and the long pool hours.  The breakfast buffet was impressive.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you freeman_karate! I appreciate your letting us know how much you enjoyed the hotel and you will be returning sometime int he future.  We work hard to make all our guests into "repeat guests."  Again, thank you. Sincerely, Christine Smith GM

Summary: I've stayed here 3 times and each was great. The beds are wonderful. The rooms clean and fresh. The hotel is easy to get to. The staff are  very helpful and understanding even when I had a personal medical issue. Breakfast is included and offers fresh fruits good coffee and real bacon on occasion!
Manager Response: Thank you VCBrown! I happy we have become your "favorite" hotel and were able to provide assistance to you when needed.  And yes, we offer real bacon every other day, hooray, we get many compliments on how good the bacon is.  Take care and we will look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, Christine Smith GM

Summary: Never been to this hotel chain before. Stayed only one night. It was amazing!  The service, food, room, etc was outstanding!  Plus they upgraded us free of charge to an Executive suite. All areas were very clean. Will be staying at these only again when we come out west!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review, it was our pleasure to be able to upgrade you to a Suite.  We will look forward to seeing you on your next visit out West!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Everyone at the Ayres was very nice. I loved the room we got a room on the ground floor and it opened up to the courtyard and the pool. We sat at there in morning drinking coffee. It was conveniently located. I was there visiting my daughter and it was really close to her house, restaurants and shopping. The late night run to Krispy Kreme was great! I would defiantly stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you Lisa for taking the time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am happy to hear that our location, service and amenities allowed for a great stay for yourself when visiting your daughter.  I will have to add Krispy Kreme to our list of local attractions; I forget how popular they are and just down the street from the hotel, thanks for the tip! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: the Hotel staff was awesome. the complimentary breakfast was satisfying, large selection of items. the "happy hour" that was provided was very generous, thank you. the room was large and comfortable. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Ramon, Thank you for your review and we do look forward to seeing you the next time you are back in the area for work.  If your company does not have a Corporate account with Ayres, let me know and I will be happy to facilitate setting one up for your future stays. Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We had a great stay here. The staff was very helpful and nice. The room was clean and had a nice setup. The only issues I had was the mattress was a little firmer then I would have liked. The other was though breakfast was great the only thing that changed from day to day was the bacon and  sausage so when staying for 5 nights as we had it got a little boring.  The cut fruit also was never ripe which was pretty gross. Otherwise everything else was wonderful. We had gone to Disneyland during this trip and the hotel next door had the pick up for the shuttle which was $5 per person and worked out great.
Manager Response: Sandra Thank you for your review, I would like to apologize that the fruit was not fresh each date, our policy is always to cut fresh daily so I will double check the kitchen.  I am glad you appreciated and used the ART shuttle to Disneyland, our two hotels are on shortest route compared to all other hotels which makes the ride over very quick.  Take care and we do hope to see you on your next visit to Disneyland! Sincerely, Christine Smith GM

Summary: Staff was courteous and accommodating.  Room was spacious, clean and loved having a frig and microwave. Hotel close to all freeways and businesses. I would definitely stay again.  Thank you Ayres Hotel!!
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you!! Christine Smith GM

Summary: Very well kept hotel. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 due to the proximity to the freeway for some of the rooms. Small pool. Fresh baked cookies nightly for kids and had a free breakfast package also. Otherwise great place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you RAysheen! I appreciate your review and am happy you enjoyed your stay overall.  Yes, some of our rooms are on the freeway side of the hotel but our windows are triple pane, so guests do not hear the traffic.  Take care and we do hope to see you in the near future! Sincerely, Christine Smith GM

Summary: We are delighted with this find. Nice friendly staff. Room is large and comfortable. Convenient to Chapman UNIVERSITY, not far from Disney and many local style resturants. Full breakfast included in room charge, which makes starting the day easy. We will be back.
Manager Response: Yeah Sail2010!  Another satisfied guest and Chapman parent.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  A tip, if you do have a son or daughter at Chapman, book your room for their graduation at least 6 months in advance!  Take care. Sincerely, Christine Smith GM

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel, tastefully furnished, good value, great service.
Summary: This was our first stay at an Ayres hotel. The hotel is conveniently located off I-5. New, quiet, serene, tastefully decorated. Double double-paned windows make for good sound insulation from the freeway. Evening "happy hour" drinks provided. Good breakfast with a variety of hot foods cooked right there. Good value. Impeccable service.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you for your kind and gracious review!  I will past on your comments to my entire staff as I do all reviews.  It means a lot to myself and my team when we have exceeded our guest's expectations. Sincerely, Christine Smith GM

Summary: Tried the Ayres upon the recommendation of a friend and so glad I did.  It was beyond my expectations.  Gorgeous hotel, huge gorgeous room, giant bathtub, comfy beds, tall ceilings, large windows, small privacy wall between beds, fabulous breakfast, outstanding staff.  Room was extremely clean which is super important to me.  Plenty of power outlets and charging ports.  Direct TV!  Great location, walk to Starbucks, Wendy's and other restaurants.  About 2 miles from Disneyland.  Great access to freeways.  Across the street from outlet mall.
Manager Response: Dear lkirbymatin, Thank you for your wonderful and comprehensive review!  We really appreciate the time a guest takes to review the hotel, good or bad, we learn from all our guest's comments and suggestions.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you are visiting Southern California. Sincerely, Christine Smith GM

Summary: We absolutely love staying at this hotel they had great service great rooms good breakfast nice pool free parking we thought the value at this hotel was very good with very high quality accommodations we will stay there again
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room is very comfy, and quiet. Breakfast is better than I expected. Great location with shuttle to Disneyland. Free parking, close to the baseball stadium. Very friendly hotel staffs. We would definitely come back if we are going to Disney
Manager Response: none

Summary: The condition of the hotel looked well kept and clean. The furnishings and bathroom were in great condition and looked great. The bed was very comfortable as were the pillows. Located very close to Hwy 5 and close to the Orange Outlets and the Angels Stadium, which can be a good or bad thing. We arrived late (9 pm) and found there was still ice water, chocolate chip & snickerdoodle cookies available as well as a a few oranges, which were refilled by morning. We only stayed one night and didn't get to try the breakfast. The bathroom includes two sets of hooks to hang clothes or towels by the bath tub, a huge oversight for a lot of hotels in my opinion, AND the tub is such where you can lean back and enjoy a bath.  I would definitely return again to enjoy the amenities of the
Manager Response: Dear angelstar54_01 Thank you very much for your great review, I am so pleased you found us and enjoyed our amenities and great, although short, stay with us.  Thank you for spreading the word and we do hope we see you in the near future! Sincerely, Christine Smith GM

Summary: Room was incredible.  Best hotel breakfast I've ever had. Bacon, eggs, silver dollar pancakes, hash browns, fresh fruit, delicious coffee and, oh yeah, bacon.  Great price for accommodations and location.  Will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Brian, I agree with the "yeah bacon", we get continuous comments about how good it is, along with our sausage as well.  Thank you for your review and see you the next time you are in town!! Sincerely, Christine Smith GM

Summary Heading: I've already told friends about it!
Summary: We were in town for a family wedding, and about 12 of the rooms were filled by our family and friends. The hotel was clean, beautifully decorated, spacious and accommodating to our needs. In the evenings we gathered in the spacious lobby and visited comfortably. The morning breakfast room provided a hearty fare, a large selection to choose from. The breakfast room was very large and there were tables that could seat 16 of us all together! It was a very pleasant experience and I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear eldme, I am so pleased that the Ayres Hotel Orange was able to help in making your family wedding a memorable experience!  Maybe we could talk you all into coming back for a 1st Anniversary party next year!!  Whatever the occasion is, my staff and I really enjoy seeing families celebrate special events and providing the service and atmosphere to relax and enjoy in a stress free environment.  Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith GM

Summary: We stayed for 5 nights in September. Check in was easy and straight forward. Room was very spacious and bathroom well set out.  A problem with water not draining after showering and shower head was rectified immediately. Free WiFi was good and certainly have no complaints about breakfast. There was plenty of choice (hot/cold) and food was freshly prepared. There is a shuttle to Disneyland which costs USD$5.00 return which was very reasonable. We didn't really find the bed that comfortable (personal preference), however the pillows were great.  House keeping staff were excellent and lovely. Didn't use the pool, but it was very clean and the area well maintained.  In fact the whole property was well maintained and very clean. There are shops within walking distance for coffee and
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was very clean, in great condition and the rooms were very spacious. I love that there was free breakfast every morning and free parking in a garage. I felt very safe and comfortable. The staff was very nice and helpful. Overall I had a really great experience here.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I'm so happy to share my evaluation of this property... The service was top notch, rooms were very clean as was the property...the rooms were spacious, the complimentary breakfast included a variety of almost whatever your taste buds were desiring.  This property was a bargain and was so close to everything!  I give Ayres an 11 on a scale of 1-10
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very very clean nice size rooms the staff are happy to see you . Breakfast  has a good choice  the double windows make it nice and quite  . Its nice having  every thing so close .parking is easy close to all freeways
Manager Response: none

Summary: I appreciate the free parking which is very rare in the Los Angeles/Orang County area. The location is near the office that I work in while in the City of Orange. The hotel is very clean and modern and  the staff is very friendly and courteous.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review!  I am glad to hear that the Ayres Hotel Orange fits your needs when in the area on business, see you again in the Future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Best Breakfast and Room! We had a Very nice stay and appreciated the Chapman University discount! Everything was clean and organized, all the employees were friendly and helpful. The location was very close to the University which made everything very accessible.
Manager Response: none

Summary: New hotel very clean great buffet breakfast easy access to hwy  Staff not very accommodating rather bothered  Housekeeping didn't make up room 1 day and then the 2nd day I asked and still wasn't made up
Manager Response: Dear Vannivan, I am so sorry your room was missed by my cleaning staff.  I checked with Housekeeping and the hotel did make the error when assigning rooms to a new employee.  Please contact me and I will be happy to offer some sort of compensation, we made the error and we will make it right!  Thank you for allowing me the opportunity to correct this situation. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Rooms and beds are fine, breakfast is nothing special but it was fresh  We had a room on second floor view of bestbuy parking lot yeah! Not ! Lights from parking lot shined into room and you felt like they could see into our room Curtains do not close all the way either  We also had tiny ants on our counter.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, I am so sorry you did not like your room and did not see the blackout drapes that would have shut the light out from the parking lot lights.  A quick call to the front desk would have helped you locate the blackout drapes behind the sheers and we are always willing to move guests should they not like a view or room configuration.  Pleas contact me directly and I will be happy to offer a discounted rate so you can experience a more perfect stay. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Nicely appointed room with a very comfortable bed. Very clean and quite given its proximity to the freeway. Free parking was also important to us.When we came down stairs in the evening, the lobby smelled like warm chocolate chip cookies.
Manager Response: Thank you AussieMom2015 for taking the time to write a review!  I am very happy you loved the hotel and appreciated our chocolate chip cookies!  We do hope to see you the next time you travel to Southern California! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Great hotel , good location, close  to the outlets shopping malls and Disney. Big rooms with very comfy beds, nice pool. Also every day free cockies and wine. Stuff is very friendly.  Good amenities and fast internet. Excellent decoration.
Manager Response: Thank you manrehe for your nice review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  My staff and I always appreciate feedback from our guests and we do hope to see yo again in the near future! With appreciation, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My dad was having cancer surgery at UCI Medical Center in Orange.  Ayres was kind and gave us a generous rate.  The hotel is lovely and the accommodations are first rate.  I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone!
Manager Response: Kyle I really appreciate you taking the time to write a review.  It was truly our pleasure to help you and your family during your father's surgery.  Take care and we hope so see you again in the future for a little happier occasion.  Your father is in our thoughts and prayers. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Breakfast is good, better than regular continental included in other hotel chains. Rooms are spacious. Most of the staff is polite and nice. Location is very convenient, 5 min away from Outlets and Disneyland. Price is appropriate.
Manager Response: Thank you Monica for your kind review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.   Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Fantastic, in every sense of the word
Summary: Great hotel, incredibly friendly staff and very nice rooms. My only complaint  is the free WiFi. The signal was pretty weak in my room on the 4th floor, but not a real inconvenience. The breakfast was very good with a specialty cook waiting for your order.
Manager Response: Dan, Thank you for your review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I do apologize for the weak WiFi signal and appreciate you mentioning it; I have called our provider to check it out and resolve the situation.  We do hope to see you again in the future for another "fantastic" stay! Sincerely, Christine Smith

Summary: Room was nice; however, prior to my stay I left a credit card authorization and spoke to the manager about my sister arriving early - I was assured there would be no problem; however, upon her arrival, the desk insisted that she leave an additional deposit - - called from the room and no one would pick up at front desk.
Manager Response: candiceo258, I am so sorry that my staff misunderstood the instructions regarding allowing your sister to  arrive earlier than you; and not seeing the credit card authorization covered incidentals as well as room and tax.  We goofed and I have already spoken to the front desk and other managers.  Thank you for bringing to my attention so I may use a learning moment for my desk employees.  Again, my sincere apologies. Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My wife and I stayed from the 12th of September until 17th. The rooms are large, airy and spotlessly clean. The mattresses are comfortable. The hotel offers a free breakfast, superb choice and very good quality. The staff all have a smile and are very friendly. The hotel give you free wi-fi access, another plus . The hotel also give you free parking, again a plus. No nickel and dime stuff from this hotel . You can catch the dart for Disney beside hotel at its sister the ALO. You can also buy tickets for dart in hotel foyer . If going to Honda centre or Angels stadium , then stay here. Superb location. They have a happy hour from Monday to Thursday,  5pm until 7pm ( free beer and wine)üòúüëç. Thanks Ayres. Your people know how to treat guests.
Manager Response: Thank you BelfastBilly!!! Many times it comes down to "location, location, location" and we are glad to be centrally located to Disneyland, Outlets of Orange, the Angels Stadium, the list goes on.  And thank you for mentioning our complimentary breakfast, parking and WiFi!  Take care and we hope to see you the next time you are visiting Southern California. Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Friendly, helpful staff and beautiful venue
Summary: Upon arrival we were greeted warmly and pleasantly surprised by how classy and clean the location was. Throughout our 3 night stay, the staff and accommodations continued to impress us and we will definitely return!
Manager Response: Thank you Michel, happy to hear we have another "satisfied guest" who will return! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: this is a very clean beautiful hotel  , staff is very friendly and ready to help, I love the room  and beds are so comfortable, breakfast has a lot to choose from and  food was very good. locations is good  too.
Manager Response: Thank you Garcia60 for letting us know we helped to make your weekend awesome! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We are in Orange several times each year to visit relatives.  We discovered the Ayers Hotels and stayed at the property on Katela several years.  This is near the stadium, Honda Center and new train station. We changed to the property on City Dr. a while ago and find the area easier to access and less congested.  We were greeted at check in by Mr Johnson.  He greeted us as returning guests and check in was quickly accomplished.  The rooms are in good condition and we sleep well on the comfortable mattresses.  There are more than enough choices at breakfast.  The property is clean!!  The friendly staff are a great asset.
Manager Response: Thank you grampafixit! I will personally thank Mr. Johnson for his attention at check-in and the entire staff for their guest service.  Comments like yours make our efforts at providing great guest service all the more meaningful.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit to Orange! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I like this hotel a lot but the fan in the bathroom is WAY too loud! And the shower wouldn't spray fully. It was stuck in half bath mode. However, best hotel breakfast I have ever had. Best hotel bacon too! On point.
Manager Response: RA W Thank you for your review!  But I am so sorry that the fan was too loud and shower spray not enough; we are working on those points as I write.  So glad you loved the bacon, I continual hear about how good our bacon is and and happy we are able to provide a quality bacon with our quality breakfast.  Again thank you! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This is a smallish hotel ( by LA standards) and my main reason for staying here was the location. I attended a LA Angels baseball game on Sunday at 12:30 pm and it is an easy 15 minute walk to the Angels Stadium. No worries about LA traffic, parking fees, or getting your car damaged. Just an easy walk down City Drive and then State Street. Plenty of other people will be doing the same walk at the same time. The stadium opens 90 minutes prior to game time on Sunday so you can go early and watch batting practice.  I had a great room - again huge by LA standards - two queens. New and modern. Plenty of room and very clean. Great staff. I had emailed the hotel manager about getting to the ballpark and he got back to me in minutes. A good full breakfast. On site chef cooking eggs and
Manager Response: Loved your review jccgtown! I am glad our hotel met your needs when attending the baseball game.  Along with going early to attend batting practice, there are now two brew pubs across from the stadium to walk to prior to the game as well.  We do hope to see you again for another game or maybe a visit to the Outlets of Orange or Disneyland!  thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Ayres continues to impress me on each visit!  New, Fresh, Clean, Modern, Convenient, Great Value, going back next time I have an OC business trip! Staff was helpful and responsive, room was impeccably clean & quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you Michael for another great review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  I am happy to hear you will stay with us again on your next visit to Orange County.  And I will pass on your compliments to my staff, we all appreciate positive feedback, from Housekeeping to Maintenance to Breakfast to Front Desk!  Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Couldn't have been any nicer!  Clean! Convenient! Cordial! Exceptional services! Friendly atmosphere! Amenities  were comparable with higher priced accommodations!  Would certainly stay again without any second thoughts.
Manager Response: Thank you Marge for your great review, I love that you had a fun "girls weekend", maybe you will make it an annual event!   Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: 5 star hotel for a 3 star price!
Summary: I was very impressed with Ayres Orange from start to finish. Check in was easy and pleasant, and I got a free bag of specialty popcorn for being an Expedia +VIP Gold member. The King Suite room was clean and spacious. The only two complaints I had were, 1. After taking a shower before bedtime, the shower drainpipe would continue making a loud noise throughout the night which actually disturbed my sleep; 2. The air conditioning unit is right next to the bed, so I definitely wouldn't turn it on while sleeping. Otherwise, the stay was more than I expected. The location is conveniently located right next to the highway. The breakfast is top notch with fresh cut fruit, eggs, and a different selection each day of sausage or bacon, as well as the other breakfast staples. Friendly staff
Manager Response: Thank you tsleeps for writing such a great review!  Especially thank you for bringing the drainpipe noise to my attention; I am having maintenance check on it, I think we figured out which room you were in.  I am very sorry it disturbed your sleep so please contact me directly should you wish to stay in the future and I will be happy to extend a great rate to you.  Again thank you for your recommendation! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We usually stay at Ayres whenever possible.  This location is one of our favorites.  Great access to Angels Stadium, Disneyland, amenities.  Always quiet and well kept.  Great breakfast buffett.  We were upgraded to the King Suite on our recent stay, the room was BEAUTIFUL!  I love the attention to detail in the decor.
Manager Response: Thank you wingit4 for your continued loyalty to Ayres Hotels.  My staff works hard to take care of our guests and turn them into "repeat" guests; we value your patronage. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The Hotel was very comfortable in every respect.  The staff was extraordinary.  The hot breakfast was great and  was quiet and peaceful.  Our family loved the location.  Because we were doing Disneyland, it was a perfect place to relax after each day.  All of the bedding was comfortable too!
Manager Response: Thank you waynedevincent for such a nice review!  I am pleased that my staff and the hotel were such a great part of making your Disneyland vacation fun and memorable.  Again, thank you and we do hope to see you again in the future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Hotel next to freeway and hospital
Summary: Several homeless people can be seen during the day at hotel. Ambulances and helicopter to hospital can be heard throughout the day and night which makes it difficult to rest. No restaurant is available within hotel. Have to drive 3blocks or walk 15-20 minutes to outlet mall that has mainly bars and a few eateries to eat at. Beds and pillows are comfortable. Small snack shop in hotel with pricey items. VIP service not offered at time of checkin.
Manager Response: Dear Guest Thank you for taking your time to post your review.   Yes, homeless people on occasion walk by the hotel on the public sidewalk and use the nearby bus stop, but they are not allowed on hotel property as they are not paying guests.  Should the homeless come onto the property they are respectfully asked to leave and dealt with in a caring and diplomatic manner.  And I honestly cannot remember the last time a guest or employee reported a problem or incident with a non-guest, homeless or otherwise. Upon check-in you mentioned not immediately receiving your VIP amenity, the clerk then apologized and gave you the amenity.   You contacted Expedia who in turn contacted me, I left a message for you apologizing and said we would provide an amenity, no knowing you had already received.  The desk tried to deliver a bottle of wine to your room, but you declined saying you did not drink.  Non-alcoholic beverages were offered, you declined.  We asked what else we could provide you as an amenity and you declined. Restaurants - I am so sorry you missed the dining opportunities in our immediate area.  There is Anepalco's which is located in our sister hotel the ALO adjacent to us.  There are also 12 non-fast food restaurants located in and around the Outlets of Orange.   I am sorry you did not enjoy your stay and I respect your decision to stay elsewhere when coming to the City of Orange. Respectfully, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Hotel across the street from hospital
Summary: Upon arrival to hotel, we were approached by a homeless lady asking for food, water and clothes. We have her what we could but noticed during day time there are several homeless people that can be seen as the hotel is across the street from Irvine Medical Center and the freeway. Ambulances and Med Air helicopter for hospital can be heard as well. We stayed on third floor in hotel and outside noise plus children running and banging above us on fourth floor at all hours could be heard. I guess walls and roof are thin. VIP amenities were not offered upon arrival. I've stayed here in past but was very disappointed in our recent stay. I doubt we will stay at this hotel again as quality and customer service has gone down.
Manager Response: Dear Guest Thank you for taking your time to post your review for a second time.  You will notice my response to be the same for the prior review.  Yes, homeless people on occasion walk by the hotel on the public sidewalk and use the nearby bus stop, but they are not allowed on hotel property as they are not paying guests.  Should the homeless come onto the property they are respectfully asked to leave and dealt with in a caring and diplomatic manner.  And I honestly cannot remember the last time a guest or employee reported a problem or incident with a non-guest, homeless or otherwise.  I am surprised you did not mention this at check-in. Upon check-in you mentioned not immediately receiving your VIP amenity, the clerk then apologized and gave you the amenity.   You contacted Expedia who in turn contacted me, I left a message for you apologizing and said we would provide an amenity, no knowing you had already received.  The desk tried to deliver a bottle of wine to your room, but you declined saying you did not drink.  Non-alcoholic beverages were offered, you declined.  We asked what else we could provide you as an amenity and you declined. Restaurants - I am so sorry you missed the dining opportunities in our immediate area.  There is Anepalco's which is located in our sister hotel the ALO adjacent to us.  There are also 12 non-fast food restaurants located in and around the Outlets of Orange.   I am sorry you did not enjoy your stay and I respect your decision to stay elsewhere when coming to the City of Orange. Respectfully, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for our quick labor day Disneyland trip. Despite being near the freeway, this hotel was rather quiet and calm. The interiors of this hotel were aesthetically pleasing and our room was clean and spacious. The bed was especially comfortable which was helpful after hours of walking around the theme parks. Parking is free and abundant. There's not shuttles to Disneyland, but we were okay with that since we had a car. Free Wi-Fi. The breakfast saved us some money and was very good considering that it was complimentary--I would say it is better than a lot of breakfast fare found at diners or denny's and IHOP. Our room was on the 3rd floor, so my only issue was that the footsteps from the room above us was very audible...I don't know if they were heavy steppers
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your great review of the hotel!  The hotel is part of the ART shuttle program to Disneyland so if my staff did not clearly communicate that to you I am very sorry.  I am thinking the footsteps you heard were from the men's soccer team we had staying with us, as normally footsteps are not a problem.  But glad you mentioned as we will try to block rooms for our sports teams on the low floors to lessen this issue in the future.  Again, thank you and I am so glad your enjoyed your stay. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The service was great.  The room was great.  Spacious, modern, and great table lamps.  5-7 Happy Hour was great.  All around a great experience, and I look forward to booking again.  Just chatted online with their customer service, and they were very responsive, and resolved my issue in seconds.  literally.
Manager Response: Thank you jav_cp7! So happy to hear that you thoroughly enjoyed to hotel.  WE do look forward to seeing you int he future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Overall, my stay here was amazing. The room was beautiful and was better than I expected. Even though I only stayed for a day, I know I will come back. I cannot thank the workers here for the amazing time i had.
Manager Response: Juan R - Thank you very much for taking the time to let us know how much your enjoyed your stay even though it was so short.  We hope you return for a longer stay next time, it was our pleasure to make your stay amazing! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The hotel was clean, nice, and the service was excellent.  The best was they have a laundry room in additional to the gym, pool, business center and conference rooms.  I would definitely stay at this hotel again!
Manager Response: Thank you nycxdn, I appreciate your kind words and do hope you can stay with again in the future! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Everything was amazing. We stay at an Ayres owned hotel 4-6 times per year and it never disappoints. The employees are amazing. The rooms are clean. The breakfast is delicious. The rooms are quiet. The area is safe. It's close to a Starbucks. What else can you ask for??? I will definitely be back. The fitness is great to get in an average workout without traveling to a "full" gym. 20 minutes to Disney with parking at the lot and taking the parking lot shuttle or 12 minutes on the ART tram. Love this place!!!
Manager Response: Thank you Jrivvy for the great review you posted.  I always appreciate it when a guests takes their time to review our hotel.  So glad you found all you needed to make your stay "amazing" and we will be here for your next visit to Disneyland. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: One of my favorite places to stay while in town. Beautiful hotel. Quiet, clean and comfortable. Staff is friendly. Love the full breakfast and free parking. Close to restaurants, shopping and freeways.
Manager Response: Thank you Veronica for your review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  We will be here for you on your next visit to the City of Orange. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Great place to stay with very friendly and caring staff.  The place is still new so the facilities reflect that.  Parking is good, there's plenty of things nearby to do (Disneyland, Angels stadium, Outlets, shops), the place is quiet and the rooms are really nice.  Wine and cookie time during the week is a nice bonus and the breakfast is fantastic, plenty of choices and a real good way to start the day.  Oh and the lobby area is nice too!
Manager Response: Thank you Robert! So glad we made your stay memorable and that you enjoyed all the extra amenities we provide our guests (and without the dreaded resort fee).  Thank you for mentioning the lobby, we feel the Bali decor calms our guests the minute they walk in the door and helps to make our guest's stays relaxing.  Hope to see you back soon! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Great stay, clean and well kept property.  Staff was excellent and responsive to our needs. Will stay again. I would have given a five, but they need to add a few different options at breakfast,  after 4 days, needed a little change.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review of the Ayres Hotel Orange! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This will always be my first choice when staying in Orange. I have stayed in this brand new, beautiful hotel a few times since it opened, when taking my daughter to Chapman University each year. I would also consider it whenever going to Disneyland, since it is only a 10 minute drive to the park. The staff is friendly and helpful. The breakfast is very good. It is quiet, not so chaotic as many hotels near Disney. The pool is small compared to some other hotels in the area, so young kids may not find it as exciting as some other places, but in general it is a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you cindyf238! My staff and I appreciate your kinds words and are pleased you enjoy the hotel!  We hope to see you on the upcoming "parents" weekend in September.  Again, thank you! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Staff was wonderful, professional,accommodating,  I would not stay anywhere else , the food was amazing fresh, delicious, and cooked right in front of you, the selections where plenty to please everyone in my family
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you! I always appreciate our guests taking time to review the hotel and letting us know how we are doing.  We do hope to see you again on your next trip to Southern California. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Ayres Hotel is a perfect choice for a family vacation.  Rooms are clean, spacious and modern.  No issues with noise.  Staff are friendly and helpful.  Overall, a great experience.  Great value for money and the buffet breakfast is awesome.
Manager Response: Thank you ble2016 for your review!  I am so glad you found my staff to be friendly and helpful and that overall you had a great stay at the Ayres Hotel Orange.  We look forward to seeing you in the future should you travel to the Orange Anaheim Area. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We come down to Orange to visit our daughter at Chapman University and always prefer to stay at the Ayers.  We have tried other hotels in the area (and because of nearby Disneyland, there are plenty of choices) but Ayres is the perfect size, rooms are spacious and staff is very nice and helpful.
