AND it is not overrun by the over stimulated Disney families. Eat next door at Anepalco.. some kind of fusion French/Mexican and very good.
Manager Response: Jeff F Thank you for taking your time to review the Hotel.  We all appreciate your kind remarks and Yes, I agree, Anepalco's Restaurant located next door in our sister hotel the ALO, is fantastic for lunch or dinner.  See you on your next trip visiting your daughter at Chapman! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay.  It was quiet, comfortable, clean.  The staff was excellent and answered all of our questions.  It was so nice to be able to have a relaxing and delicious breakfast each morning.  Wonderful experience overall. We will be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great value, spacious, good location for Chapman
Summary: Newer hotel,  nice rooms with large floor plans and a friendly staff!. Very willing to Accomodate guests requests and quick with results.  We will always stay here on our future visits. Perfect for visiting your college student at Chapman.
Manager Response: Thank you kimlucia! Thank you for your review, the hotel has really appreciated so many Chapman parents posting great reviews on Trip Advisor about the Ayres Hotel Orange.  We strive to be a "home away from home" for the four years all our Chapman parents  visit their kids prior to final graduation.  Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for one night during our son's freshman orientation at Chapman University. On check-in, the front desk clerk told us that the hotel offers a Chapman rate and to be sure to ask for it if you are a Chapman family. We had booked through a 3rd-party site so got a good rate but will be sure to remember that in the future. The hotel is very clean and our room was spacious, bigger than in more expensive hotels. Spacious tub/shower too. Included in the room rate is a hot, buffet breakfast which included scrambled eggs, bacon, hash browns, pancakes, cereal, fruit, toast, yoghurt, juices, coffee. A welcome start to the day. All in all we thought the hotel was excellent value for money.
Manager Response: Thank you msjane63! Loved your detailed review and appreciate you taking the time to let other potential guests know how much you enjoyed the hotel.  Thank you and we will see you over the next four years until your son's graduation.   Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Ayers Hotel Orange for Chapman families
Summary: Our stay at the Ayers Hotel Orange would have been rated "Excellent" except for the fact that the shower in your hotel room has absolutely NO water pressure.  Our family literally avoided showering due to the lace of water pressure as it would take three times as long to shower as the water "trickled" out of the shower head.  We plan on visiting Orange a lot as our daughter is a Freshman at Chapman University.  The Ayers hotel offers a nightly rate of $145 for Chapman families.  The hotel is very clean, a great location to Chapman and the service is friendly.  However, again, due to the water pressure issue at the hotel..we will not be returning.
Manager Response: Dear cormdenver I am very sorry about the low water pressure in your room, once your reported the problem to the front desk it was immediately fixed.  The shower head was clogged and since you only stayed one night you were not aware that it was fixed.  I would ask that you try the hotel again and see that our water pressure is normally fine.  Again, my apologies. Respectfully, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Beautiful lovely, fresh new decor. Rooms was large and modern, bed comfortable, bathroom was fine- spacious tub/shower oddly wide but not deep but would be great for little kids to bathe in. Buffet breakfast a nice tough I guess but Starbucks around the corner too....
Manager Response: Thank you chaoticfamily for taking the time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am happy that you enjoyed out breakfast and liked the room size and decor.  We would love to have you back as our guests in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Stayed for 2 nights in a family vacay to Disneyland. Room was spit spot clean. Was very pleasantly surprised. Breakfast was decent and evening reception was very nice. Offered beer, wine, soft drinks and light snacks. Short 10 minute drive to Disneyland. Would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you for the great review!  I am glad the hotel helped make your Disneyland vacation a memorable experience. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Oh, Ayres Hotel Orange, you tried hard, you delivered on some aspects, but fell short on others. Pluses: decor,  the fresh new condition of the property and staff members who tried hard to do a good job. Minuses: breakfast (same blah food every day) and uneven service delivery (for instance, guests who stayed more than one night waited for a long time to get our rooms cleaned). My rating: just average.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time to review the hotel.  I was saddened to hear that you felt the breakfast was "blah" every day as the hotel is normally rated very high for our complimentary breakfast.  I would welcome any suggestions you might have to improve our breakfast.  I would also like to apologize if your room was not cleaned as early as you wanted it to be, a call to the Front Desk by our guests requesting specific times to clean a room is always welcomed.  Otherwise cleaning varies every day depending on the number of checkouts, what time guests checkout, how many arrivals the hotel has expecting their rooms to be ready by 3:00 pm, and the times the stay over guests leave their rooms.  I am sorry you were disappointed in the Hotel but appreciate your comments. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Stayed here for a local wedding. Room nice enough and facility clean and welcoming. Now the drawbacks - shaky uncomfortable bed in room right in front of window AC, nearly freezing us whenever it came on. Coffee maker in room with only decaf. Used laundry service for 2 shirts and front desk screwed it up. Instead of overnight service by 11 am for 50% more, was ripped off for double charge and delivered 5  hrs late after multiple calls. Breakfast ok but limited choices Front desk unable to print receipt upon checkout.
Manager Response: Matt D Thank you for your review, I am sorry I was not aware of the problems you experienced during your stay.  I apologize for the dry cleaning mix-up and I have issued a full refund to your credit card for that charge, and I agree it was an outrageous charge and I have spoken to our dry cleaning company.  I am sorry you found the room uncomfortable, I would ask that when guests find something wrong with their room, whether at an Ayres Hotel or any other Hotel, they let the desk know ASAP so another room can be provided.  I am also sorry you found our complimentary breakfast; eggs, bacon/sausage, potatoes, pancakes, juices, fresh fruit, cereals, granola, pastries, breads, coffee and teas, to have limited choices.  Again, I am sorry you did not enjoy your stay but your comments are helpful to me and my staff in continuing to improve our guest service.  Respectfully, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This Ayres Hotel is absolutely amazing and awesome!!!  From the property itself, including the exterior and interior.  The lobby, rooms, outdoor patio, eating area are amazing!!!!  And the staff even more amazing!!!  Love it!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The stay at the hotel was wonderful. From the moment we checked in and until we left, I loved everything about the place. I would definitely stay there again. Oh and I really enjoyed the nice breakfast
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a very nice hotel. It is very nicely decorated, clean, and has fantastic customer service. I would highly recommend it!! The location is convenient as it is close to Chapman University and Disneyland!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location, delicious breakfast, cheerful staff, comfortable beds, large rooms, spotless.  I would definitely stay here again, accessible to all major freeways.  Parking is well lit and the hotel security patrols the area at night.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A Great Find in Orange, California
Summary: This is a lovely hotel. We fully appreciate that they have a Chapman University rate and free parking for Chapman parents. The rooms are quiet and lovely. The breakfast is very good. There are a lot of options. Unfortunately most of the food I had was cold even though it was in warm serving trays. The fruit was fresh and delicious. Definitely a gem in Orange, California.
Manager Response: Thank you Hilary for the great review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am so sorry about the food being cold and will check with our kitchen staff.  We have met so many parents of incoming Chapman freshmen, it is always fun this time of year!  Take care and we hope to see you Parent's weekend as well. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We had a nice stay here while attending a family wedding. The rooms are clean, modern and spacious. The staff are pleasant and helpful. The included breakfast is need of more variety. There are plenty of choices, but the menu could use a change from day to day.
Manager Response: Thank you Bev for your review!  The wedding group was fun to interact with, everyone was here for a very happy occasion and glad that all went well!   Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Very nice hotel, across from fun Outlets at Orange & one of our favorite restaurants, Market Place Grill. It was quite an upgrade from our usual Disney mid-price area hotels. Cookies at night & all day coffee are nice touches. Hotel staff very nice. They have security & we felt safe.
Manager Response: Ramona, Thank you for your review, so happy you found us and that we made you feel safe and secure.  We hope to see you on your next visit to Disneyland! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: stay was gr8 staff was gr8 basically a gr8 place to stay! very clean room . the view is gorgeous and the lobby as well as all around is really a sight to see! would  definitely stay there again !there it is also very close to many outlet stores a well!
Manager Response: Thank you bitrices for the gr8 5 Star review!  My staff and I appreciate it very much! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The room is so big and comfortable, comfortable bed as well. My husband and I love this hotel. Friendly reception staff.  Yummy breakfast. This hotel provide yummy cookies, cold beer and soft drink at lobby which we have not seen in any other hotels we stayed with. Would recommend to our friends if they visit  LA.
Manager Response: Dear apsaw, Thank you for taking the time to write a such a great review and recommending us to your friends, we hope to see you on your next trip to Southern California. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Very nice and cozy room for the price you pay. The breakfast provided was very satisfying and included so definitely nice extras. This is not a big hotel by any means but if a nicely decorated and beautiful interior hotel is important to you don't skip this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you Ian for your nice review, I really appreciate your recommendation to other future guests! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Exceptional  Super nice & clean hotel!. Our room was beautiful, big and very comfortable. Right off of the exit makes it easy to go where ever you want . We stayed 5 nights and only had trouble with late night noise above us one night at around midnight. We called management and they took care of it right away. FREE  Hotel *BREAKFAST* !! Who does that, right? OMG fresh fruit, bagels, biscuits eggs, bacon etc SOO good! There is a small laundry on 2nd and 4th floor if you need to wash any clothes.  Internet/business room was very nice and quiet. We would go back in a heartbeat.  *cons* (only 1)  Kind of hard to get in and out of as driveway is by a light. But who cares! We love it, the price was great and cant wait to go back for another vacation!  Thank you Ayres Hotel for making
Manager Response: You are very welcome!!  And thank you for taking you time to write such a nice review of the hotel.  We do hope to see you again on your next trip to our area, and we are working with the City of Orange to get "do not block" area painted at our entrance/exit so guests will have an easier time leaving the hotel and needing to turn left at the light. Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Satisfied doesn't begin to describe our stay
Summary: I cannot say enough good things about this place. I searched for over a month for a reasonably priced hotel for a quick 2day/3 nights Disneyland getaway. I wanted to stay on Disney property, but being we flew across country, we wanted to save a little on lodging since we wouldn't be in the hotel much. Everywhere seemed to charge $20/person for a decent breakfast and $20/night parking making an extra $60/day, but Ayers did not which is why it won our business. Check in was smooth. We were given a room on the 1st floor with a window facing the parking lot and the I-5 because our 3rd floor room wasn't ready. I secretly was upset about this because I'm a light sleeper, but there was absolutely no noise. Those windows are very sound proof. We walked in the room and my husbands
Manager Response: Thank you JoMo413! Can I hire you as our new PR person!!  Kidding aside, I am so glad you found the price of the room to be such a value for your family.  And should you be unable to book at a Disney Hotel next time you come to town, be will be here with open arms for you and your family. Thank you!!! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My family and I stayed 7 days for our Southern Cali Adventure. I use to be a flight attendant and this hotel has awesome perks. A free buffet style breakfast that is freshly cooked along with accommodating staff. Free parking and Free Happy Hour in the lobby from 5-7 drinks, cookies and fruit, The pool is really nice along with outdoor seating outside to relax. Very nice gym with equipment that some hotels lack, There is bus 14 that will take you to and from Disneyland from 715 am till 1230 am next door at the ALO Hotel. I suggest you buy a 5 day pass on the bus, All 5 of us went round trip for $42.00 the 5 days. Very happy customer that would stay again :)
Manager Response: Thank you Susan S., I really appreciate your kind review of the Ayres Hotel Orange and was happy to hear you enjoyed our amenities and service.  Thank you for the great tip to our future guests regarding the ART shuttle to Disneyland.  My staff and I do hope to see you again on a future trip to our area. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I can't say enough good things about this hotel.  It's so well maintained.  The staff is friendly and rooms are well appointed and clean.  I love the rooms with step in showers although the bathtubs are spacious.   This hotel is in a perfect central location and my first choice when I go to OC.
Manager Response: Dear Carolyn, Thank you once again for staying with us.  I meant to stay hello to you when I saw your reservation but missed you at check out by minutes.  Hope you will be seeing you again in the near future, and do ask for me at the front desk if I miss you, you have become one our regular guests!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: this was a nice place to stay
Summary: it was a real nice  spacious  room only 2 cons  no tub in room  just walk in shower  and small pool  squeezed in between  parking garage and  hotel exit  other than that it is in a pretty good location  close to alot of things  including Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am sorry you were disappointed in not having a room with a tub; but the hotel does has rooms with bathtubs  so should you stay with us in the future, please request a tub and we will be happy to pre-block one for you and your family.  Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: long time ALO first time at this property
Summary: We have spent many nights at the ALO next door but this was the first time at this property. (Due to no ALO availability)  Breakfast area was particularly nice. The new hotel has a sophisticated feel and we will definitely go again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  We thank you for staying with Ayres Hotels, whether is be the ALO by Ayres or the Ayres Orange property.  The hotels both take pride in our great guest service, cleanliness and price for value.  Thak you for remaining in the Ayres Family of Hotels. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This hotel is clean, very nice, and close to UCI. My husband had minor surgery and we stayed one night. It is also close to the outdoor outlet mall and many places to eat. No complaints. The lobby was comfortable and the free breakfast was great. Parking was abundant and close.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am glad we were there for you when your husband needed to be at UCI.  And we thank UCI for recommending the hotel for their patients and patient's families. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed at Ayres Hotel Orange for 8 days for the PGF National softball tournament.  This is a very clean, comfortable and friendly place to stay.  The breakfast was amazing. Actual real food. I would recommend this establishment to anyone looking for a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you Denise, the hotel enjoyed having all team stay with us.  It was great to host young but mature and gracious girls and watch the team's progression in the tournament during the week.  We do hope to see you again next year should the team be invited back and your daughter still playing.  Again, thank you for your review. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Made our first trip to CA for the PGF softball tournament and the Ayres was home base for about half the team. Excellent experience! The wonderful hot breakfast provided a great start to each day and we looked forward to grabbing a cookie each afternoon. Our room was large and accommodated our family of four with ease. Best hotel bathroom we had ever seen. Clean, clean, clean! Lovely d√©cor and we liked that there were night stands on both sides of the each bed. The staff was friendly and efficient. Fantastic experience!
Manager Response: Thank you, the whole team is giving us great reviews, either via TripAdvisor or through our own hotel surveys.  We loved having yo here, thank you!!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel -- walking distance to Angels Stadium
Summary: It was our first stay at a hotel in the Ayres chain. We were impressed. Comfortable, large rooms, friendly staff, nice amenities. The "happy hour" offerings were a nice touch (beer, wine, soft drinks) and the breakfast was good (eggs, bacon and much more). Internet worked well.
Manager Response: Thank you Eric for taking the time to review us!!  So glad you found us and were here for a baseball game, hope your team won!  I would like recommend to other guests attending games to also stop by the new Golden Road Brewery between the hotel and the stadium, great stop if your are walking!!  Thanks again Eric. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Every Ayres Hotel we've stayed at has gone above and beyond to make sure we're comfortable and happy. The value is fabulous-it's like a 5 star resort for a fraction of the price. There is also a professional chef who cooks homemade breakfast for the guests every morning. We will always come back to the Ayres!
Manager Response: Thank you Lollydrop! I am so glad you found our hotel to feel like a five star hotel at a great price!  With breakfast, parking and Wi-Fi included in all our rates, we want our guests to know how much we appreciate their choosing to stay at the Ayres Hotel Orange.  Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Large clean rooms with free breakfast and cookies, beer/wine in the afternoon
Summary: Very close to Disneyland and the freeways to the Orange County beaches. The staff are friendly and very helpful with suggestions. The breakfast is great and the pancakes were excellent. The room has an in-room a/c unit so the fan noise is louder than central a/c systems but it does drown out the traffic and other guest sounds in the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a wonderful stay. The rooms were big, clean and very comfortable. We enjoyed the pool in the afternoon. The best was the hot breakfast provided in the morning; it was the best we have ever had!
Manager Response: Yeah Jessica! Thanks for letting us know how much you appreciated our breakfast and pool area.  We do hope to see you on your next visit to Orange County! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Had a wonderful week at The Ayers.  Was traveling with my daughter's softball team.  The staff was wonderful & friendly and very accommodating.  Hotel very clean and housekeeping was great.  Breakfast was great as well.  Would absolutely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you Kathy! The hotel really enjoyed hosting the Travelling Teams we had in-house the last couple of weeks; and hopefully you will be back next year!  We really loved interacting with the young ladies, their maturity and sense of fun really made it a pleasure to have you all as our guests. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Very nice rooms with plenty of open space. Very close and easy access to Angels Baseball Stadium.  Breakfast offered in the morning was very good and fulfilling.  I would absolutely stay here again and would recommend the hotel to others.
Manager Response: Dear gabi3004, Thank you for the great review!  Boston played Anaheim during your visit, hope you enjoyed the game and the short walk from the hotel to the stadium.  We do hope to see you again in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Wanted a hotel close to Angel Stadium.  Went from Vegas to see a Red Sox game.  It was a wonderful stay from the early check in to the great breakfast the next morning.   This is a new property and it is beautiful.   Also a very comfortable bed.  Great amenities.   Highly recommend this property.   I like Ayres properties but this one is a stand out!
Manager Response: Thank you Tonna! Many of guest this last weekend were here for the Red Sox game, it was fun to see everyone dressed in their favorite team shirts.  We do hope to see you again for another future game or to just hang out in Orange County! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Clean and comfortable and breakfast was great.  I will be staying here again.  The staff was friendly and attentive. Every bit as nice as the Doubletree, but less plus free parking and breakfast. Great location.
Manager Response: Thank you Ronburch for your nice review!  Yes, we agree that the Ayres Hotel Orange is a great value with our free parking, Wi-Fi and breakfast and hope to see you on your next visit to the area. Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The Ayres hotel provided an amazing experience for my family on vacation. The rooms are very clean and spacious! The staff was very friendly and helpful. The breakfast was great! It's very close to restaurants and just a quick drive to Disneyland. Definitely one of the best hotels!! I would recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: yeah 600share! So happy you found the hotel to be amazing!  I will be sure my staff sees your review as well as all others.  This summer has been a season of "controlled chaos" so we appreciate when a guest acknowledges our hard work.  Thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith

Summary: everyone was so friendly and kind. the checkin was awesome as well. overall, it was a great place to stay in. would do it again. I would book a room for next year when we go to Disneyland. it's off the freeway and very convenient.
Manager Response: Dear msantiago527, Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel!  We will here here for you and your family next year and look forward to helping make your family's vacation memorable. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We enjoyed our stay.  The bed was comfy.  The linens clean, crisp and smelled good.  Lots of pillows.   We had no problem driving to Disneyland and parking in the Toy Story parking lot, using our annual pass for free parking. Normally $18.  Like the little fridge, that was very cold.   All the employees we encountered were helpful and cheery.  Breakfast was very good.  Not great. But much better than most.  Always scrambled eggs. Rotates bacon and sausage daily.  Croissants were unusually good. Fresh sliced fruit as well.   Would stay here again anytime.
Manager Response: Dear princessconsuellacat. Thank you for your kind review, I appreciate it very much when guests let us know how we are doing, positive or negative.  Glad you enjoyed your stay and we will be here on your visit to Orange County! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Great hotel chain.  Usually stay at the adjoining ALO because they allow small dogs.  Travelled solo on this trip, so stayed at the Ayres.  New, very clean hotel in great location; close to 2 fwys, restaurants and Disneyland (short drive or free shuttle) if you're so inclined.  Staff were great; free wifi was nice and worked well; and, breakfast was nice (sat outside by the pool on a beautiful SoCal day).  Will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you Tony and Family!  I was glad to hear you enjoyed your stay here as well as past stays at the ALO by Ayres next door.  We look forward to seeing you in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Great room would stay again! The bed was comfortable. Nice living room. Would appreciate an extra waste basket by the sink or kitchen area. Breakfast was good. Overall great service by the staff. Would recommend to family and friends.
Manager Response: reginar744 Thank you, thank you, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I booked this hotel as last minute, after an emergency at home left me needing somewhere else to stay. The lady at the front desk when I checked it was very nice, very welcoming. The room was very nice, and very clean. Free parking & free Wi-Fi. The only reason I took off a point in my rating is because of the deposit they require. I was told it would be $125, however my card was charged $128. Not that big of a deal, but I was told it would be returned to my card 48 hours after I check out. I checked out on Sunday morning, it is now Friday afternoon, and I still have not gotten my deposit back yet.
Manager Response: luvlolajuj, I am glad to hear you enjoyed your stay overall, but so sorry the front desk did not communicate clearly the credit card release procedure.  Once a guest checks out and we immediately release "held" authorizations and  it will take 48 - 72 hours to drop depending upon your bank.  If a debit card is used, it can take up to 2 weeks to be released by your bank.  I will make sure my staff knows the correct time line and I really appreciate you bringing this to my attention.  Thank you. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My sister's bridal party and most guests stayed at the Ayres on "The City Drive" in Orange, CA for two nights; the night before and after her wedding.  It was an incredibly beautiful hotel with large, spacious rooms; super clean and up-to-date!   The beds are very comfortable; the staff is extremely helpful and friendly and the complimentary full breakfast was AMAZING!!     The pool is beautiful and everything from start to finish was wonderful.   I had the best room in the hotel = Room 133 - just outside the pool and the patio area.  It was so convenient for everything we did all weekend.  My sister's bridal suite on the 4th floor was gorgeous!!    We all decided to come back for a weekend before the summer ends!!   I would HIGHLY recommend this hotel !!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great hotel.  Very clean and affordable. Excellent staff and delicious breakfast.  Nice pool area with great outdoor seating for relaxing.  Very close to major highways and only a short distance to awesome beaches
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you Brenda!! So glad you enjoyed your stay and the hotel's amenities.  Please think of us the next time you are visiting Orange County. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I have stayed at the Ayres on Orange for close to two years on average spending 10 days a month. I always have an excellent experience everyone is so nice they do all they can to make your trip a positive one. I can't say enough good about them. The breakfast included is great good food please people tip the cook. The hotel rooms are modern clean and the location is close to everything.
Manager Response: Thank you so Jeannette9171, I know my staff considers you part of the family and enjoy seeing you here so often.  It is great guests such as yourself that make our jobs all the more easier.  Thank you for your kind words! Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We booked the Ayres Hotel Orange for our recent trip to Disneyland. The hotel is beautiful, well kept and clean. We loved the complimentary breakfast and happy hour! The beds and pillows are the most comfortable I've ever experienced in a hotel!  The pool and spa area is also very nice, pretty, clean, and the pool is heated.  We enjoyed swimming and soaking after long days at Disneyland.  The staff is friendly and helpful.  They answered my many questions and helped me purchase tickets for the ART shuttle and figure out how to shuttle to and from Disneyland. My only minor complaint is that the coffee is horrible, literally undrinkable (even after attempting to mask the taste with cream and sugar!)  Everything else about our stay was wonderful and we will happily stay at the
Manager Response: Yikes, so sorry about the coffee.  I responded to you via email promising I would look into what happened during your stay as normally we do not receive complaints.  I did find during your stay that a new staff member had not been thoroughly trained on how much coffee to use per brew and each batch she made was either too bitter or not very strong.  Thanks for the "heads up"!  Hope to see you in the future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I was there with my whole family for a wedding. The room was nice and spacious for my little family. People were great and room was very clean! The breakfast in the morning was nice with a big variety. I would come back for sure
Manager Response: Thank you, Thank you, Thank you!!!! Christine Smith Manager

Summary: Excellent location, very clean and inviting. All of the staff we interacted with were friendly, proficient and very helpful.  The rooms are spacious and clean. Microwave and mini-fridge was great to have! Very close (walking distance) to the Outlets at Orange, Starbucks is a block or so away. Easy interstate access and close to JOhn Wayne Airport.  We did not take advantage of the breakfast or pool area. The happy hour is a nice touch and the lobby is inviting for a beer or glass of wine. Could not have asked for a better experience!!
Manager Response: HPSGene Thank you for your kind review, I am pleased you enjoyed your stay, my friendly staff and had a great overall experience.  Summer months are always our busiest so we work extra hard to keep everything going smoothly for our guests. Again thank you and hope to see you again in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Lovely rooms, clean, neat, complimentary breakfast was yummy, free parking and internet in your room.  Can't beat this! My third stay with this hotel. I have given this hotel rave reviews and now it is becoming too popular.  Hope it stays the same even with increased popularity.
Manager Response: Thank you MPickhouse, yes we are getting busier but summer in our area is always the craziest in the Anaheim area due to Disneyland and general summer vacations.  I am glad you returned to the Ayres Hotel Orange and will welcome you back on your next visit to the area!   Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: What a great experience it was during our recent stay at this hotel. GREAT location, close to all the hot spots... Disneyland, Angel Stadium and The Honda Center.  The hotel itself is very clean and spacious.  Allen the assistant general manager and his team were all very friendly and accommodating.  This will be my go to hotel when visiting the Orange County area.
Manager Response: Thank you Tina for taking your time to write a review; we appreciate your comments and I will definitely let my staff know how happy you were with our accommodations and service.  Take care and see you next time you are in the area. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Hotel was clean and updated.  Room, especially the bed, was comfortable.  Having a microwave and fridge in the room are convenient.  Breakfast was very good.  Workout room is small.  Did not use the pool area.
Manager Response: Thank you John for your kind review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  It sounds as if we met your overall needs and hope to see you again in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Very happy with my experience. The room and hotel itself was very clean, and the bed was honestly pretty comfy. It's within 5 minutes of the Block/Outlets and right next to Best Buy. The free wifi was nice, but as we were watching a movie, the internet crashed and we couldn't use it anymore. That's really my only complaint.
Manager Response: Michael, Thank you for taking the time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange!  So glad you enjoyed your stay with us; and I will definitely be checking on the WiFi access as we do not normally have problems with the service.  Thanks for the "heads up."  We do hope to see you again in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My wife and I along with 2 of our friends stay at Ayres for 5 nights while we were on our Disneyland trip. The hotel staff was very friendly and helpful upon check-in. The rooms were very comfortable and clean. We recommend it do anyone going to Anaheim/OC area.
Manager Response: Thank you GangstDCfifty for taking the time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange and especially for your recommendation to future guests, hope to see you again on your next Disney visit. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Very happy with our experience.  The hotel was very clean.  I slept better than I have in a long time in those bed.  Every one of the staff members we encountered were very pleasant!  I would definitely stay again as well as recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you Jamie, and thank you for especially mentioning my staff!  We all work hard at extending great guest service and will pass on your comments to my staff. Thank you, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The hotel was very clean and work with us on a room close to the exit due to a special need.  The lack of an onsite restaurant was disappointing. We did not know the area and were hesitant in the traffic.  Breakfast was also a disappointment.  This was the most expensive place we stayed in our 2 week trip and feel that other hotels at half the pros were just a good or better.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to respond to our survey.  I am sorry that you were not happy with the hotel breakfast and found the lack of an onsite restaurant disappointing.  There are many restaurants in the immediate area and one in our sister hotel the ALO; I will be speaking to my desk staff as to why they did not tell you about close by restaurants when you asked them.  Again, thank you for your review. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights, very modern hotel, clean, nice rooms with enough space. Free breakfast(pretty good, better than your average Hampton inns etc), free internet, free parking, free evening reception (beer, wine). Pool area small but nice. Easy walk to Angels stadium and The Outlets at Orange. Restaurants nearby, even walking distance. Would definitely stay here again when in the OC. Ayres hotels have yet to disappoint me, always top notch.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you!!! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Very friendly staffs , rooms are clean
Summary: Prepare a connection room for me and my family with child . We all like the pan cake of breakfast. No noise at night. And location is good . Just right next to the orange outlet. Parking is easy just right in front of entrance
Manager Response: Thank you Homan for your review!  So glad we met and exceeded your needs and expectations.  Hope to see you again in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Found this hotel on get away today, I was skeptical but once I got there I was pleasantly surprised. It is in a good central location, beautiful layout, the inside was aesthetically pleasing, the halls were wide , the rooms are large and well laid out, staff were helpful and pleasant, parking was easy and well laid out. The would absolutely recommend this hotel. My only hope would be that the hotel would send out invitations to the people who have stayed and enjoyed the facility. I would easily make this my go to place to stay when vacationing in LA.  J from Reno, NV
Manager Response: Thank you jmurray571 I appreciate your kind review of the hotel and am glad you enjoyed your stay!  If you gave us your email address during your stay, you will definitely receive invitations for specials at all the Ayres Hotels.  If not, email me at csmith@ayreshotels and I will put you on the list. Again, thank you! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We were impressed with the staff and the reception. The room was in great condition and everything was up to and beyond our expectation. It's very convenient to many of the facilities nearby. UC Irvine Medical Center is across the street and we were able to walk to easily. We also enjoyed the fine restaurants around.
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am pleased that our location allowed easy access to UCI for you.  Should you need to visit UCI again in the future, we look forward to being your home away from home. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Traveled to California for surgery at Univ. of CA Irvine. Stayed across the street from the medical center at the Ayres during almost the entire month of March. Our stay could not have been any better! The staff knew the reason for our stay and they were incredible! They catered to my every need, starting with a room on the top floor, facing the back of the hotel, away from the freeway. The room was exceptionally quiet for the rest that I needed after neurosurgery. Besides the room location being perfect for my recuperation, we could clearly watch the nightly fireworks from Disneyland from our room. Even when the hotel was at maximum capacity, the noise was minimal. If the hotel shuttle was not previously booked, they would shuttle us to my appointments at the Medical Center. If
Manager Response: Thank you Robin for your wonderful review of the Hotel.  My staff and I enjoyed meeting you and being able to help you through your recuperation.  We met as strangers and after a the first week you became part of the Ayres Family.  Again thank you, take care and we will be here for you on your next visit. Blessings, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Very friendly staff (we had called ahead to ask if we could store our luggage until check in since our flight would be getting in early and they said that wouldn't be a problem.  Was expecting to do that, but the room was ready and they allowed us to check in early without any problems). Clean room.  Nice free breakfast with a variety of fresh choices.  Comfortable beds and soft linens. Plenty of (FREE) parking. Easy access to interstate.  It was a great place to stay between LA and Irvine.  The only downside to this hotel was the noise.  Noise from within the hotel was very minimal, but we could hear traffic and sirens (near hospital) most nights.  We would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Amy, Thank you for your review and I am pleased to hear we met your needs and exceeded your expectations!  I am sorry about the noise from the sirens.  Even though our windows are double and triple paned guests can hear sirens on occasion if they are not heavy sleepers.  We do hope to see you again in the future! Sincerely Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Very nice hotel.  The service was excellent and the rooms were large and clean.  I highly recommend this hotel for anyone visiting Orange County or Los Angeles.  Also, the hotel is relatively close to Newport Beach and Huntington Beach.  The layout of the hotel was a little confusing.  The signage for the elevator could be a little better.  But that was not a big deal.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you! Christine Manager

Summary: We flew in from Atl to Lax, it was roughly a 45 min drive. After reading the reviews, I was nervous and didn't know what to expect.    We arrived early, they checked us in 2 hours earlier. The staff was extremely nice and helpful. During our stay they had "happy hour" with complimentary  wine and beer.   The hotel was very clean. The room was nice and spacious. I wished the beds were a little firmer, they were a little too broken in for my liking but nothing too bad that could ruin a trip.   Free wifi, free parking, free breakfast  (eggs, bacon, fruits, pancakes, breakfast potatoes etc.)  The hotel is 45min from Universal Studio and 10 minutes from Disney. It's in a very good and safe location.
Manager Response: Thank you Chantal! I appreciate your review and am glad we exceeded your expectations.  You are correct in that it is always a little scary booking a hotel when you do not know an area; you just never know what you will get.  Thank you for letting potential future guests know they will be in good hands here at the Ayres Hotel Orange. Sincerely, Christine Smith Manager

Summary: Friendly people and a nice place. The building looks new. The rooms look new. The beds are comfortable.  The breakfast is pretty good for a "free" breakfast. The bathrooms are large and well done. Bottom line is I like to stay there when in the area for work.
Manager Response: Thank you Deddy210 for your kind review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  We certainly hope you can return on your next work assignment in the area.   Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We stayed here while visiting Chapman University and got a very good rate. Our room was a double, perfectly set up with a wall partially separating the beds. I never saw that configuration before in a hotel. It's brilliant. Everything was clean, well appointed and fresh. Close to the med center, 8-10 minute ride from the university. Very friendly and helpful front desk staff.
Manager Response: Dear AmriiKC Thank you for taking the time to review the Hotel.  I am glad you found our accommodations to be better than expected and that you found the value in our pricing.  Thank you! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Lovely greeting from the staff. Room was very clean if a bit impersonal. Cleaning staff was lovely.  Breakfast was adequate. Overdone scrambled eggs, pathetic hash browns and doughy pancakes. All served with generic syrup and condiments.  Sausage was ok and bacon, while really greasy, was tasty. Really good sourdough bread for toast!  Decent fruit and generic yogurt.  Staff was very helpful about getting transportation to LBG.
Manager Response: Thank you laurelhollow for your review.  I am glad you enjoyed the hotel although it sounds like our breakfast was not quite up to our usual high standards; I do apologize for that and will continue to monitor our breakfast staff.  We do hope to see you again in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This hotel is awesome. Very clean, great looking. Rooms are spacious. Conveniently right off the freeway, first exit after Disneyland so great if you're going there. Staff was very friendly. Only complaint was that there was no bacon at the free breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you eafreire for your review! So glad you enjoyed the hotel!  We do alternate bacon and sausage on an every other day basis so hopefully on you next visit you will be here on a "bacon" day.  We tried serving both daily when we first opened but unfortunately there was so much waste with our guests taking both and more than they could finish, we decided to alternate.  We do hope to see you again the next time yo are in the area. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The Ayres hotel is our home away from home.  The customer service is amazing.  In addition, the rooms are spacious and extremely clean.  My children loved the complimentary cookies and sodas in the lobby provided in the evening.  The hotel is located in a safe area, where we were able to use the hotel's parking garage.  The garage provided ample parking.  Last but not least, the tubs are a nice size.
Manager Response: I am so glad cjomorris that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us!  Thank you for your review and we hope to see you the next time you are in the area! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The City of Orange was quaint.  St. John's Lutheran Church is a classic!  The Ayres Hotel was lovely.  The room was large, with plenty of room to walk around and get settled.  The bed was super comfortable.  The coffee bar was fabulous.  The bathroom didn't have a tub, which I would've liked, but the rest of the accommodations were great!  The staff were very polite and gave excellent directions on how to turn on the lights in the room.  I would stay in this hotel again in a heartbeat!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, my staff and I really enjoyed the Lutheran Women's Missionary League, you were all great to meet and help out during your conference.  I am so sorry you did not get a room with a tub, the hotel does have bathtubs as well so should you stay in the future please do not hesitate to request a room with a bathtub. Again, thank you for your review and we do hope to see you again int he future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The only thing I didn't like was the hotel taking $125 from my business account to hold for incidentals. Everything else was fine. The room was comfortable and it seemed soundproof even though I was on the first floor near the lobby.
Manager Response: Sharon Thank you for your review!  I do apologize if my front desk did not give you the option of using a personal credit card for the incidental authorization instead of taking your business credit card.  As you did not incur any incidental or extra charges the $125 hold was released back to your business card immediately upon checkout.  Take care and we do hope to see you again the next time you are in the area. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This property is clean and well tended.  I arrived late on Sunday only to discover a botched reservation, which the desk personnel handled with kindness, courtesy, and great resourcefulness.  This was the "hospitality" experience defined for me.  I loved my room - okay, so I had a view of the freeway, but I couldn't hear a thing.  I couldn't hear anyone in the room next door.  The room was comfortable without being overdone or pretentious.  The housekeeping folks did a great job keeping everything clean.  I would definitely return to this property and will seek out Ayres Hotel in the future.  My only "negative" would be that I'd prefer more variety at breakfast - meals were the same every day.  But hey, the breakfast room is clean, roomy and has lots of offerings - so this is a
Manager Response: Thank you Pamela P for your gracious review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I appreciate you mentioning how quiet your room was; the Ayres Family uses double or triple paned glass when building their hotels to ensure all guests get a good night's sleep.  I pass on your comments to each department so they know their hard work was appreciated. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We were pleasantly surprised by the nice accommodations and friendly staff!  We will definitely be back!  Large bathtub, good bathroom, very clean, Great main areas also and the attached restaurant Anapalcos was amazing as well.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Reservations were easy to make and were accurate.   Room was large and clean with lots of large towels, excellent lighting, nice big tub, good air conditioning.   The breakfast was excellent.  Very good service from staff.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was great hospitality. Everyone there is nice and super helpful even if it was a one night stay. Room very elegant and clean. Would defiantly stay here again. I would recommend it to friends and family.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you!!! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The hotel was conveniently located and it was easy to get to from the main streets.  The room was clean and nice to have coffee service and a refrigerator to keep our drinks and fruit cold.  We also appreciated having a free breakfast before heading out for the day.
Manager Response: Dear bettyd227 I am so happy to hear we satisfied your needs and expectations.  Please do think of us the next time you are travelling to Southern California! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: this hotel is the cleanest hotel we've stayed near disney.  its even nicer than the upscale california disney hotel.  comes with complimentary parking and breakfast. we'll definitely stick with the AYRES hotels from now on.
Manager Response: Thank you Rey D!  I am so glad we were able to convert you to use Ayres Hotels in the future when in the Southern California area.  Check out the Ayres Hotel website for all our locations.  Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I stayed here for the last week of my business trip and I really whish I had booked this hotel for my entire trip. I was very pleased with everything. The room was very clean and modern and spacious. The lobby was beautiful. And the concierges were friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you!!!   Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Beautiful hotel with everything you need for a family vacation.  Our room and bathroom are so clean and large. Parking is free and spacious. Breakfast is good and free as well.  We feel safe in three nights there.  There are computers with a printer in the business room that I used to print out the tickets for SeaWorld.  Great place to stay, so for sure we will come back next time for our family vacation since the kids love it.  This hotel also has discount for AAA member which is a plus.
Manager Response: Thank you Katrina from Sacto!! I lover your review and thank you for taking the time to let us know how we are doing!  We do hope you will put us on your vacation stop list when travelling to Southern California.  Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Ayres in Orange CA is a small but very comfortable place to stay with large, well appointed rooms including a small refrigerator and a microwave. Buffet breakfast was included in the rate. Romans are clean and the bed was comfortable. The staff was friendly. The only minor drawback, if any is its location near the fire station which may affect light sleepers if they are called into action at night.
Manager Response: Thank you Bob for taking your time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange.  We appreciate your feedback and am glad you found the hotel to be a comfortable place to stay! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The staff is super friendly. The layout of the hotel is very simple with easy access to the pool and amenities. The rooms are clean and opulent. Close and personal feel when you are greeted. It's a ten minute cab ride to Disneyland. Great value!
Manager Response: Dear David, Thank you for your kind review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am so happy you found us to be of great value and we hope to see you again on your next visit to Disneyland. Sincerely Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Quick stay, delightful room, excellent value
Summary: We spent the night here before our daughter's Chapman University graduation. This was our first time staying at the Ayres, and we regret that we didn't spend previous visits here instead of elsewhere. The room was spacious, and kudos for having the most well-lit hotel bathroom I've been in for awhile. Commencement was early so we didn't try the breakfast. Also, many thanks to the folks at the desk for letting us have a complimentary late check-out because we didn't have time to pack up and clear out before the ceremony. Not having to rush back allowed us to meet a couple of our daughter's professors at the post-graduation reception.
Manager Response: Thank you Chapman parents for your great review of the hotel!!  I am happy to hear my staff extended your check-out so you could enjoy your daughter's special day.  Thehotel wishes her a successful future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This hotel is in a great location with easy freeway access. The hotel was clean and quiet. The staff was friendly and very helpful! I forgot a purse in the room and did not realize this until 11 hours later. I called the hotel; they had my purse and when I went to get it (I was still in the area) everything was in the purse including gift and credit cards! Nice to know the staff here is honest too! I will definitely stay here again when visiting Anaheim.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Best place in Orange to stay! By Disneyland!
Summary: Great location, right off the 5. Very clean rooms and excellent staff. Simple breakfast included. About 10 minutes to Disneyland. 2 blocks away from The Outlets at Orange which has many restaurants, a movie theater, shopping and a skateboard park.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed at the Ayres to visit my daughter who is associated with UCI Medical Center which is just across the street.  I chose it because it is within walking distance of her apartment.  I am not giving the hotel five stars for absolute luxury, but it was a perfect place.  It's new, clean, pleasant, well-appointed, quiet, well-lit, comfortable everything works, and the breakfast is included.  I was exactly what I would expect from a hotel where I would happily stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Love Love Love this hotel.  My son goes to university in the area and we would never stay anywhere else.  Staff is fabulous.  The rooms are spacious always spotless.  Location is great for all the  attractions in the area
Manager Response: Thank you 44beth!We are so glad you appreciate the cleanliness of the hotel and convenient location to your son's school and to the other local attractions! Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Planned this vacation w/ my family for a long time and picked Ayres hotel in Orange as our home away from home for a few days while enjoying Disneyland. Outstanding customer service, friendly staff, clean Hugh room with modern furnishing/decor, luxurious soft bed, and a big tub. The free breakfast, wifi, and parking were a bonus. Location is perfect within walking distance from an outlet mall, restaurants, and Starbuck. This hotel is 5 stars!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your 5 Star rating of the hotel!  We are so pleased that we exceeded your expectations and hope to see you and your family on your next visit to Disneyland. Sincerely, Christine Smith

Summary: I loved my stay at Ayres hotel Orange. The room was very clean and fresh. The decor/furnishings were very nice, new and modern with a classic feel. It seemed there was a lot of thought and attention to detail in the rooms with nice countertops, faucets, crown molding, etc. I loved that the room very was large with a pullout sofa. The hotel and lobby are very nice and well kept. I was very happy with this hotel.  The breakfast buffet wasn't the best, but better than the standard buffets at other hotels, in my opinion. I enjoyed the large attractive eating area with real plates and silverware. For the price compared to other hotels in the area, I have to say this is the best value and still feels luxurious.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you for your great review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!!  We couldn't agree with you more! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: It is easy to see why this is number 1, upon check in which was late. The 2 staff members at the front counter were extremely nice and welcoming. The room we had was fantastic and modern, clean and spacious.  All the staff in the hotel always had a smile and greated us as we passed them.  A big surprise was the complimentary drinks in the afternoon in the lobby, was nice to sit down and have a glass of wine and relax!  Definitely will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you hakubachef, I am happy to hear you enjoyed the hotel and especially enjoyed our complimentary Happy Hour (Mon-Thursday).  Along with the Happy Hour, complimentary full breakfast, free parking and wifi; we hope all our guests appreciate the price value for choosing to stay at the Ayres Hotel Orange.  Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We recently traveled to Orange  On business and I give this hotel 5 stars ! The hotel is beautiful , the staff is friendly and helpful. The room was well designed, very clean and quiet. We both felt we had " the best" hotel nights sleep ever .  They also have a full breakfast for 0630-10am and in the evening wine and beer are served complimentary  . Location is right in Platinum triangle with easy access to all major freeways .
Manager Response: Thank you Rosie for your great review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  We do hope to see you on your next visit to our area. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I like this hotel.  Clean, well-kept.  Rooms nice and clean.  No charge for parking, and the breakfast both add a good value at this hotel.  Centrally located to many activities in the Orange area. Our only complaint was that the shower was very slow to get hot water and this caused a huge waste of water.
Manager Response: Mikeyk916 Thank you for the great review and letting us know about the shower problem.  I will try to figure out what room you stayed in and have maintenance check the water pressure; I appreciate the "heads up."   Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The hotel is conveniently located directly off of the freeway. It is located in a nice area, safe to walk around and many shops and restaurants close by.  I was very impressed with the upkeep and maintenance of the facility. The hotel was very clean, the rooms are spacious and modern with really comfy beds. The staff had great customer service and the hotel offers a wonderful breakfast every morning. Would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you susandiaz10 for recommending our hotel to potential future guests!  I appreciate the time you took to review us and will make sure staff sees your review along with all the other reviews we receive.  Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The hotel is conveniently located near Disney the price is very reasonable. We rented a car and the drive to Disney took 5 minutes. The staff was welcoming and pleasant. The rooms were as advertised, roomy and clean. I would stay here again in the future. Parking also was easy. With early morning traffic takes at least an hour to get to LAX.
Manager Response: Dear Allison, Thank you for your kind review!  I am happy to hear that our convenient location met your travel needs and that my staff provided you the service you expected and deserved.  We do hope to see you again inthe future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My stay at the Ayre Was so if I  hadn't forgotten my Aniversary rob!  We called looking for the Robe however although we were told we're to received a call back we didn't  and information about my special Robe
Manager Response: Dear FrancOmar07,   I am sorry you did not receive an immediate call back but we did call you 2 days later.  When we search for a lost and found item such as a robe or clothes, we check first in lost and found, check with the maid, and then check the laundry to see if the item comes down the chute mixed up with the room linen.  This takes time and we want to make sure we have checked everywhere prior to calling a guest back.  Please accept my apology for my staff not calling immediately to explain it would take a day or two to thoroughly search for your lost item. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Rooms are very clean and quiet. The hotel is close to all kind of shops within walking distance. The staff were very kind and helpful. They let us stay for lte checkout and helped us get a shuttle for transportation.
Manager Response: Thank you 396mohamad for your great review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  We appreciate your kind words and hope to see you in the near future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I keep coming back as it is really an inviting place to be. Even booked me in early so I could relax and refresh before going to an afternoon meeting today. Always smells fresh and the rooms are really clean as well as spacious. And the evening wine tasting is a special treat!
Manager Response: Thank you flu-cham for your review, and we enjoy having you as a repeat guest!  And thank you for acknowledging my Housekeeping staff, they work hard at keeping the hotel clean and fresh.  We look forward to your next visit! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I love Ayres Hotels, the rooms are clean, the beds are very comfortable, and the complementary breakfast is fresh and very  good. We stayed here a couple times so far. First was after Monster Jam, and more recently for my son's birthday trip to Disneyland. Both times have been great. I highly recomend this hotel in particular if you are going to Angel Stadium (down the street) or Disneyland. Specially families going to Disneyland. u can save on breakfast here (dont forget to tip the cooks!) and then head out. Anytime I can stay at an Ayres, I do.
Manager Response: Dear PC, Thank you for your awesome review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  So happy you were able to spend your son's birthday at Disneyland, what fun!  We will look forward to your next visit and hope to entice you to spend your son's birthday here every year. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: 3.5 star property. Friendly and attentive staff. Located along interstate highway and across from a hospital. Some traffic noise and an occasional ambulance siren. Rooms on opposite side are likely less affected. Property is in like new condition. VERY VERY clean. Guest rooms are superior with nice furnishings, comfortable bed and above average linens. Free breakfast was slightly above average. Coffee was good. Overall a great value. Highly recommend !!!
Manager Response: cjeffress Thank you, thank you, thank you!  So happy your found "great value" in your stay!  and thank you for your recommendation to our potential future guests. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The only thing I would change is the way the room is set up- the bed is right next to the floor A/C unit and blows directly onto the bed.  We had to pull the curtains closed- which we had to clip with a paper clip clamp we had and put the chair in front of the A/C to hold the curtains in front of it and block the air flow to the bed. They really should flip flop the furniture. Other than that- 2nd time staying here- clean, new feel and very spacious, including the stall shower/ bathroom.  Plenty of room for your toiletries too.  Mw and refrig. in room.  The bed was just a little soft for us, but not terrible.  Breakfast and happy hour included which we did not use. No extra charge for parking. Last minute booking gave us a good rate.
Manager Response: Thank you IlovetheCaribbeannow I also wish we could flip flop the furniture in some of our rooms but unfortunately due to the room layout we can not.  We would however move furniture in a room for a specific stay should our guests request us to do so.  If you would like to stay with us again, please contact me directly and we would be happy to flip the furniture around to make you as comfortable as possible.  And thank you for your overall "great" review. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Our two-queen room was quite large and included a partition between the beds that added privacy. The hotel is very nicely furnished. The staff were helpful and courteous. The buffet breakfast included excellent pancakes, as well as scrambled eggs and sausages or bacon and hash browns. Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank yourj968 Thank you for taking your time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I and my staff appreciate your comments and am happy to hear you found the hotel to be a great value. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Ayres Orange Hotel: "Clean" and exceptional services
Summary: Hotel was in exceptional condition. Great services and very clean hotel. Free breakfast, wifi, and parking was awesome compared to other hotels. I mean who charges wifi these days? Breakfast was great! I will stay at Ayres again when visiting Disneyland again.
Manager Response: Dear hkchoi79, Thank you for your kind remarks!  With great reviews such as yours, we hope to continue offering complimentary breakfast, wifi and parking for our future guests as well.  We will see you on your next visit to Disneyland!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This hotel was very clean. The staff was very professional. The breakfast buffet by far is the best I've had in a hotel. The housekeeping staff also does a wonderfull job maintaining the rooms. Overall I would recommend anyone to stay here.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was perfect for our stay. It's clean, quiet, the staff is very professional and friendly. It's a great value when compared to other hotels in the area. We have stayed at other hotels nearby and very much prefer this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great hotel!  Clean, spacious rooms and no charge for parking. Great location near Outlets at Orange and within walking distance to Angel Stadium.  We frequently attend Angels games and prefer this hotel over Embassy Suites at Orange.  A much better value for the $.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I checked into the Ayres expecting to spend one night.  It was clean, and the rooms are a really good size.  Free wi-fi, free breakfast (decent), business center. Gary and Christopher and the rest of the front desk staff were very nice and accommodating.  Since my business was in Santa Ana at the courthouse, I requested a late check-out.  They checked the bookings and were able to offer me 2pm (which is generous compared to other hotels).  I didn't return till 5, exhausted, and I needed to stay the second night.  Fortunately they were able to accommodate me.  It was comfortable, and I would happily stay there again.  My only other comment is that they don't have room service or an in-house restaurant (other than the buffet breakfast).  But there are places to eat nearby, and
Manager Response: Thank you Karen for you great review.  I will definitely thank Christopher and Gary for helping you out and we do hope to see you again in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Very nice hotel; beautiful, clean, well-equipped rooms; good hotel location, excellent free continental breakfast every day; excellent rates.  If you are a Chapman University parent, it is the place to stay, and be sure to ask for the Chapman room discount rate.
Manager Response: Thank you Gary! Yes the Hotel is always happy to extend the Chapman Parent rate and we encourage Chapman parents to request the rate.  For non-Chapman parents we also extend all manner of rates including specific company rates, AARP, and AAA.  The hotel will however request proof that a guest is entitled to a special rate.  When booking directly with the hotel be sure and let us know what brings you to our area and we will find the bet rate possible for you. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The most personal, patient and outstanding staff I've ever experienced at a hotel. Made a stressful trip much more manageable. Can't thank the staff enough. ... And that restaurant at the adjoining hotel? Might be the best fish tacos and quesadillas I've ever had!
Manager Response: Thank you JB-SantaFe And thank you for mentioning Anepalco's, the restaurant in our sister hotel next door, the ALO Hotel.  Anepalco's serves unbelievably great food, so be sure and try it if staying at either Ayres Hotel or if you are just in the area. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: It was ok,  although when I first reserved 3 rooms for our daughters college graduation I was told that every room (even those with 2 queens) had pull out sofas. We had several family members coming for this. When I called to confirm 3 days before I was told only the King rooms had a pull out sofa. So in that case we had to book another room.  We were disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear Scott, I am so sorry that there was a miss-communication regarding our rooms with 2 queen beds having a sofa sleeper.  I checked and found that you did book direct with the hotel and that one of my managers took your reservations.  I will speak with him as he knows the hotel but evidently he did not clearly answer your question causing the error on our part.  Please accept my apologies and if you plan to be in our area int he future please contact me directly for a discounted rate to help make amends.  Again , my apologies. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Like the best bed and breakfast!
Summary: Fabulous room with amenities and the best breakfast I have ever had as part of a stay. The staff are friendly and extremely helpful and went the extra mile to share restaurant information, order taxi service and help us with our luggage.
Manager Response: Thank you leeannsky for taking your time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange.  We appreciate your comments and am happy to know you were so pleased with your stay.  We hope to see you again in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: There was a wonderful fireplace in the lobby.  The front desk brought a chair over for me to sit right in front of it.
Summary: The room was large.  Bed was comfortable.  There were always enough towels and washcloths in the bathroom.  Very clean. The staff was friendly and very nice.  The lobby had a big fireplace.  It provided warmth on cool days and evenings.  The lobby was a nice place to sit and read or relax.  The bedroom was large and comfortable.  A very nice place to stay.  I enjoyed it.
Manager Response: Marlene Thank you for your review, I think you must be the guest who I helped pull a chair over to the fireplace for you to get closer to the warmth and ambience of the fireplace.  I am pleased to hear your enjoyed your stay and we do hope to see you in the future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We were looking for a clean and comfortable hotel for a one night stay when visiting Disneyland and we found the Ayres to be perfect for our needs. The rooms are large and clean with great bathrooms - the shower was huge. We found the beds to be very comfortable.  Check in was quick, not the friendliest but we arrived later in the evening (around 9.30pm) so just wanted to get to our rooms as quickly as possible. It was great to utilise the business centre to print tickets and breakfast was nice too.  Only issue we experienced was that we were woken by people above us banging, playing loud music and literally screaming to songs at 1.30am. We called reception and this was dealt with extremely quickly which we were very grateful for. After this we had a great nights sleep.  If I
Manager Response: Thank you pixi-klf12, I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay overall!  I am also glad to hear that my staff acted promptly in quieting down the room above you so you could get a good night's sleep.  Often times guests do not call down to the desk to alert us to noise problems, thereby not giving us the opportunity to take care of the problem quickly.  So again, thank you for allowing us to help!  WE do hope to see you again in the future!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We were in Orange for Chapman graduation. The hotel was a great location. Very clean, well appointed room. Breakfast was more than expected. Front desk was helpful  and always pleasant. One of the cleanest hotels I have been in.
Manager Response: Thank you very much Christine, I appreciate you noting the cleanliness of the hotel and will let my Housekeeping staff know their hard work is appreciated by our guests! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: A good place to stay when in Orange
Summary: Large room with comfortable bed; no discernible road noise despite being close to the freeway. Free wifi which extended to the end of my late check out which I appreciate. My only gripe is that there are no glasses or coffee cups, just disposable cups. A very small point to be fair and something I find in many US hotels.
Manager Response: CoffeeAddict, Thank you for your review and I do hope you found Starbucks around the corner.  I appreciate your comment regarding the hotel not having real cups and glasses in the rooms.  This was a decision by our Corporate office with the support of Ayres General Managers based on wanting to supply guaranteed clean cups and glasses in our rooms.  should you stay with us again, please request ceramic cups and the hotel will be happy to supply them in your room.   Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great location for a Chapman University visit
Summary: I always stay here when visiting my daughter at Chapman.  It is clean, rooms are very nice and you can drive to campus WITHOUT navigating the highway!  I will miss not staying here in the future, as my daughter has now graduated.
Manager Response: First, congratulations Mom on your daughter receiving her diploma; I am sure she worked hard the last four years and I wish her the best in her job search and future.  Thank you for your review and although your daughter is no longer at Chapman, we hope you you stay again should you find yourself in our area for other reasons. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great stay during a Disneyland visit
Summary: We recently went down to SoCal for a weekend at Disneyland and we wanted a nice hotel that was just far away enough from the parks to not be crawling with kids. This is not the closest Ayres to the parks but they still gave us a $20/night discount for showing our annual Disney passes. BTW, I have nothing against kids staying with their families in hotels, I just prefer a quieter place in the evening. And this place fit the bill, didn't see or hear a single little tyke the whole time we were there.  The first evening we were there my husband and I went for a soak in the hot tub and had the place entirely to ourselves. The pool looked nice too but the weather was a little too cool to make a swim sound appealing. The room itself was very comfortable, soft mattress, which I really
Manager Response: none

Summary: AYRES always has beautiful hotels, and this was no exception.  As expected, and the reason for booking with them, we had a LOVELY room.  BUT .... this hotel sits on a very, very busy street and our room FACED that street.  We got NO SLEEP from the constant traffic noise.  A MISERABLE night in a VERY NICE ROOM.
Manager Response: Terri,  Thank you for your great review, but let me apologize for the noise.  Our windows are triple pane and the rooms are very quiet; but once in awhile a guest will hear the traffic so I can appreciate your comment.  Should you wish to stay again please request a room facing the pool which are away from traffic.  Again, my apologies. Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent stay! Great location! Great staff!
Summary: We love staying at this hotel because it is very nice and we can walk to the Angels baseball games. The breakfast they provide is superb! The customer service is excellent! We got to the hotel to check in and realized we had made reservations at the wrong hotel. The staff was so helpful and told us they had a room available for us and even called the other Ayers property and cancelled the reservation for us with no charge. They went over and above the call of duty for us and we greatly appreciated that!
Manager Response: Dear bdh005 Thank you for reviewing the Ayres Hotel Orange; and highlighting our great location to Angels Stadium.  We are finding more and more guests staying with us on game days so they can avoid the stress of driving in the crazy traffic around the stadium and instead enjoy a leisurely walk, stopping for a cold one at the Golden Road Brewery and coming back for a great night's sleep on our Ayres Dream Sleeper mattresses. See you for the next game!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: There are so many positive things to say about this hotel: good location, nice staffs, free wifi. The parking space was plenty and free. The room is nice, clean and modern.  There is one negative thing: exercise room was small, it needs to have more equipments.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel for out-of-town wedding guests!
Summary: This is a  very nice hotel at reasonable rates.  The staff were welcoming, pleasant and helpful.  We especially enjoyed gathering with family each morning for a delicious complimentary breakfast at one of the large tables.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Ayres Hotel Orange for your family gathering! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This hotel is such a wonderful place to stay.  I'm always traveling to Orange County on business and by the end of the day you just want to get to your room and relax.  I'm always greeted by such wonderful staff.  Christopher is such a sweetie and provides Platinum Customer Service.  Whenever I'm in town for business, this hotel is ALWAYS my 1st choice.  The rooms are so clean, beds are comfortable and I always feel at home when I'm there.  Thanks Ayres Hotel Orange for always making my stay there perfect.
