Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I had Christopher read your review and thanked him for providing "Platinum Customer" service to you and all our guests.  I love the word "platinum", I think we will use that to describe the top tier of customer service and make that our goal for all staff members.  And please accept my thanks for making the Ayres Hotel Orange your home when in the area on business! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Great stay! We enjoyed the pool, the beds and the breakfast in mornings. Hands down we will be going back to Ayres Hotel Orange! Customer service was great. Really enjoyed the stay and beds were wonderful.
Manager Response: Thank you Sonia, so glad you enjoyed out Ayres Dream Sleeper Mattresses! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The Ayers has several really great things going for it:  -Excellent Location, it couldn't be easier to get on the freeway to Disney parking.I've stayed at dozens of the hotels near the park, if your hotel is on the harbor or katella youre likely charged a resort parking fee and you have to deal with stop and go traffic, you may think you are getting close to the park but unless you are walking distance it's going to be slower than this perfectly located hotel. Took us about 5 min to get to the Mickey and friends lot.  Free hot breakfast, plus cookies and fresh fruit in the lobby. There is also a managers reception, we missed it since it was from 5-7pm. Saves money not eating all meals in park.   Beautiful bathrooms in room with big soaking tub\shower.   Spacious room, clean and
Manager Response: Thank you Jordan for your great review of our hotel!  I was glad to hear that we met and exceeded your expectations and help make your Disney vacation memorable.  We hope to see you and your family next year! Sincerely Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Ayres Hotel Orange is a beautiful new hotel close to Disneyland.  The rooms are  spacious and beautifully appointed. The staff were very attentive.  Great hot breakfast and parking included. Will return on our next visit.
Manager Response: Sherry, Thank you, thank you, thank you for taking the time to review and give the Ayres Hotel Orange such a great review! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We were here from May 7 - 11with 2 rooms for a family of 5.  Our contact with the hotel was back in Feb of 2016 when we booked on hotels.com.  We email them through their website to request room that are high floors and across each other since we will be checking in at around 9pm at night.  Allen the ASM emailed me back within 24 hrs to let me know the rooms has been blocked for me.  What a speedy reply back from a hotel staff!  Upon our arrival Gary had checked us in but unfortunately one of the rooms tenant extended their stay.  We had booked for 2 King room, so Gary gave us the 2 Queen room next room over even though it would cost more money free of charge.  I understand that rooms block are not guarantee so I had no problems at all.  But they did try their best to resolve
Manager Response: Thank you lilmousemouse! And thank you for introducing yourself and family to me when you were checking out.  I am so glad we met and exceeded your expectations and that we were able to help make your Disney adventure a great experience all around!  And yes we did run out of fruit one day due to the lacrosse team inhaling their breakfast and I really appreciate you understanding the situation.  It was our pleasure to  be provide you and your family with great service and we do hope to see you on your next trip to Disneyland!!  Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This is my third time stay at he Ayres Hotel Orange during my business visits to Orange County. Being away from home for 3 nights, I am always looking for a place that I can call home away from home and Ayres Hotel Orange has done that for me. The cozy rooms allow me to get a restful night each day and ready for business. I usually don't eat much for breakfast but when swing by it usually has variety and sure looks good. The evenings are my favorite time because you get the complimentary wine, beer and other beverages as well as the delicious cookies, oh and I love the juicy oranges. I am always greeted by the front desk with smiles. Check-in and Check-out always swift. The rooms are like new every time and very clean. The high ceilings make it look so large. Housekeeping does a
Manager Response: Thank you prosperd200 for your wonderful review of the Ayes Hotel Orange!  We have achieved our goal in your case, of making our guests feel at home when staying with us! I will be sure to post your review in all departments so my staff can see their hard work has been appreciated!  While a good paycheck is always a reward for a job well done, for my employees, the accolades and positive acknowledgement of their job performance means a great deal to them.  Thank you!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I stayed here last year for the Tinkerbell half marathon, and enjoyed my stay then, so I thought it would be a good choice for our family trip to Disneyland this year. The hotel is very clean, the staff is friendly, and it's a fairly quiet hotel for being close to UC Irvine Medical Center.  The parking is free, and so is wifi.  Pus, they provide complimentary breakfast (eggs, bacon/sausage, hash browns/fried potatoes, pancakes, fresh fruit, yogurt, bagels, pastries/bagels, cereals, coffee/tea, and a variety of juices).  It's only one or two exits away from Disneyland, but the hotel shuttle is a much better deal for $5/person, and, if you want to see a baseball game, Angels stadium is right down the street as well.  I'll definitely stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Pixedust7 Thank you  for your kind review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  Your review covered the highlights of the Hotel and I appreciate your time in relating them to future guests.  See you the next time you are in our area!   Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The hotel staff went above and beyond to ensure we had an excellent stay and the hotel exceeded my expectations. Very clean room, wonderful breakfast, and the complimentary beer & wine bar was a nice surprise for happy hour. I definitely give the Ayres Orange 5 stars!
Manager Response: Thank you zparker! I so appreciate when guests take the time to review our hotel.  It is wonderful for my staff to see that guests appreciate their hard work.  Thank you! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Very classy, spacious and comfortable rooms. The bathroom was large with a nice Jacuzzi Tub. The beds were so comfortable. Loved the free breakfast,WiFi and parking. The staff was very pleasant and knowledgeable.
Manager Response: Thank you are your kind comments!  I am very glad you enjoyed that Ayres Hotel Orange and appreciate your review. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Breakfast "freshness" is a hit or miss experience, depending on whether you're the early birds or the late sleepers.  Later in the morning, you'll find cold eggs and burned pancakes.  Maybe picking nits here; wouldn't keep me from staying there again.
Manager Response: Yikes, burned pancakes, not acceptable.  Even though not a normal practice by any means I will remind staff that no matter how busy, do not overcook the pancakes and keep the eggs warm!  Thank you for your feedback and I am glad you enjoyed the hotel overall. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My daughter attends Chapman and she loves to stay here.  The dream sleeper beds are the so comfortable and the rooms are spacious and quiet.  The breakfast is excellent and very fresh.  Evening cookies are a sweet treat.
Manager Response: Thank you Dale!  It is always great to hear from our Chapman University parents as we strive to be your home away from home the four years your children attend Chapman.  Don't forget, book at least 7 months in advance for your daughter's Graduation Weekend! We will see you on your next visit! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I have been staying here since it opened and it still looks new, feels new, smells new! The staff is wonderful and accomodating and the rooms are clean, comfortable and spacious. There is a fitness center, business center, pool and hot tub.  Some rooms have bathtubs and the tubs are nice big soaking tubs not the usual tubs designed for a child. I travel to Orange County frequently and this is my hotel of choice!!
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you for your great review!  I am happy that we met and exceeded your expectations!  We do hope to see you the next time you visit our area! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Spent two days there, the room was very nice and we loved it. Comfortable bed, free parking and good breakfast. The hotel had just about everything we could ever have needed.  Only problem was with ART transportation to and from Disneyland. At end of night VERY late to pick guests up from the park; up to 40 min to 1 hour wait standing at stop where the transit was meant to pick people up.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent, spacious room. Very clean. Spacious vanity and shower. Staff very helpful with local advice as to local travel and local restaurants. Will certainly stay again to visit Grandson at Chapman University.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The best outdoor setting to enjoy the great breakfast feast. Very clean, very friendly staff. Would definitely stay again. Our room was comfortable, even the roll out bed was good. Pool felt warm and we enjoyed the hot tub, too.
Manager Response: Dear Marge Thank you for reviewing the hotel, I was very happy you enjoyed our service, staff and hotel.  We do look forward to seeing you in the future!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Perfect for the cheap price. Tastefull large rooms, looks brand new, nice restaurant and close to Disneyland! Nice little warm massagepool and swimmingpool in the back. Clean and stylish enviroment. A lot of parkinglots. So worth the price!!
Manager Response: Thank you Orjan for your kind review.  I am pleased your found great value for the price you paid.  Happy travels in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We were visiting Chapman University and stayed at the Ayres Hotel for 3 nights. We love this hotel. Everything was clean, modern and new. Beds were very comfortable, the spaciousness of the room was great, even had a small divider between the beds for privacy. The breakfast food was very good, a lot of healthy choices even for the gluten free people like me! The Ayres made us fell very welcome and we will be staying here every time we visit Chapman.
Manager Response: Thank you again, I also received your personal email thanking the hotel for your great stay.    And we will look forward to seeing you the next four years of your son's education at Chapman University. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Clean and friendly would go again!! We even had a room with the Disneyland fireworks! It was perfect! The breakfast was good and fruit very fresh. We weren't able to make the reception in the evening due to our plans but we could smell the cookies as we left!
Manager Response: Thank you jdille for your review!  Next time ask the front desk to save you some cookies for when you return to the hotel later in the evening, we are happy to do so! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I had the opportunity to see my room before making a choice on my preference.  Much appreciated!  I was also given the chance to use some of the amenities, like the pool and spa which were excellent and well maintained!
Manager Response: none

Summary: King suite! Nice sheets, comfy bed! Chilled water and  Cookies in the afternoon! Nice breakfast offered until 10am. Large shower. Large amount of storage! Really clean. Quiet hotel, no doors slamming, like other hotels! Little oasis by the pool! Very helpful and friendly staff. Convent to highways, visited downtown and Santa Ana .
Manager Response: Thank you Cherylr for your comprehensive and kind review, you covered all the best points of staying at the Ayres Hotel Orange. Thank you!!! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We just needed a nice night stay and this was perfect. Great bed, quiet room , and a very good breakfast in the morning. Diagonal from uc Irvine hospital just off the I-22. The bathroom was spacious , Too bad at these rates, fresh water was not available in the room . Had to go to front desk and pay. We'll be back.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your kind review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  I am sorry we do not provide complimentary water in the rooms.  We do have water in the lobby where guests can fill up their water bottles or thermos; but I appreciate that no all guests carry those when they travel.  Again, thank you for your review and we do hope to see you in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel for business or tourist
Summary: I like every thing in the hotel, the room, the staff, the breakfast (delicious). Near to many marts. Ideal for tourist or business. Calm for rest. Beautiful and comfortable hotel. Near to Irvine and Los Angeles.
Manager Response: Dear 40Almeida, Thank you for pointing out that the Ayres Hotel Orange is perfect for both business and leisure!  We do feel we have the perfect location for both Disneyland and the guest doing business in the area. WE do hope to see you in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great stay, clean rooms, nice for families.
Summary: Our family stayed there for a week while visiting LA, really nice access to the I-5, close to Disney and if you don't mind driving an extra few minutes, a much nicer experience for the money than more "central" locations.
Manager Response: Dear Miquel. Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel!  WE appreciate the feedback and I will make sure my employees see your reviews as well as all others. Tank you! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We've stayed at several hotels in this area over the past few years, and this Ayres property tops the rest. Beautiful room, comfortable bed, nice amenities, and an excellent breakfast! Our room faced the I-5 Freeway, but there was absolutely no noise. The hotel is convenient to the Angels' Stadium, the Honda Center and even Disneyland. We definitely will stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear pjurney, I am so glad the Ayres Hotel Orange lived up to your expectations!  Thank you for the review, we appreciate all our guests who let us know how we are doing! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We really enjoyed our visit at the newer location in Orange.   Room is nice & big, like the storage & separation of the restroom and of course the large bath tub!  It is close to the freeways, The Block at Orange, Angel stadium & of course Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Wendy, Thank you, thank you, thank you!! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Highly recommend the Ayers Orange Hotel.  We have stayed here several times while visiting our son at Chapman University.  The rooms are spacious and inviting and the staff is friendly and helpful.  The location is great and within walking distance to the Orange Outlets.  Free wi-fi and parking.
Manager Response: Dear Lynn, Thank you for your review, we love our Chapman Parents!!  We hope to see you until your son graduates and then continue visiting us when you are in the area! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The staff were professional and accommodating. Our after party from the wedding fell through, so they allowed us to continue to celebrate and spend family time together in the dining area. They even baked us a large tray of cookies for the entire family! They went above and beyond to help us enjoy this special event. There rooms are clean and spacious. There breakfast is probably the best I've ever had from any hotel.
Manager Response: Dear sjgarcia216, I am so happy to hear we provided a great wedding experience for all!  It is always wonderful so be part of such happy occasions and help to make them memorable. Thank you for letting us know we accomplished our goal! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Building location was great, parking was great, service was great, staff was absolutely wonderful. a bar and lounge would be great. the breakfast in the morning was great. Staff from all shifts were friendly and professional.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you!!! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Would like to see bottle (wine,beer) openers in the room. Bottled water either complimentary or charged if opened. Plates tucked away with a couple forks and knives would be nice too. But did call front desk and they managed to send some paper ones up. Like the look and the comfort of the room, staff very friendly. Possibly some extra towels too. Always seem to run short.
Manager Response: Dear Sonia, Thank you for your feedback and your suggestions; we always appreciate hearing from our guests how we can better our service!   Sincerely, Christine Smith General manager

Summary: The hotel is very clean and the beds are quite comfortable. Our breakfast was also excellent. Fresh baked cookies every evening .... A pleasant surprise! We were very tired when we returned Saturday night, so we ordered room service. The food was excellent, and the portions are huge. The staff was polite and friendly, too. Overall great experience. We will stay with them again.
Manager Response: Dear Fox2ski, Thank you for your comments and I am happy you enjoyed your stay!  I was glad to hear you had a good experience with our contracted Room Service company as a prior guest was disappointed and I followed up with the company to make sure they were adhering to the Ayres standards.  We hope to see you again in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I love this hotel. Great location, easy parking, extremely clean (very important, and seemingly hard to find within a reasonable budget), and modestly priced given the quality of experience. I will come back for many more visits.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your review and for highlighting the quality of your experience here at the Ayres Hotel Orange!  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Although the hotel was near a major freeway, it was very quiet. The rooms were large and comfortable. I tend to dislike staying on the first floor but the hallway and room above us were completely quiet. The hotel is beautiful and the staff was extremely helpful and friendly. The breakfast was delicious and had good options.
Manager Response: Thank you Alyssai for reviewing us!!  I really appreciate when our guests take their time to let us know how we doing and I will past on your comments to my staff! With appreciation, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We booked one night at this property per one of the two recommendations of Chapman University in order to attend a retirement celebration event at the University. Walter, the associate at the front desk and the assistant general manager, Allen, we're so pleasant and accommodating. They allowed us to check in early in order to get ready for the event. They even arranged for the hotel driver, Brian, to take us to the University thereby alleviating the stress of driving in an unfamiliar area.. The room we had was very clean, quiet and very nicely appointed. Wi-fi connectivity was excellent. The complimentary breakfast was very good. Lastly, Brian was so kind to give us very good directions to get to the 405 freeway as we were apprehensive about returning via the 5 freeway. We will
Manager Response: Dear snuggle809, Thank you for your review and highlighting my great staff!  I will make sure they and the rest of my staff see your comments as we all pride ourselves in being a team and making sure we all extend great service to our guests.  Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Spacious room with well placed outlets for our electronics, fridge and microwave. Attractive bathroom with new fixtures. Modern decor and very clean. Generous hot breakfast. Great location for Disney or Convention Center.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Spacious, well appointed, clean room. Friendly, accommodating staff. Chocolate chip cookies, wine and fresh fruit. Fine breakfast. Excellent location. Very fair price. Aces all around. Will definitely stay again when in the area.
Manager Response: Dear John, Thank you, thank you! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: There was no restaurant at this hotel and the restaurant they provided Room Service through was not so good.  Other than that the stay was pleasant.  Needed help with luggage on checkout and they sent a staff member to help which we appreciated.  We would stay again.
Manager Response: George and Jean Thank you for reviewing the hotel.  I am sorry that the Room Service via an outside vendor was not good.  I will followup with them as we expect them to maintain the same high standards with our guests as the hotel does.  I am glad the htoel portion of your stay was good and we do hope to see you again in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Good hotel-clean, big rooms would stay here again. Very good to visit Chapman or even Disneyland. Can catch the shuttle next door Only negative was the breakfast-you have to go early or it is cleaned out of everything so we just went to the Starbucks close by
Manager Response: Dear Rita, I am sorry that breakfast was not replenished when you entered the dining room; we had a large student group who inhaled everything in site and it took us about 10 minutes to catch up with hot fresh food.  Next time you are with us let me know and I will ensure you receive a quality breakfast in a timely manner.  Thank you for your review! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This is a spanking new place, one of a small chain of hotels that falls somewhere between the standard big box and a Marriott.  The decor is interesting, there is a big fireplace in an equally large reception room, and a full buffet breakfast and evening wine and beer reception.  My (king) room was spotless, quiet and comfortably furnished and the bath was all marble and spacious.  The staff was attentive and capable and the place is situated next to an outlet mall, a Starbucks, and etc.  This is about as good as you are going to do in the middle of commercial America.  It is a bit tricky entering the place, so keep your eyes peeled or you will be making a significant re-entry maneuver.
Manager Response: Dear Guests, Thank you for your review, so happy you referred to us as a "spanking new place."  The Ayres Hotel Orange is almost 2 years old now so we appreciate when guests still think of us as "new."  I so glad you enjoyed your stay and will make sure your review is posted for my employees to read.  Again thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith

Summary: Really enjoyed our first stay at the hotel. The support staff was polite, responsive and very professional. I like the fact that there was plenty of parking on the premises and a number of dining options nearby. I do have one suggestion regarding breakfast and that is you should have an omelette station with fresh ingredients. A little touch like this can go a long way in engendering guest goodwill and loyalty.
Manager Response: Dear issacv2016 Thank you for your review and we do hear your suggestion about omelets.  The hotel does cook omelets when lower occupancy permits.  On those mornings when we are serving 150+ guests we just aren't able to cook omelettes as the line would be out the front door.  We have though just started doing a different variation on plain scrambled eggs each day when we are busy.  I am glad to know that you enjoyed your stay and we do hope to see you in the future. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Great service!! Staff was very courteous. Wonderful place to stay. Would definitely recommend and return. Or family and friends had a nice experience as well.  We were there for 3 days and enjoyed it .
Manager Response: Thank you 86maryloud for you kind review of the hotel! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I appreciated the free parking and wifi, and the hot breakfast was very nice too.  Pancakes, eggs, sausage and fresh fruit, and a variety of pastries, cereals, yogurts, etc.  In Anaheim you sometimes have to pay extra for all of these.  We spent the day at disneyland and went to a show at the honda center that night, very convenient  and easy drive to both places.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We travel to Anaheim often for cheer competitions and have stayed in many hotels. I felt like I was always getting nickeled and dimed to death the closer I stayed to the convention center so I decided to try staying a couple of miles away to see if I could get more for my money. AYRES hotel delivered!  This hotel is beautifully decorated, warm, inviting, offered FREE Wifi, FREE parking, FREE hot buffet breakfast, the rooms were spacious and the cleanest I have ever seen in a hotel. The only thing that did not impress me was the pool and jacuzzi as they were so small that when we saw two people in the hot tub, it looked too crowded so we passed. Aside from that, we LOVED it. The location was great and close to everything! Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you Jacie! I am pleased to hear that you tried the hotel out and loved it.  Many of our guests comment on also not wanting to be caught up in the noisy craziness of hotels closer to the Convention Center and Disneyland so we are glad to provide a more quiet restful stay.  I appreciate your comment regarding the size of the pool and wish there would have been more room to expand but overall our guests enjoy the pool and patio area.  thank you again! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Our room was large and clean with attractive modern decor. Really appreciated amenities such as power outlets on both sides of the beds, USB power outlets, microwave, mini-fridge. The bathroom looked very new, the fixtures were well designed and gleaming. Our 2-queen bed room had a partial divider between beds adding a bit of welcome privacy. Location is great for Disney and Convention Center. Breakfast was generous and tasty. Staff were pleasant. Parking was free and ample. Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Sandra, Thank you for your great review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  My staff and I pride ourselves on being the cleanest hotel in the area and work hard to maintain the Ayres Family high standards of cleanliness.  We hope to welcome you back in the near future! Sincerely, Christine Smith

Summary: I wanted to stay at the Double Tree by Hilton but they did not have rooms available so I called Ayers which is located across the street and I am glad I did. The room is clean and very spacious. I was impressed with the high ceiling. Very quiet and I am assuming its because of the thick walls I did not hear voices of people next door. Complimentary breakfast is great. Wi-Fi had great connection. The front desk is really friendly. Housekeeping kept my room super clean and organized every single. This hotel is close to the Outlet Mall so it is easy to go shopping. Tons of restaurants within walking distance or can easily get there by Uber in a few minutes. Also just a couple of miles away from Disneyland. Very beautiful and hospitable place to get away. I will be staying here
Manager Response: Dear pkdocbatse, I am so pleased you called us here at the Ayres Hotel Orange; and especially since you were enjoyed your stay with us!  I will be sure to pass on your comments to my staff and we hope to see you again when you are in the area.  Again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We travel to Orange County several times a year to visit family.  We returned to the Ayers Hotel Orange due to its' location, great atmosphere, service and quality.  Every member of the hotel staff we had contact with was friendly and helpful.  The room was well appointed and clean.  There were good choices for breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear grampafixit, Thank you for your kind review, I really appreciate you taking the time to review our hotel and am happy your pleased with our guest service.  Take care and hope to see you in the future! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Large group of band kids and chaperones.
Summary: We had a group of 50+high school band kids and chaperones that stayed at the hotel from April 7th through the 9th. Checking in was a breeze even at 1am due to the fine front desk manager and his staff pre packaging the keys with the room numbers and WiFi password along with a rooming list, we had them in their rooms by 1:30. The next morning after a good night sleep from the most comfortable hotel beds I have ever slept in we came down to the dining area to the smell of bacon! There was a wide variety to choose from from cereal to pancakes to scrambled eggs with bacon and potatoes, sliced fruit and yogurt. They even extended the time by an half hour to accommodate the late risers. After a afternoon of music competition and roaming the Outlets at Orange mall we pre arranged the
Manager Response: Thank you bzydad!!  and let me compliment you, the other chaperones and especially the band kids.  The kids were fun, mature, respectful of our other hotel guests and really seemed to enjoy the trip overall.  It is always a pleasure when we host great groups such as yours.  We look forward to seeing you again next year!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We chose Ayres Hotel Orange for all our family and friends to stay at for our son's wedding last week. I can not tell you how impressed we all were of the entire experience. Every single staff member I came across was interested in our comfort and satisfaction. The rooms were lush and extremely clean. I felt pampered. The breakfasts in the large, attractive dining area will be a fond memory for sure. Our group sat around the extra large tables chatting and enjoying each others company for hours each morning. The fresh cookies (and the wine!) were welcome surprises and lovely touches when we returned after the wedding events and long days at the Disney parks. I am thankful to have learned about the quality of the Ayres chain and will seek them out for our future travel. Thank
Manager Response: Dear anders52016 Thank you very much for your kind review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  it is always fun to host wedding groups as it is a fun and memorable occasion for all.  I will pass on your comments to all of our staff, and again, thank you! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: our stay was comfortable the breakfast hot and delicious! The only let down was the late check-in time (3:00pm)   Our family needs to have time to settle into the room and get everyone situated.  (we stayed 4 days)
Manager Response: Dear cheez2013 I am so glad you enjoyed your stay here at the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am sorry we were not able to provide you with "early check-in".  Most hotels normal policy is check-in between 3 - 4 pm.  When you have a check-out time of 12 noon, we need time to get into the rooms and clean them thoroughly prior to the next guest arrival.  Our hotel was full during your stay which makes it even more difficult as we did not have vacant rooms from the night prior that would have allowed an early check-in.  My advice to all guests is to request early check-in when you make the reservation and call the morning of arrival to see if availability will allow an early check-in.  We do the best possible to honor your request. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This was our first time staying at a Ayres Hotel. My wife & I were very impressed with the cleaniness & elegance of the Ayres Hotel. The staff was very friendly & helpful. Housekeeping was amazing, the beds & pillows were very comfortable. They have great breakfast and great service. Also, its a block away from the Block if Orange, many restaurants to choose from. I've stayed in many Hotels but this is by far one of the best of them all.
Manager Response: Dear Rafael Thank you very much for taking the time to write such a great review!  We look forward to having you back, possibly for your 1st Anniversary next year!! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My wife and I got married at the Hacienda, and the Ayres had an agreement with them that we would get a special for any friends or relatives that wished to stay.  it was spectacular.  the room was lovely and spacious and clean.  the staff was very attentive and seemed to appreciate all the fun we were having.  I love the Ayres hotels.
Manager Response: Dear jdenson Thank you very much for your kind review, the Hotel really enjoys hosting wedding groups,  it is always fun to see two families getting to know one another during happy wedding celebrations!  As in the review above, we would love to see you back here next year for your 1st Anniversary!  Good luck to you and your new wife in yourcontinuing life adventure together! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: First of all the location is perfect for the area. Just minutes from Disneyland, Knots Berry Farm, Angel Stadium  and John Wayne Airport. Not to mention the 91, 55, 22 and 57 fwy's.  The staff, breakfast, room and amenities  were awesome.     Ayres Orange is a great clean hotel for the price and the service.    It was a very relaxing, comfortable stay and meeting other guests from New Zealand and visiting  with them at the pool was just the icing on the cake.    Plenty of parking and well lit at night,  I had no worries  about my suv being parked there at all.  Of course the  24 hour surveillance is a comfort.   I would highly recommend Ayres Suites Orange to anyone that is coming to Southern California, Orange/ Riverside county area.  Keep up the great work guys and as time
Manager Response: Kendall, Thank you for taking the time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am happy to hear all was perfect for you and we do hope to see you again the next time you are in the Orange/Anaheim area.  Take care until then. Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Room very spacious, neat and tidy, Breakfast good.  If going by Orange will definitely book Ayres Hotel Orange.  Conveniently located close to the airport and Orange Outlet.  Staff very helpful.  and understanding
Manager Response: none

Summary: I love staying at the Ayres Hotel in Orange.  This is my second stay.  Both times were great.  This is a beautiful hotel but more important a safe hotel.  It's so quiet you cannot hear your neighbors come home at night or people talking in the hallway.  I will stay there again if the need arises.
Manager Response: 761colleenc Thank you so much for the review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am glad to hear you found the hotel comfortable and above all safe.  We pride ourselves on taking care of our guests and making sure all their needs are met.  Again, thank you. Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Ayres Hotels are always my first choice when booking in SoCalif locations. They are well run and provide excellent services. This location was recently opened and was enjoyable. The restaurant next door was excellent. Next time we go to Disneyland we will consider stay at this location
Manager Response: Thank you James for your great review of the hotel.  And yes, Anepalco's restaurant next door at our sister hotel the ALO by Ayres is a great restaurant!  The Owner/Chef Daniel was just named "one of the up and coming Chef's in Orange County to follow" and his food is amazing.  We do hope you bring your family on your next visit to Disneyland ! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Although it was a little bit of a further drive to Disneyland it was worth it to us to be away from the crowds. Great quiet hotel with a nice breakfast and room. Great place to stay. Room was very clean and nice. No problems at all
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff at this hotel were exemplary.  The property was well kept and clean.  The shuttle service offered was prompt and dependable.  All around great service.  Breakfast was full service with multiple selections to choose from.  I can't wait to book this family vacation again next year.
Manager Response: Thank you Yvette for taking the time to write your review; my staff and I staff appreciate you letting us know you enjoyed your stay!  We will see you next year! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This was my first trip to California. I could not have had a better experience with my hotel stay. Not only is breakfast included in the price, but it is a really great breakfast. The staff was very friendly and willing to help me with anything I needed. I would definitely recommend Ayres Hotel Orange to any friend or family member. THANK YOU for an amazing experience and I can't wait to come back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everything about this place was amazing. Very very clean and nice. Perfect comfortable beds. Great full breakfast in the morning. The staff was very nice and helpful.  Our new favorite hotel in Aneheim. The only drawback is that the front parking lot is small so you have to walk to the hotel next door to catch the shuttle to Disneyland. We will definitely be using this hotel again in the future. We were beyond happy with our experience.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is new and clean. Location is perfect, close to I5, less than 10 minutes to Disneyland and Outlet of Orange. The only down thing is that you can not completely close the window curtain. Our room window face the east, so the sun light comes into the room quite early.
Manager Response: Dear Kevin Thank you for the great review of the hotel.  I do apologize for the curtains, it sounds as if you did not see the blackout drapes behind the sheer curtains and the decorative drapes.  I will remind Housekeeping to pull out and leave the blackout drapes visible to our guests.  Again,thank you for taking your time to review the Hotel. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: In Orange as attending a conference in Anaheim. The location of this hotel was very close to Anaheim. Clean well presented hotel, Good staff, didn't try room service but the breakfast was not very good.  It was cheap though and I would stay again when next in Anaheim.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was my second stay for business and my employer has a corporate rate that makes this hotel a very good value.  Like other Ayre's hotels I have stayed at, the staff seems to be very personable and genuinely concerned with making your stay enjoyable, from the front desk to housekeeping and breakfast crew.  Room was clean, huge shower with great water pressure, new and plush towels, comfortable bed and bedding.  Wifi worked fine and breakfast is a step up from the hot breakfast at some of the larger chain hotels.  They also have a happy hour on weekday evenings.  No snacks, but there is beer and wine set out for guests.  No lines or drink tickets like some other places.  I cannot think of anything to complain about here.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your great review!  We look forward to your next visit while on business and thank your company for choosing the Ayres Hotel Orange! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Service was awesome, hotel spotless, rooms were great, breakfast was delicious and overall was the best hotel we've stayed at!! Anytime we get to go to anaheim, we'll be sure to choose this hotel. Thanks Ayres hotel for the hospitality!
Manager Response: You are so welcome!!  I will past on my comments to all staff and let them know how much I and out guests appreciate their efforts. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This was the best hotel!   Room was great, it was clean and the bed was comfortable. We thought the breakfast was yummy, and we loved the cookies and oranges in the afternoon. The shuttle could have run more often but it was very convenient.
Manager Response: none

Summary: First time staying at one of your locations and loved it. Starts with a great nights stay in a comfortable bed in a spacious room. Follow that with complimentary breakfast along with happy hour you have a great stay. Will be back when we come to visit our daughter again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I arrived before check in time and no rooms were available . The staff made sure I had a comfortable place to work until my room was available.  The room was quite  and clean .  Breakfast was well made and there was a selection of items.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great 3 nite stay for 60th b day Disney getaway !!!!!!!!
Summary: From check in to great bed/pillows, bathroom, and comfort. It was a perfect get away for my wife's 60th b day to her fave place on earth.  Disneyland. Great job to entire staff. Have stayed at other Ayre hotel before and they were both great.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Out stay was wonderful from reservation right through to checkout. We reserve through Allen Boganwright who was very friendly and professional. The staff at the front desk were always smiling and willing to help. The breakfast area was very clean with a good selection, and was better than I have found at most hotels. The room was very quiet even when we were situated across from elevator we didn't hear anything. Would definitely recommend
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our family truly enjoyed our four night stay at this nice new hotel. Everything was very clean and the staff was very friendly. The breakfast was great and saved us time and money. The only negative was the long waits for the shuttle which I know is out of their control. Will stay here again.
Manager Response: Jamie V Thank you for your kind review!  Just to let you and other future guests know, the hotel is working with ART shuttle to lessen the wait times for guests.  They have been receptive to improving their scheduling as other hotels have also voiced their dissatisfaction as well. Again, thank you! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The room above me was making so much noise I couldn't sleep or do business two nights in a row. No one answered the phone downstairs for over 15 minutes so I called the corporate office which of course was closed. I tried calling back downstairs and finally was told they were short-staffed and security had called off for the next couple of days. I was so exhausted the next morning and then noticed the signs all over the hotel that the water would be off due to a water line break. Let's not forget the nightly fireworks at Disneyland which were not as bad as the occupants upstairs. I love Ayres and make them my first choice for my stay. However, this Ayres seemed to have too much drama.
Manager Response: Felicia Thank you for writing a review of the hotel, I only wish that during your 5 day/5 night stay you would have contacted management to help you resolve the noise issue you experienced.  I would like to apologize for the night auditor not taking care of the noisy room above you, that was indeed our error;  I would like let you know that we now contract with an outside Security Company so we are covered every night.  And yes we did have to shut the water off due to a leak, but it was done between 1 am - 4 am so that our guests would not be inconvenienced.  We provided bottled water to all our rooms and did not have one complaint as everyone slept through the repair.  Should you wish to try another stay at the Ayres Orange Hotel please contact me directly and I would be happy to provide a complimentary room to show you that what you experienced was not a normal occurrence. Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I was very please with the accommodations, well organize and very helpful service personnel, clean and quiet rooms. location was great. It was close to so many attractions,. The complimentary breakfast was good experienced. The rooms were clean and well maintained. I highly recommend this hotel, and will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you!!  I appreciate our guests taking the time to write a review and we pass on all reviews to our staff to see as well! Christine Smith  General Manager

Summary: The hotel was new and decorated in very soothing colors and very clean.  The staff were pleasant, helpful and courteous.  I would liken this hotel to a cross between a Hampton and and a Hilton Garden Inn but decorated better and newer.  The Breakfast served from 6AM to late morning was a little better than a Hampton Inn - fresh eggs, pancakes, sausage or bacon etc. Fresh fruit but it appeared to be exactly the same all four mornings with only trading out bacon for sausage and hash browns for cottage potatoes. We had a special rate on a crowded weekend so for the market our rate was excellent. And they were very accommodating with small requests. They also did not charge for parking which was a major savings as some hotels in the area charge $18 or more per day for parking. The
Manager Response: DinerSniner Thank you very much for your great and comprehensive review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!  We appreciate your comments and do hope to see you again the next time you are in the Orange Anaheim area.  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This was our first stay at an Ayres Hotel and was an overall excellent experience. The entire hotel was very clean and well decorated. The lobby was large with comfortable seating. The front desk staff was friendly and accommodating to all our needs. We stayed in a king studio suite which was clean, comfortable and spacious. The room had plenty of room for luggage, closet and was well equipped with refrigerator, microwave, iron, hair dryer. The bathroom was spacious with a large shower and plenty of hot water. I was impressed that they were also eco-friendly with solar and multiple charging stations for electric cars. They include a large daily buffet style breakfast with made to order omelettes. Highly recommend Ayres and plan on staying there again in the future.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is well decorated in a style which is clean and simple rather than ornate, which I like. The lobby has comfortable seating in which to enjoy the complimentary reception at 5 PM. The queen double suite is roomy and comfortable with better than average bed and bath linens. Coffee, fridge, and microwave are all convenient. The breakfast selection has hot and cold items and the only negative thing I can say here is the orange juice served tastes like a powdered mix. It is terrible. This is California, and bad orange juice?
Manager Response: Dear Jerry H Yikes, I am so sorry that the orange juice did not taste like good old Florida or California OJ.  We serve juice from a concentrate and it sounds like the concentrate was running low and you getting mostly water, I am so sorry and will remind my staff to check more often during breakfast.  I do thank you for your review and am glad to know you enjoyed your stay and the hotel.  We hope to see you on your next visit to the area and I promise the juice will be back to normal!! Christine Smith  General Manager

Summary: We stayed a few days mid-week. From the cheerful front desk clerk to the nice lady working the breakfast buffet, everyone was professional ,  courteous,  and good at their job.  The room was spacious,  clean, and quiet. We enjoyed our stay and heartily recommend the Ayres to anyone visiting north Orange County.
Manager Response: Thank you "Brewery Owner."  Let me tell our guests about your business, the Anaheim Brewery located at 336 S. Anaheim Blvd in Anaheim; just down the street from the Ayres Hotel Orange.  The hotel enjoys recommending all the quality businesses in our area that we know our guests will enjoy; you have been added to our concierge list!  And again thank you for choosing to stay at the Ayres Hotel Orange. Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This hotel was recommended by a colleague in the area and we have a corporate discount.  It was a great stay, super clean and quite.  I did not stay for breakfast but the staff was super helpful and nice.
Manager Response: Thank you JT for your kind review of the Ayres Hotel Orange; we always appreciate feedback from our guests!  We hope to see you on your next trip to the area and hope you will have time to enjoy our breakfast buffet as well.  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Wonderful family stay at brand new hotel near Disneyland
Summary: Our family of 4 spent 3 nights at the wonderful Ayres Orange, at the end of our 12 day road trip from San Francisco.  The hotel is 10-15 minutes from Disneyland parking lot, around the corner from a Best Buy and another 10 minutes from Outlets at Orange and other shopping stores.  We really enjoyed our stay and was the best hotel we had during our trip.  The staff was very friendly and eager to help and please.  Most were bilingual (Spanish and English).  I had some packages delivered to the hotel prior and they had them waiting for us at our arrival. Check-in was quick.  Our room with 2 queen beds at the top floor was new, ample and very clean.  Beds and pillows were very comfortable (my wife has back problems and she had the best sleep in all our trip).  The room included free
Manager Response: Carlos, thank you very much for your review!   I really appreciate the time you spent covering all areas of the hotel and my staff; you should be a professional review writer!!  I remember your family and saw how much you all enjoyed the hotel and am glad we provided a perfect ending to your vacation.  Again, thank you and we do hope to see you on your next visit to southern California.  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Very pleasant stay! Breakfast was great... Room was nice, fresh & clean. Very close to the shopping center! Excellent workers very welcoming & friendly. Enjoyed the oranges & cookies what a nice treat!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review and so glad you enjoyed our "oranges" from the Ayres Hotel "Orange".  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: My friend and I needed a place to stay nearby downtown Disney. We found this gem roughly about 4 or so miles from our destination. This hotel had a wonderful staff and the rooms were incredible! I would definitely recommend this hotel to others.
Manager Response: Karinad15 I really appreciate you taking to time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am so glad you found us and we do hope to see you on your next trip to Disneyland.  Thank you!  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Beautiful hotel, very nice, clean rooms. Excellent breakfast included. Would definitely stay here again. Plenty of free parking, nice pool and whirlpool, convenient location. Very helpful, friendly staff.
Manager Response: Pam A Thank you, thank you, thank you for your nice review of the Ayres Hotel Orange!!  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: This hotel is one of my favorite places to stay when visiting Disneyland, which is around five to ten minutes away up the 5 North. The staff in the lobby is extremely pleasant, and the rooms are clean and spacious -- especially if you get a room with on King Sized bed and a couch. They also let us park our two cars their, which was great. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Christian S Thank you very much for recommending the Ayres Hotel Orange to potential future guests; we appreciate the kind review and will look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Disneyland!!  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great stay close to Angels Stadium
Summary: Hotel was very clean and nicely furnished. They had a nice breakfast buffet and the staff was very friendly.  The provided a complimentary ride for us down to Angels Stadium and it was so close by that we ended up walking back to our hotel after the event.  There were good sidewalks for walking the entire way.  Great stay and would recommend to others.
Manager Response: Thank you Patti for reviewing the Ayres Hotel Orange!  The hotel was happy to be able to give you a ride to the Angels Stadium as it was a slow evening and we had a driver available.  I would like to advise future guests that the Hotel is not always able to provide this service and when baseball games are being played we do not provide rides due to heavy traffic.  Our guests have found It is quicker to walk to the Stadium than to fight the heavy traffic in a vehicle.  The Golden Road Brewery and Brewpub just opened across the street from the Stadium so we suggest our guests walk there pre-game to enjoy their  wide selection of beers; have a great time at the game and safely walk back to the Hotel.  Again, thank you Patti!  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The best thing that happened was when I was looking for a place to eat and the clerk not only helped me find a great restaurant but also helped me find something that would not trigger any of my numerous allergies.  She was great!
Manager Response: Dear Susan, Thank you so much for taking the time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange; I always appreciate our guest's comments and love to share them with staff.  I am happy we met your expectation of great service and hope to see you again in the future!  Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great stay at a clean and spacious hotel
Summary: Stayed 5 nights in the King studio suite on the 3rd floor with my 2 girls (6 & 4). There were lots of convenient shelves near the sink for both the bathroom and mini frig area.  I typically don't like to put my stuff in the drawers in case I forget to check them when I leave so I liked the spacious shelves where I could throw in my backpack and essentials.    Love the free parking around the hotel.  Wasn't difficult to find spots (was there in february).  Love the free wifi and free breakfast which consisted of pancakes, eggs, sausage, hashbrown, cereals, breads/muffins, and fresh fruit.    We were right next to the freeway exit.  I didn't mind the noise much since I liked the convenience of being able to get to the freeway quickly.    Only issue that I had was on the 2nd day as
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was clean, well-kept and very nice.  The bathroom doors were positioned too close to the sink so that when closing/opening the door, it would hit someone standing at the sink.  The breakfast was top notch - tasty, area was clean and alot of variety - very impressive and well done.  We were unable to get connecting rooms at check-in - was disappointing since the hotel caters to Disneyland/Getawaytoday clients that often travel in large family groups.  The shuttle service was an absolutely AWFUL experience. We waited close to 50 minutes at Disneyland for a shuttle back to the hotel.  This was not at the end of the night when everyone was going home, it was around 9:00 - 9:30.  We waited at #14 at Disneyland and watched other buses come twice in the time it took to our
Manager Response: Thank you C466WQandrea for your review of the Hotel.  I am very sorry that the ART shuttle was not working as well as it normally does during your stay.  We have contacted ART (they service all the hotels near Disneyland on different routes) and expressed our dissatisfaction with their service the week of your stay.  They asked us to pass on their apologies and acknowledged that due to internal problems they did not provide their normal reliable service.  I am glad yo found the rooms to meet your needs as a family and we are always pleased to be able to provide a complimentary breakfast, wifi and parking. Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I stayed for almost two months!!! The best place ever. Staff are very nice, friendly and helpful. My first contact was Kareen over the phone and when I arrived!! Such a sweet personality. Over the time I talked to Daisy and Reanna they stole my heart. They also worked front desk. What makes this Hotel different from the rest is that you get delicious breakfast every morning that includes Pancakes fresly prepared by Juana who became also one of my favorite persons in the Hotel. My other favorite part is that you get Free drinks from Monday - Thursday!! (Wine, beer and sodas) and also fresly made cookis every afternoon. The hotel is always spotless thatnks to the hard work of the Hosekeeping crew. The pool is a very good size! Nice Jacuzzi! Excercice room. Free parking and WiFi.
Manager Response: Thank you Veronica for your great review!  I am glad we were able to be your second home for the 2 months you stayed and all my staff miss you as well.  Take care and do feel free to drop by and say hello when you are near the Hotel!! Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The hotel was beautiful and very clean.  We enjoyed our time there and will come back again when we are in the area. We loved the breakfast.  It was good not to have to leave the hotel to eat.  Shower was wonderful.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have stayed in several of the Ayres Hotels. I can say without a doubt that the Orange CA location follows the same practices of their entire chain. The service, attention to every single detail and cleanliness is beyond what is expected from any 5 star Resorts. The ample parking lot, truly fast Wi-Fi and the nice breakfast restaurant are just some of the amenities that help the Ayres stand head and shoulders above the rest.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Friendly staff. Clean rooms, Breakfast is decent and fresh. Rooms are clean and new. High ceilings. Quiet rooms. Free Wifi is fast. Free parking. Close to highway so easy to drive distances. 10 min drive to Disneyland. Next to Outlets of Orange.  In out from hotel is little tricky but manageable due to streets. Recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and will post your comments for the entire staff to see.  Again, thank you!! Christine Smith General Manager Ayres Hotel Orange

Summary: Just an amazing time! Monica was stunning in the Kitchen providing amazing food and always with a smile. Eric and Rheanna were the evening staff and went over and above to make our stay as great as it was. Just doesn't get better then this. Next time in the area, I'll be staying here!
Manager Response: Dear rdm04 Thank you for taking the time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange and for specifically naming some of our outstanding team members.  I will make sure they read the review and give them a high five as well!  Christine Smith General Manager Ayres Hotel Orange

Summary: Room/bathroom is wide, overall interior is good, everything seems brand new, clean and nice. Breakfast is also very good. So overall staying was very satisfied.  But in the evening, there seems no house keeping service, so a very simple request such as bringing a shampoo had to be done by a front desk clerk a few hours later.   In addition, since there was a room service menu in the room, we called for dinner. But it was not a hotel's one, so they answered it would take more than an hour! Of course we canceled the order.  Therefore you will be satisfied the overall facilities and stay, but might be disappointed about some services.
Manager Response: Dear Sejun P Thank your for reviewing the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I appreciate you letting me know about the how long it took to get the shampoo, I will review what happened with the desk as our policy is to take care of guest's needs ASAP.  The Hotel does use an outside company for rooms service as there is not enough demand for room service to justify the expense for handling in house.  We will however continue to monitor requests and if viable sown the road we will add room service.  Again, thank you and we hope to see you again in the future.  Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Had an excellent experience at the ayers.  Beds are comfortable, room was roomy and pleasant!  Customer service was helpful and friendly.  Breakfast buffet was delicious. Hotel is on the shuttle line for disneyland... very convenient.  We would visit again!
Manager Response: Dear Julie S Thank you very much for your great review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  Your comments validate our hard work and goal of providing excellent service. Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: The rooms were very nice and comfortable.  The shower was large and nice.  There are drinks in the lobby in the evening in a relaxed atmosphere which I enjoyed.  The breakfast buffet could have used more varied choices but the food they had was good.
Manager Response: Dear Becky S Thank you for reviewing the Ayres Hotel Orange; I am so glad you enjoyed the Hotel and our Happy Hour (Mon-Thurs); it is definitely popular with our guests!  We hope to see you again on a future trip to our area. Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Wow!  Where do I begin?  I was prescribed radiation treatments every weekday for 6 weeks and chemo for 2 of those weeks at the UCI Medical Center.  Because my husband and I live in the Palm Springs area, we needed to find accommodations near the Med. Center.  While researching a place to stay, the Manager of the Ayres Hotel, Christine Smith, showed us a variety of rooms and offered us their special rate for UCI patients.  During our 6 week stay, the entire staff could not have been friendlier nor more helpful.  I asked if I could bring a spray attachment for the shower and the Manager saw that we were provided the attachment.  When my husband was not available to take me the few blocks to the Center, I was provided transportation in the hotel shuttle.  On one day, after my
Manager Response: Thank you Ella for your wonderful review.  It was my and my staff's pleasure to help support you during your treatments at UCI.  We are grateful to the Ayres Family to allow us to provide special rates for our UCI patients and to do whatever is necessary to make our guests feel at home.  You and your wonderful husband will always be part of the Ayres Hotel Orange Family and we look forward to seeing you in the near future for pleasure this time.    Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: If you stay at this hotel as a base for Disneyland you won't be disappointed. Ayres includes parking, wifi and breakfast - which those 3 items along may cost you an extra  $100 per night in fees at 99% of the other hotels around Disney. I did my research and found that the price for the room was not only cheaper - but not paying all of those extra fees really saved a lot of money. I gave 4 stars because we stayed here 5 days and only had our room cleaned on 2 of those days. My wife and I were not pleased with that after a long day at Disney.   Other than that, the staff was friendly and the breakfast was good - lots of fresh fruit and beverage choices.   I would have given them 5 stars if our room had been attended to appropriately. The maid knocked on our door one night as late
Manager Response: Dear shark1977 Thank you for your review and pointing out our amenities!  We pride ourselves as being the perfect Hotel for a Disney visit; along with providing solitude for our corporate guests.  We hope to see you again in the future!!  Sincerely, Christine Smith

Summary: I spent many hours on TripAdvisor looking for a nice hotel for my family at a decent price. I am very conscious about cleanliness and this hotel did not disappoint!! Very clean, nice decor and comfortable beds! Staff was friendly, breakfast was good (and free!). We enjoyed the cookies every night too. ART stopped at the hotel next door and it took 15-20 minutes to get to Disneyland. Will stay again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was in a great location and conveniently located next to lots of shops and restaurants you could walk to. The hotel rooms were large and had great storage space. The breakfast and wine/beer happy hour were also great. The only negative was the employees customer service was less than friendly. They were short when we checked in and we had to ask about everything like parking and breakfast they just printed the tickets and gave them to us without saying anything. Overall they didn't seem to love their jobs.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Not a chain, which is awesome. They really do a great job making you feel at home. I would definitely go back. Breakfast was good and the cookies and oranges in the lobby were a nice treat. Cozy and nice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is close to shopping and residential areas; great for when you are visiting family in the area. The rooms are very spacious, the size of a suite, not just a hotel room.  Very comfortable, great beds, pillows and bedding overall.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good stay, will definitely come back.
Summary: Great hotel, staff was helpful and courteous, and I was very happy with the clean, spacious room. Only reason I might not return was the distance to the convention center. Not their fault, they did a great job!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Comfortable and clean new hotel with a limited breakfast offering
Summary: Somehow the hotels next to each other switched names: former Ayres Hotel is now called Alo Hotel and there is a new Ayres Hotel which first confused me as I keep coming back for business in the area. However, there was a nice surprise to see that the new Ayres is really an improvement: large, clean rooms, comfortable bedding, decent bathrooms, etc. The only "complaint" I have: the breakfast is clearly sub-Standard, both in presentation as well as in quality and choice. I would expect more for the price. But hey, this is a point for improvement that I would like to check when I come back again for business...
Manager Response: Dear Guest Thank you very much for taking the time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I am happy to see you enjoyed your room and the new hotel.  I am sorry that you did not feel our breakfast offered a lot of choice as our breakfast includes eggs, bacon or sausage, potatoes, pancakes, assorted juices, coffee, milk, 4 different types of cereal including granola, fresh sliced fruit as well as whole fruit (apples, oranges and bananas), yogurt, fresh baked pastries and breads.  Even though our breakfast is complimentary, we feel we offer something for everyone.  Thank you again for your comment! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable, and convenient to Disney
Summary: Our family stayed here for a week during our Disneyland trip. We received very good service from the staff, had a nice comfortable and clean room, had a wonderful breakfast every morning, and the kids loved the cookies in the evenings. It was so convenient to catch ART right next door to get to our Disney destinations.
Manager Response: Dear Brooke H Thank you very much for your kind review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  It is always great to have wonderful feedback I can pass onto my staff!  Again, thank you!  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice place though a little pricey
Summary: The breakfast was very good. Not just thrown in pan you could taste the love.  Coffee was better the second day.  The hotel is close to the outlet mall and good restaurants.  It is accessible to Angel Stadium and Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great, family friendly accommodation close to Disney and Orange Outlets. Nice buffet breakfast in the morning and large, spacious rooms. The hotel is nice and quiet yet only a stones throw from Disney land
Manager Response: Dear lusianz Thank you so much for taking your time to review the Ayres Hotel Orange; we appreciate your kind remarks and hope to see you the next time you are in our area!  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Had personal business in OC for two days and stayed in this wonderful gem.  Well appointed and friendly staff.  Very clean, modern and very comfortable.   I will make this my regular choice for future visits.
Manager Response: Thank you Carolyn for choosing the Ayres Hotel Orange, we appreciate you comments and will look forward to seeing you in the future!!  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Great staff, beautiful rooms, wonderful location and daily breakfast a plus. Definitely plan on returning at a later date. Price was comprable for the area, but amenities and staff made it seem like you got a steal of a deal!!
Manager Response: Thank you Jennifer for your caring review about the Ayres Hotel Orange!  And we will be here for you in the future!! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Excelent hotel not far from Disney
Summary: It's a boutique hotel. Friendly staff. Modern and confortable accomodations. I strongly recommend that you have a car. Missed a safe box in the room and more options in breakfast, but - don' t worry - you will like it!
Manager Response: Thank you Jose for your review!! Although we do not have safes in the room we do have safety deposit boxes available at the Front Desk.  Even without a car Disneyland is just an ART shuttle away and our location accesses several different bus lines for the area.  Coming in on Amtrak? The Hotel will gladly pick you up and take you back to the Anaheim station.  We look forward to seeing you in the future!! Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We booked this hotel for a trip to Disneyland. This is the farthest we have ever stayed from Disneyland as this hotel is miles away. We thought we would take the ART Bus Route 14 shuttle and be just fine. WRONG! One time it took more than 1 1/2 hours to return from the park. We finally starting driving and would park at the Garden walk and take the ART Shuttle from there due some medical issues with walking.  The hotel is great, but if you are planning a trip to Disney, do not count on that Bus 14.  The hotel was clean and breakfast was great. The cookies in the lobby and happy hour almost made up for the negative Bus experience (not the hotel's fault). I would stay here again if it was closer to Disneyland. Beautiful hotel, great service.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review of the Ayres Hotel Orange.  I was very sorry to hear about your negative experience with the ART # 14 bus.  Let me assure you that this is not a normal occurrence as other guests have given us very positive feedback on ART's efficiency.  I will be speaking with ART directly to find out what happened during your stay as we do not want it to happen to other guests in the future.  Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We continue to enjoy our stays at the Ayres hotel.  Time after time we are pleased and thankful for the staff, accomodations and ammenities which provide us a wonderful stay, great breakfast, and attentive service.  This time was no different and provided a wonderful place for family to gather to celebrate a late Christmas together.  Definitely a place to come back to again and again!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was charged 125$ in fraudulent charges. After talking with manager Alan Boganwright its seems this is a regular thing they do. They are forcing me to make amends through my credit card company. One star for being a thieving racket!
Manager Response: David Thank you for your post, as I said when we spoke on the phone I respect your right to do a review, positive or negative about the Ayres Hotel Orange.  The $125 charge was for a smoking fee and was communicated to you when you called.  You were adamant that you did not smoke in the room and I and my Assistant Manager told you that we only charge this fee if we are certain the offense occurred.  As a compromise I told you that the Manager who inspected your room on departure and who requested the smoking fee be charged was on vacation until the Jan. 11th; and that I would be happy to interview her and investigate further upon her return to verify if the smoking fee was warranted or not.  As I said to you, I will call you on Monday the 11th and let you know whether the charge will stand or not.   Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: We wanted a hotel for 3 nights to complete our month long visit to USA and Canada. We were wanting to go to theme parks, Ice Hockey and do a big discount/outlet shop. This hotel offered proximity and ease of access to all. The room (238) although facing out to a busy multi lane road/intersection was fantastic for what we wanted. The windows were double glazed and had 3 layers of curtains so we were unaffected by any traffic. The room had 2 queen sized beds but we were afforded some privacy as there was a pony wall separating the beds, the room was quite spacious and well layed out in that there was a microwave, coffee machine and small fridge in the one area and the bathroom was essentially two distinct zones, the first being mirrored sink area with a seperate room with the
Manager Response: none

Summary: An extremely comfortable stay at a beautiful boutique hotel! I would've given it a 5, but we had one hiccup that should have never happened.     Our visit started the day after Christmas, so I was expecting a crowd, but being a few miles from Disneyland, it was not crowded at all. The check in process was smooth and easy, and we got a cute little bag of cookies. The staff was very friendly through our entire stay. The room was very clean and beds were extremely comfortable! We had breakfast 3 of our 4 mornings, and the 1st day was restaurant quality with pancakes, bacon, eggs, hash browns, bread/bagels/pastries, fresh whole fruit and sliced melon platter, and beverages. The 2nd day sausage was substituted for the bacon and roasted potatoes in instead of hash browns. The 3rd day
Manager Response: none

Summary: The mattress probably needs replacing, which I informed the hotel about.  The mattress didn't hug me like most Ayres mattresses.  The mattress also had a slight lean, I felt like i was laying on a hill.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was one of my most memorable business meetings I've planned.   The hotel was amazing, the staff superb and Rose (Sales and Catering Coordinator) was the best at providing last minute touches and needs.  Newer property and kept extremely clean. Front desk staff is very friendly and welcoming. Breakfast-Lunch area is spacious and one of the best  I have experienced. The sleeping rooms were fantastic, business like yet personal. Bedding very comfortable. We will definitely be back! Great job!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I loved this Hotel!  I choose this Hotel based on the reviews and I was not disappointed! My family and I were planning a Disneyland trip for my daughters birthday & after looking into a few Hotels, I decided to go with this one because of the great reviews it had & I am glad I did! We stayed for 2 nights. To start off the Hotel is beautiful! The lobby area is amazing and very welcoming, the Christmas tree was lovely!  We stayed in a King studio suite. Our room was huge, and very clean! And so comfortable! The bed was amazing and every morning we had delicious breakfast. The staff was very nice. The Hotel was nice and quiet, with very little noise from the streets. The parking was great and plenty of it. I even had a crib for my daughter!  Overall I really enjoyed this hotel,
Manager Response: none

Summary: We are Disneyland lovers and always looking fir the best  affordable place to stay. When we find out this Hotel brand new last year, we call this our second home. Friendly people, clean rooms and the breakfast its delicious.
Manager Response: Dear eligg1995,  On behalf of our entire team, I would like to extend our most heartfelt thank you for your kind compliments! I am ecstatic to see that you had such an enjoyable stay and that you consider our hotel your second home! We hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: The room was very nice and large
Summary: The bed was very comfortable and the Staff were super nice. Even as late as we checked in, they were very welcoming and immediately pointed out sodas, wine and beer and invited us to relax and enjoy our stay
Manager Response: Dear despujol,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay. Our team is constantly striving to exceed the expectations of our guests and I am delighted to read that we made you feel welcomed. Thank you again for the feedback and we look forward to serving you again.  Sincerely,  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: Brand new rooms with excellent service you will love it . We went to Disneyland it's just 3 miles and you have ART service which picks you up and drop off too. Friendly service and good breakfast. I recommend my friends and family and everyone to stay there.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Creat location, beautiful, comfortable rooms, close to Disney, can see the fireworks in the distance from a high North or West room.  Downtown Orange was nice, try Pizza at the Blaze. The area is still crowded, but tolerable.
Manager Response: Thank you guest for your great review!!   And I agree, Blaze pizza is wonderful and there are also so many other unique and good restaurants to choose from when staying at the Ayres Hotel Orange.  May I suggest you try Felix Cuban Cafe the next time you are in the area.  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Wish we could have stayed longer!
Summary: Lovely ambience, helpful and friendly staff even in fulfilling special requests.  Good breakfast.  Free and convenient parking.  Can't say anything bad....and we're very picky.  Wish we could have stayed longer.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very much the quality of the better marriot level properties I have stayed at, The rooms and bathrooms are large, comfortable, and very clean. Staff was super friendly. Nice amenities like free fruit and water in the lobby. The free parking, Wi-Fi, and breakfast buffet made this place of great value. Only downside was noise. The air-conditioners are really loud, and you get some street noise from the freeway. The location is super convenient to tons of places. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I travel quite a bit for both business and pleasure especially to Southern California.  This is by far the best hotel I have ever stayed at. Quality accomodations Excellent food Friendly and helpful staff
Manager Response: none

Summary: quiet room, nice size, bathroom was big too.  breakfast is a full spread.  oranges in lobby all day and cookies in the evening in lobby are nice additions.  plenty of room for a family of four.  usb ports are convienant
Manager Response: none

Summary: Went for my daughters birthday, and the stay was awesome!  We love all the Ayres Hotels and this one is no different.  The staff, the rooms, the breakfast, the location - all perfectly wonderful! Took the shuttle from the sister hotel in the same parking lot to Disneyland for 2 days and was so convenient and inexpensive.  Hotel is right off the freeway, but no freeway noise.  Pool area is small and not very welcoming, but clean with a spa too.  Definitely will stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is our second stay at this hotel and it was again outstanding.
